Kenè be ke mezaat wey wazà pulus te menge hadì wey menge upisyal edewayen te Megbevayà sikandan?
Wazè din ibpelavi te menge pengulu; wazè din peburi is menge sepian lavew te menge pubri, su pudu zin sikandan linimbag.
Minsan is gemhanan he menge etew edtik-ew ebpatey ke mezukilem, he wazà etew he midhilavet kandan.
Ebpekeventayan te Megbevayà is langun he ebeelan te etew.
Wazà merusirem he lugar he egkehimu he ed-elesan te menge lalung.
Kenè en kinahanglan he edtewaǥen din pa is etew he medhendiyà te etuvangan din su ed-imbistigahan din su wey zin mehukumi.
Kenè en kinahanglan he ebpenginginsà sikandin ke ereg be he ibpaawà diyà te kegkelavew zan is gemhanan he menge etew ne ed-ilisan te zuma.
Su netuenan din is menge vaal zan, id-awè din is gehem dan wey edèdeetan din sikandan minsan mezukilem.
Edsilutan din sikandan diyà te etuvangan te menge etew tenged te kelelalung dan.
Ebeelan din heini su ǥeina te mid-engked sikandan he edsunud kandin, wey wazè dan seǥipaa is menge paaǥi zin.
Edèdaaǥen dan is menge pubri, ne nezineg te Megbevayà is kebuyù dan te tavang.
Piru minsan ebpereremek wey ed-eles is Megbevayà, ne wazà ebpekekaǥi he kenà hustu is ebeelan din. Piru is tutuu, ebentayan te Megbevayà is menge etew wey is menge nasyun,
su wey zin meeǥen is kedumala te menge etew he wazà medtuu kandin he ebpekezezaat te menge etew.
“Job, maan is kenè ka ed-uvey ziyà te Megbevayà is egkaǥi te, ‘Nekesalà a, piru ed-engked ad he ebaal te salà’
etawa egkaǥi ka te, ‘Ipeteuni nu kedì is salè ku. Emun nekesalà a ne kenè ku en ed-umanan te ebaal.’
Kenà ibeǥey te Megbevayà is hangyù nu emun kenè nu ed-engkezan is mezaat he vaal nu. Diyan te kenikew is disisyun ne kenà dini te kedì. Umbe keǥiya nu kedì ke hengkey is egkekaǥi nu.
Is menge etew he uluwanen wey ebpekesavut, he nemineg kedì,
ebpekekaǥi he is egkeǥiyen nu, Job, ne wazà mezumahi te ketau wey wazè din pulus.
Ereg ka he ebpurungan egezami su is menge lalag nu iring te menge lalag te lalung he etew.
Mid-umanan nu pa is salè nu pinaaǥi te kebpekidsukulè nu te Megbevayà. Edsudien nu wey ed-insultuwen nu is Megbevayà diyà te etuvangan dey.”
Ne mid-uman pa megkaǥi si Elihu te,
“Egkeisip nu ve he hustu is migkaǥi nu he wazè nu salà diyà te etuvangan te Megbevayà?
Piru ed-insè ka man te, ‘Hengkey is egkekuwa ku emun kenà a ebaal te salà?’
“Edtevaken ku sikew wey is menge emiǥu nu.
Lingehè ka ziyà te langit ne purungi nu ahaa ke sengemenu ketikang is menge ǥapun.
Emun nekesalè ka, ne kenà heeyan ebpekeipiktu te Megbevayà, minsan edsigudu ka ebaal te salà.
Ne emun metazeng ka, ne hengkey he keupiyaanan is igkeveǥey nu te Megbevayà?
Iyan dà egkeipiktuwan te meupiya etawa mezaat he vaal nu is iring nu he etew.
“Is menge edèdaaǥen ebuyù te tavang he libriya sikandan te kedèdaaǥa kandan te gehemanen he menge etew.
Piru wazà sikandan mebpengumew-umew te Megbevayà he midlimbag kandan wey mibeǥey kandan te zesen dutun te timpu te kelised.
Wazè dan medangep diyà te Megbevayà he midlimbag kandan he metau pa te menge langgam wey menge tagbis.
Ne emun ebpengumew-umew zan ne kenè dan edtevaken te Megbevayà su mepelevawen sikandan wey lalung he menge etew.
Uya, kenà ebpemineǥen te Mekeǥeǥehem he Megbevayà is kebuyù dan te tavang he wazè din pulus.
Ne lavew en he kenè din ebpemineǥen is kebpengumew-umew nu, Job, emun egkaǥi ka he wazè nu maahà is tavang din te kasu nu he mid-uwit nu ziyà te kandin, ne ebpeketulung ke zà ebpeketaǥad kandin.
Migkaǥi ke pa te wazà medsilut is Megbevayà minsan nepauk sikandin, wey wazè din seǥipaa is mezaat he vaal te menge etew.
Job, wazà pulus te ebpengeǥiyen nu. Utew keladu he sikew is egkagi wazè nu kedsavut mehitenged te egkeǥiyen nu.”
Mibpedayun megkaǥi si Elihu te:
“Pemineǥa a zèpa kenikew, su zuen ku pa egkeǥiyen he idlavan ku te Megbevayà.
Mahabet is netuenan ku ne ibpeehè ku kenikew he wazà mesayep is Megbevayà he midlimbag kedì.
Utew venar he wazè ku sikew terterui, su utew a metau is ed-etuvangen nu.
“Utew mekeǥeǥehem is Megbevayà, piru kenè din betasan is kedsudì te etew. Netuenan din is langun.
Wazè din ituǥut he meuyag-uyag is lalung, ne ibeǥey zin is metazeng he kukuman diyà te edèdaaǥen he menge pubri.
Wazè din bey-ani is menge metazeng. Ebeǥayan din sikandan te zengeg te wazà pidtemanan duma te menge hadì.
Iyan, emun edèdaaǥen sikandan, he iring te egkedinahan,
ibpahayag te Megbevayà is salà he nehimu zan duma te kebpelavew.
Ibpepemineg din sikandan te petizaan din, wey idsuǥù din kandan is ked-engked te kelelalung dan.
Emun ebpezumazuma zan wey ebpenilbi zan te Megbevayà, ebmeuswaǥen wey ebmelipayen dan seled te tivuuk he untung dan.
Piru emun kenè dan ebpezumazuma kandin, ebpatey zan te tebek he kurang dan te kedsavut.
Is menge etew he wazà medtuu te Megbevayà, duen pauk diyà te gehinawa zan, ne minsan edsilutan sikandan te Megbevayà, ne kenà sikandan ebpetavang kandin.
Ebpematey zan he egkepeel-elezan te vetan-en dan pa.
Piru pinaaǥi te menge elentusen, ebpenuruen te Megbevayà is menge etew. Ebpekeistudyu zan te kebpemineg kandin pinaaǥi te menge kegkerasey.
“Inlikey ka te Megbevayà te kezeetan wey wazè ke zin ipeveyveyai te zuma, ne impeuswag ke zin. Ne nepenù te metaam he keenen is lemisahan nu.
Piru ǥuntaan egkeseǥazan nu is silut he ereg te menge lalung. Kenè ka ebpekelikey te metazeng he kukuman.
Mebpekevantey ka he kenè ka meuwit te ketiǥeyunan wey zekelà he sipsip.
Ebpeketavang be te kelised nu is ketiǥeyunan nu wey is kebpekegaga nu?
Kenè nu isipa is ebpeebuten he mezukilem he iyan is timpu he egkezeetan is menge nasyun.
Andam ka he kenè ka mekevaal te kelelalung. Ibpaantus ka su para mekelikey ka te kebaal kayi.
“Isipa nu ke sengemenu is kegkemekeǥeǥehem te Megbevayà. Wazà menunudlù he ebpekeiring kandin.
Wazà ebpekepenurù kandin ke hengkey is ereg he ebeelan din, wey wazà ebpekekaǥi ziyà te kandin te, ‘Nekesalè ka’.
Kenè nu lipati is kedalig te menge vaal zin he iyan daan ebeelan te zuma emun egkanta zan.
Naahà te tivuuk he menusiyà is menge vaal te Megbevayà, minsan pa te meziyù is ked-ahaa zan duen.
Mekeǥeǥehem is Megbevayà, ne kenè tew egketegkad is kegkemeǥeǥehem din, ne kenè tew egkekaǥi ke sengemenu en is keǥurang din.
Iyan is Megbevayà mibpepemenahik te wahig puun te tanà ne ebeelan din heini he uzan.
Egkevusbus is uzan puun te menge ǥapun ne para heini te menge etew.
Wazà etew he netau ke mibmenumenu is kebpeyepata te ǥapun, wey ke egkemenumenu is kedruǥung diyà te langit he iyan ed-ubpaan te Megbevayà.
Ahaa nu ke mibmenumenu zin te ebpekilat diyà te peliǥuy zin, wey ke egkemenumenu is kegkindab kayi pehendiyà te netemanan te zaǥat.
Pinaaǥi kayi te ǥehem te Megbevayà, edumelahan din is menge nasyun wey ebeǥayan din te zekelà he egkekaan is menge etew.
Egewezan din is kilat ne edsuǥuen din te kedsinuǥat te edsinuǥaten din.
Is ruǥung tuus te ebpekeuma he vagyu, ne minsan is menge vaka egketau ke zuen bagyu he ebpekeuma.
“Ebpekehuyab is kumeng ku tenged keniyan te vagyu.
Pemineǥa niw is edraǥeb he laǥeng te Megbevayà.
Impekilat din diyà te langit taman te kineziyuan he vahin te kelibutan.
Ne egkezineg is kedraǥeb te mezaǥing he laǥeng din. Wazè din eǥena is kedraǥeb te laǥeng din.
Egkein-inuwan is edraǥeb he laǥeng te Megbevayà. Mibaal sikandin te egkein-inuwan he menge vaal he kenè tew egketegkad.
Ebmenduan din is ayis te kedtanà diyà te tanà wey is uzan te ked-uzan te mereǥes,
su para mekehimeley is menge etew te terebahu zan, ne ebpekepurung dan ebpekeisip-isip te menge vaal te Megbevayà.
Is menge langgam, ed-eles diyà te menge elesè dan ne zutun dan dà emun timpu te vagyu.
Is bagyu wey is meǥenew he keramag ne ziyà ebpuun te midteǥuan duen.
Pinaaǥi te ǥehinawa te Megbevayà nepurma is ayis, wey nehimu he ayis is meluag he wahig.
Ebpenuen din te wahig is menge ǥapun, ne ibpekilat din heini.
Ed-eneb-eneb is menge ǥapun seled te tivuuk he kelibutan sumalà te mandù te Megbevayà.
Ibpeuzan te Megbevayà te mereǥes su para zuen wahig diyà te tanà, etawa pinaaǥi te kebmansu zin te etew, etawa pinaaǥi te kebpaahaa zin te gaǥew zin.
“Pemineǥa nu heini, Job, wey ngunngunua nu is egkengein-inuwan he ebeelan te Megbevayà.
Netuenan nu ve ke ebmenmenuwen te Megbevayà te edumala is menge ǥapun, wey ke ebmenmenuwen din is kebpekindab te kilat?
Netuenan nu ve ke maan is edletewletew is menge ǥapun diyà te zivavew? Baal heini te egkein-inuwan he Megbevayà he kenà edtaman is ketau zin.
Sikew is edrimrimusengan tenged te meinit he keramag he ebpuun diyà te zivavà,
ebpekeuǥup ke ve te Megbevayà te kedempas te langit wey te kedhimuwa kayi he mezesen iring te peǥelungan he brunsi?
Emun uluwanen ka, keǥiyi key ke hengkey is ereg he egkeǥiyen dey ziyà te Megbevayà. Kenè dey egketuenan ke ebmenmenuwen te egkaǥi is ketezengan dey su nerusireman is ked-isip-isip dey.
Kenà a egkaǥi ziyà te Megbevayà he ebpekidlalis a kandin, su kela ke zèdeeti e zin.
Wazà etew he egkepurungan din egketengtengi is andew su ebpekesirang heini su utew mesiǥa he ziyà te langit emun idlayap te keramag is menge ǥapun.
Puun te zizaya, egawas is Megbevayà he ed-ilak-ilak iring te vulawan ne egkein-inuwan is kebpekesirang din.
Kenè tew egketegkad is Mekeǥeǥehem he Megbevayà he lavew te langun, ne kenè kiw ebpekeuvey ziyà te kandin. Metazeng sikandin wey kenà ebpenlupiglupig,
umbe, edtehuzen sikandin te menge etew. Ne kenè din edseǥipaan is menge etew he kunaan dan ke metau sikandan.”
Ne midtavak te Nengazen si Job he ebpuun te eribpures is laǥeng din,
“He Job, egkezuwazuwa ke ves te ketau ku? Pinaaǥi te menge lalag nu egketuusan he wazè nu netuenan.
Ne ǥuntaan, pengandam ka, ne tevaka nu is menge insè ku.
Hendei ka hein mibeelan ku is pundasyun te kelibutan? Keǥiya nu kediey ke zuen nu netuenan.
Netuenan nu ve ke hentei is mibayàbayà ke sengemenu kezekelà heini he pundasyun etawa hentei is midsukud kayi? Siguradu netuenan nu heini!
Hengkey is nekepelig-en te pundasyun te kelibutan? Wey hentei is mibpelastar kayi he pundasyun?
Dutun he timpu, nesevaha te kegkanta is menge mekevugwas wey nemen-uruhuy te kegkelipey is langun he menge velinsuǥuen.
Hentei is midsavuk te dulunà te egketemanan te zaǥat dutun te kebugwak din puun te zizalem?
Iyan a midtambun te zaǥat te menge ǥapun wey kerusirem.
Midsevukan ku te zulunà is daǥat, ne neiring heini te midsireduwan ku wey midtrengkahan.
Migkeǥiyan ku is daǥat te, ‘Taman ke zà kayi ne kenè ke en medlapey pa; kayi zà taman is dezekelà he menge vaǥel nu.’
“He Job, nekesuǥù ke en be te andew he medsilà heini,
para mekeeneb te tivuuk he kelibutan is kerayag din su wey zin ikepeengked is mezaat he ebeelan te mezukilem?
Tenged te kerayag kayi, nehimu he keladu is kelibutan he iring te marka te silyu wey linumpian te visti.
Tenged te kerayag, kenà ebpekeuyayà is menge lalung, su kenè dan ebpekepesipala te zuma.
“Nekehendiyè ke en be te menge serebseb diyà te zizalem te zaǥat etawa ziyà te kinezizeleman he vahin te zaǥat?
Ingkepeturedu en be kenikew is pultahan pehendiyà te merusirem he lugar te menge minatey?
Netuenan nu ve ke sengemenu kezekelà is kelibutan? Keǥiya nu kayi te kediey ke netuenan nu heini is langun!
Netuenan nu ve ke hendei ebpuun is kerayag wey kerusirem?
Igkepelikù nu ve sikandan diyà te ebpuunan dan?
Kunaan nu ves ke netuenan nu heini is langun! Henduen be te zaan ke en he neetew hein midlimbag ku is kelibutan. Utew ke en bes meǥurang!
“Nekehendiyè ke en be te ebpuunan te uzan he giyew?
Heini he ǥiyew idteǥana ku para te timpu te kesamuk wey timpu te tebek.
Netuenan nu ve is beyeey pehendiyà te ebpuunan te kilat etawa lugar he ebpuunan te keramag he ebpuun diyà te edsilaan?
Hentei is mibaal te veyeey te uzan wey vagyu?
Hentei is edsuǥù te uzan para med-uzan diyà te disirtu, he lugar he wazà duen ed-ubpà he etew?
Hentei is ebpeuzan te tanà he mehiǥawan para meketuvù is menge sagbet?
Hentei is ebpuunan te uzan, wey zehemug,
wey te ǥiyew he ebpuun te langit?
Nehimu he ayis is wahig ne neiring kezesen te vatu, ragkes en is divavew he vahin te zaǥat.
Igketagkes nu ve etawa egkehekazan is grupu te menge vituen he egngezanan te Penikapan wey Belatic?
Egkehimu nu ve te egiya is menge vituen te kebpaahà dutun te timpu te kebpeehè dan? Egkehimu nu iyan te egiya is menge vituen he egngezanan te Dekelà wey Deisey he menge Bir?
Netuenan nu ve is paaǥi te kegkezumelaha te kelimbaǥan diyà te kewkewangan etawa kayi te kelibutan?
Egkemendaran nu ve is menge ǥapun para med-uzan?
Igkepekilat nu ve is kilat? Edsinuǥaten din be is ibpesinuǥat nu?
Hentei is mibeǥey te etew te ketau wey kedsavut?
Hentei is metau he ebpekevilang te menge ǥapun? Hentei is ebpekevusbus te wahig puun te langit
he ebpeketivuuk te eliyavuk?
“Iyan ke ve ebpen-ahà te egkekaan te menge erimaung wey edhantey kandan
dutun te edleku sikandan diyà te elesè dan etawa sihung te zezeisey he kayu?
Hentei is edsavud te menge uwak emun egkevitil zan wey ebpesavud kedì is menge pispis dan?
“Netuenan nu ve ke keenu ed-anak is leew he menge kambing? Nekevantey ke ve te ked-anak te menge selazeng?
Ebilangen nu ve is menge vulan te keǥingayan dan taman te ked-anak dan? Netuenan nu ve ke keenu sikandan ed-anak?
Edleku zan is ebeliliten taman te ebpekaanak dan.
Emun edekelè en is anak dan diyà te sibsivayan, edhipanew heini ne kenè en edlikù.
Hentei is nengelintau wey mekeuyayà is leew he asnu?
Iyan a mibeǥey kandin te sibsivayan he egkeubpaan din; ibpeubpè ku ziyà te tanà he mibey-anan en.
Ebpekeziyù heini te meǥurub he inged ne kenà egkesuat he ebuǥawen.
Edriǥuriǥu heini ziyà te menge vuntud is ebpen-ahà te egketabtab din.
“Igkepeterebahu nu ve is baka he simadun? Kenè be heini ed-awà diyà te tudil nu emun mezukilem?
Egkehiketan nu ve heini ne igkeeradu nu ziyà te vevesukè nu?
Ebpekesarig ke ve te zesen din para egketerebahu zin is meveǥat he terebahu nu?
Ebpekesarig ke ve kayi he edtiǥumen din wey edhekuten din is neraǥun pehendiyà te gunasà?
“Utew mekempet he ed-ahaan is pakpak te ustrits emun edseripakpak, piru kenà heini ebperepeng te kekempet te pakpak te tulabung.
Ed-ewaan te ustrits is impis din diyà te tanà su para meinit heini.
Kenè din igkeipeng is kegkeǥieki etawa kegketekutaki zuen te leew he menge langgam.
Mesipala sikandin te menge pispis din he henduen be te kenà kandin. Kenà sikandin egkeipeng he kela ke mehimu he wazà pulus te midheǥuan din.
Su wazè ku sikandin beǥayi te ketau wey kedsavut.
Piru emun lumbà te kebpelelaǥuy ne và din dà ed-engiti is kudà wey is ed-untud kayi.
“Job, iyan ke ve mibeǥey te kudà te zesen? Iyan ke ve mibeǥey te keburey ziyà te lieg din?
Iyan ke ve nengelintau wey mekelingketew he iring te terapan ne wey zaan mekeherìhì te igkahandek te menge etew?
Meviserviser heini he egkahiskahis te tanà, he ebpaahà te zesen din. Ne ebpelelaǥuy pehendiyà te edtebekan.
Wazè din igkahandek ne kenè din ebpeleǥuyan is tebek.
Edleletingkik wey edsinew is menge ǥumaan te ed-untud kandin.
Ebpengelivegbeg is eliyavuk tenged te keǥaan te kebpelelaǥuy zin. Ne kenè en egkesanggen emun ibpezaǥing is budyung.
Edherìhì emun egkezineg din is daǥing te vudyung. Minsan meziyù pa heini egketuusan din is tebek, ne egkezineg din is kulehian te edtetebek wey is mandar te menge peremandar.
“Iyan ke ve nenurù te dapay te kedlayang wey kedhendiyà te zivavà?
Iyan ke ve midsuǥù te kulaǥu te kedlayang wey kebaal te salag diyà te metikang he lugar?
Diyà ed-ubpà te zempilas is kulaǥu; is metikang he menge vatu ne iyan elesè din.
Dutun sikandin ebpememantew te egkehimu he edewiyen din, ne egkeehè din haazà minsan diyè dà sikandin te meziyù.
Emun duen egkeehè din he minatey ebeyaan din heini, ne edsupsupen te menge pispis din is lengesa kayi te minatey.”
Ne migkaǥi pa is Nengazen diyà te ki Job te,
“Iyan a Megbevayà he Mekeǥeǥehem. Piru ibpeletew nu ves diyà te kebpekidlalis nu kedì he nesayep a. Ne ǥuntaan tevaka a kenikew.”
Umbe, midtavak ni Job is Nengazen te,
“Kenà a ereg he edtavak kenikew. Hengkey is idtavak ku? Ebpereremek e zà.
Mezakel en is nekaǥi ku. Kenà ad ebpedayun te kegkaǥi.”
Ne mid-uman megkaǥi is Nengazen diyà te ki Job he ebpuun diyà te eribpures is laǥeng din,
“Pengandam ka, ne tevaka nu is menge insè ku.
Iyan be ibpeletew nu he kenà a metazeng su para medletew he iyan ka metazeng?
Mekeǥeǥehem ke ve iring kedì? Edraǥeb be is laǥeng nu iring te kedì?
Emun egkehimu nu heeyan, ne ipeheehè nu is kegkemekeǥeǥehem nu, kegkelavew nu, wey zengeg nu.
Ipeehè nu is dekelà he pauk nu te menge mepelevawen pinaaǥi te kebpekevevaa nu kandan. Ne runteka nu is menge lalung diyà te edhitindeǥan dan.
<range>
Ileveng nu sikandan is langun diyà te tanà, diyà te lugar te menge minatey.
Emun egkehimu nu heeyan, iyan a mismu edalig kenikew, ne ebpeǥumbenar a he zuen nu egkehimu te kedlibri te keugelingen nu.
“Ahaa nu is langgam he hipuputamus, he linimbag ku iring kenikew. Ebpenabtab dà sikandin iring te vaka,
piru utew sikandin mezesen. Is lawa zin ne utew melig-en.
Is ikug din iring te kayu he sidru, nepenù te zesen is menge vuvun din.
Is menge tulan din ne iring kelig-en te tuvu he brunsi etawa kebilya.
Edhuna heini he egkein-inuwan kenà te zuma he menge linimbag ku, piru siak is midlimbag kayi egkezaag ku heini.
Ebpenabtab sikandin diyà te menge vuvungan dutun te eguǥusà is leew he menge langgam diyà te uvey zin.
Edleku heini ziyà te lempek te ebpenuvù he zuǥiyen, he egketembunan te menge ribpes he uvey te wahig.
Iyan egkehimu he helungè din is ebpenuvù he menge zuǥiyen wey zuma pa he ebpenuvù diyà te uvey te zal-ug.
Kenè din igkahandek is deǥurus te wahig. Melinew is kegeǥehinawa zin minsan henduen be te egketembunan en te Wahig he Jordan.
Hentei is ebpekezakep kandin pinaaǥi te kedezeeti te mata zin? Hentei is ebpeketinlang te izung din pinaaǥi te kedhingutela kandin?
“Job, egkevunuwit nu ve is dragun he Leviatan? Egkehiketan nu ve is bèbè din te pisì?
Igkepelahus nu ve is pisì diyà te izung din? Etawa egkekew-itan nu ve te vunuwit is bakè din?
Layun be sikandin edhangyù diyà te kenikew he ipaawè nu? Etawa ebpehizuhizu ve sikandin kenikew?
Ebpekid-uyun be sikandin kenikew he ebpeuripen kenikew seled te tivuuk he untung din?
Egkehimu nu ve heini he ayam iring te tagbis? Etawa igkeveǥey nu ve heini ziyà te menge anak nu he vahi he para velvelayen?
Egkepemasa ve heini te menge nigusyanti he ebevehinen dan wey zan ikevelegyà?
Ed-utengan be te serapang nu is lundis din etawa ulu zin?
Emun egkeutel nu heini ne kenè nu egkelipatan is kereǥen te kedhingutela nu kayi, ne kenè nu en heini ed-umanan ebeeli.
Wazà pulus te kedtinguhà ked-utel kandin. Su kegkaahaa nu pa kandin egkaawè en is burut nu.
Emun wazà ebpeǥaruǥaru he edsamuk kandin ne hentei man is ebpeǥaruǥaru he edsukul kedì?
Hentei man is ebpekekaǥi te nekeutang a ziyà te kandin te ereg he ebelesan ku te meupiya? Te kediey man is langun he kayi te kelibutan.
“Ed-umanan ku pa egkeǥiya ziyà te kenikew is bahin te lawa te Leviatan wey ke sengemenu is kegkemekeǥeǥehem din wey kezesen din.
Hentei is ebpekaanis te lundis din etawa igkepeutengan din heini?
Hentei is ebpekehimu he ebpeǥinganga kandin? Te mekahandekhandek man is menge ngipen din!
Is peka zin ne zuen mekepal he menge pengalang he henduen be te nekelinya he menge kelasag.
Nekedliliib heini he minsan is keramag ne kenà duen ebpekevayà, wey wazà ebpekaanis kayi.
<range>
Emun ebpemusenga ne zuen edtik-ew edsiǥa, ne is menge mata zin edsiǥa he iring te kedsilà te andew.
Ibpelepew zin is hapuy puun te vèbè din,
egawas is evel puun te izung din he henduen be te sengew te edìdì he kuzen he meregreg is tavun din.
Is gehinawa zin ebpekevaǥa te vurit, su hapuy is egawas diyà te vèbè din.
Nepenù te zesen is lieg din, ne utew egkahandek is ebpekaahà kandin.
Minsan is sapù din ne nepurung mahasek wey mezesen.
Mezesen is gehinawa zin iring te ǥelingan he vatu.
Emun ed-enew sikandin ne egkengeteranta tenged te kegkahandek is mekeǥeǥehem he menge etew.
Wazà ispada, bangkew, besut etawa kelawit he ebpekezezaat kandin.
Diyà te kandin iring dà kelemineg te reǥami is putew, ne is brunsi iring dà te repuk he kayu.
Emun ebpenaan sikandin ne kenà sikandin ebpelaǥuy. Is menge vatu he idlimpawes diyà te kandin ne henduen dà te ukap is kegezama zin kayi.
Is kayu he idlagkut kandin, henduen dà te reǥami ziyà te kandin. Ed-engitan din dà is hagyung te vangkew he ibunlawit diyà te kandin.
Is getek din, ne zuen meǥarang he menge hun-ap he henduen be te menge bildu. Umbe ednayà heini emun edula ziyà te vasak.
Edsimbeǥen din is daǥat he henduen be te egkaràkarà he wahig diyà te kuzen etawa lana he edìdì diyà te kitang.
Is wahig he egkeveyaan din eburàburà te meputì, he henduen be te meputì he vulvul is ked-ahaa zuen.
Wazà iring kandin kayi te kelibutan. Sevaha heini he linimbag he kenà egkahandek.
Ebpekevevaan din is langun he gelbuwen he menge langgam. Iyan heini hadì te langun he langgam he kenà ebpekeuram.”
Ne zutun midtavak ni Job is Nengazen te,
“Netuenan ku he egkehimu nu is minsan hengkey, ne wazà ebpekeeǥen kenikew.
Mid-insaan a kenikew ke maan is egkezuwazuwa a te ketau nu he wazè ku man netuenan. Tutuu iyan he migkaǥi ku is menge hitavù he kenè ku egketegkad.
Mibpekidlalag ka kedì ne migkaǥi ka he ebpemineǥen ku sikew wey edtevaken ku is menge insè nu.
Hein aney nezineg ku zà diyà te zuma is mehitenged kenikew, piru ǥuntaan neehè ku en sikew.
Umbe, ingkeeled ku is langun he mibpengaǥi ku mehitenged kenikew, ne idsendit ku haazà pinaaǥi te kebpinuu ku ziyà te eliyavuk wey avu.”
Hein nepasad te egkaǥi te Nengazen diyà te ki Job heini, migkeǥiyan din si Elifas he tig-Teman te, “Nepeukan ku sikew wey is dezuwa he emiǥu nu, su kenè kew iring te suluǥuen ku he si Job su wazè kew mulà megkaǥi te tutuu mehitenged kedì.
Umbe, ǥuntaan kuwa kew te pitu he tudu he vaka wey pitu he meemahan he kerehidu ne hendiyè kew te ki Job, ne ipemuhat niw heini he pemuhat he edtutungen para te keugelingen niw. Id-ampù kew ni Job ne edtevaken ku is ampù din ne kenè ku sikiyu edsilutan te silut he ereg te kedtinurebung niw. Kenè kew iring te suluǥuen ku he si Job su wazè kew mulà megkaǥi te tutuu mehitenged kedì.”
Umbe, mibeelan ni Elifaz he tig-Teman, ni Bildad he tig-Shua, wey ni Zofar he tig-Naama is insuǥù te Nengazen kandan. Ne midtavak te Nengazen is ampù ni Job.
Ne hein ingkaampù ni Job haazà is menge emiǥu zin, impeuman sikandin ipeuswag te Nengazen ne midtakep din sikan is nehuna he imbeǥey zin ki Job.
Ne zutun midhendiyà is langun he menge suled din wey is langun he menge emiǥu zin te valey zin ne migkaan dan duma kandin. Ne midlangan dan si Job tenged te langun he kemereǥenan he imbeǥey te Nengazen kandin. Ne is kada sevaha kandan, mibeǥey ziyà te kandin te selapì wey vulawan he sising.
Umbe, midtuvazan te Nengazen is huziyan he vahin te ked-ubpà ni Job te lavew pa zuen te nehuna. Mibeǥayan din sikandin te 14,000 he menge kerehidu, 6,000 he menge kemilyu, 1,000 he paris te menge vaka, wey 1,000 he vehiyan he menge asnu.
Mibeǥayan din daan sikandin te pitu pa he anak he menge maama wey tetelu pa he anak he menge vahi.
Is kinekekayan he vahi he anak din ne iyan si Jemina, ne nesekepu zin si Kezia, ne nekesunud si Keren Hapuc.
Ne wazà bahi he iring kandan kekempet dutun te inged dan. Ne in-iring ni Job is menge azen he imbeǥey zin kandan he egkepengevilin dan te egkepengevilin te menge meemahan dan.
Ne puun dutun neuyag-uyag pa si Job seled te 140 pa he tuig, ne neehè din pa is menge kevuwazan din taman te ikeepat he lapis.
Ne meǥurang en sikandin dutun te kebpatey zin.
Deyzey is etew he kenà ebpemineg te penurù te menge lalung, wey kenà ed-iring te ebeelan te menge mekesesalà, wey kenà ebpekiduma kandan he ed-undaunda te Megbevayà.
Kekenà, iyan mulà kandin he igkelipey is kedtuman te menge penurù te Nengazen, ne iyan heini ebpurungan din egngunngunua te maandew wey te mezukilem.
Iring sikandin te kayu he ziyà ipemula te veyvey te wahig ne ebpemeǥas sikandin dutun te timpu te tipemeǥas, ne kenà egkeǥangu is menge zahun din. Is etew he iring kayi, ed-uswag diyà te menge vaal zin.
Piru kenà mulà iring kayi is lalung he menge etew, kekenà, iring sikandan te ukap he idlayap te keramag su wazè dan pulus.
Umbe te andew te kedhukum, edsilutan sikandan te Megbevayà ne kenà sikandan ebpeketampu te menge metazeng.
Su egiyahan te Nengazen is menge metazeng, piru is menge ulaula te menge lalung iyan ed-uwit kandan diyà te kezeetan.
Maan is ed-isipen te menge etew is kedsukul te Nengazen? Maan is ed-isipen dan is wazè din pulus?
Is menge hadì wey is menge pengulu kayi te kelibutan, ne midtiǥum dan wey nengandam te kebpekidtebek te Nengazen wey te hadì he mibpilì din.
Ke sikandan te, “Kinahanglan he kenè kiw ebpevayàbayà wey ebpesakup kandan.”
Piru is Nengazen he ziyà te langit he ebpimpinuu te pinuuwè din te kedhadì, ed-engitan din dà sikandan.
Tenged te kegkepauk din, ebpetizeenan din sikandan, egkengehandek dan.
Ke sikandin te, “Diyà te Zion, kes segradu he vuvungan ku, insavuk ku is mibpilì ku he hadì.”
Ne migkaǥi haazà is hadì he mibpilì te Megbevayà te, “Ibpehayag ku is migkaǥi kedì te Nengazen te, ‘Iyan ka Anak ku, ne ǥuntaan ibpekilala ku he amey ad kenikew.
Buyù ka kayi te kediey ne ibeǥey ku kenikew is menge nasyun, taman te pinekemeziyù he lugar te tivuuk he kelibutan para maangken nu heini, ne edtumanen ku heeyan.
Dumelaha nu sikandan, he wazè ebpekesukul te kedumala nu. Iring sikandan te ziniyun he ǥelemiten he edrupeten nu.’ ”
Umbe, sikiyu is menge hadì wey menge pengulu kayi te kelibutan, sevuta niw heini he menge lalag, ne pemineǥa niw is petizaan keniyu.
Penilbiyi niw is Nengazen duma is kedtahud ne ikelipey niw sikandin.
Tehuza niw is hadì he mibpilì din, su emun kenà, ne egkepeukan kew zin ne edèdeetan kew zin. Deyzey is langun he ed-aput diyà te Nengazen.

Nengazen, mahabet is kuntada ku; mahabet is ebpekigkuntada kedì!
Kesikandan te kenè ke kun edtavang kedì.
Piru is tutuu, iring ka te kelasag he ebpengalang kedì. Iyan ka ebeǥey kedì te kezeeǥan wey kelig-en.
Ed-umawen ku sikew, Nengazen, ne edtevaken a kenikew ziyà te segradu he vuvungan nu.
Edhizeǥà a wey edlipezeng ne egkepukew a, ne wazà ebpekekaid kedì su iyan man ed-ipat kedì is Nengazen.
Minsan linibu pa he menge kuntada is edliǥuy kedì, ne kenà a egkahandek.
Sigi en, Nengazen he Megbevayè ku, libriya a! Su zengan mibpeel-elezan nu is langun he kuntada ku he menge lalung; ne in-awè nu is gehem dan he iyan pezem kedezaat kedì.
Iyan ka edlibri, Nengazen, wey edtuvad te menge etew nu.

Sikew is metazeng he Megbevayè ku, tevaka a kenikew zutun te ked-umawa ku kenikew. Hein nekebmerasey a zengan, midtevangan a kenikew. Umbe ǥuntaan, pemineǥa nu is menge kebpengemuyù ku wey kehizuwi a.
Sikiyu is menge etew he egkuntada kediey, sengemenu keluǥayad is kebpeel-elezi niw kedì? Sengemenu keluǥayad is kebmahala niw te menge tuluuwen he wazè dan pulus wey kedsunud te ketetarù?
Tentenuzi niw he mibpilì te Nengazen is menge etew he edsunud kandin para mehimu he ǥaked din. Tenged kayi, ebpemineǥen e zin emun ebpengumew-umew a kandin.
Emun egkepauk kew, kinahanglan he kenè kew ebpekesalà tenged dutun. Ne emun edhizeǥè kew en diyà te menge hizeǥaan niw, pekelinawa niw is gehinawa niw ne purung kew ngunùngunù.
Sarig kew ziyà te Nengazen ne iyan niw layun ul-ulaha is kebpemuhat te hustu he menge pemuhat.
Mahabet is egkaǥi te, “Nengazen kehizuwi key; iyan ka metau he uzara key. Ipeehè nu is keupiya nu kenami!”
Piru lavew pa is kelipey he ibeǥey nu kediey; kenà is kelipey te menge etew he zekelà is keenen dan wey inumen dan.
Su iyan ka is Nengazen ed-ipat kedì, umbe kenà a egkehandek su wazà ebpekekaid kedì minsan dutun te timpu te kedlipezeng ku.

Nengazen, pemineǥa nu is pengemuyù ku he egkezumahan te zag-es.
Pemineǥa nu is kebuyù ku te tavang diyà te kenikew, he Megbevayà he hadì ku, su ziyà a te kenikew ebpengemuyù.
Emun meselem ed-endamen ku is gehinawa ku te kebpengemuyù diyà te kenikew. Ne emun ebpekepasad e en, ne edteǥazan ku is tavak nu te hangyù ku.
Sikew is tutuu he Megbevayà, ne kenè nu igkelipey is mezaat he ulaula; kenè nu edewaten is lalung he menge etew.
Kenà ebpekeuvey kenikew is menge mepelevawen; egkepeukan nu is langun he ebaal te mezaat.
Edezeetan nu is menge teruen ne egkeepesan nu is menge etew he ebpenhimatey te etew wey is menge men-aakal.
Iyan, siak mulà, ebpekeseled a ziyà te valey nu he segradu su ǥeina te utew a kenikew mibmahal. Ne zutun ku sikew ed-ezapa te ked-azap duma te zekelà he kedtahud kenikew.
Nengazen, tenged te mahabet is menge kuntada ku, giyahi-a kenikew sumalà te ketazeng nu. Pekeleduwi nu kediey is utew hustu he paaǥi nu su wey ku iyan mesunud.
Kenà egkeseriǥan is lalag te menge kuntada ku, su iyan dà tuyù dan is kedezaat te zuma he etew. Is menge lalag dan igkepetug-iring te neebriyan he leveng he edsengew is kemahù din. Is menge egkeǥiyen dan ne pudu limbung.
Megbevayè ku, siluti nu is menge kuntada ku. Deyzey ke egkeuney sikandan te mezaat he menge tuyù dan. Iselikwey nu sikandan tenged te utew subra is menge salè dan, su mibpekidsukulè dan kenikew.
Piru berakat he mebmelipayen is langun he menge etew he ziyà med-aput te kenikew. Deyzey ke ebpekeuruhuy sikandan te kegkelipey zan. Ilikey nu te kezeetan is menge etew he mibmahal kenikew su para mebmelipayen sikandan tenged dutun.
Edtuvazan nu, Nengazen, is menge metazeng. Is kebmahala nu kandan ne iyan nehimu he kelasag dan he kenà egkezeetan.

Nengazen, minsan duen nu pauk kedì, ne kenà a kenikew siluti.
Kehizuwi a wey vewii a, su utew ad meluya.
Nesemukan utew is isip ku, Nengazen. Keenu e en be kenikew ebewii?
Etura a kenikew, Nengazen, ne ǥeuza a. Tenged te kebmahala nu kediey, libriya a te kemetayen.
Su emun ebpatey a, ne kenè ku en maan sikew egketenuzan; kenà ad maan ebpekezalig kenikew ziyà te lugar te menge minatey.
Mibmeluye e en tenged te utew ku kegkesekiti. Kada mezukilem egkahames is ulunè ku te luhà.
Nemenlevag en is menge mata ku su ebpeketulung ad ebpekesineǥew tenged te vaal te langun he menge kuntada ku.
Sikiyu is memezaat is baal, pekeziyù kew kediey, su nezineg en te Nengazen is sineǥawan ku.
Nezineg din en is kebuyù ku te tavang, ne edtevaken din en is ampù ku.
Egkepeel-elezan wey egkengeheratan is langun he menge kuntada ku. Egkengelagewlagew sikandan he ebpekeziyù tenged te kegkeeled dan.

Nengazen he Megbevayè ku, ed-aput a ziyà te kenikew. Libriya a su zuen menge etew he edsurung kediey,
su emun kenà a kenikew edlibriyen, ne kela ke edhimetayan e zan; ebpitpitasen dan is lawa ku iring te ebeelan te erimaung te egkezawi zin, ne zutun wazè en ebpekelibri kediey.
Nengazen he Megbevayè ku, emun nekevaal a te mezaat diyà te iring ku he etew,
emun mibelesan ku te mezaat is meupiya he mibeelan kedì te emiǥu ku, emun mid-eǥawan ku te menge azen is kuntada ku te wazà hustu he hinungdan,
ne vey-ani ad kenikew pinaaǥi te kedtuǥut nu he mezaag a te menge kuntada ku ke edsurungen e zan. Bey-ani ad ke edtekutakan e zan taman te kebpatey ku, ne ed-ewaan e zan is minatey en.
Nengazen he Megbevayè ku, ipeehè nu en guntaan is pauk nu te menge kuntada ku he utew egkengepauk kedì, su iyan man ebpen-ahaan nu is hustu he kukuman.
Tiǥuma nu is langun he menge tribu ziyà te kenikew, ne dumelaha nu sikandan te ziyè ke zà te langit.
Iyan ka, Nengazen, edhukum te menge etew. Ipeehè nu he wazè ku salà, su netuenan nu man he metazeng a ne wazè ku mibeelan he mezaat.
Kenè nu ituǥut he ebpedayun is ulaula te mezaat he menge etew, ne tuvazi is menge metazeng, su metazeng ke man he Megbevayà, wey egkesusi nu is isip dey wey gehinawa zey.
Iyan ka, He Megbevayà, nehimu he kelasag ku. Iyan ka edlibri te menge metazeng.
Egkezumahan te ketazeng is kedhukum nu, ne kada andew egkepeukan nu is menge lalung.
Ne emun kenè dan ed-engkezan is menge mezaat he vaal zan, ne andam ka he edsilut kandan. Iring ka te sundaru he naandam en is idhimatey zin he menge gumaan. Migkemanga zin en is ispada zin wey zaan din en he edhingaten is panè din he ebelahan te egkeregreg he vesut.
<range>
Is lalung he menge etew ne mezaat is ed isipen dan; edtinguhè dan te kebaal te samuk ne ebpenlimbung sikandan.
Edlikù diyà te kandan is kebaal zan te samuk wey kebpesipala. Iring sikandan te mibudsi para egkeuluǥan te zuma zan, piru iyan mulà sikandan egkeulug dutun.
<range>
Sikew, Nengazen, is Utew Lavew he Megbevayà. Ebpeselamatan ku sikew tenged te ketazeng nu. Edeliǥen ku sikew pinaaǥi te kegkanta ku.

He Nengazen he iyan Egalen dey, is kegkemekeǥeǥehem nu egkaahà kayi te tivuuk he kelibutan! Egkezineg nu ziyan te langit is kedeliǥa te menge etew kenikew.
Minsan is dezeisey pa he menge vatà mibpenurù nu te kedalig kenikew, su wey mepeel-elezi is menge kuntada nu he ebpeninguhà he mekavales.
Emun edtengteng a ziyà te langit he mibeelan nu, ne egkeehè ku is bulan wey menge vituen he insavuk nu ziyà te nengesevukan dan,
ebpekeinsà a ziyà te ǥehinawa ku te hengkey ves is menusiyà, maan is utew nu edseǥipaa? Menusiyè dà sikandin, piru maan is utew nu igkeseeng?
Midhimu nu sikandin he minus pa is gehem din, kenà haazà is menge velinsuǥuen nu, piru imbeǥey nu kandin is dengeg, in-iring nu sikandin te hadì.
Midhimu nu sikandin he iyan edumala te menge linimbag nu; ne mibpeveyveyaan nu kandin is langun,
ragkes en kayi is langun he menge langgam wey menge keranapranap: sikan is ebpenhipanew,
sikan is ebpemenlayang, wey sikan is diyà ebpen-ubpà te wahig.
He Nengazen he iyan Egalen dey, is kegkemekeǥeǥehem nu egkaahà kayi te tivuuk he kelibutan!

Ebpeselematan ku sikew, Nengazen, te ebpuun kayi te tivuuk he ǥehinawa ku. Ibpenudtul ku is langun he egkein-inuwan he menge vaal nu.
Utew Lavew he Megbevayà, egkelipey a wey egkanta a te idalig ku kenikew.
Emun edlepawen nu en is menge kuntada ku, ne ebpemelaǥuy sikandan he ebpemekeurambak, ne ebpemematey sikandan.
Su metazeng ka he menhuhukum he ebpimpinuu ziyà te pinuuwè nu te kedhadì; midhukuman a kenikew ne zutun neehè nu is puriba he kenà a zait he edsilutan.
Midhukuman nu ne midèdeetan nu is menge mezaat he menge nasyun, umbe kenè en sikandan egketenuzan taman te taman.
Mibpurungan nu zèdeeti is menge kuntada ku, ne kenè ne maan sikandan egkaahà taman te taman. Mibpemengkag nu is menge inged dan, ne kenè ne sikandan egketenuzan.
Iyan sikew, Nengazen, edhadì ka te wazà pidtemanan; andam ke en te kedhukum puun te pinuuwè nu te kedhadì.
Edhukuman nu te hustu is menge etew kayi te kelibutan; mezait wey wazà egkevintahaan dutun te kedhukum nu.
Nengazen, iyan ka egkeeputan te menge etew he edèdaaǥen dutun te timpu te kelised.
Edsarig kenikew is menge etew he nekekilala kenikew. Su wazè pa mid-aput diyà te kenikew he wazè nu zewata.
Sikiyu is menge etew, kentahi niw te kedalig is Nengazen he edhadì diyà te Zion. Iseysey niw ziyà te menge nasyun is nengeveelan din!
Ebelesan din is ebpemendaagdaag, su edseǥipaan din is kebpekitavang te menge dinaagdaag.
Nengazen, dekelà is ked-antus ku tenged te kedèdaaǥa kedì te menge kuntada ku. Ikehizu a kenikew ne libriya a te kemetayen,
su wey ku ikeseysey ziyà te menge etew ziyà te menge pultahan te inged he Zion is menge mibeelan nu, he iyan igkezeliǥa ku kenikew. Ne edlipey a zutun tenged te kedlibriya nu kediey.
Nehitavù diyà te menge nasyun is mezaat he pelanu zan. Iring te iyan sikandan neulug diyà te vudsi he mibeelan dan, etawa iring te iyan sikandan nelitag te kandan he litag.
Impekilala te Nengazen ke hentei sikandin pinaaǥi te metazeng he kedhukum din, ne is lalung he menge etew, iyan nekezezaat kandan is mezaat he menge vaal zan.
Kemetayen is egkepeveyaan te lalung he menge etew ziyà te langun he menge nasyun, su ǥeina te ebey-anan dan is Megbevayà.
Kenà taman te taman is kebey-ani te Megbevayà te menge egkengeayuayu. Ebpekeperateng gihapun is menge egkengeayuayu he edlibriyen sikandan te Megbevayà.
Sigi en Nengazen, kenè nu ituǥut he iyan ebmezeeǥen is kebpekegaga te menge etew zà duen. Hukumi nu is menge nasyun diyà te etuvangan nu.
Ipeǥezam nu, Nengazen, is gehinawa zan te kegkahandek kenikew. Ipeisip-isip nu kandan he menge etew zà sikandan.
Nengazen, maan is mibpekeziyù ka? Maan is mid-eles ka zutun te timpu he edlised key?
Tenged te kegkemepelevawen te lalung he menge etew, ibpaantus dan is menge egkaayuayu. Berakat he iyan sikandan melitag te idlitag dan te zuma he menge etew.
Ibpahambug dan is menge mezaat he tinguhè dan. Is menge etew he azen is dekelà diyà te ǥehinawa zan, ebpenrawak wey ed-undaunda kenikew, Nengazen.
Tenged te kegkemepelevawen te menge lalung, ne kenè en sikandan ebpetavang kenikew. Kenè dan ed-isipen is mehitenged kenikew.
Ne minsan pa zutun, layun sikandan ed-uswag, umbe wazè en diyà te isip dan is kedhukumi nu kandan. Ne và dan dà ed-un-undaha is menge kuntada zan.
Iyan diyà te isip dan is: wazà mezaat he egkehitavù kandan, kekenà layun dan ebmelipayen ne wazà ebpekekaid kandan.
Nepenù te rawak, tarù, wey hulga is menge lalag dan. Melemu zà diyà te kandan is kebpenrawak.
Ed-eyanan dan diyà te menge inged is menge etew he wazà mekesalà diyà te kandan. Ebpeniizan dan ne edhimetayan dan.
Iring sikandan te erimaung he ed-eles he ed-ayan su edekepen dan is menge egkaayuayu, ne emun ebpekezakep dan en ne eguyuzen dan haazà.
Mekehizuhizu is egkekeizan dan su ed-eminen dan en is desen dan te kedruuǥa zan kandin taman te kenè en sikandin ebpekeenew.
Iyan diyà te isip dan is iring te midsebpengan te Megbevayà is menge mata zin su kenè en ebpekilavet dutun te mezaat he vaal zan.
Nengazen he Megbevayà, kenè nu pekeuǥeta is kedsiluti nu te menge mezaat he etew! Ne kenè nu vey-ani is menge egkaayuayu he menge etew.
He Megbevayà, kenè nu ituǥut he un-undaha ka te menge mezaat he etew. Ipeehè nu kandan he tarù is egkeisip dan he kenè nu sikandan edsilutan tenged te menge mezaat he vaal zan.
Neehè nu is menge etew he ed-antus wey sikan is ebpenlised, ne andam ka he edtavang kandan. Edangep diyà te kenikew is mekehizuhizu he menge etew he iring te menge ilu, ne edtevangan nu sikandan.
Iawè nu is gehem te menge mezaat he etew. Siluti nu sikandan tenged te kezaat dan taman te egkeengkezan dan is ked-ulaula te mezaat.
Nengazen, edhadì ka te wazà pidtemanan. Egkengeawà is mezaat he menge nasyun kayi te kelibutan he midlimbag nu.
Nengazen, nezineg nu is ampù te menge egkaayuayu he menge etew. Ne ǥeina te ebpemineǥen nu sikandan, edlig-enan nu sikandan.
Ebpemineǥen nu is pengemuyù te menge ilu wey menge etew he edèdaaǥen, su wey ikeveǥey ziyà te kandan is hustu he kukuman, su wey wazè en ebpelihandek kandan he etew he kelibutanen dà.
Diyà a te Nengazen edhangyù he kelesaǥi e zin. Ne maan is egkaǥi kew kayi te kedì te, “Pelaǥuy ka iring te tagbis pehendiyà te menge vuvungan,
su zutun te merusirem edhingaten en te menge mezaat he etew is menge panè dan, su ebpenaan dan en is menge etew he edtinazeng.
Wazè en egkehimu te menge metazeng emun naawè en diyà te inged is metazeng he kukuman.”
Diyà is Nengazen ed ubpà te segradu he valey zin; diyà te langit is pinuuwè din te kedhadì. Ed-ahaan din wey edsusiyen din is langun he menge etew.
Edsusiyen din is menge metazeng wey is menge lalung he menge etew. Ne egkeepesan din is menge mesipala.
Ebpeuzanan din te egkeregreg he menge vaǥa wey esupri is menge lalung he etew; ne edsilutan din sikandan pinaaǥi te meinit he keramag he ebpekelupa kandan.
Su metazeng is Nengazen ne iyan igkelipey zin is metazeng he menge vaal. Umbe, is etew he edtinazeng ebpekeuvey ziyà te etuvangan din.

Tevangi a, Nengazen, su wazè en etew he nesamà he metinumanen wey egkeseriǥan.
Langun he menge etew ne ebpemenarùtarù diyà te menge zuma zan. Egemiten dan is meungangen he menge lalag te kebpenlimbung dan.
Deyzey pezem Nengazen ke ibpetiem nu sikandan is ebpemenlimbung pinaaǥi te meungangen he menge lalag wey sikan is menge gelbuwen.
Ke sikandan te, “Ebmezeeǥen key pinaaǥi te kebpahambug dey. Ebpekehimu key he egkaǥi te minsan hengkey he egkesuatan dey, ne wazà ebpekezawey kenami.”
Migkaǥi is Nengazen te, “Edtevangan ku is menge egkaayuayu su edèdaaǥen sikandan, ne utew subra is kebpekeantus dan. Egkelesaǥan ku sikandan su iyan heini ebperetengen dan.”
Egkeseriǥan utew is menge saad te Nengazen. Iring heini te pelata he ebpekesarig ki he lunsey heini su kepipitu ipaaǥi ziyà te hapuy para maawà is menge sahug din.
Nengazen, layun key kenikew ventayi, ne ilikey key te lalung he menge etew te minsan hengkey he timpu.
Su nekeelingkus kenami is lalung he menge etew ne edeliǥen pa te kezekelan is kelelalung dan.

Nengazen, sengemenu keluǥayad is kenè nu kedseǥipaa kediey? Taman en be heini te wazà pidtemanan? Sengemenu keluǥayad is ked-elesi nu kediey?
Sengemenu keluǥayad is kebpekaantus ku te kegkeliveg. Sengemenu keluǥayad is kebpekaantus ku te kegketeǥui te seeng te ǥehinawa ku? Sengemenu keluǥayad is kegkezeeǥa kedì te menge kuntada ku?
Nengazen he Megbevayè ku kenà a kenikew pesegdana; iveǥey nu en kedì is mibuyù ku pinaaǥi te ked-ampù ku. Ilikù nu kayi te kedì is desen ku su para kenà a mebpatey.
Su utew egkelipey is menge kuntada ku emun egkezaag e zan. Kenè nu ituǥut he mekezayandayan sikandan pinaaǥi te kegkezeeǥa zan kedì.
Ebpekesarig a kenikew, Nengazen, su ǥeina te kenà egkaawà is kebmahala nu kediey. Ne utew a egkelipey su edlibriyen e man kenikew. Egkentahan ku sikew, Nengazen, su puun pa zengan mibpurungan a kenikew.
Is menge tulebung, egkaǥi sikandan diyà te gehinawa zan te, “Wazà Megbevayà!” Pudu sikandan lalung ne utew mezaat is menge vaal zan. Wazà minsan sevaha kandan he ebaal te meupiya.
Diyà te langit mid-ahà te Nengazen is keet-etawan su edsusiyen din ke zuen be nekesavut te tutuu wey ke zuen be edangep diyà te kandin.
Sikandan is langun, midsuwey zan te tutuu he zalan ne pudu memezaat is ulaula zan. Wazà minsan sevaha kandan he ebaal te meupiya.
Wazè be metueni kayi te lalung he menge etew is menge vaal zan? Netuenan dan heini! Ebpegpeǥesen dan is menge emurè ku te inged wey zan mekeselapì he iring dà sikandan te edsupal te keenen, ne kenà sikandan ed-ampù diyà te Nengazen.
Piru egkengeheratan sikandan, su edlevanan te Megbevayà is menge metazeng.
Edhimuwen dan he kenè edlampus is menge pelanu te menge egkaayuayu, piru iyan is Nengazen ebpengalang te menge egkaayuayu.
Deyzey ke ebpekeume en is edlibri te Israel he ebpuun diyà te Zion. Utew ebmelipayen is menge tig-Israel he menge etew te Nengazen, emun idlikù din en is meupiya he kebpekesavuk dan.
Nengazen, hentei is edtuǥutan nu he mekeubpàubpà diyà te valey nu? Hentei is edtuǥutan nu he ebpekeubpà diyà te segradu he vuvungan nu?
Is tavak te Nengazen, “Iyan is etew he wazà duen igkesawey wey meupiya is menge ulaula zin. Tutuu wey tinutuuwà is kegkaǥikaǥi zin.
Wazà sikandin mekeulug te kewusa ziyà te zuma, wey wazà sikandin medhimu wey megkaǥi te mezaat diyà te iring din he etew.
Ed-isipen din he wazà pulus te menge etew he kenè ku edewaten, iyan ebentuǥen din mulà is menge etew he edtahud kediey. Edtumanen din is pesarig din minsan pa ke egkereǥenan sikandin te kedtumana kayi.
Kenè din ibpaanak is selapì he ibpeutang din, wey kenà sikandin egkeuwit te suhul emun ibpetistiǥus sikandin su wey mehukumi te silut is kenà dait he edsilutan.” Is etew he iyan heeyan ulaula zin, ne egkehimu sikandin he layun melig-en ne kenà sikandin egkewaleng te minsan keenu.
He Megbevayà, bentayi a, su ziyà a te kenikew med-aput.
Iyan ka Nengazen ku, diyè dà ebpuun te kenikew is langun he menge meupiya he nezawat ku.
Emun bahin te metinumanen he menge etew nu he ziyà med-ubpà te tanà he Israel he utew menge vuutan, dekelà is kelipey ku tenged kandan.
Piru is menge etew he edsarig te menge ed-ezapen ed-iseg dà is kelised dan. Ne kenà a edtampu kandan te kebpelengesa zan para te zuma he menge ed-ezapen, ne kenè ku ebpengum-umawen is menge ngazan keniyan he menge ed-ezapen.
Nengazen, is kegkeengkena ku kenikew iyan en kegkeengkena ku te langun. Ibeǥey nu kediey is langun he kinahanglan ku. Ne ziyà te menge velad nu is untung ku.
Utew mekempet is imbeǥey nu kediey. Meupiya utew is langun he nezawat ku he ebpuun diyà te kenikew.
Edeliǥen ku sikew, Nengazen, su iyan ka layun edsambag kedì. Minsan mezukilem ne iyan ebpenurù kedì is isip he imbeǥey nu kediey.
Layun ku sikew ed-isipa, Nengazen. Umbe, kenà a egkahandek su geina te duma ku sikew.
Iyan heeyan hinungdan he melipayen a; utew zekelà is kelipey ku kayi te kebpengungubpaan ku. Ne ebpengungubpaan a he wazè ku igkelenew,
su kenà a kenikew ebpesegdanen he mekehendiyà a te lugar te menge minatey. Kenè nu idtuǥut he meredak is lawa te metinumanen he suluǥuen nu.
Ipenurù nu kediey is paaǥi wey ku maangken is ebpedayun he untung. Ne tenged te kebpekiduma nu kediey, wazè en kurang te kelipey ku; wazà pidtemanan te kelipey ku ziyà te avey nu.
Pemineǥa nu, Nengazen, is pengemuyù ku, para kenà a mevintahai. Pemineǥa nu is utew tutuu he ked-ampù ku.
Netuenan nu ke hengkey is hustu, umbe iyan ka zait he ebpekekaǥi he wazà mezaat he mid-ulaula ku.
Minsan is gehinawa ku ke mezukilem ne midsusi nu. Migezaman a kenikew ne wazè nu naahà he mezaat kayi te kediey. Midisisyun a he kenà a egkaǥi te mezaat
iring te ed-ul-ulahan te zuma. Midtuman ku is menge suǥù nu, ne pinaaǥi kayi, nelikayan ku is kebpesipala.
Layun ku ed-ikula is dalan nu, ne wazà a medsuwey zutun.
Megbevayè ku, ed-ampù a ziyà te kenikew su netuenan ku he edtevaken a kenikew. Pemineǥa nu is ampù ku.
Ipeehè nu is egkein-inuwan he ǥaǥew nu. Pinaaǥi te ǥehem nu, edlibriyen nu is menge etew he ebpekelasag kenikew tenged te menge kuntada zan.
Ilikey a kenikew te kezeetan iring te kedlikaya te etew te mata zin wey kenà mesazir, ne pengelangi a kenikew iring te kebpengalang te tagbis te menge anak din pinaaǥi te kedlekupi zin kandan.
Kelesaǥi a te menge kuntada ku he edsurung kediey kayi te nekeliǥuy su edhimetayan e zan.
Wazè dan hizu, ne pinaaǥi te kegkagi zan, ebpelavew zan.
Midpen-ehè e zan, ne ǥuntaan edliǥuyan e zan en. Edtaǥad dan dà te kebpekelugar zan te kedezaat kedì.
Iring sikandan te ed-ayan he erimaung diyà te elesè din, he andam he ebpitaspitas te egkezawi zin.
Nengazen, tebeka nu en sikandan wey zaaǥa nu is lalung he menge kuntada ku. Libriya a pinaaǥi te ǥehem nu, su wey e zan kenà mekeizi.
Libriya a wey a kenà mekeizi kayi te menge etew he iyan dà ed-isipen dan is kelibutanen he menge vutang. Siluti nu sikandan te silut he inteǥana nu kandan, ne iragkes nu en daan is menge anak dan. Ne elin nu teǥenahi te silut is menge apù dan.
Piru siak mulà, egkeehè ku sikew, su wazà a mebaal te salà. Emun egkepukew e en ne utew a zutun melipayen su egkeehè ku en sikew.

Nengazen, iyan ka mibeǥey kedì te zesen, ne mahal ku sikew.
Iyan ka, Nengazen, batu he endilungè ku, melig-en he elesè ku wey menluluwas. Iring ka te elesà he vatu, he ed-eles a ziyà te kenikew. Iyan ka kelasag ku, mekeǥeǥehem he menluluwas, wey eputà.
Edeliǥen ka, Nengazen, su emun ebuyù a te tavang diyà te kenikew, ne edluwasen a kenikew zutun te menge kuntada ku.
Is kemetayen iring te pisì he ebpekevakus kediey, wey iring te litag diyà te veyeey ku. Is kezeetan iring te vendes te zalem he ed-anud kedì.
<range>
Umbe, te kedlised ku, nengumew a kenikew, Nengazen. Mibuyù a te tavang diyà te kenikew te Megbevayè ku, ne zutun te valey nu mibpemineg nu is ked-ampù ku.
Ne zutun ne midlinug, ne minsan is menge pundasyun te menge vuvungan ne neyunggat, tenged te kegkepauk nu, Nengazen.
Migawas is evel puun te izung nu, ne ziyà te vèbè nu migawas is mekahandekhandek he hapuy wey egkeregreg he menge vaǥa.
Mibpuwasan nu is langit iring te kebpuwas te kurtina, ne mibpenaug ka he ziyà med-untud te mekepal he ǥapun.
Mid-untud ka te kirubin, ne utew heini meǥaan he edlayang he eduma te keramag.
Midhimu nu is merusirem he tambun te peliǥuy nu. Mid-eles ka ziyà te mekepal he ǥapun.
Midpengilat diyà te etuvangan nu, ne puun te kivel mid-uzan te menge ǥiyew wey egkeregreg he menge vaǥa.
Is laǥeng nu Nengazen, te Utew Lavew he Megbevayà, iring te ruǥung diyà te langit.
Mibpanè nu te kilat is menge kuntada nu, ne nemekepelaǥuy zan he egkengeteranta.
Emun edawey ka wey utew ka egkepauk ne egkengemezahan is daǥat ne egkaahà is tanà diyà te kinezizeleman kayi, wey egkaahà is pundasyun te kelibutan.
Puun te langit midawat a kenikew, ne inggaun a kenikew puun te mezalem he wahig.
Midluwas a kenikew zutun te mekeǥeǥehem he menge kuntada ku he kenè ku egkesukulan.
Midsurung e zan hein egkereǥenan a, piru mid-uǥupan a kenikew, Nengazen.
Midlibri a kenikew te ebpekekaid pezem kedì su ingkesuat a kenikew.
Edtuvazan a kenikew su ǥeina te metazeng a, wey wazè ku neveelan he salà.
Su edsunuzen ku is menge paaǥi nu, ne sikew is Nengazen he Megbevayè ku, wazè ku sikew engkezi.
Edtumanen ku is langun he menge suǥù nu, ne wazè ku supaka is menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu.
Netuenan nu he wazà igkesawey te keugelingen ku, ne edlikayan ku is kebaal te salà.
Edtuvazan a kenikew su neehè nu he metazeng a, ne wazè ku eveelan he ibpekesalà ku.
Metinumanen ka ziyà te menge etew he metinumanen daan. Meupiya ka ziyà te menge etew he meupiya zaan.
Tinutuuwà is kebpekidepitè nu te menge etew he tinutuuwà daan is kebpekidepitè dan kenikew, ne metau ka zaan he bales te menge lalung.
Uya, edlibriyen nu is kenà menge mepelevawen, piru ibpekevavè nu mulà is menge etew he mepelevawen.
Nengazen he Megbevayè ku, iyan ka kerayag ku. Emun merusirem, ne iyan ka sulù ku.
Tenged te kedtavang nu, ebpekehimu a he edsurung te menge sundaru, ne egpekehimu a zaan he ebpemenahik te verengbeng he nekeliǥuy te inged.
Is kenikew he paaǥi, Megbevayà, ne wazè din sayep. Is lalag nu egkeseriǥan. Iring ka te kelasag te langun he ebuyù kenikew te pengalang.
Iyan ke zà, Nengazen, kes Megbevayà; kes endilungè dey he vatu.
Iyan ka ebeǥey kedì te zesen wey ebantey kedì diyà te ibayè ku.
Edlig-enan nu is menge paa ku iring te paa te selazeng, para mezesen a he ebpenekezeg diyà te metikang he menge lugar.
Ebpenuruen a kenikew te kebpekidtebek, iring te kedhingat te mevisekeg he panà.
Ebpengelangan a kenikew iring te kelasag, umbe nelibri is untung ku. Ed-ipaten a kenikew pinaaǥi te ǥehem nu, Ne nevantug a pinaaǥi te kedtevangi nu kedì.
Ebeǥayan a kenikew te meupiya he ibayà, umbe wazà mekezugkilas is menge paa ku.
Midal-as ku is menge kuntada ku ne nesaut ku sikandan. Ne human a medlikù hein nengezaag ku en sikandan.
Midezeetan ku sikandan ne nengepiley zan diyà te uvey te nehitindeǥan ku, ne kenè en sikandan ebpekeenew.
Mibeǥayan a kenikew te zesen te kebpekidtebek, ne nengezaag ku is menge kuntada ku.
Mibpepeleǥuyan a kenikew te menge kuntada ku, ne midezeetan ku sikandan.
Mibuyù dan te tavang, piru wazà midlibri kandan. Nengumew-umew zan kenikew, piru wazè nu sikandan tevaka.
Midruntek ku sikandan taman te neiring en sikandan te eliyavuk he idlayap te keramag. Midtekutakan ku sikandan he iring te tunaan diyà te menge zalan.
Midluwas a kenikew te ribildi he menge etew. Midhimu a kenikew he pengulu te menge nasyun. Is menge lumelengyawà ne ebpenilbi kedì.
Midluhud sikandan kedì tenged te kegkehandek dan, ne midtuman dan is suǥù ku.
Neewaan sikandan te kevurut, umbe migawas dan puun te mid-elesan dan he ebpengerkeren te kegkahandek.
Uuyag ka, Nengazen! Edeliǥen ka is endilungè ku he vatu. Ibayew ku sikew tenged te iyan ka Megbevayà he menluluwas ku.
Ebelesan nu is menge kuntada ku, ne ibpesakup nu kedì is menge nasyun.
Midluwas a kenikew zutun te utew menge mesipala he menge kuntada ku, ne ibpezaag nu kedì sikandan.
Umbe, ibpezalig ku sikew ziyà te menge nasyun. Egkentahan ku sikew te menge kedalig.
Is pinilì nu he hadì ebeǥayan nu te zekelà he menge kezeeǥan. Mahal nu si David wey is menge kevuwazan din te wazà pidtemanan.

Is hewhewanan ebpahayag te utew kegkemekeǥeǥehem te Megbevayà, su zutun egkeehè ta is menge linimbag din.
Ke và dan dà etew ne edtudtulen dan is gehem te Megbevayà te maandew wey te mezukilem.
Minsan kenè ta egkezineg is menge lalag dan,
ne ebpekeuma ziyà te minsan hendei kayi te kelibutan is tudtul zan; nekeeneb heini ziyà te minsan hendei. Mibeelan te Megbevayà diyà te kewkewangan is egkesevukan te andew.
Ne puun dutun, egawas is andew ke meselem he melipayen iring te ebpengesawa he ibpenahik, wey iring te ebpekidlumbà he andam en he ebpelelaǥuy.
Edsilà heini ziyà te edsilaan ne edsanlep diyà te edsenlepan. Ne egkesuǥat is langun te keinit din.
Is kesuǥuan te Nengazen wazè din sayep. Ne ebpekezasig heini kenita. Egkeseriǥan is menge penurù te Nengazen ne ebpekeveǥey heini te ketau te kenà metau.
Hustu is menge sulunuzen te Nengazen, ne ebpekeveǥey heini te kelipey. Wazà sayep te menge suǥù te Nengazen ne ebpeketayew te isip te etew.
Meupiya is kedtahud te Nengazen, ne ereg heini he ed-ul-ulahan te wazè din pidtemanan. Is kedhukum te Nengazen hustu wey metazeng.
Ne is langun kayi edhuna pa he mahal te lunsey he vulawan, he ke và dà keenen, edhuna pa he meemis te teneb he wazè din sahug.
Pinaaǥi kayi, Nengazen, egkeleǥuyan a is suluǥuen nu. Ne emun edtumanen ku heini ne mahabet is keupiyaanan he egkekuwa ku.
Usahay kenà egketuenan te etew he nekesalà sikandin. Tenged kayi Nengazen, peseyluwa a kenikew te menge salà he neveelan ku he wazè ku metueni.
Ne tevangi a zaan kenikew wey a kenà mekevaal te menge salà he edtivevaan ne kenè nu ituǥut he meuripen a kayi, su para wazà igkesawey kedì ne zutun egkelikayan ku is mehabet he kelasi te kebpekesalà.
Sikew, Nengazen, is eputè ku, wey mibelukas kedì, berakat he ebpekepenunuat kenikew is menge lalag he egkengekaǥi ku wey egkeisip ku.

Berakat he edtevaken te Nengazen is ampù nu ke edlised ka. Berakat he idlikey ka te Megbevayà ni Jacob te ebpekekaid kenikew.
Berakat he egkeumahan ka te tavang din kenikew he ebpuun diyà te valey zin diyà te Zion.
Berakat he zewata zin is menge halad nu, iring te pemuhat he edtutungen.
Berakat he iveǥey zin kenikew is ebpengeduyen nu. Berakat he medlampus is menge pelanu nu.
Ed-ugyab key tenged te kezeeǥan nu, ne edsilibra key he edalig te Megbevayè tew. Berakat he iveǥey te Nengazen is langun he ebuyuen nu.
Guntaan netuenan ku he ibeǥey te Nengazen is kezeeǥan diyà te mibpilì din he hadì. Ne ziyà te langit he iyan kes segradu he ubpeey zin, edtevaken din is ked-ampù dutun te mibpilì din. Ne layun din ibpezaag pinaaǥi te gehem din.
Emun duen tebek, is duma edsarig te menge kerwahi zan, ne is duma pa ne edsarig te menge kudè dan, iyan, sikami mulà, iyan edseriǥan dey is Nengazen he iyan Megbevayè dey.
Sikan is edsarig te menge kerwahi wey menge kudà egkengezeetan, iyan, sikami mulà, ebpekezaag key wey kenà egkaawà is kelig-en dey.
Nengazen, beǥayi nu te kezeeǥan is mibpilì nu he hadì, ne tevaka key kenikew emun ebpengum-umawen dey sikew.

Nengazen, mibmelipayen is hadì he pinilì nu, tenged te mibeǥayan nu sikandin te zesen. Utew sikandin nelipey su mibpengelinteuwan nu he mekezaag sikandin.
Imbeǥey nu kandin is penganduy zin; imbeǥey nu kandin is ebuyuen din.
Midawat nu sikandin ne mibeǥayan nu te meupiya he menge vutang. Migkurunahan nu sikandin te lunsey he vulawan.
Mibuyù din diyà te kenikew he sumpuli nu is untung din, ne mibeǥayan nu sikandin te meluǥayad he untung.
Tenged te kezeeǥan he imbeǥey nu ziyà te kandin nevantug sikandin wey midekelà is dengeg din.
Ne ebpedayun is menge tuvad nu kandin. Ne utew nekeveǥey kandin te kelipey is kebpekiduma nu kandin,
su edsarig man sikandin kenikew te Nengazen he iyan kes Utew Lavew he Megbevayà. Ne tenged te kebmahala nu kandin, ne kenà sikandin egkemenu.
Is gehem nu ne iyan ebpekezaag te langun he menge kuntada nu.
Emun ebpeehè ke en kandan, edezeetan nu sikandan, ne egkeiring sikandan te rapug he utew meregreg. Ne tenged te pauk nu kandan, ed-epuren nu sikandan te hapuy.
Edhimetayan nu is langun he kevuwazan dan, ne wazà edresik kandan.
Mezaat is pelanu zan kenikew, piru kenè dan edlampus.
Su ebpelaǥuy sikandan emun egkeehè dan he andam ke en te kedsilut kandan, he iring te ziyè nu en ibpesinaru te kandan is edhingaten nu he panà.
Nengazen, ereg ka he edeliǥen tenged te zesen nu. Umbe, egkanta key te idalig kenikew tenged te kegkemekeǥeǥehem nu.

Megbevayè ku, Megbevayè ku, maan is mibey-anan a kenikew? Maan is meziyù ka kayi te kedì? Nezumahan en te zag-es is ked-antus ku, piru wazè e pa ǥihapun kenikew tevangi.
Megbevayè ku, wazè ku en himeley su maandew wey mezukilem is kebpengumew-umew ku kenikew, iyan, wazà a kenikew tevaka.
Iyan waǥas ka, ne edeliǥen ka te menge tig-Israel su iyan ka hadì dan.
Midsarig kenikew is menge kepuun dey ne midlibri nu sikandan.
Mignganey ke zan ne midtevangan nu sikandan. Midsarig sikandan kenikew ne wazà sikandan mepakyas.
Ebpeel-elezan a wey edsudien a te menge etew, ke sikandan te, “Wazè din pulus; kenà sikandin iring te etew, kekenà, iring sikandin te tagkey.”
Is kada sevaha he ebpekaahà kedì ne ed-insultu kedì, ne ebpengelengkeleng is egkaǥi te,
“Midsarig ke man buwa te Nengazen, ne maan is wazè ke zin libriya? Ke tutuu he nekepenunuat ka kandin, ne maan is wazè ke zin tevangi?”
Piru iyan ka mibpeǥawas kedì puun te ǥetek te iney ku, ne puun pa te edsusu e pa, ne inlikey a kenikew te ebpekezezaat kedì.
Ne puun te kedlusaza kedì ne insarig e en diyà te kenikew, ne iyan ke zà Megbevayè ku.
Umbe, kenà a kenikew vey-ani su meǥaan en egkeula-ula is melised ne wazà duma he ebpeketavang kedì.
Edliǥuyan a te menge kuntada ku, iring sikandan te memezesen he tudu he vaka ziyà te tanà he Bashan.
Iring daan sikandan te menge erimaung he ebpemenhiniǥer is eginganga he andam en he edaas kedì.
Naawè en is desen ku; iring a te wahig he id-ulà, ne henduen be te nekegkikiwey en is menge tulan ku. Naawè en daan is kevurut ku; iring a te netunew he kendilà.
Naawè en is desen ku; iring a te tanà he mibadtik, ne mibmevisekeg en is dilè ku. Nengazen, ebey-anan a kenikew minsan pa te edserupatey ad.
Midliǥuyan a te lalung he menge etew; iring sikandan te menge asu he ebpemen-erungut kayi te kedì. Mibpelehusan dan is menge belad ku wey menge paa ku.
Nenletew en is menge tulan ku; ne is menge etew, ne edtengtengan e zan dà.
Mibahinbahin dan is menge visti ku pinaaǥi te ripa.
Piru, sikew, Nengazen, kenà a kenikew pekeziyui. Iyan ka ebpekeveǥey kedì te zesen ne tevangi ad guntaan.
Libriya a su edhimetayan a te menge kuntada ku; kenè nu ituǥut he mepatey a kayì te henduen be te menge asu.
Libriya a su egkeizen a te iring te menge erimaung. Tevaka nu is ampù ku ne libriya a su egkeizen a te iring te menge tudu he vaka.
Idsangyew ku ziyà te menge emurè ku te inged is mibpemeelan nu. Edeliǥen ku sikew ziyà te menge kevurunan dan.
Sikiyu is edtahud te Nengazen, deliǥa niw sikandin! Sikiyu is menge etew kayì te Israel he menge kevuwazan ni Jacob, bentuǥa niw wey kehendeki niw is Nengazen!
Su wazè din pesegdana is menge elentusen te menge egkaayuayu. Wazè din sikandan iniyuǥi, kekenà, ebpemineǥen din is kebuyù dan te tavang.
Midasig a kenikew su wey a medalig kenikew diyà te kevurunan te menge etew nu. Diyà te etuvangan te menge etew he edtahud kenikew, edtumanen ku is menge pesarig ku he ibpemuhat ku ziyà te kenikew.
Egkaan is menge egkaayuayu ne egkahantey sikandan. Is menge etew he midangep diyà te kenikew ne edalig kenikew. Berakat he mebmeupiya wey mebmeluǥayad is untung dan.
Egketenuzan ka te langun he menge etew ziyà te minsan hendei kayi te tivuuk he kelibutan ne edlikù dan diyà te kenikew, Nengazen, ne ed-ezapen ke zan,
Su iyan ka hadì, ne iyan ka edumala te menge nasyun.
Kenà duwazuwa he edsimba kenikew is langun he menge sepian he etew kayi te kelibutan. Minsan is langun he menge etew he henduen be te ebpematey en, ne ibpeehè dan is kedtahud dan kenikew su edluhud dan. Wey minsan sikan is nemematey en,
ebpenilbi kenikew is menge kevuwazan dan. Ebpenuruen mehitenged kenikew te Nengazen is huziyan he menge lapis te menge kevuwazan.
Ne sikan is huziyan he egkengeetew, edtudtulan daan sikandan he midlibri nu is menge etew nu. Ne iyan ka mibaal kayi.
Nengazen, iyan ka ed-elima kedì, umbe egkekuwa ku is langun he egkinehenglanen ku.
Iring a te kerehidu he ibpehimeley nu ziyà te penebtavà he zutun is gerabi he memeilem he sagbet. Ne ibpeikul a kenikew ziyà te meleneng he wahig.
Edlig-enan a kenikew. Ibpeikul a kenikew te hustu he zalan te ketazeng su wey ka meveǥayi te zengeg.
Minsan pa ke edhipanew a ziyà te suǥud he zuen duen ebpekepatey, ne kenà a egkahandek su zuma ku man sikew. Ebpekeveǥey kedì te kelig-en wey kelipey is kegiyahi nu wey kebpengelangi nu kedì.
Ed-endaman a kenikew te keenen diyà te etuvangan te menge kuntada ku. Impurung a kenikew itetepian su midlenahan nu is ulu ku. Ne ebpepezaharan a kenikew te inumen.
Nesiguru ku he ke sengemenu keluǥayad is untung ku ne iyan daan keluǥayad te kebpurungi nu wey kebmahala nu kedì. Ne ziyà a ed-ubpa te valey nu, Nengazen, te wazà pidtemanan.
Is kelibutan wey is langun he ed-ubpà kayi, ne gaked te Nengazen.
Iyan sikandin mibangun te kelibutan ne ziyè din benguna te mezalem he wahig.
Hentei is egkehimu he edtekezeg diyà te vuvungan te Nengazen? Hentei is ebpekeseled diyà te segradu he valey zin?
Iyan sikan is meupiya is ulaula zin wey lumpiyu is isip din, wazà med-azap te zuma he menge ed-ezapen, wey kenà tarù is penangdù din.
Edtuvazan wey ed-isipen sikandin he metazeng te Nengazen, is Megbevayà he menluluwas din.
Iyan heeyan kelasi te etew he egkehimu he ed-aput wey edsimba te Megbevayà ni Jacob.
Puwasi is kezaan he menge ǥemawan duen te valey te Megbevayà su para mekeseled sikan is mekeǥeǥehem he Hadì.
Hentei ves heini is mekeǥeǥehem he Hadì? Iyan sikandin sikan is Nengazen he mezesen wey melig-en he ebpekidtebek.
Puwasi is kezaan he menge ǥemawan duen te valey te Megbevayà su para mekeseled sikan is mekeǥeǥehem he Hadì!
Hentei ves heini is mekeǥeǥehem he Hadì? Iyan sikandin sikan is Nengazen he Mekeǥeǥehem. Uya, iyan sikandin is mekeǥeǥehem he Hadì.
Nengazen he Megbevayè ku, iyan ka ed-empuan ku wey edseriǥan ku. Kenè nu ituǥut he mezaag a te menge kuntada ku, su para kenà a meeled-eled.
<range>
Is edsarig kenikew kenà egkepeel-elezan, iyan, egkepeel-elezan sikan is edluib kenikew.
Penurua a, Nengazen, te menge paaǥi nu.
Penurua a te paaǥi para kenà a mekesuwey te tutuu, su iyan ka Megbevayà he menluluwas ku. Layun a edsarig kenikew.
Tentenuzi nu, Nengazen, is hizu wey ǥaǥew nu he impeehè nu puun pa zengan.
Ne kenè nu en tentenuzi is menge salà he neveelan ku hein betan-en e pa. Tenged te ǥaǥew nu, tentenuzi a, Nengazen, su wey nu ikepaahà is keupiya nu.
Meupiya ka wey metazeng ka, Nengazen, umbe ipenurù nu ziyà te menge nengetazin is hustu he zalan.
Egiyahan nu is kenà menge mepelevawen te kebaal te hustu. Ipenurù nu kandan is kenikew he menge paaǥi.
Dutun te langun he ebeelan nu, ipeehè nu is gaǥew nu wey kegkemetinumanen nu ziyà te menge edsunud te ibpetuman diyà te kesuǥuan nu.
Nengazen, minsan mahabet is menge salè ku, peseyluwa a kenikew, su para mezeliǥi ka.
Nengazen, is menge etew he edtahud kenikew, egiyahan nu wey zan meikul is dalan he ereg he ed-ikulen.
Meuswaǥen is ked-ubpè dan, ne ebpedayun is ked-ubpà te menge kevuwazan dan diyà te tanà he Israel.
Nengazen, utew nu emiǥu is menge etew he edtahud kenikew ne ibpetentenuzan nu kandan is kebpekid-uyun nu kandan.
Diyè e zà layun edangep te kenikew, su iyan ka edlibri kedì te ebpekezezaat kedì.
Pemineǥa a wey kehizuwi a, su midsebsevaha a ne edèdaaǥen a.
Mid-iseg en is menge kemereǥenen ku; libriya a te kegkeliveg ku.
Is-isipa a kenikew kayi te menge elentusen ku, ne peseyluwa a te langun he menge salè ku.
Ahaa nu man, utew mahabet is menge kuntada ku ne zekelà is kedumut dan kedì.
Tipiǥi nu is untung ku, ne libriya a kenikew! Kenà a kenikew peel-elezi, su ziyà a med-aput te kenikew para kenà a mekeizi.
Metazeng a wey wazà igkesawey kediey; umbe iyan ke en metau he kenà a mekeizi. Edsarig e zà kenikew.
Ipelingkawas nu, Megbevayè ku, is menge tig-Israel te langun he menge kelised dan.
Nengazen, ipeehè nu he wazè ku salà, su nengungubpaan a he wazà igkesawey kedì ne mibpurung a medsarig kenikew.
Susiya a, Nengazen; susiya nu is isip ku wey ǥehinawa ku.
Su layun ku edtentenuzi is gaǥew nu, ne layun ku sikew ebpezumdumahi.
Wazà a mebpekiduma te menge etew he limbungan wey uvag-uvag dà is menge ulaula zan.
Kenà a uyun te menge kevurunan te mezaat he menge etew. Ne wazà a mulà mebpekiduma kandan.
Edlùluan ku is menge velad ku he tuus te wazè ku salà. Ne edhendiyà a te pemuhatà he zutun ka ebpemuhata su ed-azap a kenikew, Nengazen.
Ne zutun egkanta a te menge kentahan he para te kebpeselamat, wey edseysayen ku is langun he egkein-inuwan he menge vaal nu.
Nengazen, mahal ku is baley he ubpeey nu, he iyan kes lugar he zutun egkaahà is kegkemekeǥeǥehem nu.
Kenà a kenikew zèdeeti duma te menge mekesesalà, iring te menge teremunù.
Heini sikandan, layun ebevaal te mezaat ne ebpenepian dan is duma.
Iyan, siak mulà, wazà igkesawey kediey, umbe libriya a wey kehizuwi a.
Guntaan netuenan ku he kenè e en egkemenu, umbe, edeliǥen ku sikew Nengazen diyà te ketiǥuman te menge etew nu.
Is Nengazen iyan kerayag ku, menluluwas ku, wey eputè ku, umbe wazà ereg he igkahandek ku.
Emun edsurungen a te lalung he menge kuntada ku su edhimetayan e zan, ne iyan dan egkezaag ne kenà a iyan.
Minsan edliǥuyan a te mahabet he menge sundaru, ne kenà a egkahandek. Minsan pa ke edsurungen e zan, edsarig a te Megbevayà.
Duen sevaha he mibuyù ku ziyà te Nengazen he utew ku en egkesuati he iyan is: kebpekeubpè ku ziyà te valey zin seled te tivuuk he untung ku, ne zutun egkepurung ku egkengunùngunù is keupiya zin, ne ebpekahangyù a ziyà te kandin he giyahi e zin.
Emun timpu te kesamuk id-eles e zin wey edhimu sikandin te paaǥi wey a kenà memenu zutun te valey zin. Diyè e zin ibpehulenà te lugar he kenà a zuen egkekeizan.
Umbe, egkezaag ku is menge kuntada ku he edliǥuy kediey. Ne ebpemuhat a zutun te valey te Nengazen duma is ked-uruhuy ku su utew a egkelipey. Ne egkentahan ku sikandin.
Pemineǥa a, Nengazen, ke ebpengum-umawen ku sikew; kehizuwi a ne iveǥey nu kedì is ebuyuen ku.
Neǥezam ku kayi te ǥehinawa ku he ibpezangep a kenikew ziyan te kenikew, umbe kenà duwazuwa is kedangep ku ziyan te kenikew, Nengazen.
Kenà a kenikew elesi! Kenà a kenikew iselikwey tenged te pauk nu kedì te suluǥuen nu. Iyan ka neketavang kedì, umbe kenà a pesegdana wey iselikwey, Megbevayà he menluluwas ku.
Minsan pa ke ed-engkezan a te amey ku wey iney ku, ed-eturen e zed gihapun kenikew, Nengazen.
Impenurù nu kedì is kenikew he menge paaǥi. Ne ziyà a kenikew ipeikul te hustu he zalan, su zuen ku menge kuntada.
Kenà a kenikew ipalad diyà te kandan; edèdeetan e zan kun su egkeǥiyen dan he neveelan ku is wazè ku meveeli.
Piru midtuu a he egkeseǥazan ku is keupiya nu mintras ebpengungubpaan e pa kayì te tanà.
Sarig kew te Nengazen! Mebpekelig-en kew ne kenè kew medarà. Purung kew sarig diyà te Nengazen!
Nengazen he iyan kutè ku. Ebpengumew a kenikew. Pemineǥa nu is ked-ampù ku! Su emun kenà a kenikew ebpemineǥen, ne megaan a ebpatey.
Pemineǥa nu is hangyù ku te tavang diyà te kenikew, zutun te ziyà a medsinaru te segradu he valey nu he imbayew ku is menge velad ku.
Kenà a siluti zuma te menge lalung. Uvag dà sikandan ebpekid-emiǥu su mezaat is pelanu zan.
Belesi nu sikandan te sungkad te menge vaal zan. Siluti nu sikandan tenged te mezaat he menge vaal zan.
Su wazè dan seǥipaa is menge mibeelan nu. Umbe zezeeti nu sikandan ne veleǥaza nu en sikandan dutun te kebpekesavuk dan.
Nengazen, ereg ka he edeliǥen, su midineg nu is kebpehizuhizu ku kenikew.
Iyan ka mibeǥey kedì te zesen; iyan ka migkelasag kedì. Midsarig a kenikew ne edtevangan a kenikew. Umbe utew a melipayen ne migkanta a te peselamat diyà te kenikew.
Iyan ka, Nengazen, mibeǥey te zesen diyà te menge etew nu. Iyan ka melig-en he eputà wey menluluwas te pinilì nu.
Libriya nu wey tuvazi nu is menge etew he ǥaked nu. Bentayi nu sikandan he iring te ed-elima te kerehidu; etimana nu sikandan te wazà pidtemanan.
Sikiyu is menge linimbag diyà te langit, deliǥa niw is Nengazen. Deliǥa niw is gehem din wey zesen din.
Deliǥa niw is kegkemekeǥeǥehem din. Ezapa niw sikandin diyà te segradu he etuvangan din.
Ebpenriǥungriǥung is laǥeng te Nengazen he iyan kes mekeǥeǥehem he Megbevayà, ne egkezineg heini ziyà te menge zaǥat.
Is laǥeng te Nengazen, mekeǥeǥehem wey zekelà is dengeg din
ne ebpekevadtì te melig-en he kayu ziyà te Lebanon.
Edhuyungen te Nengazen is menge vuntud diyà te Lebanon wey Hermon, ne egkeiring heini te nati he vaka he edlinglingketew.
Is laǥeng te Nengazen, ebpekepekilat
wey ebpekehuyung te sibsivayan; egkehuyung din minsan is sibsivayan diyà te Kadesh.
Is laǥeng te Nengazen, ebpekepaanak te selazeng wey ebpekepetaktak te zahun te menge kayu. Ne ziyà te valey zin ibensag te langun is lalag he, “Mekeǥeǥehem is Megbevayà!”
Is Nengazen iyan ebmandù te zalem te menge wahig; iyan sikandin kes hadì he ebmandù te wazà pidtemanan.
Edlig-enan te Nengazen is menge etew zin, ne ebeǥayan din sikandan te meupiya he kebpekesavuk.

Edeliǥen ku sikew, Nengazen, su midlibri a kenikew te kezeetan ne wazè nu ituǥut he mekezayandayan is menge kuntada ku tenged te kebpekesavuk ku.
Nengazen he Megbevayè ku, mibpetavang a kenikew tenged te zaru ku, ne mibewian a kenikew.
Midlibri a kenikew te kemetayen. Wazà nu ituǥut he mepatey a.
Sikiyu is metinumanen he menge etew te Nengazen, deliǥa niw is Nengazen pinaaǥi te kegkanta niw. Deliǥa niw sikandin te kedalig pinaaǥi te kedtentenuzi niw te kegkewaǥas din.
Su melemu egkaawà is pauk din, iyan, is keupiya zin mulà, ebpedayun te wazà pidtemanan. Egkeseeng ki emun timpu te mezukilem, piru egkelipey ki zed emun ebmeselem en.
Nengazen, tenged te keupiya nu in-iring a kenikew te vuntud su midlig-enan a kenikew. Ne tenged te melig-en is kebpekesavuk ku, ne ziyà te ǥehinawa ku ebpekekaǥi a te, “Kenà ad iyan egkemenu.” Piru hein wazà a kenikew seǥipaa, neǥezam ku is kegkahandek.
<range>
Nengumew-umew a kenikew, Nengazen, ne midhangyù a. Ke siak te,
“Hengkey is egkekuwa nu emun ebpatey a? Su kenè en man ebpekezalig kenikew is minatey en. Ne kenè din en daan igkeseysey is kebmetinumanen nu.
Pemineǥa a kenikew, Nengazen, ne kehizuwi a. Ne tevangi a.”
Tenged te tavang nu, mid-ilisan nu te melipayen he kedsayew is keseengan ku. Impeluwas nu kedì is bisti ku he saku he tuus te kedlalew ku, ne mibeǥayan a kenikew te kelipey.
Umbe, kenà a ebpereremek dà, kekenà, egkanta a te menge kedalig kenikew. Nengazen he Megbevayè ku, ebpeselamatan ku sikew te wazà pidtemanan.

Nengazen, diyà a te kenikew med-aput. Ne kenè nu ituǥut he mepeel-elezi a. Libriya a su metazeng ke man.
Pemineǥa a, ne segugunà a kenikew libriya. Kelesaǥi a he iring te nekeendilung a ziyà te vatu; pengelangi a he iring te nekeeles a ziyà te melig-en he elesà.
Geina te iyan ka endilungè ku wey melig-en he elesà, penurua a wey ǥiyahi a su wey ka meveǥayi te zengeg.
Ilikey a kenikew te litag he idlitag kedì te menge kuntada ku, su iyan ka pengalang ku.
Idsarig ku kenikew is untung ku. Libriya a kenikew, Nengazen, su iyan ka kes Megbevayà he egkeseriǥan.
Utew ku egkeepesi is menge etew he ed-azap te wazà menge pulus he menge ed-ezapen, su ziyè e man mulà te kenikew medsarig, Nengazen.
Egkelipey a su veliǥeǥawen ke man. Ne wazà mekeeles kenikew is menge elentusen ku, ne netuenan nu is menge kelised ku.
Wazà a kenikew iveǥey ziyà te menge kuntada ku, kekenà, midlibri a kenikew te kezeetan.
Kehizuwi a, Nengazen, su edlised e en. Nemenlevag en is menge mata ku te kedtulung ku kedsineǥew, ne mibmeluya ad.
Layun ku zuen igkeseeng. Nepipire en he tuig is kebpeketulung ku kebpekesineǥew. Mibmeluya ad tenged te menge elentusen ku, ne henduen be te wazè en desen te menge tulan ku.
Ebpeel-elezan a te menge kuntada ku, lavew en is menge emurè ku te inged. Minsan is menge kilala ku ne nengahandek en he ed-uvey kediey. Emun egkeehè e zan diyà te zalan ne ebpekeziyuan e zan.
In-iring e zan en te minatey su edlipatan e zan en. Iyan ked-isipa zan kedì he iring a te ziniyun he nerupet he wazè din en pulus.
Egkezineg ku is kebpenènaasà te mezakel he menge kuntada. Ebpemiligru a minsan hendei a ebpevayà, su mibpelenuwan e zan te edhimatey.
Iyan, midsarig a ziyà te kenikew, Nengazen. Iyan ka Megbevayè ku.
Is untung ku ne ziyan te kenikew; libriya a te menge kuntada ku he edezaat kedì.
Ipeehè nu is keupiya nu kedì te suluǥuen nu; ne ǥeina te mahal a kenikew, ne libriya a kenikew.
Nengazen, kenè nu ituǥut he mepeel-elezi a, su ziyà a te kenikew megnganey. Iyan nu zà peel-elezi is menge lalung he etew ne penhimetayi nu sikandan, su wey zan mekepereremek en diyà te leveng dan.
Ipetiem nu heeyan is menge teruen he ebpegalbu wey edsudì te menge metazeng.
Utew zekelà is keupiyaanan he idteǥana nu te menge etew he edtahud wey edsarig kenikew. Egkaahà te langun is keupiya nu.
Id-eles nu sikandan diyà te lugar he zutun ka, ne zutun kenà sikandan egkesudì wey egkeinsultuwan te menge etew.
Nengazen, ereg ka he edeliǥen! Su egkein-inuwan is paaǥi te kebpaahaa nu te ǥaǥew nu kedì hein diyà a te sevaha he inged he midlingutan te menge kuntada.
Tenged te utew ku kegkahandek, kunaan ku ke mibpekidsuwey ke en kedì. Iyan, dutun, midineg nu is kebpehizuhizu ku zutun te kebuyù ku te tavang diyà te kenikew.
Sikiyu is menge etew te Nengazen he metinumanen, mahala niw sikandin. Ebentayan te Nengazen is menge metinumanen, iyan, dekelà mulà is idsilut din te menge mepelevawen.
Sikiyu is ebperateng te tavang te Nengazen, mebpekelig-en kew wey mebpekevurut.
Utew zeyzey is etew he nepesaylu en is menge kedrapas din te menge suǥù, wey mibpanas en is menge salè din.
Utew zeyzey is etew he wazè en isipa te Nengazen he mekesesalà sikandin, wey wazà sikandin mebpenlimbung.
Hein wazè ku pa iketug-an is menge salè ku, mibmeluya a, ne henduen te nerupet en is menge tulan ku, tenged te kebpekezag-es ku seled te tivuuk he andew.
Su maandew wey mezukilem is kedsiluti nu kedì; naawè en is desen ku ne henduen be te nekagkag a te meinit he andew.
Ne intug-an ku ziyà te kenikew is menge salè ku; wazè ku in-eles. Ke siak te idtug-an ku is menge salè ku ziyà te kenikew. Ne zutun te kedtug-an ku, mibpesaylu a kenikew.
Umbe, is langun he metinumanen kinahanglan he med-ampù diyà te kenikew zutun te timpu te kelised, su emun ebpekeuma is kelised he iring te zalem, ne kenè dan egkemenu.
Iyan ka elesè ku; pengalang ku zutun te timpu te kelised. Himuwa nu he ebpekeliǥuy kayi te kediey is menge etew he ebpemen-ugyab te kegkelipey zan tenged te kedlibriya nu kediey.
Nengazen, migkaǥi ka kayi te kedì te, “Ibpenurù ku kenikew is dalan he zait he ed-ikulen nu. Ne zutun te kebentayi ku kenikew ne edsembaǥan ku sikew.
Kenè nu iringi is kudà he kenà ebpekesavut, he kinahanglan pa he egkekangan wey edrindahan su para mekepezumazuma.”
Mahabet is menge kemereǥenan he egkeseǥazan te lalung he menge etew, iyan, sikan mulà, is midsarig diyà te Nengazen, ebmahalen din wey edlevanan din sikandan.
Umbe, sikiyu is menge metazeng, lipey kew tenged te mibeelan te Nengazen diyà te keniyu! Sikiyu is nengungubpaan te hustu he paaǥi, ugyab kew tenged te kegkelipey niw!
Sikiyu is menge metazeng, ugyab kew tenged te kegkelipey niw. Sikiyu is nengungubpaan te hustu he paaǥi, deliǥa niw su mezait sikandin he edeliǥen!
Deliǥa niw is Nengazen pinaaǥi te alpa. Tukari niw is Nengazen te zuma pa he menge pezaǥing he zuen din menge kuwirdas.
Kentahi niw sikandin te veǥu he kanta; tukari niw sikandin te meupiya, ne ugyab kew tenged te kegkelipey niw.
Su tutuu is lalag te Nengazen, ne egkeseriǥan is langun he ebeelan din.
Egkasuat is Nengazen he ebaal te metazeng wey hustu. Egkaahà kayi te tivuuk he kelibutan is gaǥew zin.
Pinaaǥi te lalag te Nengazen, nehimu is langit: andew, bulan, wey menge vituen.
Midtingeb din is wahig te zaǥat he henduen be te intaǥù diyà te gerepun etawa insavuk diyà te budiga.
Is langun he etew kayi te kelibutan ereg he edtahud te Nengazen.
Su migkaǥi zà sikandin ne nehimu en is kelibutan. Mibmandù dà sikandin ne nehimu is langun.
Edèdeetan te Nengazen is pelanu te menge nasyun, ne kenè din idtuǥut he medlampus is menge tuyù dan.
Piru is kandin mulà he menge pelanu ne ebpedayun te wazà pidtemanan; is kandin he menge ketuyuan kenà egkaawà taman te taman.
Utew zeyzey is nasyun he iyan Megbevayè din is Nengazen. Utew zeyzey is menge etew he migaked te Nengazen.
Puun diyà te langit edtengtengan te Nengazen is langun he menge etew.
Diyà sikandin te ubpeey zin ne edtengtengan din is langun he ed-ubpà kayi te kelibutan.
Iyan sikandin mibeǥey te isip diyà te langun he menge etew, ne netuenan din is langun he ebpen-ul-ulahan dan.
Is hadì kenà ebpekezaag te tebek tenged dà te kezakel te menge sundaru zin. Is sevaha he sundaru kenà ebpekeǥawas he libri puun te tebek tenged dà te kezesen din.
Kenà tenged te menge kudà is kebpekesiguru te kebpekezaag te tebek. Kenà ebpekelibri is kezesen dan.
Ebentayan te Nengazen is menge edtahud kandin, he edsarig te kebmahala zin kandan.
Iyan sikandin edlibri kandan te kemetayen wey ed-uyag kandan emun timpu te vitil.
Edtaǥad kiw zuma is kedsarig te Nengazen. Iyan sikandin edtavang wey ebpengalang kenitew.
Egkelipey kiw tenged kandin. Su edsarig kiw ziyà te kandin te waǥas he Megbevayà.
Nengazen, deyzey ke kenà egkaawà is kebmahala nu kenami, iring te edsarig key ziyà te kenikew.

Layun ku edeliǥa is Nengazen; kenà a ed-engked he edalig kandin.
Ibpegalbu ku is Nengazen, ne sikiyu is menge edèdaaǥen, pemineg kew wey medlipey.
Duma kew kedì te edalig te Nengazen; edsevaha kiw te kedalig kandin.
Mid-ampù a ziyà te Nengazen ne midtavak e zin. In-awè din is langun he kegkehandek ku.
Ebmelipayen is menge etew he edsarig diyà te kandin, ne kenè dan en egkepeel-elezan.
Mibpengumew is egkaayuayu he etew te Nengazen, ne midtavak din sikandin. Midlibri zin sikandin te langun he kelised din.
Ebentayan te velinsuǥuen te Nengazen is menge etew he edtahud te Nengazen, ne edlibriyen din sikandan te kezeetan.
Gezami niw wey niw metueni ke sengemenu keupiya is Nengazen. Utew zeyzey is etew he midsarig te pengalang te Nengazen kandin.
Sikiyu is metinumanen he menge etew te Nengazen, tehuza niw sikandin. Su is menge edtahud kandin, egkekuwa zan is langun he kinahanglan dan.
Is menge erimaung egkehimu he egkaamin is keenen dan ne egkengevitil zan, iyan, is menge etew mulà he edangep diyà te Nengazen, kenà egkeeminan te meupiya he menge vutang.
Hendini kew is egkengesuat he mebmetau, pemineǥa a keniyu. Ebpenuruen ku sikiyu te kedtahud te Nengazen.
Egkesuat kew ve he mekaangken te kelipey wey melugayad he untung?
Likayi niw is kegkaǥi te mezaat wey kedtarùtarù.
Likayi niw is mezaat he vaal, ne iyan niw veeli is meupiya. Himuwa niw is paaǥi para layun melinew is kebpekidepitè niw te zuma.
Ebentayan te Nengazen is menge metazeng, ne ebpemineǥen din is menge pengemuyù dan.
Piru egkuntedahan din is menge etew he ebaal te mezaat. Edèdeetan din sikandan taman te kenè en sikandan egketenuzan te menge etew kayi te kelibutan.
Ebuyù te tavang diyà te kandin is menge metazeng, ne edtevangan din sikandan. Edlibriyen din sikandan te langun he menge kemereǥenen dan.
Uvey is Nengazen diyà te nengepakyas, ne edlibriyen din is menge etew he naawà is perateng dan.
Minsan mahabet is menge mereǥen he egkehitavù diyà te etew he metazeng, iyan, edlibriyen sikandin te Nengazen te langun dutun.
Kenà duwazuwa is ked-ipata te Nengazen kandin, ne wazà minsan sevaha he tulan din he egkelepù.
Is menge mezaat he vaal, ne iyan ebpekepatey te menge mezaat he etew. Edsilutan te Nengazen sikan is egkeepesan dan is menge metazeng.
Edlibriyen te Nengazen is menge etew zin he menge suluǥuen din. Ne is langun he ed-aput diyà te kandin ne kenè din edsilutan.
Kuntedaha nu, Nengazen, is menge etew he mibpekigkuntada kedì. Pekidtebek ka te menge etew he mibpekidtebek kedì.
Kuwaa nu is kelasag nu wey penagang nu, ne tevangi a.
Endama nu is dezeisey wey dezekelà he vangkew nu wey pemilaka nu is menge etew he edal-as kedì, ne peseriǥi a he edlibriyen a kenikew.
Deyzey ke egkepeel-elezan is menge etew he edtinguhà he edhimatey kedì. Berakat he mekepelaǥuy he egkengeteranta is menge etew he mibpelanu he edezaat kedì.
Deyzey ke egkeiring sikandan te ukap he idlayap te keramag dutun te kedsegseǥa kandan te velinsuǥuen nu.
Berakat he ebmerusirem wey ebmelandeg is egkepeveyaan dan dutun te kedel-asa kandan te velinsuǥuen nu.
Su minsan wazà hustu he hinungdan, mibaal zan te litag he idlitag dan kedì, wey mibangbang dan su para meulug a zutun.
Berakat he metik-awi sikandan meumahi te kezeetan. Berakat he iyan sikandan meuney zuen te idlitag dan kedì. Berakat he iyan sikandan meulug duen te vangbang dan.
Ne zutun egkelipey a tenged te kedlibriya nu kedì, Nengazen.
Ne zutun, ibensag ku is menge lalag he ebpuun diyà te tivuuk te ked-etew ku he edhenduen te, “Wazè nu iyan iring, Nengazen. Edlibriyen nu is menge egkaayuayu wey menge pubri te kedluplupiǥa wey kebintahai kandan.”
