Is mesipala he menge etew ebpenistiǥus kuntra kedì. Ed-uluǥan a zan te kewsa.
Mezaat is ibales dan te meupiya he ebeelan ku ziyà te kandan, umbe neselekawan a utew.
Piru emun egkezeruwan dan, ebpetuusan ku he igkeseeng ku sikandan pinaaǥi te kebivisti ku te saku wey kebpuasa. Ne emun kenà edtevaken is ampù ku para kandan,
epekeriǥuriǥu a is edlalew he iring te suled ku wey emiǥu ku is igkeseeng ku. Nekezuzungul a is egkeseeng su is kegkeseeng ku kandan iring daan te kegkeseeng te sevaha he etew te iney zin.
Iyan, hein iyan ad midlised, mid-amur-amur zan is egkengelipey. Mid-amur-amur zan is edezaat kedì. Ne wazè ku metueni ke maan. Ne edsiguduwan e zan en ed-ituka.
Duma zan is memesudì he wazà medtuu te Megbevayà su utew zekelà is pauk dan kedì.
Nengazen, kenè nu ipedayun is kenè nu kedtavangi kedì. Libriya ad te ked-etekiya kedì kayi te iring te menge erimaung.
Ne zutun te kedlibriya nu kedì, edeliǥen ku sikew wey ebpeselamatan diyà te ketiǥuman te menge etew nu.
Kenè nu ituǥut he melipey is limbungan he menge kuntada ku tenged te kegkezeeǥa zan kedì. Is ebpemendumut kedì te wazà hustu he hinungdan, kenè nu ituǥut he meengiti e zan.
Wazà menge lalag dan he meupiya he ebpekepeupiya te zuma he etew, kekenà, ebaalvaal sikandan te mezaat he tudtul su wey megurigew sikan is melinawen en is ked-ubpè dan kayì he lugar.
Imbensag dan kayi te kediey is pesangil zan, he ke sikandan te, “Neehè dey is mezaat he mibeelan nu.”
Nengazen, neehè nu heeyan, umbe kenè ka và dà redtan. Kenà a kenikew pekeziyui.
Nengazen he Megbevayè ku, levani e en kenikew kayi te menge etew he mibpesangil kedì.
Nengazen he Megbevayè ku, ǥeina te kenè ka ebpemintahà, ne ipetueni nu te menge etew he wazè ku salà. Kenè nu ituǥut he ed-eengitan e zan.
Kenè nu ituǥut he mekekaǥi sikandan te, “Netuman en human is penganduy zey te kedezaat kandin!”
Is langun he iyan igkelipey zan is menge kebpekaantus ku, berakat he egkepeel-elezan wey egkeliveg sikandan. Berakat he sikan is langun he neminusan kediey, kenà medlampus is tuyù dan wey mepeel-elezi sikandan.
Berakat he mekeugyab te kegkelipey is menge etew he igkelipey zan is kenà ked-utengi kedì te salà he impesangil kedì. Berakat he layun sikandan mekekaǥi te, “Utew zait he edeliǥen is Nengazen ne igkelipey zin is keupiyaanan te suluǥuen din.”
Edtudtulen ku is ketazeng nu, wey layun ku sikew edeliǥa.

Iyan heini lalag he taǥù kayi te ǥehinawa ku mehitenged te kegkemekesesalà te lalung he etew: Is lalung he etew ne kenà egkahandek te Megbevayà.
Su metikang is ked-isipa zin te keugelingen din, kenè din egkaahà is kelelalung din he ereg pezem he egkeepesan din.
Mezaat wey tarù is menge lalag din, ne kenè din en ed-ul-ulahan is hustu wey meupiya.
Minsan edhidhizeǥà sikandin ne ebpelanu sikandin te mezaat. Dekelà is gehinawa zin te kebaal te kenà meupiya, ne kenè din id-awà diyà te isip din is kebaal te mezaat.
Nengazen, is gaǥew nu wey kegkemetinumanen, ne kenà egkesukud; metikang pa heini te langit.
Is ketazeng nu, ne melig-en; igkepetug-iring te metikang he menge vuntud. Is hustu he kedhukum nu, ne kenà egketegkad; igkepetug-iring te mezalem he zaǥat su kenà egketegkad. Ed-eturen nu, Nengazen, is menge etew wey menge langgam.
Megbevayè ku, utew mahal is gaǥew nu. Ebpengelangan nu is menge etew iring te kedlekupi te tagbis te pispis din.
Nengeperahan sikandan te idsegkayà he keenen diyà te valey nu; ipeinum nu sikandan te metaam he wahig nu.
Su iyan ka ebpuunan te untung. Edteyawan key kenikew, ne neteyawan is menge isip dey.
Ipedayun nu is kebmahala nu te menge etew he migkilala kenikew. Ipedayun nu is kebaal nu te meupiya ziyà te menge etew he midtinazeng.
Kenè nu ituǥut he mezaag a te menge lalung wey menge gelbuwen he kuntada ku.
Egkezeetan is lalung he menge etew, ne kenè en sikandan ebpekeenew.
Kenè ka mesemuki mehitenged te lalung he menge etew; kenè ka mesina te memezaat is baal.
Su kenà egkeuǥet ne egkeiring sikandan te sagbet he ebpatey, etawa iring te menge pinemula he egkeǥangu.
Sarig ka te Nengazen, ne ul-ulaha nu is meupiya. Pengungubpaan ka kayi te tanà he wazè nu igkahandek he ebpekekaid.
Tinguhaa nu he iyan mekeveǥey kenikew te kelipey is Nengazen, ne ibeǥey zin kenikew is ebpengenduyen nu.
Ipeveyveyai nu te Nengazen is tivuuk he untung nu; sarig ka ziyà te kandin ne ebeelan din heini ziyà te kenikew:
Edhimuwen din he utew keladu is kebpezeyaǥa zin he metazeng ka wey wazè nu salà, iring kekeladu te silà te andew ke meudtu.
Mebmelinawen ka ziyà te etuvangan te Nengazen ne kenè ka medarà is edtaǥad te ebeelan din. Kenè ka mesemuki emun duen menge etew he ebmeuswaǥen wey edlampus is mezaat he menge pelanu zan.
Kenè nu ituǥut he zuen pauk etawa seeng diyà te ǥehinawa nu tenged kandan. Kenè ka mesemuki, su ebpekezezaat heini kenikew.
Su is lalung he menge etew edsegseǥen puun te tanà he Israel, piru is menge etew he edsarig te Nengazen ne ebpedayun is ked-ubpè dan kayi he tanà.
Kenà egkeuǥet egkahanew is lalung he menge etew. Ne minsan ke ebpen-ahaan niw pa sikandan, ne kenè niw en egkaahà.
Piru is kenà memepelevawen ebpedayun is kandan he ked-ubpà kayì te tanà he Israel he dezeyaan is kebpekesavuk dan.
Is lalung he menge etew ebpelanu te mezaat diyà te menge metazeng, wey utew zan egkeepesi is menge metazeng.
Iyan, ed-engitan dà sikandan te Nengazen, su netuenan din he hapit en egkeuma is timpu te kedezeeti kandan.
Edhulevuten te lalung he menge etew is ispada zan, wey edhingaten dan is panè dan, su edhimetayan dan is menge egkaayuayu wey menge pubri he midtinazeng.
Piru iyan sikandan egkeuney egketiyuk te ispada zan, ne egkengevadtì is menge panè dan.
Is deisey he azen te metazeng meupiya pa kenà is mahabet he ketiǥeyunan te lalung he menge etew.
Su id-awà te Nengazen is desen te menge lalung, ne edtevangan din mulà is menge metazeng.
Ed-eturen te Nengazen is menge etew he wazà igkesewayi kandan. Ne is egkepengevilin dan ne kenà egkaawà diyà te kandan te taman te taman.
Ne minsan timpu te vangkit kenà sikandan egkemenu, ne minsan timpu te vitil ne zekelà is keenen dan.
Iyan, is menge lalung egkengezeetan mulà sikandan. Is menge kuntada te Nengazen egkeiring te bulak su ebpematey zan dà. Egkengahanew sikandan iring te evel.
Is lalung he menge etew ne emun ed-utang ne kenà ebayad. Ne kelelaǥan mulà is menge metazeng.
Is menge etew he edtuvazan te Nengazen, ebpedayun is ked-ubpè dan kayi te tanà he Israel. Piru is etew he edrewakan din edsegseǥen puun kayi he tanà.
Egiyahan te Nengazen is kada langkad te etew he ebpekepenunuat te Nengazen is kebpengungubpaan din.
Minsan ebpekesipà sikandin ne kenà egkepiley su egewazen sikandin te Nengazen.
Puun te vatè e pa taman en guntaan te meǥurang e en, ne wazè e pa mekaahà te metazeng he menge etew he mibey-anan te Nengazen etawa mekepekilimus te keenen is menge anak dan.
Layun pa sikandan ebpekepememeǥey wey ebpekepesambey, ne is menge anak dan nehimu he tuvad diyà te zuma he menge etew.
Likayi niw is mezaat ne veeli niw is meupiya su para taman te taman is kebpekeubpè niw kayi te tanà he Israel.
Su igkesuat te Nengazen is hustu he kukuman ne kenè din ebpesegdanen sikan is menge metinumanen he edsunud kandin. Edtipiǥan din sikandan te taman te taman, piru is menge kevuwazan te lalung he menge etew ne edsegseǥen mulà puun te tanà he Israel.
Is menge metazeng mulà pedayun he ebpekeubpà dutun te tanà te taman te taman.
Hustu is menge lalag te metazeng ne egkezumahan te ketau.
Edtipiǥan din diyà te ǥehinawa zin is menge kesuǥuan te Megbevayè din ne kenè din heini edrepasen.
Is lalung he menge etew, ed-eyanan dan is menge metazeng, su egkesuatan dan te edhimatey.
Piru kenà idtuǥut te Nengazen he mepatey zan is menge metazeng. Ne kenà idtuǥut te Nengazen he mehukumi te silut is menge metazeng emun ebpekeetuvang dan diyà te hukmanan.
Sarig ka te Nengazen ne tumana nu is paaǥi zin, ne ebeǥayan ke zin te zengeg pinaaǥi te pedayun he kebpeubpaa zin kenikew kayi te tanà kayi te Israel. Ne egkeehè nu is kedsegseǥa te menge mezaat he etew puun keniyan he tanà.
Hein nehuna he timpu, duen neehè ku he lalung he etew he ebpendaagdaag. Ed-isipen din is keugelingen din he lavew te zuma; iring sikandin te metawis he kayu he sidru ziyà te Lebanon.
Iyan, te huziyan he timpu minatey sikandin; nahanew en sikandin. Mibpen-ehè ku sikandin, ne wazè ku en maahà.
Ne ahaa nu purungi is etew he wazà duen igkesawey he ebpengungubpaan te hustu wey melinew. Duen din mulà meupiya he egkepaabut.
Piru is menge mekesesalà ne pudu ebpendezeeti; wazà meupiya he egkepaabut dan.
Baal te Nengazen is kelibriyanan te menge metazeng. Iyan sikandin edhimu te paaǥi para kenà sikandan memenu emun timpu te kelised.
Edtevangan din sikandan ne edlibriyen din te kegkeiza kandan te menge mezaat he etew, su ziyè man sikandan med-aput te kandin.

Nengazen, minsan egkepeukan a kenikew ne kenà a kenikew sewaya.
Henduen be te mibpanà a kenikew wey midlepadu te mesakit.
Tenged te kegkepauk nu te kebpekevaal ku te menge salà, ne kenà meupiya is kegezamgezam ku kayi te lawa ku.
Henduen be te egkelened ad te menge salè ku, iring heini te meveǥat he uwiten he kenè ku egkehenat.
Tenged te kezuzupangi ku, nengeredak is menge palì ku ne mibmemahù.
Egkevekut e en te utew ku kegkesekiti, ne tivuuk he andew is kedlalew ku.
Ne kenà meupiya is kegezamgezam ku kayi te tivuuk he lawa ku su ed-al-al is peka ku.
Ne utew e en meluya. Ebpekezag-es a tenged te mesakit he egkeǥezam ku.
Nengazen, netuenan nu is langun he penganduy ku he meulii a, wey nezineg nu is kedag-es ku.
Ebpekehuyab is kumeng ku; wazè ku en desen, ne kenè e en utew ebpekaahà.
Midlikayan ad te menge emiǥu ku wey menge zuma ku tenged te zaru ku. Minsan is menge kezuzumahi ku ne mibpekeziyuan e zan en.
Edtuǥesen a te menge etew he egkesuat he edhimatey kedì. Ne sikan is egkesuat he ebpaantus kedì, midhisgutan dan is paaǥi te kedezeeti zan kedì. Tivuuk he andew is kebpelanu zan te kedluib kedì.
Mibpevevengel e zà wey mibpeeemew he henduen be te kena a ebpekezineg wey ebpekekaǥi.
Ebpevevengelan ku zà is mezaat he menge pelanu zan ne wazà ad megkaǥi.
Su midsarig a kenikew, Nengazen. Iyan ka, Nengazen he Megbevayè ku, iyan ka edtavak te ampù ku.
Su mid-ampù a ziyà te kenikew he kenè nu ituǥut he melipey wey mekepahambug is menge kuntada ku tenged te kegkezèdeeti zan kediey.
Henduen be te egkezeetan ad, ne kenà egkeengked is ked-antus ku.
Idtug-an ku is menge salè ku he nekesamuk kediey.
Melig-en wey mahabet is menge kuntada ku. Egkeepesan e zan minsan te wazà hustu he hinungdan.
Mezaat is ibales dan te menge meupiya he vaal ku kandan. Ne egkuntedahan a zan su ebpeninguhà a he ebaal te meupiya.
Nengazen he Megbevayè ku, kenà a kenikew pesegdana; kenà a kenikew pekeziyui.
Tevangi e en guntaan kenikew, Nengazen he menluluwas ku.

Nekekaǥi a kayi te gehinawa ku te, “Ebpekeventayan ku is ed-ul-ulahan ku, ne edlikayan ku he mekesalà a pinaaǥi te kegkaǥikaǥi ku. Ebpeninguhaan ku he kenà a mekeriklamu ziyà te Megbevayà. Lavew en ke ziyà te uvey ku is lalung he menge etew.”
Umbe, mibpereremek e zà, ne wazà ad megkaǥikaǥi. Iyan, wazà heini meketavang kedì su nasì en med-iseg is mesakit he egkeǥezam ku.
Ne nesemukan utew is isip ku. Ne hein edtulungan ku en egngunngunua ke ebpedayun e ve he ebpereremek etawa kenà, ne nasì en med-iseg is kegkesemuki te isip ku. Umbe wazè ku en meeǥen is gehinawa ku; nekekaǥi a te,
“Nengazen, petentenuzi nu kedì he zuen ketepusan te untung ku wey nevilang en is kahabet te menge andew te ked-ubpè ku; ipesavut nu kedì ke sengemenu zà keluǥayad is untung ku.”
Utew zà mevavà is untung he imbeǥey nu kediey. Diyà te kenikew is keluǥayad te untung ku ne wazè din bali. Su is tutuu iyan heini: is untung te etew ne iring dà te keramag he edlavey zà,
wey iring te alung he egkaawà. Utew egkesamuk is etew te menge vuluhaten he wazè din pulus. Edtiǥum sikandin te menge ketiǥeyunan, iyan, emun ebpatey en sikandin, ne kenè din en egketuenan ke hentei is egkepulusan dutun.
Guntaan, Nengazen, wazè en duma he edseriǥan ku. Iyan ke zà edseriǥan ku.
Ipelingkawas a te langun he menge salè ku, ne kenè nu ituǥut he sudia a te menge tulebung.
Ebpereremek e en; kenà ad edriklamu, su iyan ka midrasey kedì.
Guntaan, kenà ad kenikew siluti. Su henduen e en te ebpatey kayi te kebpeentusa nu kedì.
Ebmensuwen nu is etew pinaaǥi te kedsewaya nu kandin, tenged te menge salè din. Ne iring is ebeelan nu te kegketket su id-awè nu id-amin is mahalen he menge azen din. Tutuu iyan he iring dà te keramag is untung te etew su edlavey zà.
Nengazen, tevaka nu is ked-ampù ku; pemineǥa nu is kebuyù ku te tavang. Seǥipaa nu is kedsineǥew ku. Su iring e zà te lumelengyawà he meǥeliyug nu kayi te kelibutan, iring te langun he menge kepuun ku.
Kena ad kenikew kepeuki, su para mebmelipayen a te kenè e pa ebpatey.

Wazà a medarà he edtaǥad te Nengazen, ne mibpemineg din is kebuyù ku te tavang diyà te kandin.
Henduen be te mibatun e zin puun te mekulbà he vudsi etawa tunaan, ne iring te impeuntud e zin diyà te vatu su para kenà a mekeizi.
Mibpenurù e zin te veǥu he kanta, kanta te kedalig kandin te Megbevayè tew. Ne mahabet he etew is ebpekaahà te mibeelan te Megbevayà ne ebpeketahud wey ebpekesarig dan kandin.
Utew zeyzey is etew he edsarig te Nengazen, ne kenà edangep diyà te menge gelbuwen he iyan edsunuzen dan is tarù.
Nengazen he Megbevayè ku, wazà ebpekeiring kenikew. Mahabet is egkein-inuwan he mibeelan nu, wey mahabet is menge pelanu nu para kenami. Ne kenè ku heini igkeseysey pudu su utew medmezakel.
Wazà mekepenunuat kenikew is nekedseselekawà he kelasi te menge pemuhat. Wazè ka mebuyù te menge pemuhat he edtutungen wey pemuhat he para idlumpiyu. Kekenà, midhimu a kenikew he mepezumdumahan kenikew.
Umbe, migkaǥi a te, “Heini e zed, andam a he edtuman te menge suǥù nu sumalà is ingkesurat he menge lalag nu mehitenged kedì.
Megbevayè ku, igkelipey ku is kedtuman te egkesuatan nu. Edtipiǥan ku ziyà te ǥehinawa ku is menge kesuǥuan nu.”
Edtudtulen ku is kedlibriya nu kedì diyà te egketiǥum he menge etew nu. Netuenan nu Nengazen he kenà a ed-engked he edtudtul kayi.
Is kedlibriya nu kediey wazè ku ziyè dà tipiǥi te ǥehinawa ku, kekenà, ibpenudtul ku zaan he metinumanen ka wey edluwas ka. Ne wazè ku ieles is gaǥew nu wey ketutuanan diyà te ketiǥuman dey te menge etew nu.
Nengazen, kenè nu eǥena is hizu nu kediey. Berakat he is gaǥew nu wey kebmetinumanen nu egkehimu he iyan layun pengalang ku.
Henduen be te edliǥuy kedì is menge kelised he utew subra is kahabet. Henduen be te egketembunan ad te menge salè ku, ne kenà ad ebpeketuredu te hustu he ibayè ku. Henduen be te edhuna pa he mezakel is menge salè ku te vulvul ku, ne tenged kayi naawè en is kevurut ku.
Nengazen, libriya a kenikew. Tevangi ad guntaan.
Berakat he is langun he edtinguhà he edezaat kedì ne egkepeel-elezan wey egkeliveg.
Berakat he is menge etew he edsudì kedì egkeinuinu ne egkepeel-elezan sikandan.
Berakat he melipey is langun he midangep diyà te kenikew. Berakat he layun mekekaǥi sikan is menge etew he mepeselematen te kedlibriya nu kandan te, “Dait he edeliǥen is Nengazen”
Bahin kedì, egkaayuayu a wey pubri a. Berakat he isipa a kenikew, Nengazen. Iyan ka ebpeketavang wey ebpekelibri kedì. He Megbevayè ku, tevangi e en guntaan.

Utew zeyzey is etew he edtevang te menge egkaayuayu. Su edtevangan sikandan te Nengazen emun timpu te kelised.
Egkelesaǥan sikandin te Nengazen wey edtipiǥan is untung din. Edtuvazan sikandin te Nengazen kayi te tanà he Israel; kenà sikandin ibeǥey ziyà te menge kuntada zin.
Edtevangan sikandin te Nengazen ke egkezeruwan; ebewian din sikandin te egkeǥezam din.
Migkaǥi a te, “Nengazen, kehizuwi a kenikew. Bewii a, su edtug-an a he nekesalà a ziyà te kenikew.”
Mezaat is migkaǥi te menge kuntada ku mehitenged kedì. Ke sikandan te, “Deyzey ke ebpatey en sikandin su wey melipati en.”
Uvag kun edleuyen e zan, piru ebpen-ehè dan bes te mezaat he egketudtul zan mehitenged kediey. Ne emun diyè dan en te ǥawas ne ebpenudtulen dan haazà diyà te zuma.
Is langun he egkeepes kedì ne ebpenèneesà mehitenged kediey, ne ed-isip-isip dan te mezaat ke ebmenumenu zan para mezeeti a.
Ke sikandan te, “Utew en gerabi is daru zin, umbe kenè ne sikandin ebpekeenew.”
Minsan is emiǥu ku utew he egkeseriǥan ku he mibpekidtuǥen kedì te egkaan ne iyan midluib kedì.
Piru sikew, Nengazen, kehizuwi a kenikew; bewii a kenikew su wey a mekevales te menge kuntada ku.
Ne egketuenan ku he nekepenunuat a kenikew, su kenè nu idtuǥut he mezaag a te menge kuntada ku.
Tenged te wazà mezaat he vaal ku, ne idtuǥut nu he mekeubpà a zuma kenikew te wazà pidtemanan.
Edeliǥen is Nengazen he Megbevayà te Israel te wazà pidtemanan. Amen! Amen!

Is kebpenginahanglan ku kenikew te Megbevayè ku, iring te kebpenginahanglan te selazeng te wahig emun egkemezahan sikandin.
Egkemezahan a kenikew he iyan uuyag he Megbevayà. Keenu e pa vuwa ebpekehendiyà te valey nu te ked-uvey ziyà te etuvangan nu?
Maandew wey mezukilem is kebpekesineǥew ku ne samè dà kenè ku meinum is luhè ku, ne zutun edtulung ed-insà is menge etew te, “Hendei en be is Megbevayè nu he edtavang kenikew?”
Kenà meupiya is isip ku emun egketenuzan ku he zutun te nehuna he timpu iyan a nengulu te mezakel he menge etew te kedhendiyà te valey nu. Ne edsilibra key zuma is ked-ugyab te kegkelipey wey kebpeselamat kenikew.
Piru kenà a ereg he egkeseeng wey egkeǥiyaǥiya. Ereg a he edsarig kenikew. Uya, ed-umanan ku sikew edeliǥa, is menluluwas wey Megbevayè ku.
Utew a neseeng; is kegkeseeng ku iring te edeǥurus he seleg te evaǥa he ebpeketambun kediey. Umbe edtentenuzan ku sikew ǥuntaan te kayi a te tanà he uvey te Jordan wey Hermon, kayi te Buntud he Mizar.
<range>
Emun maandew ibpeehè nu is gaǥew nu Nengazen, umbe emun mezukilem en, egkanta a te ked-ampù diyà te kenikew te Megbevayà he mibeǥey kedì te untung ku.
He Megbevayà he endilungè ku, egkaǥi a ziyà te kenikew te, “Maan is edlipatan a kenikew? Maan is kinahanglan pa he egkeseeng a tenged te kedèdaaǥa kedì te menge kuntada ku?”
Henduen be te nerupet en is menge tulan ku tenged te kebpeel-elezi zan kedì. Egkeǥiyan e zan te, “Hendei en be is Megbevayè nu he edtavang kenikew?”
Maan is egkeseeng a wey egkeǥiyaǥiya? Te ereg e man he edsarig kenikew, ne ed-umanan ku sikew edeliǥa is menluluwas ku he Megbevayè ku.
He Megbevayà, ipeehè nu he wazè ku salà, ne levani a su wey a kenà mezezeeti te menge etew he kenà edtuu te Megbevayà. Libriya a te kedezeeti kedì te limbungan wey lalung he menge etew.
Iyan ka, Megbevayà melig-en he eputè ku. Ne maan is inselikwey a kenikew? Maan is kinahanglan pa he egkeseeng a tenged te kedèdaaǥa kedì te menge kuntada?
Teyawi a ne penurua a te tutuu su para meǥiyahi a te kebpekid-uliey kenikew ziyà te valey nu he ziyà te segradu he vuvungan.
Ne zutun ed-uvey a ziyà te pemuhatà he zutun ka ebpemuhata, Megbevayè ku, iyan ka ebeǥey kedì te kelipey. Megbevayè ku, edeliǥen ku sikew pinaaǥi te kedtukar te alpa.
Maan is egkeseeng a wey egkeǥiyaǥiya? Ereg a he edsarig kenikew. Uya, ed-umanan ku sikew edeliǥa, is menluluwas wey Megbevayè ku.

He Megbevayà, netudtul kenami te menge kepuun dey is mibpemeelan nu hein kaazen dan pa zutun te neuǥet en he timpu,
he mibpenegseg nu is menge etew he wazà medtuu kenikew ne iyan nu impeubpà diyà te ed-ubpaan dan is menge kepuun dey. Impaantus nu haazà he menge etew ne impeuswag nu mulà is menge kepuun dey.
Piru iyan tutuu is, kenà pinaaǥi te ǥumaan wey ketau te kebpekidtebek is ingkeengkena te menge kepuun dey kayi he tanà, kekenà, tenged te ǥehem nu, ebilidad nu, wey hizu nu kandan tenged te kebmahala nu kandan.
Iyan ka hadì ku wey Megbevayè ku; iyan ka mibeǥey te kezeeǥan diyà te kenami te menge kevuwazan ni Jacob.
Pinaaǥi kenikew egkezaag dey is menge kuntada zey.
Wazà a medsarig he iyan ibpekezaag ku is panè ku wey ispada ku.
Su iyan ka ebpengelintau para mezaag dey is menge kuntada zey. Ebpeel-elezan nu is ebpekidtebek kenami.
He Megbevayà, iyan ka ibpehivantug dey layun, ne edeliǥen dey sikew te wazà pidtemanan.
Piru ǥuntaan, inselikwey key en kenikew ne intuǥut nu he mepeel-elezi key. Wazè nu en dumahi is menge sundaru zey.
Ketau nu is kegkepeleǥuwi zey te menge kuntada zey. Ne mibpenavan dan is menge azen dey.
Intuǥut nu he mebpematey key iring te menge kerehidu he mibpenlapà. Ne impeyapat key kenikew ziyà te menge nasyun.
Sikami is menge etew nu, ne henduen be te imbelegyè key zà kenikew te veratu. Henduen te wazè dey pulus diyà te kenikew.
Kenikew he ketau is kegkepeel-elezi kenami wey ked-eengiti kenami te siringan dey he menge nasyun.
Duen pa menge erubasa zan he ebpekeinsultu kenami, ne ebpurung dà sikandan ebpenggemen-gemen is edsudì kenami.
Layun ad ebpeel-elezi. Ne igkeeled ku en is kegkaahaa te vuked ku,
tenged te ebpengeǥiyen wey ked-insultuwi kedì te menge kuntada ku he egkesuat he ebpenimales kedì.
Nehitavù heini is langun minsan pa te wazè dey sikew lipati, ne wazè key zaan medrapas te paaǥi te kebpekid-uyun nu kenami.
Wazè key med-iniyug kenikew ne wazè key medsuwey ziyà te zalan he ibpeikul nu kenami.
Iyan, henduen be te midrupet key kenikew wey mibey-anan diyà te utew merusirem he ed-ubpaan te leew he menge asu.
He Megbevayà, egketuenan nu emun midlipatan dey sikew wey ke ziyè key ed-ampù te zuma he menge megbevayà, su egketuenan nu man minsan is id-eles te etew he isip din.
<range>
Iyan, tenged te kedtuu zey kenikew, ne layun key en ebpemiligru te kemetayen. Iring key te kerehidu he para edlepaan.
Sigi en, Nengazen, waleng kad! Kenè key kenikew iniyuǥi taman te taman.
Maan is mid-elesan key kenikew wey wazè key kenikew seǥipaa kayi te menge elentusen dey wey kedèdaaǥa kenami?
Iring key te nengepiley ziyà te tanà he kenè en ebpekeenew.
Gègaani key en tevangi; libriya key su mahal key man kenikew.

Is isip ku nepenù te mekempet he menge lalag hein idseysey ku en is ebpemulvulakan he menge lalag he para zuen te hadì. Ne is ketau ku te kegkaǥi ne iring te ketau zuen te utew metau he menunurat.
Mahal he Hadì, iyan ka utew mezagwey te langun he menge maama, ne is menge lalag he egawas diyà te vèbè nu ebpekeveǥey te keupiyaanan te zuma he etew, su ǥeina te layun ka edtuvazi te Megbevayà.
Inseluniket nu is ispada nu, mevurut he hadì; mekeǥeǥehem ka wey meupiya is dengeg nu.
Utew meupiya is dengeg nu; mezeeǥen ka ke edsurung ka para te kedlevani nu te tutuu wey hustu he kukuman para te menge edèdaaǥen. Ne tenged te ǥehem nu ebeelan nu is egkein-inuwan he menge vaal.
Pelii nu te meǥarang he menge vala te panè nu is menge pusung te menge kuntada nu. Ebpesakup kenikew is menge nasyun.
Is ginhedian nu, Megbevayà, ebpedayun te wazà pidtemanan, ne metazeng is kedumelaha nu kayi.
Igkesuat nu is metazeng, iyan, igkeepes nu mulà is mezaat. Umbe, mibpilì ka te Megbevayà he Megbevayè nu, ne imbeǥey zin kenikew is kelipey he lavew pa te kelipey te menge zuma nu.
Is bisti nu mehemut te pehemut he mira, aloe, wey kasia. Edlenganen ka te menge musikiru te menge gelemiten te kedtukar he ziyà te seled te turuǥan nu, ne haazà he turuǥan, mahal is indayandayan duen.
Nepipira zuen te dungganen he menge vahi nu is menge anak te menge hadì. Ne ziyà te egkekewanan nu, edhithitindeg is egkehimu he rayna nu he midsun-ud te elahas he lunsey he vulawan he ebpuun te Ofir.
Sikew is ed-esewaan te hadì, pemineǥa nu is egkeǥiyen ku: lipati nu en is menge emurè nu te inged wey is menge kezuzumahi nu,
su utew ka nesuati te hadì tenged te kekempet nu. Tehuza nu sikandin su egalen nu sikandin.
Is menge meǥinged diyà te Tyre, ragkes en is utew menge sepian, ebeǥayan ke zan te menge azen su wey nu mepurung sikandan meseǥipà.
Utew ka mekempet keniyan te seled te turuǥan nu. Is bisti nu binurdahan te vulawan.
Idsun-ud diyà te kenikew is mekempet he visti nu ne ed-uwiten ka ziyà te hadì. Ne is menge raǥa he edumahan diyà te kenikew edtinundug kenikew, su iyan sikandan avey nu.
Ne utew zekelà is kelipey niw zutun te kedseled niw ziyà te turuǥan dutun te hadì.
Mahal he Hadì, is menge kevuwazan nu he menge maama egkengehimu zaan he hadì he iring te menge kepuun dan. Ne edhimuwen nu sikandan he menge pengulu te tivuuk he tanà.
Edhimuwen ku he kenè ka egkelipatan te langun he egkelapislapis he kevuwazan. Umbe taman te taman is kedeliǥa kenikew te menge nasyun.

Is Megbevayà iyan ebpengalang kenitew wey iyan ebeǥey kenitew te zesen. Ne layun sikandin andam he edtavang emun timpu te kelised.
Umbe, kenè kiw egkahandek minsan pa ke egkehuyung is tanà ne egkengetempag is menge vuntud ne egkengeulug diyà te zizalem te zaǥat,
minsan pa ke ebpurung ebpemaǥel is daǥat he iyan igkengehuyung te menge vuntud.
Duen wahig he ebpekeveǥey te kelipey ziyà te inged te Megbevayà, kes segradu he ubpeey te Utew Lavew he Megbevayà.
Kayi he inged ed-ubpà is Megbevayà, umbe kenà heini egkezeetan. Kenà edlanganlangan is Megbevayà para te kedtavang kayi he inged.
Egkengeheratan is menge nasyun; egkengehuyung is menge ginhedian. Tenged te kulehian te Megbevayà henduen be te egketunew en te kegkahandek is menge etew kayi te tivuuk he kelibutan.
Duma tew is Nengazen he Mekeǥeǥehem. Iyan sikandin Megbevayà ni Jacob, ne iyan sikandin eputè tew.
Hengkayi kew, ahaa niw is menge bineelan te Nengazen, is egkengein-inuwan he menge vaal zin kayi te kelibutan.
Ibpeengked din is menge tebek kayi te tivuuk he kelibutan. Ebpemedtìen din is menge panà wey menge vangkew, ne idrapug din is menge kelasag.
Migkaǥi sikandan te, “Engked kew en he ebpetebtebekà. Ne kilelaa a keniyu is Megbevayà. Ebentuǥen a te menge nasyun kayi te tivuuk he kelibutan.”
Duma tew is Nengazen he Mekeǥeǥehem. Iyan sikandin Megbevayà ni Jacob, ne iyan sikandin eputè tew.

Sikiyu is langun he keet-etawan diyà te menge nasyun, pelakpak kew wey ugyab kew te kedalig te Megbevayà he egkezumahan te kelipey.
Utew telehuzen is Nengazen he iyan kes Utew Lavew he Megbevayà. Mekeǥeǥehem sikandin he hadì te tivuuk he kelibutan.
Edhimuwen din he iyan key edumala is menge tig-Israel te menge nasyun.
Mibpilì din is tanà he egkepengevilin dey, he iyan kes tanà he impehivantug te pinelanggè din he si Jacob.
Dutun te kedhendiyà te Megbevayà te pinuuwè din te kedhadì, ed-ugyab is menge etew te kegkelipey zan duma is kebpezaǥing te menge vudyung.
Kanta kew te kedalig te Megbevayà. Kanta kew te kedalig te hadì tew.
Su iyan is Megbevayà hadì te tivuuk he kelibutan. Deliǥa niw sikandin pinaaǥi te menge kanta.
Ebpinuu sikandin diyà te segradu he pinuuwè din te kedhadì su edhedian din is menge nasyun.
Edtiǥum is menge pengulu te menge nasyun duma is menge etew te Megbevayà ni Abraham. Su is menge pengulu te kelibutan gaked te Megbevayà. Mezait iyan sikandin he edeliǥen.

Mekeǥeǥehem is Nengazen he Megbevayè tew, ne ereg sikandin he edeliǥen is diyà te inged din he iyan is Jerusalem he ziyà te segradu he vuvungan din.
Mekempet is ketikang kayi he vuvungan ne ebpekeveǥey te kelipey te tivuuk he kelibutan. Heini is segradu he Buvungan he Zion iyan inged te Mekeǥeǥehem he Hadì.
Diyà is Megbevayà te melig-en he menge vahin te Jerusalem, ne impeehè din en te menge meǥinged kayi he iyan sikandin eputè dan.
Midtigum is menge hadì su edsurungen dan is Jerusalem.
Piru zuen dan naahà he ingkeinuinu zan; nahandek dan ne mibpemelaǥuy zan.
Mibpengerker sikandan te kegkahandek wey kegkesekiti; neiring sikandan te vahi he ebeliliten.
Midèdeetan sikandan te Megbevayà; neiring sikandan te varku ziyà te Tarshish he nesuǥat te mevendes he keramag he ebpuun diyà te edsilaan.
Netudtulan key zà dengan te menge vaal te Megbevayà, ne guntaan neehè dey en heini ziyà te inged te Megbevayè dey, he Mekeǥeǥehem he Nengazen. Edlig-enan din heini he inged te taman te taman.
He Megbevayà, mibpurungan dey ngunngunua is gaǥew nu hein diyè key te seled te valey nu.
Ebentuǥen ka ne edeliǥen ka te menge etew seled te tivuuk he kelibutan, tenged te mezeeǥen ka pinaaǥi te ǥehem nu.
Egkelipey is menge meǥinged diyà te Zion wey is diyà te zuma pa he menge inged diyà te Juda, tenged te metazeng he kedhukum nu.
Menge tig-Israel, liǥuya niw is Zion ne vilanga niw is menge turi kayi.
Purungi niw ahaa is menge verengbeng wey is melig-en he menge vahin kayi te inged, su para metudtul niw ziyà te edsunud he menge lapis te kevuwazan
he is Megbevayà he edsilbiyan tew ǥuntaan iyan kes Megbevayè tew te wazà pidtemanan. Iyan sikandin egiya kenitew te wazà pidtemanan.

Pemineg kew is langun he menge etew he ed-ubpà kayi te kelibutan,
dekelà is dengeg din etawa kenà, sepian etawa pubri.
Egkaǥi a te egkezumahan te ketau ne zekelà is pulus te ked-isip-isip ku.
Ebpemineg a te menge erubasa ne idseysey ku is menge kehuluǥan dan, dutun te edtukar a te alpa.
Minsan ke egkehitavù is bangkit, ne minsan ke edliǥuyan a te lalung wey limbungan he menge etew he edsarig wey ebpahambug tenged te azen dan, ne kenà a egkahandek.
<range>
Is etew kenà ebpekehimu he ebayad diyà te Megbevayà para kenè en sikandin mebpatey.
Su ǥeina te utew mahal is untung, ne minsan sengemenu kezekelà ne kenà ereg he ibayad
para meuyag is etew te wazà pidtemanan ne kenè en mebpatey.
Su netuenan en te langun he minsan is uluwanen he etew ne ebpematey, iring din daan sikan is menge tulebung wey menge taleng. Ne emun ebpematey zan en igketaǥak dan dà is menge ketiǥeyunan dan diyà te zuma.
Is menge leveng dan iyan en baley zan te wazà pidtemanan. Ne zutun sikandan ebpekeubpà te taman te taman, minsan pa ke zuen dan tanà hein uuyag dan pa.
Minsan ke sepian is etew ne ebpatey ǥihapun iring te uyaǥen etawa leew.
Iyan heini egkepeveyaan te menge etew he edsarig te keugelingen dan wey sikan is ebpekeuyun te egkeǥiyen dan.
Netendek en is kebpatey zan iring te menge kerehidu. Ne is kemetayen iyan egiya kandan pehendiyà te penlevengà, iring te ed-elima he iyan egiya te menge kerehidu. Emun egkepawà, egkeveyveyaan sikandan duen te menge etew he midtinazeng. Egkengeredak is nemematey. Iyan en egkehimu he ubpeey zan, is leveng.
Piru siak mulà, edlibriyen a te Megbevayà te ǥehem te kemetayen, su egkuwaan e zin.
Kenè ka mesina ke edsepian is duma, wey emun egkeumanan pa is ketiǥeyunan te pemilya zan.
Su kenè dan heeyan egkeuwit emun ebpatey zan en; is ketiǥeyunan dan kenè dan egkeuwit diyà te leveng.
Dutun te uuyag pa sikandan, ne iyan ked-isipa zan te keugelingen dan he midtuvazan sikandan te Megbevayà, ne edeliǥen sikandan te menge etew tenged te kegkemeuswaǥen dan,
iyan, ebpekaamur ǥihapun sikandan te menge kepuun dan he nemematey en, diyà te lugar he kenè dan en ebpekevulug ebpekaahà te merayag.
Is sepian he etew he wazè din kedsavut, ebpatey he iring te menge langgam.
Is Nengazen he iyan kes mekeǥeǥehem he Megbevayà, ebpekidlalag wey ebpengumew te menge etew kayi te tivuuk he kelibutan.
Ed-anlag sikandin he ebpuun diyà te Zion, he iyan kes inged he wazà kurang te kekempet din.
Ne ebpekeuma is Megbevayà he ebpetuus, su ziyà te egkehunaan din duen egkeregreg he hapuy, ne ziyà te ebpekeliǥuy kandin ne zuen bagyu.
Ed-umawen din is langit wey is kelibutan su ibpepirma zin te kedhukumi zin te menge etew zin.
Egkaǥi sikandin te, “Tiguma niw kayi te kediey is metinumanen he menge etew ku he mibaal te kedpekid-uyun kedì pinaaǥi te kebpemuhat.”
Ebpahayag is langit he metazeng is Megbevayà, su iyan sikandin edhukum.
Migkaǥi pa is Megbevayà te, “Sikiyu is menge etew ku, pemineǥa niw is egkeǥiyen ku. Iyan a Megbevayà, kes Megbevayà he iyan ed-ezapen niw; iyan a ebpenistiǥus te ebpekesuǥat keniyu te menge tig-Israel.
Wazè ku sikiyu zewaya te menge kebpemuhat niw, etawa menge pemuhat he edtutungen he layun niw ibpemuhat.
Piru wazè ku kinehenglana is menge tudu he vaka niw wey menge kambing niw.
Su kediey is langun he langgam: is menge langgam diyà te ketelunan, is menge vaka ziyà te linibu he menge vuvungan,
is menge tagbis diyà te menge vuvungan, wey is menge langgam diyà te vevesukà.
Angin ke egkevitil a, ne kenà a ebuyù te keenen diyà te keniyu, su kediey is tivuuk he kelibutan wey is langun he taǥù din.
Kenè ku man egkeenen is usa zuen te tudu he vaka he ibpemuhat niw, ne kenè ku zaan ed-inumen is lengesa zuen te menge kambing.
Siak, is Utew Lavew he Megbevayè niw, iyan egkesuatan ku he ibpemuhat niw kedì is: kebpeselamat wey is kedtumana niw te menge pesarig niw kedì.
Umawa a keniyu te timpu te kelised su edlibriyen ku sikiyu, ne zutun edeliǥen a keniyu.”
Egkaǥi mulà is Megbevayà diyà te lalung he menge etew te, “Wazè niw ketenged te kegkaǥi zuen te menge suǥù ku wey kebpekid-uyun ku.
Egkeepesan niw is menge penurù ku; wazè niw seǥipaa is menge lalag ku.
Emun ebpekeehè kew te tekawen ne ebpekid-emiǥu kew kandin, wey ebpekidrerempungen kew zaan te menge mengungumpadi.
Mezaat is ebpengeǥiyen niw ne utew zà melemu ziyà te keniyu is kedtarùtarù.
Layun mezaat is menge lalag niw mehitenged te menge suled niw.
Ne hein mibeelan niw heini is langun, wazè ku sikiyu dewaya; umbe kunaan niw ke iring a keniyu. Piru guntaan, edewayen ku sikiyu ne ibpeehè ku keniyu he utew kew lalung.
Pemineǥa niw heini, sikiyu is nengelipat te Megbevayà, su emun kenà, edezeetan ku sikiyu ne wazà ebpekelibri keniyu.
Is ebpemuhat kayi te kedì te kebpeselamat ebeǥey kedì te zengeg, ne edlibriyen ku sikan is ebpekeventayan din he kenà sikandin mekevaal te mezaat.”


He Megbevayè ku, kehizuwi a kenikew tenged te kebmahala nu kedì. Iawè nu is menge salè ku tenged te zekelà he hizu nu kedì.
Lùlui nu is kegkezaat ku; lumpiyuwi a te menge salè ku.
Su langun he timpu ed-isipen ku wey ed-engkenen ku is menge salè ku.
Diyè e zà te kenikew mekesalà. Mibeelan ku is menge vaal he mid-isip nu he mezaat. Umbe hustu is menge lalag nu he ebpekesuǥat kedì. Utew hustu is kedhukumi nu kediey.
Lalung a wey mekesesalà a puun pa te kegkeetew ku.
Iyan egkesuatan nu is ebpuun te keputian te atey he meheǥet wey tinutuuwà he ked-ul-ulaha te hustu; umbe penurua a su wey a mehimu he uluwanen.
Iawè nu is menge salè ku su wey a melumpiyuwi; lùlui a su wey a mebmeputì.
Ipeǥezam nu kediey is kelipey wey keǥalew, para zuen ku ǥihapun kelipey minsan pa te henduen te edrupeten nu is menge tulan ku.
Iawè nu is menge salè ku; penasa nu is langun he kelelalung ku.
He Megbevayè ku, lumpiyuwi nu is gehinawa ku, ne beǥayi a te veǥu wey mepezumdumahan he ǥehinawa.
Kena a kenikew segseǥa puun te etuvangan nu, ne kenè nu iawà kayi te kediey is waǥas he Mulin-ulin nu.
Ilikù nu kayi te kediey sikan is kelipey he neseǥazan ku hein midlibri a kenikew. Ne veǥayi a te metinumanen he ǥehinawa.
Ne zutun ibpenurù ku is menge paaǥi nu ziyà te menge mekesesalà su para mekelikù sikandan diyà te kenikew.
He Megbevayà he menluluwas ku, libriya a te salè ku he iyan is kedhimatey, ne ebpekezaǥing a is edtudtul te kedlibriya nu kedì.
Nengazen, tevangi a kenikew su wey a mekekaǥi te menge lalag he idalig kenikew, ne edeliǥen ku sikew.
Kenè nu igkesuat is menge pemuhat, ne minsan pa ke ebpemuhat a ziyà te kenikew te pemuhat he edtutungen, ne kenè nu heini igkelipey.
Is pemuhat he ebpekeveǥey kenikew te kelipey, Megbevayè ku, iyan is kenà kebpelavew wey is ked-iniyuǥi te menge salà. Ne iyan heini he kelasi te pemuhat edewaten nu.
He Megbevayè ku, tuvazi nu is Zion, he iyan is inged he Jerusalem su igkelipey nu is kebaal kayi. Umana nu venguna sikan is menge verengbeng kayi.
Ne zutun igkelipey nu human is hustu he menge pemuhat, ragkes en is menge pemuhat he ed-eminen edtutunga. Ne ibpemuhat en maan is tudu he menge vaka ziyà te pemuhatà he zutun ka ebpemuhata.


Sikiyu is mekeǥeǥehem he menge etew, maan is ibpehivantug niw is kelelalung niw? Kenè be layun kew ebpurungi te Megbevayà?
Ebpelenuwan niw is igkezeeti te zuma he etew. Is menge zilè niw ne iring te meǥarang he kutsilyu su ebpekepalì te ǥehinawa te zuma. Kedlimbung is layun niw ed-ul-ulaha.
Dekelà diyà te ǥehinawa niw is mezaat kenà is meupiya, ne ibpelavi niw is kedlalag te tarù kenà te kedlalag te tutuu.
Sikiyu is menge limbungan, utew niw igkesuat is kebpesekiti niw te zuma pinaaǥi te menge lalag niw.
Siguradu he edezeetan kew te Megbevayà te wazà pidtemanan. Edekepen kew zin ne eguyuzen kew zin pehendiyà te ǥawas te valey niw. Ne edhewien din is untung niw.
Egkaahà heini te menge metazeng, ne egkeinuinu sikandan. Ne ed-engit sikandan is egkaǥi te,
“Ahaa niw is menge etew he kenà edsarig te Megbevayà he melig-en pezem he eputè dan. Su iyan dan edseriǥan is mahabet he menge azen dan, ne mid-iseg is kegkemekeǥeǥehem dan pinaaǥi te kedezaat dan te zuma he etew.”
Piru siak mulà egkeiring a te kayu he ulibu he ziyà meketuvù te valey te Megbevayà. Edseriǥan ku is kebmahala zin kedì te wazà pidtemanan.
He Megbevayè ku, ebpeselamatan ku sikew te taman te taman tenged te mibeelan nu. Edsarig a kenikew su ebpurungan nu is metinumanen he menge etew nu.

Diyà te ǥehinawa te menge tulebung egkaǥi sikandan te, “Wazà Megbevayà!” Pudu sikandan lalung ne utew mezaat is menge vaal zan. Wazà minsan sevaha kandan he ebaal te meupiya.
Puun te langit edtengtengan te Megbevayà is keet-etawan, su edsusiyen din ke zuen be nekesavut te tutuu wey ke zuen be midangep diyà te kandin.
Is langun mid-awà diyà te Megbevayà ne pudu memezaat is ulaula zan. Wazà minsan sevaha kandan he ebaal te meupiya.
Wazè be metueni kayi te lalung he menge etew is menge vaal zan? Netuenan dan heini! Ebpegpeǥesen dan is menge amurè ku te inged wey zan mekeselapì he iring dà sikandan te edsupal te keenen, ne kenà sikandan ed-ampù diyà te Megbevayà.
Piru egkengeheratan sikandan. Egkeǥezam dan is kegkahandek he wazè dan pa keenu meseǥazi, su ibpeyapat te Megbevayà is menge tulan dan. Sikandan is menge edsurung keniyu te menge tig-Israel, ebpeel-elezan niw sikandan, su inselikwey sikandan te Megbevayà.
Deyzey ke ebpekeume en is edlibri te Israel he ebpuun diyà te Zion. Utew ebmelipayen is menge tig-Israel he menge etew te Megbevayà, emun idlikù din en is meupiya he kebpekesavuk dan.


He Megbevayà, libriya a; pinaaǥi te ǥehem nu, petueni nu he wazè ku salà.
Pemineǥa nu is menge kebpengemuyù ku
su zuen menge lumelengyawà he midsurung kedì su edhimetayan e zan. Menge mesipala sikandan ne wazè dan mekekilala kenikew.
Kenà a egkezuwazuwa he sikew is Megbevayè ku, ne iyan ka edtavang kediey. Iyan ka, Nengazen, sendiǥè ku.
Berakat he medlikù diyà te menge kuntada ku is menge pesipala zan. He Megbevayà dèdeeti nu sikandan tenged te kebmetinumanen nu.
Nengazen, ebpemuhat a ziyà te kenikew te pemuhat he kineugelingen he suat. Edeliǥen ku sikew su iyan haazà meupiya.
Su ibpelingkawas a kenikew te langun he kelised ku, ne egkeehè ku is kegkezeeǥa te menge kuntada ku.

He Megbevayà, pemineǥa nu is ked-ampù ku; seǥipaa nu is kebuyù ku te tavang diyà te kenikew.
Pemineǥa a ne tevaka a. Egkeliveg ad te kegkesemuki ku.
Egkeǥiyaǥiya a te kebpenhulgà wey kebpendaagdaag te lalung he menge kuntada ku. Su edsinemukan e zan wey edumutan tenged te kegkepeuki zan kedì.
Utew subra is kebpekehuyab te kumeng ku su nahandek a te kemetayen.
Egkerkeren ad te kegkahandek ku, su utew subra is kegkeheratì ku.
Ke vè e zà merepatik ne edlayang e en su ebpen-ahà a te egkehimelayan ku.
Edlayang a pezem pehendiyà te meziyù he sibsivayan ne zutun a ed-ubpà.
Egaanggaan a ebpen-ahà te egkeelesan ku su wey a kenà meturedu te menge kuntada ku he egkepauk kedì su iring is pauk dan te utew mevendes he vagyu.
Nengazen, dèdeeti nu is menge kuntada ku; gurigawa nu is menge isip dan su wey zan kenà meuyun. Su neehè ku is kebpesipala wey kebpetebtebekà te menge etew ziyà te inged.
Maandew wey mezukilem egkehitavù heini ziyà te minsan hendei zutun te inged. Nepenù te kelelalung wey kesamuk haazà is inged.
Minsan hendei zutun ne zuen kelelalung wey kebpendezaat, ne kenè en egkeengked is kebpendaagdaag wey kebpenlimbung diyà te menge kelesada.
Ke và ku zà kuntada is ed-insultu kedì ne egkaantus ku heini. Ke và ku zà ukag is ebpendezeisey kedì ne egkelikayan ku sikandin.
Piru utew ku emiǥu is mid-insultu kedì su zuma ku wey neked-iring key.
Dengan utew key teleemiǥu, ne ebpezumehè key is edhendiyà te valey te Megbevayà duma te mahabet pa he menge etew.
Berakat he medtik-ew mebpematey is menge kuntada ku. Berakat he evelenga sikandan te penlevengà minsan uuyag dan pa. Su ziyà te kandan is kelelalung wey ziyè daan te menge ubpeey zan.
Piru ebuyù a mulà te tavang diyà te Nengazen he Megbevayà ne edlibriyen e zin.
Meselem, meudtu, wey mezukilem ebpekeriklamu a zuma is kedag-es ne ebpemineǥen e zin.
Edluwasen e zin te ebpekekaid kedì te kebpekidtebek ku, minsan mahabet is ebpekigkuntada kedì.
Is Megbevayà he edhadì te wazà pidtemanan ebpemineǥen e zin, ne ebpekevevaan din is menge kuntada ku. Heini sikandan ne wazà kegkeveǥu te kineiya zan, wey wazè dan kedtahud te Megbevayà.
Is emiǥu ku te nehuna he timpu nekigkuntada te menge emiǥu zin; wazè din tumana is menge pesarig din.
Menayù wey meupiya is kebpengaǥikaǥi zin, iyan, duen bes kedumut diyà te ǥehinawa zin, ne ibmesakit te ǥehinawa is menge lalag din, su iring heini te meǥarang he ispada.
Isarig nu ziyà te Nengazen is igkeseeng nu, ne edtevangan ke zin. Kenà egkehimu he ebpesegdanen din is menge metazeng te minsan hengkey he timpu.
Piru is menge teremunù wey menge limbungan idtimbag din diyà te mezalem he lugar te menge minatey, dutun te kenè pa sikandan edliwezeenan. Piru siak mulà, edsarig a te Megbevayà.

He Megbevayà, kehizuwi a kenikew, su edsurungen a te menge kuntada ku. Layun e zan edresaya.
Layun a edsurunga te menge kuntada ku. Utew Lavew he Megbevayà, mahabet is egkuntada kediey.
Emun ebpekeǥezam a te kegkahandek, ne edsarig a ziyà te kenikew.
He Megbevayà, edeliǥen ku sikew tenged te penaad nu. Kenà a egkahandek su edsarig a kenikew. Wazà etew he ebpekezezaat kedì.
Layun ibpesuwey te menge kuntada ku is menge lalag ku. Layun dan ebpelanu te kedezaat kedì.
Ed-eles-eles dan edtigum, ne ebentayan dan is langun he ebeelan ku su iyan tuyù dan is kedhimetayi zan kedì.
He Megbevayà, kenè nu ituǥut he mekelikey sikandan te silut tenged te kelelalung dan. Dèdeeti nu sikandan tenged te pauk nu kandan.
Netuenan nu is menge keseengan ku. Edtentenuzan nu is menge timpu he zutun nekesineǥew a. Kenè be inlista nu heini ziyà te libru nu?
He Megbevayà, dutun te ked-umawa ku kenikew ebpemekepelaǥuy is menge kuntada ku. Neseǥazan ku heini tenged te edlevanan a kenikew te Megbevayè ku.
Nengazen he Megbevayà, edeliǥen ku sikew tenged te saad nu.
Kenà a egkahandek su edsarig a kenikew. Wazà etew he ebpekezezaat kedì.
Edtumanen ku, Megbevayè ku, is pesarig ku kenikew. Ibpemuhat ku is pemuhat te kebpeselamat kenikew.
Su midlibri a kenikew te kemetayen, ne wazè nu mehimuwa he mezaag a, su wey a mekepengungubpaan diyà te etuvangan nu, Megbevayà, te kebpengungubpaan he merayag.

Kehizuwi a, Megbevayè ku, su ziyà a te kenikew med-aput, iring a te pispis te tagbis he ebpelekup te iney zin. Ed-aput a ziyà te kenikew taman te wazè en bangkit.
Ed-umew a ziyà te kenikew te Utew Lavew he Megbevayà, iyan ka edtuman te mibpeleyaǥan nu kediey.
Puun te langit ebpekeuma is tavang nu te kedlibri kediey. Ebpeel-elezan nu is menge etew he edsurung kediey. Ibpeehè nu is gaǥew nu wey kebmetinumanen nu para kediey.
Edliǥuyan a te menge kuntada ku he iring te menge erimaung he andam he edawi te etew. Is menge ngipen dan iyan is menge vangkew wey menge vesut te panà. Is menge zilè dan iyan is meǥarang he menge ispada.
Ipeehè nu, Megbevayè ku, is kegkemekeǥeǥehem nu ziyà te langit wey kayi te tivuuk he kelibutan.
Neseeng a su edlitaǥen a te menge kuntada ku. Ne mibangbang daan sikandan te para egkeuluǥan ku, piru iyan sikandan neulug duen.
Edsarig a ziyà te kenikew Megbevayè ku. Egkanta a te kanta he idalig kenikew.
Ed-enew a emun egkeriwaswas en, ne ed-endamen ku is gehinawa ku wey is menge gelemiten ku te kedtukar he zuen menge kuwirdas su para egkeǥamit ku te kedalig kenikew.
Edeliǥen ku sikew, Nengazen, diyà te teliwazà te menge etew. Egkentahan ku sikew ziyà te teliwazà te keet-etawan diyà te senge nenasyun.
Su is gaǥew nu wey kebmetinumanen nu ne kenà egkesukud; metikang pa heini te langit.
Ipeehè nu Nengazen is kegkemekeǥeǥehem nu ziyà te langit wey kayi te tivuuk he kelibutan.

Sikiyu is menge pengulu, metazeng be is kedhukum niw te menge etew?
Kenà! Su iyan niw zà ed-isipen is kebaal te mezaat. Ebpelebleviyan niw is menge etew ziyà te inged niw.
Is menge lalung, ebpekeziyuan dan is Megbevayà ne edtarùtarù dan puun pa te kegkeetew zan.
Mevisa sikandan iring te menge uled. Iring sikandan te zurepu he kenà ebpemineg te laǥeng te metau he ebmansu te uled.
<range>
He Nengazen he Megbevayà, iawè nu is kebpekegaga zan te kebpendezaat he iring te edsepù ka te ngipen te menge erimaung.
Mahanew pezem sikandan iring te wahig he egkemezahan, ne emun ebpanà sikandan, ne kenè dan pezem mekeigù.
Meiring pezem sikandan te tuwey he egkaapug, etawa vatà he neranran he wazè en mekevulug mekaahà te merayag.
Dezeeti nu sikandan, batà etawa meǥurang. Dezeeti sikandan he meǥaan pa te ed-initen he ziniyun he edtevunan te menge zezeisey he kayu.
Egkelipey is menge metazeng emun egkeehè dan he edsilutan nu is menge lalung ne ebpematey sikandan.
Dutun ebpekekaǥi is menge etew te, “Tutuu iyan he zuen suhul te menge metazeng; ne zuen Megbevayà he edhukum te menge etew kayi te kelibutan.”

He Megbevayà, libriya a te kedezaat kedì te menge kuntada ku; iyan ka metau he kenà a mekeizi te menge etew he egkuntada kedì.
Libriya a te kegkaid te lalung he menge etew he ebpemenhimatey.
Nengazen, ahaa nu man, mid-eyanan e zan, su edhimetayan e zan minsan pa te wazà a mekesalà diyà te kandan.
Wazà neveelan ku he salà, piru andam sikandan he ed-surung kedì. He Nengazen he Megbevayà he Mekeǥeǥehem, Megbevayà te Israel, seǥipaa ad ne tevangi ad guntaan. Siluti nu en is menge etew he wazà medtuu kenikew. Kenè nu ikehizu is menge seligkep.
<range>
Ebpemenlikù dan ke egkesakep en is iring te asu he ebpemenhiniǥer he edliǥuyliǥuy te inged.
Pemineǥa nu is ebpengeǥiyen dan; memesakit heini he iring te ispada. Egkaǥi pa sikandan te, “Wazà ebpekezineg kenami.”
Piru ed-engitan nu zà sikandan, Nengazen. Ed-un-undahan nu zà sikandan is wazà medtuu kenikew.
He Megbevayà, iyan ka zesen ku; edtaǥad a kenikew su ziyà a layun te kenikew edangep,
ne iyan ka Megbevayà he mibmahal kedì. Iyan ka huna kedì ne ipeehè nu kedì is kegkezaaǥa te menge kuntada ku.
Piru hunaa nu sikandan resaya ne human nu himetayi su para kenà egkelipatan te menge etew ku is paaǥi nu te kedsilut te menge kuntada nu. He Nengazen he iyan layun ebpengalang kenami, tezina nu wey zèdeeti nu is menge kuntada ku pinaaǥi te ǥehem nu.
Edhimu sikandan te salà pinaaǥi te ebpengeǥiyen dan, umbe verakat he iyan mekeutel kandan is kegkemepelevawen dan. Ebpenrawak dan wey edtarùtarù,
umbe tenged te pauk nu kandan, dèdeeti nu sikandan taman te egkepurung sikandan egkahanew. Ne zutun egketuenan te keet-etawan kayi te tivuuk he kelibutan he iyan ka hadì te Israel.
Emun mezukilem ebpemenlikù is menge kuntada ku he iring te asu he ebpemenhiniǥer he edliǥuyliǥuy te inged.
Iring sikandan te asu he edliǥuyliǥuy su ebpen-ahà te egkekaan din, ne egngesnges emun kenà egkahantey.
Iyan, siak mulà, egkanta a mehitenged te ǥehem nu. Kada meselem ebpekezaǥing a is egkanta mehitenged te ǥaǥew nu. Su ǥeina te ziyà a layun te kenikew edangep ne iyan ka ebpengelintau para wazà mezaat he egkehitavù kedì emun timpu te kelised.
He Megbevayà, iyan ka ebeǥey kedì te zesen; egkanta a te menge idalig kenikew, su iyan ka eputè ku, is Megbevayà he mibmahal kedì.


He Megbevayà, mid-engkezan key kenikew ne ketau nu is kegkezaaǥa kenami. Nepeukan key kenikew, ne ǥuntaan seǥipaa key en.
Midhuyung nu wey impeveka nu is tanà he Israel, iyan, guntaan edhangyù a ziyà te kenikew he purungi nu en heini su hapit en egketempag.
Sikami is menge etew nu ibpepurung key kenikew ibpaantus. Ebpekeziregdireg key en he henduen be te midlangut key kenikew te vinu.
Piru sikami is edtahud kenikew, ebpetizeenan key kenikew su wey key mekelikey te vesut te panà te menge kuntada.
Luwasa key pinaaǥi te ǥehem nu. Tevaka nu is menge kebpengemuyù dey su para melibri key is menge minahal nu.
He Megbevayà, migkaǥi ka ziyà te valey nu te, “Ebpekezaag a; ebehinen ku is Shekem wey is Suǥud he Sucot ne ibpemeǥey ku ziyà te menge etew ku.
Kediey is Gilead wey is Manase. Is Efraim iyan menlelavan ku, ne is Juda iyan perezumala ku.
Ne suluǥuen ku mulà is Moab ne ed-engkenen ku is Edom. Ne idsegyawan ku is kegkezeeǥa ku te Filistia.”
Hentei is ed-uwit kedì diyà te Edom wey ziyà te inged kayi he mibpeliǥuyan te menge verengbeng?
Kenè be iyan ka, is Megbevayà he midselikwey kenami he wazè en meduma te menge sundaru zey?
Tevangi key te kebpekidtebek te menge kuntada zey, su kenà ebpulus is tavang te etew.
He Megbevayà, ebpekezaag key pinaaǥi te tavang nu, su iyan ka ebpekezaag te menge kuntada.

He Megbevayà, pemineǥa nu is ked-umew ku, pemineǥa nu is ked-ampù ku.
Puun dini te meziyù he lugar ebpengumew a kenikew su neewaan ad te perateng. Uwita a kenikew ziyà te lugar he wazà duen ebpekekaid,
su iyan ka pengalang ku; iring ka te turi he iyan kenà ibpekeseled te menge kuntada ziyà te inged.
Ipeubpà a ziyà te valey nu te wazà pidtemanan. Ipaaput a ziyà te kenikew iring te kebpeeputa te tagbis te menge pispis din pinaaǥi te kedlekupi zin kandan.
Su nezineg nu, Megbevayè ku, is menge penaad ku kenikew, ne mibeǥayan a kenikew te menge vutang he ibeǥey nu ziyà te menge etew he edtahud kenikew.
Pekeluǥeyaza nu is untung te hadì ne ipahadì nu seled te wazà pidtemanan pinaaǥi te kegkehimu he hadì te menge kevuwazan din.
Berakat he medhadì sikandin te wazà pidtemanan he iyan ka eduma kandin, is Megbevayà. Levani nu sikandin tenged te ǥaǥew nu wey kebmetinumanen nu.
Ne zutun layun a egkanta te kedalig kenikew, ne layun ku edtumana is menge penaad ku kenikew.

Diyè e zà te Megbevayà ebpekehimeley, ne ebpuun diyà te kandin is kelibriyanan ku.
Iyan sikandin endilungè ku wey menluluwas ku. Iyan sikandin eputè ku, umbe kenà a egkezeetan.
Sikiyu is langun he menge kuntada ku, sengemenu keluǥayad is kedtulunga niw kedsurunga kediey te kedezaat kedì? Iring a te verengbeng he egketempag en wey te kudal he midsulad en.
Egkesuatan a keniyu te ebpaawà puun te metikang he ketengdanan ku. Ne igkelipey niw is kedtarùtarù. Meupiya uvag is menge lalag niw kayi te kedì piru ziyà te ǥehinawa niw ebpenrewakan a keniyu.
Diyè ku zà te Megbevayà egkaangken is kebpekehimeley ku su ibpeperateng e zin.
Iyan dà sikandin endilungè ku wey menluluwas ku. Iyan sikandin eputè ku, umbe kenà a egkezeetan.
Iyan is Megbevayà edlibri kedì wey ebeǥey kedì te zengeg. Iyan sikandin melig-en he endilungè ku he edlavan kedì.
Sikiyu is menge etew te Megbevayà, sarig kew kandin te langun he timpu! Keǥiya niw ziyà te kandin is langun he igkeǥiyaǥiya niw su iyan sikandin kelasag tew.
Is menge etew, dungganen man etawa kenà, ne kenà egkeseriǥan. Neked-iring dà he wazà pulus; emun edtimbangen sikandan ne edhuna pa sikandan he mahagkap te keramag.
Kenè kew medsarig te kebpeneligkep te azen. Kenè niw peretenga is keupiyaanan pinaaǥi te kebpenakew. Minsan edekelè pa is ketiǥeyunan niw, ne kenè niw heini seriǥi.
Layun ku en egkezineg he egkaǥi is Megbevayà te kandin is gehem wey is gaǥew.
Kenà duwazuwa he ebelesan te Nengazen is menge etew sumalà is mibeelan dan.

He Megbevayà, iyan ka Megbevayè ku, ne meselem pa utew ne edangep e en diyà te kenikew. Ke và ke zà wahig ne egkemezahan a kenikew. Iring te ziyà a te memaza he tanà he wazà duen wahig.
Neehè ku is kegkemekeǥeǥehem nu wey kegketelehuzen nu ziyà te valey nu.
Edeliǥen ku sikew su is gaǥew nu edhuna pa he mahal kenà is untung.
Ebpeselematan ku sikew te kemulu e pa uuyag. Ibayew ku is menge velad ku te ked-ampù diyà te kenikew.
Egkekuntintu a iring te etew he nahantey te ǥastu. Ne ed-ugyab a is egkelipey he edalig kenikew.
Ne zutun te kedhizeǥè ku ne edtentenuzan ku sikew. Ebpurungan ku sikew ed-is-isipa te tivuuk he kezukileman,
su iyan ka midtavang kedì. Ne ed-ugyab a te kegkelipey zutun te kebpeeputa nu kedì diyà te kenikew he iring te kedlekupi te tagbis te menge pispis din.
Mid-uvey a ziyà te kenikew, ne migewezan a kenikew su para kenà a mekeizi.
Is egkesuat he edhimatey kedì ne ziyà ebpekepevayà te ubpeey te menge minatey.
Ebpematey sikandan te tebek, ne is menge lawa zan egkeenen te leew he menge asu.
Egkelipey is hadì tenged te midhimu te Megbevayà diyà te kandin. Egkelipey zaan is langun he ebpenangdù diyà te Megbevayà. Piru ibpetiem mulà te Megbevayà is menge teruen.

He Megbevayà, pemineǥa nu is riklamu ku. Tipiǥi nu is untung ku su midhulgà a te menge kuntada ku.
Iyan ka metau he kenà medlampus is mezaat he planu kedì te grupu te menge lalung.
Mesakit is kebpengaǥikaǥi zan, iring te ispada wey vala te panà.
Utew zà melemu ziyà te kandan is kegkaǥi te mesakit he lalag diyà te menge etew he wazà duen igkesawey, ne wazè en kegkahandek dan te kegkaǥi kayi.
Ebpehinghinggatè dan te kebaal te mezaat he pelanu. Ne ebpelenuwan dan ke hendei zan idlitag is menge litag dan. Ke sikandan te, “Wazà ebpekaahà kayi.”
Mibpelanu zan te mezaat ne ke sikandan te, “Utew meupiya is pelanu tew.” Kenè egketegkad is isip wey ǥehinawa te etew.
Iyan, ebpenaan sikandan te Megbevayà, ne egketik-ew zà sikandan egkengetiyuk.
Edezeetan sikandan te Megbevayà tenged te ebpengeǥiyen dan. Is langun he ebpekaahà kandan ne ebpemenggemenggemen te kedsudì kandan.
Ne zutun egkengahandek is langun he menge etew. Ne egngunngunuen dan is mibpemeelan te Megbevayà, ne edtudtulen dan haazà.
Egkelipey wey edalig te Nengazen is langun he menge metazeng tenged te mibeelan din, ne ebuyù dan he kelesaǥi zin sikandan.

He Megbevayà, ereg ka he edeliǥen dey ziyà te Zion! Ne edtumanen dey is penangdù dey kenikew.
Is langun he menge etew ed-uvey ziyà te kenikew su edtevaken nu is menge kebpengemuyù dan.
Minsan mahabet is menge salè dey, ebpeseyluwen key ǥihapun kenikew.
Deyzey is etew he mibpilì nu wey midhinggat nu he ziyà med-ubpà te valey nu. Diyà te valey nu he iyan kes segradu he ubpeey nu egkeveyangan key te meupiya he menge vutang.
He Megbevayà he menluluwas dey, edtevaken key kenikew pinaaǥi te egkein-inuwan he menge vaal he mibeelan nu te kedlibriya nu kenami. Iyan ka ebpekeveǥey te keupiyaanan te menge etew kayi te tivuuk he kelibutan.
Mekeǥeǥehem ka, ne pinaaǥi te kegkemekeǥeǥehem nu insavuk nu is menge vuntud.
Ibpeengked nu is rekabù te menge vaǥel wey keǥurub te menge etew.
Minsan sikan is diyà ebpemen-ubpà te meziyù ne nengahandek kenikew, tenged te egkein-inuwan he menge vaal nu. Ebpekeugyab te kegkelipey is menge etew kayi te tivuuk he kelibutan tenged kenikew.
Ed-etimanen nu is tanà wey ebpeuzanan nu, ne midhimu nu he mekeveǥey te sebpet. He Megbevayà, is menge wahig nu kenà egkemezahan, ne ebeǥayan nu te sebpet is menge etew. Id-andam nu is tanà he uuzaran.
Ebpeuzanan nu is ineradu he tanà taman te ebmeyunek heini, ne edtuvazan nu is nenuvù he menge pinemula.
Edhimuwen nu he zekelà is menge abut emun tiraǥun. Is langun he menge lugar he egkepeveyaan nu ne ebpekaangken te zekelà he uzar.
Is menge penebtavà diyà te sibsivayan ne zekelà is memeilem he sagbet duen; is menge vuvungan henduen be te menge etew he egkengelipey.
Is menge penebtavà neeneb te menge ebpemenabtab; is menge suǥud neeneb te menge trigu. Heini he menge lugar henduen be te menge etew he ebpemen-ugyab wey ebpemenganta te kegkelipey.
Sikiyu is menge etew kayi te tivuuk he kelibutan, ugyab kew ziyà te Megbevayà te kegkelipey.
Kanta kew te kedalig kandin. Iveǥey niw kandin is dengeg pinaaǥi te kedeliǥa niw kandin.
Keǥiyi niw sikandin te, “He Megbevayà, utew iyan egkein-inuwi is menge vaal nu. Tenged te zekelà he ǥehem nu nekeluhud diyà te etuvangan nu is menge kuntada nu.
Is langun he menge etew kayi te tivuuk he kelibutan, ed-azap dan kenikew. Ne egkanta zan te kedalig kenikew.”
Hendini kew, ehaà niw is egkengein-inuwan he mibpemeelan te Megbevayà diyà te menge etew.
Nekehipanew is menge kepuun tew ziyà te zaǥat, su mibpengelinteuwan din he meluwis is daǥat su wey mekelepew is tanà; ne umbe edlipey kiw.
Edhadì sikandin te wazà pidtemanan pinaaǥi te ǥehem din, ne ebpeniizan din is menge nasyun. Ne kenà ereg he ebpegalbu is menge mesinupaken te Megbevayà.
Sikiyu is menge etew, deliǥa niw is Megbevayà. Ipezineg niw is kedeliǥa niw kandin.
Edtipiǥan din is untung tew, ne wazè din ituǥut he mezeeti kiw.
He Megbevayà, iyan tutuu is migezaman key kenikew; midhimu key kenikew he lunsey iring te pelata he midlunsey pinaaǥi te hapuy.
Intuǥut nu he meutel key wey impevavè key kenikew te meveǥat he uwiten.
Mibpetekutakan key kenikew te menge kuntada zey; iring key te mideleman wey nekeǥawas puun te nevinsulan. Iyan, guntaan midhimu nu en he meupiya is kebpekesavuk dey.
Ebpemuhat a ziyà te valey nu te menge pemuhat he edtutungen. Edtumanen ku is menge penangdù ku ziyà te kenikew,
he migkaǥi ku kenikew hein egkereǥenan a.
Ebpemuhat a ziyà te kenikew te melambù he menge uyaǥen he kerehidu, tudu he vaka, wey kambing. Iyan heini pemuhat he edtutungen.
Sikiyu is langun he edtahud te Megbevayà, hendini kew wey a keniyu pemineǥa; edtudtulan ku sikiyu ke hengkey is mibeelan din kedì.
Mibuyù a te tavang diyà te kandin ne midalig ku sikandin.
Emun wazè ku itug-an is menge salè ku ne kenà a pezem ebpemineǥen te Nengazen.
Piru mibpemineg a te Megbevayà; midineg din is ked-ampù ku.
Edeliǥen ku is Megbevayà, su midseǥipè din is ked-ampù ku, ne kenà duwazuwa is kebmahala zin kedì.

He Megbevayà, kehizuwi key wey tuvazi key. Ipeehè nu kenami is keupiya nu,
su para metueni ziyà te langun he menge nasyun te tivuuk he kelibutan is paaǥi nu wey is kedluwas nu.
He Megbevayà, berakat he edeliǥen ka te tivuuk he menusiyà.
Berakat he meǥalew he egkanta te kegkelipey is langun he menge etew kayi te tivuuk he kelibutan, tenged te ketazeng te kedhukum nu kandan wey kegiyahi nu kandan.
Berakat he edeliǥen ka te langun he menge etew, Megbevayè ku.
Berakat he mebeǥey te sebpet is tanà. Berakat he edtuvazan kiw te Megbevayè tew. Berakat he edtahud kandin is langun he menge etew ziyà te minsan hendei kayi te kelibutan.
<range>

He Megbevayà, ipedsusuwey nu en is menge kuntada nu. Berakat he mekepelaǥuy sikandan.
Segseǥa nu sikandan iring te evel he idlayap te keramag. Dezeeti nu is menge lalung diyà te etuvangan nu, iringa nu te kendilà he egketunew te hapuy.
Piru is menge metazeng, ed-ugyab sikandan te kegkelipey ziyà te etuvangan nu.
Kentahi niw is Megbevayà, kentahi niw sikandin te menge kedalig. Deliǥa niw sikandin is ed-untud te ǥapun. Is ngazan din iyan is Nengazen; mebmelipayen kew ziyà te etuvangan din.
Is Megbevayà he ziyà ed-ubpà te segradu he valey zin, ed-elimahan din is menge ilu ne edlevanan din is menge valu he vahi.
Ebeǥeyan din te pemilya sikan is egketawantawan ne melipayen is menge vihag he edlibriyen din. Iyan, is menge mesinupaken mulà, diyà sikandan ebpekeubpà te meinit he lugar he memaza is tanà duen.
He Megbevayà, hein mibpenguluwan nu is menge etew nu te kedhipanew ziyà te sibsivayan,
nehuyung is tanà wey mid-uzan su geina te nekeuma ka, is Megbevayà te Israel. Impezayag nu is keugelingen nu ziyà te Sinai.
Ne wazà kurang te uzan he imbeǥey nu, umbe nepurung mahames is memaza he tanà he imbeǥey nu ziyà te menge etew nu.
Ne zutun med-ubpà is menge etew nu, ne tenged te keupiya nu mibeǥayan nu is menge pubri he menge etew te egkinehenglanen dan.
Nenelaan ka, Nengazen, ne impenudtul haazà te mahabet he menge vahi:
“Nemelaǥuy is menge hadì wey is menge sundaru zan, ne is menge azen dan mibahin te menge vahi he tig-Israel.
Minsan sikan is mibpetaǥak diyà te tudil te menge kerehidu nekezawat te vahin he menge ledawan he merepatik, he is menge pakpak dan mid-epizan te pelata ne mid-epizan te lunsey he vulawan is purù dutun te pakpak dan.”
Hein impedsusuwey te Megbevayà he Mekeǥeǥehem sikan is menge hadì, henduen sikandan te menge ayis he midtanà diyà te Buntud he Zalmon.
Utew mekempet is Buntud he Bashan; mahabet is menge vuvungan dutun.
Maan is nesina heini te vuntud he mibpilì te Megbevayà he iyan ed-ubpaan din te wazà pidtemanan?
Nekeuma is Nengazen diyà te valey zin he ebpuun diyà te Sinai duma te linibu he menge kerwahi zin.
Hein mibpeketikang sikandin, mahabet he menge vihag is mid-uwit din, ne midawat din is menge gasa he ebpuun diyà te menge etew, minsan is ebpuun diyà te mesinupaken kandin. Ne kayi te kenitew ed-ubpà is Nengazen he Megbevayà.
Ereg he edeliǥen is Nengazen he Megbevayà he menluluwas tew, su andew-andew edtevangan kiw zin te menge prublima tew.
Is Megbevayè tew, Megbevayà he edlibri. Iyan sikandin Nengazen he Megbevayà he edlibri kenitew te kemetayen.
Kenà duwazuwa he ebekbeken te Megbevayà is ulu te menge kuntada zin he kenà ed-engked te kebaal te salà.
Migkaǥi is Nengazen te, “Ibpelikù ku is menge kuntada ku he ebpuun diyà te Bashan; ibpelikù ku sikandan ebpuun diyà te zizalem te zaǥat,
su ebpenhimetayan sikandan ne edtekutakan niw is lengesa zan ne edtulungan heini ebpendilai te menge asu niw.”
He Megbevayà wey Hadì ku, egkaahà te langun is kedsilibraha te menge etew nu te kezeeǥan nu pinaaǥi te kedhendiyè dan te valey nu.
Edhuna is ebpemenganta, ne ebpehuziyan is ebpemenduyug te kanta, ne ziyà te pid-elangan dan iyan is menge raǥa he ebpezaǥing te menge tamburin.
Ne ibensag dan is lalag he edhenduen te, “Deliǥa niw is Megbevayà ke edtiǥum kew! Sikiyu is langun he kevuwazan ni Israel, deliǥa niw is Nengazen!”
Edhuna is deisey he tribu ni Benjamin, ne iyan edtinundug is menge pengulu te Juda duma is menge grupu zan, ne edtinundug kandan is menge pengulu te Zebulun wey Naftali.
He Megbevayà, ipeehè nu is gehem nu iring te mibeelan nu ziyà te kenami zengan.
Tenged te valey nu ziyà te Jerusalem ed-uwit is menge hadì te ǥasa zan kenikew.
Dewaya nu heeyan is nasyun he iring te kumekaid he langgam diyà te meribpesen. Dewaya nu zaan is menge nasyun he iring te menge tudu he vaka duma te menge nati taman te edluhud sikandan ne idhalad dan diyà te kenikew is menge pelata zan. Ipedsusuwey nu is menge etew he igkelipey zan is kebpekidtebek.
Ebpesakup kenikew is menge tig-Ehipto. Ne egkengelagewlagew is menge tig-Etiopia te kebeǥey te ǥasa ziyà te kenikew.
Sikiyu is menge sakup te menge ginhedian kayi te kelibutan, kentahi niw is Megbevayà. Kanta kew te kedalig te Nengazen
he ed-untud te kezaan he langit. Pemineǥa niw is ebpenriǥungriǥung he laǥeng din.
Ipezayag niw is kegkemekeǥeǥehem te Megbevayà he edhadì te Israel. Is langit ebpaahà te kegkemekeǥeǥehem din.
Ebpendeǥubduven ki is ed-etuvang te Megbevayà te Israel ziyà te segradu he ubpeey zin. Ebeǥayan din te ǥehem wey zesen is menge etew zin. Dait he edeliǥen is Megbevayà!

Libriya a, Megbevayè ku, su neiring ad te etew he hapit en egkelened.
Henduen be te egkelenep e en diyà te mezalem he vasak he kenà egketegkad. Ne henduen be zaan te egketembunan a te menge vaǥel su ziyà a te mezalem he wahig.
Neveley ad te kebuyù te tavang ne mesakit en is bekereng ku. Mibmerusirem en is ked-ehè ku te kedtaǥad te tavang nu, Megbevayè ku.
Utew mahabet is edumut wey egkesuat he edhimatey kedì te wazà hustu he hinungdan. Iyan erubasa ku he edhuna pa sikandan he mezakel te vulvul ku. Ed-uluǥan e zan te kewusa ne idteǥel zan ibpeulì kedì is menge vutang he wazè ku tekawa.
He Megbevayè ku, netuenan nu is ketutulebungi ku; wazà mekeeles kenikew is menge salè ku.
He Nengazen he MEGBEVAYÀ he Mekeǥeǥehem he Megbevayà te Israel, berakat he kenà mepeel-elezi tenged kediey is menge etew he edsarig wey edangep diyà te kenikew.
Su tenged kenikew ed-insultuwan a wey ebpeel-elezan.
Su in-iring a te langyew te menge kezuzumahi ku, ne is menge suled ku wazè e zan isipa he suled dan.
Ebpesipelahan a tenged te kebmahala ku te valey nu. Ibmesakit te gehinawa ku is lalag te menge etew he insultu kenikew.
Emun edsineǥew a wey ebpuasa a, ne ebpeel-elezan e zan.
Emun ebivisti a te saku su wey maahà he egkeseeng a, ne edsudien e zan.
Iyan a layun ed-ituka te menge etew he ebpemimpinuu ziyà te pultahan te inged, ne egkekanta is egkengelangut te kanta he idsudì kedì.
Iyan, ed-ampù a ziyà te kenikew, Nengazen. Ne zeyzey ke zutun te timpu te kegkehizuwi nu en kedì, ne edtevaken nu is ampù ku tenged te zekelà he ǥaǥew nu kedì. Su metinumanen ka te saad nu te kedlibri,
tevangi a para kenà a melenep diyà te vasak. Libriya a kenikew te menge edezaat kedì he iring te edlibriyen a kenikew ziyà te mezalem he wahig.
Kenè nu ituǥut he mebpatey a tenged te kegketembuni kedì te menge vaǥel.
Nengazen, tevaka a tenged te keupiya nu wey kebmahala nu kedì. Seǥipaa a tenged te zekelà he hizu nu kedì.
Kena a kenikew elesi is suluǥuen nu. Tevaka ad kenikew ǥuntaan su melised is kebpekesavuk ku.
Uvey ka kayi te kediey ne libriya a te kedezaat kedì te menge kuntada ku.
Netuenan nu is kebpeel-elezi kedì, is ked-insultuwi kedì, wey is kedezeeti te zengeg ku. Neehè nu is langun he menge kuntada ku.
Inmesakit te ǥehinawa ku is kebpeel-elezi zan kedì ne mibmezaat is isip ku. Ebperetengen ku is kegkehizuwi kedì, piru wazà nehizu kedì. Ebperetengen ku is kedlipaya kedì, piru wazà midlipey kedì.
Midsevukan dan hinuun te hilu is keenen ku, ne hein egkemezahan a, sukà is imbeǥey zan kedì.
Emun egastu sikandan, berakat he mehimu haazà he igkezeeti zan duma te menge meǥeliyug dan.
Berakat he mengelakap sikandan wey pen-elia.
Nengazen, ivusbus nu ziyà te kandan is pauk nu. Ipeǥezami nu kandan is rerangit nu.
Berakat he ewai zan en is ed-ubpaan dan wey wazè en dutun ed-ubpà.
Su ebpesipelahan dan is menge etew he edsilutan nu, ne idantal zan is kebpekebmereǥen dutun te midsilutan nu.
Ne iuman nu heeyan te menge salè dan ne kenè nu en sikandan libriya.
Penasa nu is menge ngazan dan diyà te libru he edlistahan nu te menge uuyag, ne kenè nu sikandan ilista zuma te menge metazeng.
He Megbevayà, nesekitan a wey nekaantus a, umbe levani a kenikew pinaaǥi te kedlibriya nu kediey.
Edeliǥen ku is Megbevayà pinaaǥi te kanta. Ibeǥey ku kandin is dengeg pinaaǥi te kebpeselamat ku.
Ebpekelipey pa heini te Nengazen kenà te menge pemuhat he vaka.
Emun egkaahà heini te menge egkaayuayu, ne egkengelipey zan; ebmelig-en is menge etew he midangep diyà te Megbevayà.
Ebpemineǥen te Nengazen is menge egkaayuayu, ne kenè din egkelipatan is menge etew zin he mibihag.
Deliǥa niw is Megbevayà, sikiyu is langun he ziyà te langit, kayi te kelibutan, wey ziyà te zaǥat.
Su edlibriyen te Megbevayà is Jerusalem, ne ed-umanan din ebenguna is menge inged diyà te Juda. Dutun ed-ubpà is menge etew zin ne iyan dan ebpekaangken keniyan he tanà.
Is menge kevuwazan te menge suluǥuen din iyan ebpekepengevilin kayi, ne sikan is mibmahal kandin ne ebpekeubpà dutun.

Nengazen he Megbevayà, libriye e en wey tevangi e en guntaan.
Berakat he mepeel-elezi wey meliveg is menge etew he egkesuat he edhimatey kedì. Berakat he ebpemelaǥuy he egkepeel-elezan is langun he egkesuat he mezeeti a.
Berakat he is menge etew he edsudì kedì ebpekeiniyug tenged te kegkeeled dan.
Ne is langun he midangep diyà te kenikew, berakat he melipey zan tenged kenikew. Ne sikan is utew zan igkesuat is kedlibri nu, ne verakat he layun dan megkaǥi te, “Dait he edeliǥen is Megbevayà!”
Bahin kedì, egkaayuayu wey pubri a. Uveyi a kenikew, Megbevayè ku! Iyan ka edtavang wey menluluwas ku. Nengazen, gègaani ad kenikew tevangi ǥuntaan.
Nengazen, diyà a te kenikew med-aput. Kenè nu ituǥut he mepeel-elezi a.
Tevangi a wey luwasa a su metazeng ke man. Pemineǥa a wey luwasa a.
Kelesaǥi a iring te nekeendilung a te vatu, su ziyè e zà layun te kenikew edangep. Kenà duwazuwa he edlibriyen a kenikew, su iyan ke man endilungè ku wey melig-en he elesà ku.
He Megbevayè ku, luwasa a te kezeetan he edhimuwen te menge lalung wey mesipala he menge etew.
He Nengazen he MEGBEVAYÀ, diyà te kenikew is perateng ku. Su puun te vatè e pa ne midsarig e en kenikew.
Puun pa te ked-enaka kedì, edsarig e en diyà te kenikew ne edlevanan a kenikew. Ne edeliǥen ku sikew te wazà pidtemanan.
Mahabet is nekeiring kedì he ziyà ed-aput te kenikew su ǥeina te neehè dan pinaaǥi te kedlevani nu kedì he iyan ka iyan melig-en he eputà.
Layun ku edeliǥa is kegkemekeǥeǥehem nu.
Kena a kenikew engkezi emun meǥurang ad. Kenà a kenikew pesegdana emun meluya ad.
Su midtiǥum is menge kuntada ku su mid-uyun dan mehitenged kediey; egkesuatan e zan te edhimatey.
Ke sikandan te, “Mibey-anan en sikandin te Megbevayà, umbe edel-asen tew sikandin ne edekepen tew, su wazè en edtavang kandin.”
He Megbevayè ku, kenà a kenikew pekeziyui; kenè ka langanlangan is edtavang kedì.
Berakat he mepeel-elezi wey mengezeeti is menge etew he mibutangbutang kedì. Berakat he mepeel-elezi wey susudia is menge etew he egkesuat he edezaat kedì.
Piru siak, Megbevayè ku, layun a ebperateng te tavang nu, ne ibpeiseg ku pa is kedeliǥa ku kenikew.
Layun ku edtudtula is metazeng he ebeelan nu he kedlibri te menge etew nu, minsan pa te kenè ku heini egketegkad ke maan.
Edhendiyà a te valey nu, Nengazen he MEGBEVAYÀ, ne edeliǥen ku sikew tenged te menge mibeelan nu he nezumahan te zekelà he ǥehem. Iyan dà edtudtulen ku is ketazeng nu.
He Megbevayà, puun te vatè e pa, mibpenurù ad kenikew mehitenged te egkein-inuwan he menge vaal nu, ne taman en guntaan is kebpenudtula ku kayi.
Ne minsan pa te ebmeǥurang e en su ed-uvanen ad, ne kenà a kenikew pesegdana, Megbevayè ku, zutun te kebpenudtula ku te ǥehem nu wey zesen nu ziyà te huziyan he menge lapis te menge kevuwazan.
Is ketazeng nu, Megbevayè ku, kenà egketegkad. Egkein-inuwan is mibpemeelan nu; wazà iyan iring kenikew.
Minsan ibpesaǥad a kenikew te mahabet he menge elentusen, ne ebeǥayan a ǥihapun kenikew te veǥu he untung; egkeiring a te minatey he ebenhawen nu zed.
Ebeǥayan a kenikew te zekelà he zengeg, ne ed-umanan a kenikew edlipaya.
He Megbevayè ku, tenged te kebmetinumanen nu edeliǥen ku sikew pinaaǥi te kedtukar te alpa. Edeliǥen ku sikew, is Waǥas he Megbevayà te Israel, pinaaǥi te kegkanta ku he eduyuǥan te alpa.
Igkulahì ku is kegkelipey ku zutun te kegkanta ku te kedalig kenikew tenged te kedlibriya nu kediey.
Layun ku edtudtula is ketazeng nu, su is egkesuat he edezaat kedì nepeel-elezan wey neliveg.
He Megbevayà, penurua nu is hadì te kenikew he paaǥi te kedhukum he metazeng,
para egkezumahan te ketazeng is kedhukumi zin te menge etew nu lavew en is egkengaayu-ayu.
Berakat he ebpekeveǥey te keuswagan te menge etew nu is menge vuntud wey menge vuvungan tenged te ketazeng te hadì.
Berakat he edlevanan wey edtevangan te hadì is menge egkaayuayu, ne edaaǥen din is menge etew he edaagdaag kandan.
Berakat he ebpedayun is kedhadì din te wazà pidtemanan pinaaǥi te kegkehimu he hadì te menge kevuwazan din, mintras duen pa andew wey vulan.
Berakat he egkeiring sikandin te uzan he ebpekeveǥey te wahig kayi te kelibutan.
Dutun te timpu te kedhadì din, berakat he kenà egkaawà is ketazeng ne kenà egkaawà is kegkemeuswaǥen te ked-ubpà te menge etew taman te taman.
Berakat he is ginhedian din ebpuun te sevaha he zaǥat ne taman en te sevaha pa he zaǥat, wey puun te Wahig he Eufrates ne taman te kinemeziyuan he vahin te kelibutan.
Berakat he mebpesakup kandin is menge kuntada zin he ziyà ebpemen-ubpà te sibsivayan.
Berakat he is menge hadì diyà te Tarshish, menge pulu, wey te Sheba, ebeǥey ziyà te kandin te menge ǥasa te kebpekilala he ebpesakup sikandan kandin.
Berakat he ebpesakup kandin is langun he menge hadì ne ebpenilbi kandin is langun he menge nasyun.
Su edtevangan din is pinesagdan he menge egkaayuayu, he ebuyù te tavang diyà te kandin.
Egkehizuwan din is menge wazà egkehimu wey egkengaayuayu, ne edtevangan din su wey kenà sikandan ebpatey.
Edlibriyen din sikandan te kedèdaaǥa wey kebpesipelahi kandan, su utew mevali sikandan diyà te kandin.
Berakat he luǥeyazi te untung is hadì! Berakat he ebeǥey kandin te vulawan is Sheba. Berakat he layun sikandin id-ampù he tuvazi sikandin te Megbevayà.
Berakat he mebeǥey te menge abut is tanà minsan is puntur te menge vuntud, ne meiring te Lebanon he utew uuzaran. Berakat he mebmahabet is ebpemen-ubpà diyà te menge inged, meiring sikandan kezakel te menge sagbet diyà te menge vevesukà.
Berakat he kenà egkelipatan is ngazan te hadì te taman te taman mintras duen pa andew. Berakat he pinaaǥi kandin edtuvazan is langun he menge nasyun, ne ebpekekaǥi is menge etew ziyà te menge nasyun te, “Deyzey sikandin.”
Mezait he edeliǥen is Nengazen he Megbevayà, kes Megbevayà te Israel, he iyan dà ebpekehimu keniyan he menge egkengein-inuwan.
Ereg he edeliǥen is kegkemekeǥeǥehem din te wazà pidtemanan. Berakat he maahà te menge etew kayi te tivuuk he kelibutan is kegkemekeǥeǥehem din. Amen! Amen!
Iyan heini ketepusan he menge kebpengemuyù ni David te anak ni Jesse.
Meupiya iyan is Megbevayà te Israel, lavew en diyà te menge etew he lumpiyu is gehinawa zan.
Piru siak, hapit en egkaawà is kedtuu ku,
su nesina a te gelbuwen wey lalung he menge etew hein neehè ku he mid-uswag sikandan.
Meupiya is kedlelawa zan ne kenà mesakit is kemetayen dan.
Wazà menge elentusen dan ne kenà sikandan edlised iring te zuma he menge etew.
Umbe, melemu zà diyà te kandan is kebpaahà te kegkegelbuwen dan wey kegkemesipala zan.
Is menge ǥehinawa zan nepenù en te kelelalung, ne iyan dan dà layun egkeisip is kebaal te mezaat.
Edsudien dan wey mezaat is ebpengeǥiyen dan diyà te zuma. Utew sikandan hembugiru he ebpenhulgà wey ebpendaagdaag te zuma.
Mezaat is menge lalag dan he igkuntada zan te Megbevayà diyà te langit wey te menge etew kayi te kelibutan.
Umbe, minsan is menge etew te Megbevayà edsunud kandan wey ebpengumbenar te egkeǥiyen dan.
Ke sikandan te, “Kenà egkesayud is Megbevayà? Wazà hanew te Utew Lavew he Megbevayà.”
Iring keniyan is menge lalung he etew, wazè dan igkeliveǥ ne mid-iseg pa is kegkesepian dan.
Tenged kayi wazè ku maahà is pulus te kedtinazeng ku wey kedlikey ku te salà.
Layun a kenikew ibpaantus, Megbevayè ku; hapit kada meselem is kedsiluti nu kedì.
Angin ke mid-iringan ku is lalung he menge etew te ked-un-undaha zan kenikew, ne nelimbungan ku en is menge etew nu.
Nenigudu a wey ku mesavut heini, piru utew a midlised,
taman te midhendiyà a te valey nu, ne zutun nesavut ku human ke hengkey is egkehitavù diyà te lalung he menge etew.
Benar he idsavuk nu sikandan diyà te wazà kesiguruwan he kebpekesavuk, ne edezeetan nu sikandan.
Egketik-ew zà sikandan egkengezeeti; egkeumahan sikandan te mekahandekhandek he hitavù ne ebpematey sikandan is langun.
Is kegkahanew zan iring te teǥeinep he emun edkepukew ki is nekelipezeng ne wazè en. Egkelipatan en sikandan emun egkesilutan nu en sikandan.
Hein neseeng a wey nesekitan a,
nehimu a he iring te tulebung he langgam diyà te etuvangan nu su wazè ku sikew mesavut.
Piru ed-uvey a ǥihapun diyà te kenikew ne egiyahan a kenikew.
Egiyahan a kenikew pinaaǥi te menge sambag nu, ne ziyà te egkehuziyanan ed-uwiten a kenikew ziyà te utew meupiya he kebpekesavuk.
Wazè en duma ziyà te langit he egkinehenglanen ku, kekenà, iyan ke zà. Su ǥeina te kayi ka te kediey, wazè en duma pa he ebpengenduyen ku kayi te kelibutan.
Minsan edluyahan is lawa ku wey isip ku, iyan ka, Megbevayè ku, ebpuunan te zesen ku. Iyan ke zà egkinehenglanen ku taman te taman.
Is menge etew he ed-iniyug kenikew, ne kenà duwazuwa he egkengahanew sikandan; edezeetan nu is wazà medtuman te egkesuatan nu.
Piru mid-isip ku mulà he utew meupiya is ked-uvey ziyà te kenikew, Megbevayà. Nengazen he MEGBEVAYÀ, midhimu ku sikew he kutè ku, su wey ku ikeseysey is langun he menge vaal nu.
He Megbevayà, maan is ebpedayun en is ked-iniyuǥi nu kenami? Maan is nepeukan key kenikew is menge etew he ebentayan nu?
He Megbevayà, tentenuzi nu is menge etew nu he mibpilì nu zengan para mehimu he kenikew ne midlibri nu para maangken nu en. Tentenuzi nu is Buvungan he Zion he ubpeey nu.
Leuya nu ne ahaa nu is ebpedayun he kegkezeeti zuen te valey nu tenged te mibeelan te menge kuntada.
Nen-ugyab dutun te valey nu is menge kuntada nu, su ibpeehè dan is kegkezeeǥa zan kenami te menge etew nu. Midsavuk dan te bendira zan he tuus te kebpekezaag dan.
Midrundus dan is baley nu he henduen dan te egkamet diyà te ketelunan.
Midèdeetan dan sikan is mibpurungan ukiri he menge kayu he himan te valey nu pinaaǥi te menge wasey wey menge piku zan.
Mibinsulan dan is baley nu; midremerikan dan heini is ubpeey nu.
Iyan diyà te isip dan is ebpurungan key zan edezeeti. Mibinsulan dan is langun he tiǥumà kayi te Israel he para te ked-ezapa kenikew.
Wazè en tuus te kebpekiduma nu kenami; wazè en nesamà duen te ebpemeneuven nu, ne wazè en netau kenami ke keenu egkeengked heini is pesipala kenami.
He Megbevayà, sengemenu keluǥayad is kebpeel-elezi te kuntada zey kenikew? Taman en be te taman is ked-un-undaha zan kenikew?
Maan is wazè nu pa sikandan siluti? Maan is henduen be te kenè nu edwelengen is menge velad nu? Dèdeeti nu en sikandan!
Iyan ka, Megbevayà, hadì dey puun pa zengan, ne kemahabet nu en libriya is menge etew kayi te kelibutan.
Pinaaǥi te ǥehem nu neluwisan is tanà diyà te dizalem te zaǥat, iyan ka migevà te menge ulu te zezekelà he menge langgam diyà te zaǥat.
Iyan ka migevà te menge ulu te menge dragun he Leviatan wey mibpekaan te menge lawa zan te menge langgam diyà te sibsivayan.
Iyan ka mibpetudà te menge serebseb wey te menge wahig he edtudà. Iyan ka mibpemazà te menge wahig he edtudà he kenà pezem egkemezahan.
Iyan ka mibaal te maandew wey mezukilem, iyan ka midsavuk te andew wey vulan diyà te nesevukan dan.
Iyan ka midsavuk te langun he menge taltal kayi te kelibutan, iyan ka midhimu te ǥulavung wey timpu te meǥenew.
Tentenuzi nu, Nengazen, is kebpeel-elezi wey kedsudia kenikew te menge tulebung he menge kuntada.
Kenè nu iveǥey is menge etew nu he iring te menge merepatik te menge kuntada he iring te kumekaan te etew he menge langgam. Kenè nu lipati minsan keenu is edèdaaǥen he menge etew nu.
Tentenuzi nu is kebpekid-uyun nu kenami, su utew mesipala is menge kuntada zey, ne mibmerusirem is nasyun dey tenged te kelelalung.
Kenè nu ituǥut is kegkepeel-elezi te menge edèdaaǥen. Berakat he edeliǥen ka te menge egkaayuayu wey menge pubri.
He Megbevayà, levani nu en guntaan is dengeg nu. Tentenuzi nu he edtulungan ke en ebpeel-elezi te menge tulebung.
Kenè nu ituǥut he ebpedayun is kedtulung kebpengulahì te menge kuntada nu he tuus te kegkepauk dan.

He Megbevayà, mepeselematen key kenikew. Mepeselematen key su uvey ka kenami. Edtudtulen dey is egkein-inuwan he menge vaal nu.
Ke sikew te, “Duen timpu he midtail ku he para te kedhukum, ne metazeng is kedhukum ku.
Emun egkehuyung is kelibutan ne ebpengerkeren te kegkahandek is menge meǥinged kayi, ne iyan a edlig-en te mibengunan kayi.
Migkeǥiyan ku is menge hembugiru he menge lalung te med-engked en sikandan he ebpahambug wey ebpehivantug tenged te egkehimu zan.
Migkeǥiyan ku sikandan he engkezi zan en is kebpezalig dan.”
Hustu heeyan is egkaǥiyen te Megbevayà, su wazà duma he ebeǥey te zengeg,
kekenà, iyan dà is Megbevayà. Iyan sikandin edhukum; ebpekevevaan din is ked-etew te zuma, ne is duma ebeǥayan din te zengeg.
Su egkulang is Nengazen te tasa he nepenù te eburàburà he utew mevisa he vinu he iyan is pauk din. Ne edteǥayen din heini su wey meinum te langun he lalung he menge etew kayi te kelibutan taman te egkaamin dan.
Iyan, siak mulà, kenà a ed-engked he ebpenudtul mehitenged te Megbevayà ni Jacob, ne egkentahan ku sikandin te menge idalig kandin.
Id-awè din is gehem te menge lalung he menge etew, ne ed-umanan din mulà is gehem te menge metazeng.

Diyà te Juda nekilala utew is Megbevayà; nevantug sikandin diyà te Israel.
Ed-ubpà sikandin diyà te Buvungan te Zion he ziyà te Jerusalem.
Dutun he lugar mibpendezeetan din is edhagyung he menge vesut te panà te menge kuntada, is menge kelasag dan, is menge ispada zan, wey is duma pa he menge ǥumaan dan.
He Megbevayà, mekeǥeǥehem ka wey utew lavew zutun te kedtupang nu puun te menge vuvungan he zutun nu penhimetayi is menge kuntada nu.
Mibpen-aǥew nu ziyà te mevurut he menge sundaru is menge vutang he inaǥew zan diyà te zuma. Ne mibpematey sikandan is langun, ne wazà minsan sevaha kandan he nekehimu he egkayew te velad din.
He Megbevayà ni Jacob, nemematey en is menge pereuntud te kudà wey is menge kudè dan pinaaǥi zà te kedawey nu.
Mekahahandek ka, Megbevayà. Wazà ebpekehimu he edsukul kenikew emun egkepauk ka.
Ebpuun te langit imbeǥey nu is kukuman nu. Ne nengahandek is menge etew kayi te kelibutan ne wazà sikandan mekekaǥi hein
midhukum ka, Megbevayà, he edlibriyen nu is langun he menge edèdaaǥen kayi te kelibutan.
Kenà duwazuwa he is kegkepauk nu te lalung he menge etew igkezeliǥi kenikew, ne kemulu pa is pauk nu.
Pesarig kew ziyà te Nengazen he Megbevayè niw ne tumana niw heini. Ipeuwit niw is menge meǥinged te kesikbit niw he menge nasyun te menge gasa ziyà te telehuzen he Megbevayà.
