Ibpekevavè din is mepelevawen he menge pengulu; igkehandek sikandin te menge hadì kayi te kelibutan.

Mibpekezaǥing a is ebuyù te tavang diyà te Megbevayà. Nengumew a su wey e zin mezineg.
Dutun te timpu te kelised ed-ampù a ziyà te Nengazen. Ne zutun te ked-ampù ku ke mezukilem kenà a egkeveley he ebayew te menge velad ku, piru wazè ku ǥihapun kelipey.
Emun ebpurungan ku egngunngunua is Megbevayà egkesuǥey a ne egkaawà is perateng ku.
Wazè e zin ipelipezeng; kenè ku egketuenan ke hengkey is egkeǥiyen ku, su utew a nesemuki.
Ed-isipen ku is nemenlavey he menge andew wey is menge tuig he neuǥet en he nenlavey.
Emun mezukilem ne mezalem is ed-is-isipen ku. Ebpurung a egngunùngunù ne iyan heini menge insà he neuma te isip ku:
“Taman en be vuwa te taman is ked-iniyuǥi kenami te Nengazen? Kenà key en buwa ebpekepenunuat kandin?
Kela ke naawè en is kebmahala zin kenami? Kenè din en buwa edtumanen is penangdù din?
Kela ke nelipat en sikandin he egkehizu? Kenè en be sikandin egkehizu tenged te pauk din?”
Ne ke siak te, “Is ibmesakit te ǥehinawa ku iyan is: kenè en bes edtavang kenami is lavew he Megbevayà.”
Nengazen, edtentenuzan ku is menge vaal nu. Uya, edtentenuzan ku is egkengein-inuwan he mibeelan nu zengan.
Ed-isipen ku wey egngunùngunuen is langun he mekeǥeǥehem he menge vaal nu.
He Megbevayà, is menge paaǥi nu ne kenà iring te menge paaǥi te zuma. Wazà ebpekerepeng te kegkemekeǥeǥehem nu.
Iyan ka Megbevayà he mibaal te egkengein-inuwan. Ibpeehè nu te menge etew is gehem nu.
Midlibri nu is menge etew nu he menge kevuwazan ni Jacob wey ni Jose pinaaǥi te ǥehem nu.
He Megbevayà, is menge wahig neiring te etew he emun egkeehè ke zin ebpengerkeren te kegkahandek din.
Mibusbus te uzan is menge kivel; midruǥung diyà te zivavew ne nengilat diyà te minsan hendei.
Ne egkezineg is selenuhug te menge vagyu; is menge kilat neketayew te kelibutan; ne neyunggat is kelibutan.
Midlayun nu is daǥat he nemaǥel te dezekelà he menge vaǥel, piru wazè ka maahà is edsaǥad.
Migiyahan nu is menge etew nu he iring te menge kerehidu, pinaaǥi ki Moises wey ki Aaron.
Sikiyu is menge lumunè ku te inged, pemineǥa niw is menge penurù ku.
Ebpenuruen ku sikiyu pinaaǥi te menge sempità. Edtudtulen ku keniyu is in-eles he menge ketutuanan dengan
he netuenan tew en, su midtudtul kenitew te menge kepuun tew.
Kenè tew heini id-eles te menge vatà; edtudtulen tew heini ziyà te edsunud he menge lapis te kevuwazan. Edtudtulan tew sikandan te ǥehem te Nengazen wey te egkengein-inuwan wey zait he edeliǥen he menge vaal zin.
Mibeǥayan din te kesuǥuan is menge etew ziyà te Israel he menge kevuwazan ni Jacob. Ne insuǥù din diyà te menge kepuun tew he ipenurù dan heini ziyà te menge anak dan,
su para metueni heini te ebpekesunud he lapis te kevuwazan, ne igkepenurù dan daan heini ziyà te menge anak dan.
Ne pinaaǥi kayi edsarig sikandan te Megbevayà, ne kenè dan egkelipatan is mibpemeelan din ne edtumanen dan is menge suǥù din.
Ne kenà sikandan egkeiring te menge kepuun dan he menge supekiru, kenà menge metinumanen, kenà melig-en is kedsarig dan te Megbevayà, wey kenè dan mepezumdumahan kandin.
Is menge sundaru he menge kevuwazan ni Efraim, minsan neǥumeenan sikandan te menge panà, nemelaǥuy sikandan dutun te timpu te tebek.
Wazè dan tumana is kebpekid-uyun dan te Megbevayà; wazè dan sunuza is kesuǥuan din.
Midlipatan dan is egkein-inuwan he menge vaal zin he impeehè din kandan.
Egkein-inuwan is mibeelan te Megbevayà diyà te Zoan he sakup te tanà he Ehipto, ne naahà haazà te menge kepuun tew.
Midtevì din is daǥat ne impevayè din sikandan; diyè din isavuk te pesikilizà te nezalandalan he tanà is wahig he henduen be te menge elavat.
Emun maandew, egiyahan din sikandan pinaaǥi te ǥapun, ne te mezukilem, ne pinaaǥi te kerayag te hapuy.
Impeveka zin is menge vatu ziyà te sibsivayan ne midtudà puun dutun is wahig he henduen be te ziyà ebpuun te serebseb, umbe kenà alang-alang he wahig is imbeǥey zin kandan.
Impetudè din puun dutun te vatu is wahig, ne henduen be haazà te ziyà ebpuun te zekelà he wahig he edtudà.
Piru is menge kepuun tew, mibpedayun dan mulà he ebaal te salà diyà te kandin. Dutun te sibsivayan midsukulan dan is Utew Lavew he Megbevayà.
Midtivevè dan gezami is Megbevayà pinaaǥi te kebuyù dan te ampey zan he keenen.
Mid-insultuwan dan is Megbevayà pinaaǥi te kegkaǥi zan te, “Kenè kiw vuwa igkepekaan te Megbevayà kayi te sibsivayan.
Tutuu iyan he hein midtabpì din sikan is batu ne migawas is wahig, piru egkeveǥayan kiw zin be zaan buwa te supas wey usa is menge etew zin?”
Umbe, nepauk is Nengazen te kegkezineǥa zin kandan. Iring te hapuy is pauk din te menge tig-Israel he menge kevuwazan ni Jacob.
Su wazè dan kedtuu kandin, ne wazè dan medsarig he edlibriyen din sikandan.
Piru minsan pa te iyan haazà, midsuǥù din is langit he med-abri,
ne mibpeud-uzanan din sikandan te keenen he egngezanan te ‘manna’. Imbeǥey zin kandan is keenen he ebpuun te langit su wey zan mekaan.
Sikandan is menge etew zà duen, nekekaan dan te keenen te menge velinsuǥuen. Ne impezahar te Megbevayà heini he keenen diyà te kandan.
Impepengeramag te Megbevayà te keramag he ebpuun te edsilaan wey edsenlepen pinaaǥi te ǥehem din.
Ne mibpantad is menge tagbis he impeuzan-uzan din diyà te kandan.
Impelugtanè din haazà diyà te ebpekeliǥuy te menge tulda zan duen te kampu zan.
Umbe, nekekaan sikandan ne nengahantey zan, su imbeǥey te Megbevayà kandan is egkesuatan dan.
Ne zutun te ebpetakè en sikandan egkaan,
nepeukan sikandan te Megbevayà. Mibpenhimetayan din is tig-Israel he menge vetan-en he memeupiya is kedlelawa wey memezesen.
Piru minsan pa te neseǥazan dan heini is langun he egkein-inuwan he mibpemeelan te Megbevayà, wazè dan med-engked he ebaal te salà wey wazè dan medtuu kandin.
Umbe, migègaanan din tepusa is menge untung dan pinaaǥi te netik-ew he kezeetan.
Ne hein mibpenhimetayan din is duma kandan, ne is duma zuen te nengesamà, midsendit dan ne midangep dan diyà te kandin ne zekelà is suat dan te tavang din.
Neisip dan he iyan endilungè dan wey edlibri kandan is Utew Lavew he Megbevayà.
Piru kenà diyà ebpuun te ǥehinawa zan is kedeliǥa zan kandin su menge teruen sikandan.
Kenà meheǥet is gehinawa zan diyà te kandin; kenè dan metinumanen te kebpekid-uyun kandan.
Minsan pa te iyan heini, hihizuwen gihapun kandan is Megbevayà. Mibpesaylu zin sikandan te menge salè dan ne wazè din sikandan dèdeeti. Layun din ed-eǥena is pauk din kandan minsan utew en sikandin egkepauk.
Midtentenuzan din he menge etew zà sikandan, he iring te keramag he edlavey zà su ebpematey sikandan.
Diyà te sibsivayan, layun dan edsupaka wey ebeǥayi te seeng is Megbevayà.
Layun dan egezami is Megbevayà; ebeelan dan is igkeepes te Waǥas he Megbevayà te Israel.
Midlipatan dan is gehem din he impeehè din hein midlibri zin sikandan te kegkeiza kandan te menge kuntada zan,
ne midlipatan dan sikan is egkein-inuwan he mibeelan din diyà te Zoan he sakup te tanà he Ehipto.
Midhimu zin he lengesa sikan is edtudà he menge wahig te menge tig-Ehipto, umbe wazà egkeinum dan.
Mibpehurepunan din sikandan te utew subra he langew para merasey sikandan; impelepew zin is gerabi he menge vakbak he nekezezaat te menge pinemula zan.
Impekaan din te terapan is menge pinemula zan wey menge abut dan.
Mibpendèdeetan din is menge perasan dan wey menge kayu zan he sikemur pinaaǥi te ǥiyew.
Mibpenhimetayan din is menge uyaǥen dan pinaaǥi te ǥiyew wey kilat.
Tenged te utew zin kegkepeuki kandan, midsuǥù din is duma zuen te menge velinsuǥuen din te kedezaat kandan.
Wazè din eǥena is pauk din; wazè din sikandan libriya te kemetayen, kekenà, mibpenhimetayan din sikandan pinaaǥi te mezaat he menge hitavù.
Mibpenhimetayan din is langun he penganey he menge anak he maama diyà te Ehipto, he iyan kes menge kevuwazan ni Ham.
Impeǥawas din puun te Ehipto is menge etew zin he iring te menge kerehidu he migiyahan din diyà te sibsivayan.
Midumahan din sikandan, umbe wazà sikandan mahandek. Piru nengelened mulà diyà te zaǥat is menge kuntada zan.
Mid-uwit din sikandan diyà te tanà he mibpilì din; diyà te menge vuntud he mid-aǥew zin pinaaǥi te ǥehem din.
Midsegseg din sikandan pehendiyà te meziyù te menge etew zin, ne mibahinbahin din haazà is tanà. Mibehinan is kada tribu te Israel su para maangken dan haazà, ne zutun din sikandan ipeubpà.
Iyan, migezaman dan is Utew Lavew he Megbevayà, su midsupak dan sikandin ne wazè dan tumana is menge suǥù din.
Iring te menge kepuun dan, mibpekeziyuan dan wey midluivan dan is Megbevayà. Ne iring sikandan te nevadtì he panà su kenà sikandan egkeseriǥan.
Midhimu zan he mepauk wey mebpengelikud kandan is Megbevayà pinaaǥi te kebangun dan te menge simbahan diyà te metikang he menge lugar wey te ked-azap dan te zuma he menge ed-ezapen.
Netuenan te Megbevayà heini is mibeelan te menge tig-Israel, umbe nepauk sikandin ne mid-iniyuǥan din en sikandan.
Mid-ewaan din sikan is tulda zin diyà te Shilo he iyan ubpeey zin kayi te kelibutan.
Intuǥut din he maaǥew te menge kuntada sikan is Kavan te Kebpekid-uyun he simbulu te kegkemekeǥeǥehem din wey kegkelavew zin.
Nepeukan din is menge etew he ǥaked din, umbe mibpenhimetayan din sikandan pinaaǥi te tebek.
Mibpeminsulan is menge vetan-en he menge maama kandan, umbe wazè en ebpekeesawa te menge raǥa zan.
Nemematey te tebek is menge memumuhat dan, ne is nengevalu he menge esawa zan ne wazè en mekelalew para kandan.
Piru nehitavù he henduen be te neelimukawan is Nengazen; neiring sikandin te mezesen he etew he mibmevurut tenged te vinu.
Midsegseg din is menge kuntada zin; ne wazà pidtemanan is kegkepeel-elezi zin kandan.
Wazè din pilia is tribu ni Efraim he menge kevuwazan ni Jose.
Su iyan din mibpilì is tribu ni Juda wey is Buvungan he Zion he utew zin minahal.
Dutun din benguna is baley zin, ne iring heini te langit wey tanà su taman te taman is kelig-en kayi.
Si David is mibpilì te Megbevayà he egkehimu he suluǥuen din. Perevantey zà si David te menge kerehidu, piru impeuswag din su midhimu zin si David he hadì te Israel he iyan kes menge etew he ǥaked din. Umbe igkepetug-iring gihapun si David te perevantey te menge kerehidu,
<range>
ne tinutuuwà is ked-etura zin te menge tig-Israel ne mibpurungan din sikandan penguluwi.
He Megbevayà, midsurung te meǥinged diyà te senge nenasyun is meǥinged diyà te tanà he ǥaked nu. Midremerikan dan is segradu he valey nu ne midezeetan dan is Jerusalem.
Impekaan dan te zumezaas he menge tagbis wey zumezaas he menge langgam is nemematey he menge etew nu he menge metinumanen he suluǥuen nu.
Impetiǥis dan is lengesa te menge etew nu ne iring te wahig is kedtudà kayi ziyà te tivuuk he Jerusalem, ne wazà minsan sevaha he nesamà he ebpekeleveng te nemematey.
Ebpeel-elezan key wey edsudien key te menge nasyun he nekeliǥuy kenami.
Keenu en buwa egkaawà, Nengazen, is pauk nu kenami? Taman en be te taman is pauk nu kenami? Eriyubriyub en be he iring te hapuy is kebpengelikud nu?
Ipeehè nu is pauk nu ziyà te menge nasyun wey menge ginhedian he wazà megkilala wey medsimba kenikew.
Su mibpenhimetayan dan is menge etew nu ne midezeetan dan is nasyun te menge etew nu.
Kenè key kenikew siluti tenged te menge salà te menge kepuun dey. Kekenà, kenè nu en pekeuǥeta is kegkehizuwi nu kenami su wazè dey en egkehimu.
Tevangi key kenikew, Megbevayà he Menluluwas dey, su wey ka mezeliǥi. Luwasa key wey peseyluwa key te menge salè dey su wey ka mevantug.
Kenè nu itugut he ebpekekaǥi ziyà te kenami is menge etew ziyà te zuma he menge nasyun te, “Hendei en is Megbevayè niw?” Ipeehè nu kenami is penimales nu te menge nasyun tenged te kebpenhimetayi zan te menge etew nu he menge suluǥuen nu.
Pemineǥa nu is dag-es te menge etew nu he menge vihag. Edhimetayan sikandan, umbe libriya nu sikandan pinaaǥi te ǥehem nu.
Nengazen, kepipitu nu tekepa is penimales nu te uvey zey he menge nasyun te kebpeel-elezi zan kenikew.
Ne sikami is menge etew nu he iring te menge kerehidu he ebentayan nu, ne wazà pidtemanan te kebpeselemati zey kenikew. Layun dey sikew edeliǥa taman te taman.

Sikew is ebantey te Israel, pemineǥa key kenikew, iyan ka migiya te iring te menge kerehidu he menge kevuwazan ni Jose. Sikew is ebpimpinuu ziyà te pinuuwè nu te kedhadì he egkezivavew te nepelestaran te menge kirubin, ipeehè nu is gehem nu
ziyà te etuvangan te tribu ni Efraim, ni Benjamin, wey ni Manase. Ipeehè nu en is gehem nu, ne veyai key ne ibriya key.
He Megbevayà, iliku nu kayi te kenami is keupiya te kebpekesavuk dey zengan. Ipeehè nu kenami is hizu nu su wey key melibri.
Nengazen he Megbevayà he Mekeǥeǥehem, sengemenu keluǥayad is timpu he igkeepes nu zà is menge kebpengemuyù dey te menge etew nu?
Mibpenù key kenikew te seeng ne samè dà kenè dey meinum is luhè dey.
Intuǥut nu he tebeka key te kesikbit dey he menge nasyun, ne sikandan is menge kuntada zey ne ed-undaunda kenami.
He Megbevayà he Mekeǥeǥehem, ilikù nu kayi te kenami is meupiya he kebpekesavuk dey zengan. Ipeehè nu kenami is keupiya nu su wey key melibri.
Sikami is menge etew nu, neiring key te pinemula he paras he migkuwa nu ziyà te Ehipto ne impemula nu ziyà te tanà te menge etew he midsegseg nu.
Mibpurungan nu hiǥewani haazà is tanà, ne nendalid haazà is paras ne neeneb te langkat din heini is tanà.
Nelembungan te menge subpang din is menge vuntud wey is dezekelà he kayu he sidru.
Nekeuma is menge subpang din diyà te Daǥat he Mediteraneo ne taman en te zekelà he Wahig he Eufrates.
He Megbevayà, maan is midrundus nu is menge verengbeng kayi te paras? Egketakew en hinuun te langun he sumeseǥazà is menge veǥas din.
Egkeenen heini te kenà ayam he menge vavuy wey zuma pa he menge leew he langgam.
Seǥipaa key zed umani, Megbevayà he Mekeǥeǥehem! Puun diyan te langit ahaa nu is kebpekesavuk dey. Is-isipa key kenikew is menge etew nu,
he iring te pinemula he paras he impemula nu pinaaǥi te ǥehem nu. Tentenuzi key kenikew is menge anak nu he impehitindeg nu su para mevantug ka.
He Megbevayà, iring key te midtamped he paras he mibinsulan. Egkezumahan te pauk nu is kedtengtengi nu kenami ne midezeetan key kenikew.
Piru ǥuntaan tevangi key en kenikew is menge etew he mibpilì nu he ebpekeuvey kenikew wey midlig-enan nu su para mevantug ka,
ne kenè dey en sikew ed-ewaan. Ilikù nu zini te kenami is meupiya he kebpekesavuk dey, ne ed-ezapen dey sikew.
He Nengazen he Mekeǥeǥehem he Megbevayà, ilikù nu zini te kenami is meupiya he kebpekesavuk dey! Ipeehè nu kenami is hizu nu su wey key melibri.

Kentahi niw he melipayen kew is Megbevayà he iyan mibeǥey kenitew te zesen. Ugyab kew ziyà te etuvangan te Megbevayà ni Jacob!
Puuni niw is kegkanta; ipezaǥing niw is tamburin, tukara niw is utew meupiya he ebpemineǥen he menge instrumintu he zuen dan menge kuwirdas.
Ipezaǥing niw is budyung te kedsilibra te Pista te Kebpuun te Hayag wey zuen te pista he ebeelan tew emun tuker.
Su iyan heini sulunuzen te menge tig-Israel. Su suǥù heini te Megbevayà ni Jacob.
Impenurù din heini he penurù te menge kevuwazan ni Jose hein midsurung din is Ehipto. Nekezineg a te laǥeng he wazè ku mekilala he edhenduen te,
“Impelingkawas ku sikiyu te kegkeuripena keniyu; in-awè ku is menge meveǥat he uwiten niw.
Hein egkereǥenan kew mid-umew a keniyu ne midlibri ku sikiyu. Ne ziyà te mid-elesan ku he kivel midtavak ku is umew niw. Ne migezaman ku sikiyu ziyà te serebseb te Meriba.
Sikiyu is menge etew ku he menge tig-Israel, pemineǥa niw is petizaan ku keniyu. Deyzey pezem ke ebpemineǥen a keniyu!
Kinahanglan he liyu kedì, kenè kew med-azap te zuma; kenè niw ezapa is tarù he menge Megbevayà.
Iyan a kes Nengazen he iyan Megbevayè niw he iyan kes mibpeǥawas keniyu ziyà te Ehipto. Buyù kew kayi te kediey ne ebeǥayan ku sikiyu te menge kinahanglan niw.
Piru sikiyu is menge Israilihanen he menge etew ku, wazè kew mebpemineg wey mebpezumazuma kedì.
Umbe, mibpesagdan ku sikiyu te kebmesinupaken niw, ne mibeelan niw is egkesuatan niw.
Emun pezem ebpemineg kew kedì wey edtumanen niw is menge paaǥi ku,
ne diritsu ku zà edsiluti wey edaaǥa is menge kuntada niw.
Is menge edumut kediey, ne ebpekeluhud kedì su egkahandek. Ne wazà pidtemanan te silut dan.
Iyan, sikiyu mulà is menge etew ku, ibpekaan ku sikiyu. Edhentayen ku sikiyu te utew meupiya he trigu wey teneb.”
Midumala te Megbevayà is ketiǥuman te menge gemhanan, ne edhukuman din sikandan.
Ke sikandin te, “Sengemenu keluǥayad is kedtulung niw kedhimu te hukum he kenà metazeng? Sengemenu keluǥayad is kedtulungi niw kedepiǥi te menge lalung?
Iveǥey niw is hustu he kukuman diyà te menge utew egkengeey-eyuwi wey menge ilu. Levani niw is ketenged te menge egkaayuayu he edèdaaǥen.
Luwasa is menge utew egkengeey-eyuwi wey is menge pubri ziyà te ǥehem te menge mezaat he etew!
Utew kew menge paglung! Utew kew menge taleng! Diyè kew te kerusireman, umbe negurigew en heini is kelibutan.
Siak, is Utew Lavew he Megbevayà, egkeǥiyan ku sikiyu te menge megbevayè kew, ne pudu ku sikiyu menge anak.
Ebpatey kew iring te etew. Egketapus is untung niw iring te minsan hentei he pengulu.”
Sigi en, Megbevayà, hukumi nu en is menge etew ziyà te langun he menge nasyun kayi te kelibutan, su ǥaked nu sikandan.

He Megbevayà, kenè ka pereremek, kekenà, waleng ka!
Hanu man te menge kuntada nu, egkegurigew zan he edsurung ne ebpegalbu sikandan su ebpekezaag dan kun.
Duen meeles he pelanu zan he para te kezeetan te menge etew nu he ed-eturen nu.
Ke sikandan te, “Gaang-gaang kew su edèdeetan tew is nasyun he Israel su para melipati en heini taman te taman.”
Nesevaha sikandan te mezaat he pelanu zan. Mid-uyun sikandan te kegkuntada kenikew.
Iyan sikandan kes menge Edomanhen, menge Ismailihanen, menge Moabitanhen, menge Hagarnen,
menge Gibalnen, menge Amunihanen, menge Amalikanhen, menge Filistihanen, wey menge etew te Tyre.
Midtavang daan kandan is Asiria he mezesen he tumetavang te menge kevuwazan ni Lot.
Daaǥa nu sikandan Nengazen, iring te mibeelan nu ziyà te menge Midianhen, wey ziyà te ki Sisera wey ki Jabin diyà te zal-ug he Kishon.
Mibpatey sikandan diyà te Endor ne neredak is menge lawa zan ne nehimu he abunu te tanà.
Dèdeeti nu is menge pengulu zan iring te mibeelan nu ki Oreb, ki Zeeb, ki Zeba, wey ki Zalmuna.
Su migkaǥi sikandan te, “Ed-eǥawen tew is tanà te Megbevayà.”
He Megbevayà, ipeyapat nu sikandan iring te eliyavuk wey ukap he idlayap te keramag.
Iring te hapuy he midelandap he nekevinsul te menge kayu ziyà te vuvungan, del-asa nu sikandan ne pelihendeka nu pinaaǥi te vagyu.
<range>
Peel-elezi nu sikandan, Nengazen, taman te edangep sikandan diyà te kenikew.
Berakat he mepeel-elezi wey utew mengehandek sikandan te wazà pidtemanan. Berakat he mebpatey zan he utew zan egkeeled!
Berakat he metueni zan he iyan ka, Nengazen, he iyan dà Utew Lavew he Megbevayà kayi te tivuuk he kelibutan.

Nengazen he Mekeǥeǥehem, utew mekempet is baley nu.
Egkesuat a utew he edhendutun! Mibulung ad te kedseled diyà te valey nu, He Nengazen. Is tivuuk he ǥehinawa ku engkanta te kegkelipey tenged kenikew te uuyag he Megbevayà.
Nengazen he Mekeǥeǥehem, Hadì ku wey Megbevayè ku, minsan is menge maya wey is menge keluǥeyluǥey, duen dan menge salag diyà te uvey te pemuhatà, ne zutun is menge pispis dan.
Utew zeyzey is menge etew he ziyà ed-upbà te valey nu; layun sikandan egkanta te kedalig kenikew.
Utew zeyzey is menge etew he nekaangken te zesen he ebpuun diyà te kenikew, he mezesen is penganduy zan he ebisita ziyà te valey nu.
Dutun te kebpekevayè dan diyà te Memaza he Suǥud, henduen be te neǥezam dan he zuen dutun menge serebseb, ne henduen be te mid-uzanan haazà su zuen dutun wahig he nengetang-el.
Ne mid-iseg pa is desen dan dutun te kedhipanew zan, taman te ziyè en is kada sevaha kandan te etuvangan te Megbevayà diyà te Zion.
Nengazen he Megbevayà he Mekeǥeǥehem, he Megbevayà ni Jacob, pemineǥa nu is ked-ampù ku!
He Megbevayà, peburi nu is kelasag dey he iyan is hadì dey he mibpilì nu.
Is senga andew he ked-ubpà diyà te valey nu ne meupiya pa te nengkelibu he andew he ked-ubpà diyà te minsan hendei he lugar. Edtumuen ku is kedhithitindeg diyà te ǥemawan te valey nu, He Megbevayà, kenà is ked-ubpà diyà te valey te menge lalung.
Su sikew, is Nengazen he Megbevayà, iring ka te andew he ebpeketayew, wey te kelasag he egkehimu he pengalang. Ebeǥey ka te pebur wey zengeg. Kenè nu idsekel is minsan hengkey he meupiya ziyà te nengungubpaan he wazà duen igkesawey.
Nengazen he Mekeǥeǥehem, utew zeyzey is edsarig diyà te kenikew.

Nengazen, impeehè nu is keupiya nu pinaaǥi te kebpekeveǥey te keupiyaanan te tanè nu he Israel; impeuswag key en maan kenikew.
Mibpesaylu nu is menge salè dey; ne in-awè nu en diyà te isip nu.
Wazè key en kenikew mepeuki.
He Megbevayà he menluluwas dey, ilikù nu kayi te kenami is meupiya he kebpekesavuk dey. Iawè nu en is pauk nu kenami.
Taman te taman en be is kegkepeuki nu kenami?
Kenè be egkehimu ke idlikù nu kayi te kenami is meupiya he kebpekesavuk dey su wey key melipey tenged kenikew?
Nengazen, ipeehè nu kenami is kebmahala nu kenami ne libriya key.
Ebpemineǥen ku is egkeǥiyen te Nengazen he Megbevayà, su ibpenaad din diyà te kenitew te metinumanen he menge etew zin is meupiya he kebpekesavuk; emun kenè tew edlikuan is tinulebung he menge vaal tew.
Tutuu iyan he edlibriyen din is menge etew he edtahud kandin su para metuusi he kemulu edterebahu is gehem din kayi te tanè tew.
Ebpekeduma is gaǥew wey kebmetinumanen, ne ebpekeduma zaan is ketazeng wey is kelinew.
Is kebmetinumanen te etew kayi te tanà ne netuenan te Megbevayà diyà te langit. Ne is ketazeng te Megbevayà diyà te langit egkezawat te etew kayi te tanà.
Siguradu he edtuvazan kiw te Nengazen, ne edekelà is sebpet te tanè tew.
Is ketazeng iring te menunudtulà he edhuna te Nengazen su ed-endamen din is ibayà te Nengazen.
Nengazen, pemineǥa nu wey tevaka nu is ked-ampù ku su egkaayuayu a wey pubri a.
Tipiǥi nu is untung ku su meheǥet is kedsunud ku kenikew. Iyan ka Megbevayè ku; luwasa a kenikew is suluǥuen nu he midsarig diyan te kenikew.
Kehizuwi a, Nengazen, su layun a ebpengumew-umew kenikew.
Lipaya a kenikew, Nengazen, is suluǥuen nu su ziyà a te kenikew med-ampù.
Tutuu he meupiya ka wey mepineseyluwen, ne utew nu mibmahal is langun he ebpengumew-umew kenikew.
Pemineǥa nu, Nengazen, is ked-ampù ku; pemineǥa nu is kebpehizuhizu ku kenikew.
Ebpengumew-umew a kenikew te timpu te kelised su edtevaken e man kenikew.
Wazà megbevayà he iring kenikew, Nengazen; wazà minsan hentei he ebpekehimu te nengehimu nu.
Edsimba kenikew is langun he menge etew ziyà te menge nasyun he midlimbag nu. Ne edeliǥen ke zan.
Su mekeǥeǥehem ka, ne egkein-inuwan is menge vaal nu; iyan ke zà Megbevayà.
Penurua a Nengazen te paaǥi nu, ne edtumanen ku heini te kenà duwazuwa. Tevangi a he mehimu he utew hustu is kedtehuza ku kenikew.
Nengazen he Megbevayè ku, edeliǥen ku sikew te kedalig he ebpuun kayi te tivuuk he ǥehinawa ku. Edeliǥen ku sikew te wazà pidtemanan.
Su utew a kenikew mibmahal; midlibri a kenikew te kemetayen.
He Megbevayà, edsurungen a te gelbuwen he menge etew su edhimetayan e zan. Mesipala sikandan ne wazè dan mekekilala kenikew.
Piru sikew, Nengazen, hihizuwen ka wey veliǥeǥawen ka he Megbevayà. Beliǥeǥawen ka wey metinumanen, ne kenè ka melemu he egkepauk.
Seǥipaa a wey kehizuwi a; beǥayi a te zesen nu ne libriya a is suluǥuen nu.
Ipetuusi nu kayi te kediey is keupiya nu su wey mepeel-elezi is menge kuntada ku ke egkeehè dan haazà. Su iyan ka, Nengazen, edtavang wey ebeǥey kedì te kelipey.
Midtukud te Megbevayà is inged he Zion; diyè din benguna te segradu he menge vuvungan. Lavew is kebmahala zin kayi he inged te kebmahala zin te langun he zuma he menge lugar ziyà te Israel.
<range>
Meupiya is menge lalag din mehitenged kayi he inged.
Ke sikandin te, “Emun idlista ku is menge nasyun he migkilala kedì, idragkes ku is Ehipto wey is Babilonia, idragkes ku zaan is Filistia, Tyre, wey Etiopia. Is menge etew he ebpemuun kayi he menge nasyun ed-isipen ku he hustu en he tig-Zion.”
Tutuu he egkekaǥi heini mehitenged te Zion, he mahabet he menge etew is kenà tig-Zion he ed-isipen he hustu en he tig-Zion. Ne iyan edlig-en kayi he inged is Utew Lavew he Megbevayà.
Idlista te Nengazen is menge etew zin, ne idragkes din is menge etew he ziyà ebpemuun te zuma he menge nasyun he mid-isip din he hustu en he tig-Zion.
Edsayew wey egkanta sikandan is langun, ke sikandan te, “Ebpuun te Zion is langun he menge tuvad kenitew!”

Nengazen, iyan ka Megbevayà he menluluwas ku. Ed-umawen ku sikew te maandew wey mezukilem.
Pemineǥa nu is ampù ku; tevaka nu is kebuyù ku te tavang.
Su mahabet he menge kelised is nengeseǥazan ku, ne henduen be te ebpatey ad.
Sevaha a zuen te menge etew he edserupatey en. Neiring a te etew he kenè en egketavang.
Mibey-anan ad iring duen te nemematey en. Neiring a zuen te nemematey en he nemeketayhad diyà te leveng; neiring a zuen te mibpenlipatan nu en he kenè nu en egketevangan.
Henduen be te intimbag a kenikew ziyà te vudsi he utew mezalem wey utew merusirem.
Utew a kenikew nepeuki. Is pauk nu iring te menge vaǥel he neketaplì kayi te kediey.
Impekeziyù nu kayi te kediey is menge emiǥu ku. Midhimu nu he utew mezaat is ked-ahaa zan kedì. Nezureng a ne kenà ad ebpekepelaǥuy.
Tenged te menge elentusen ku, ne kenà ad utew ebpekaahà. Nengazen, andew-andew is kebpengumew-umew ku kenikew duma is kebeyawa ku te menge velad ku.
Wazè ka mebaal te menge egkein-inuwan para te menge nemematey en, ne wazà sikandan med-enew is edalig kenikew.
Is gaǥew nu wey kebmetinumanen nu ne kenà egketudtul te nemematey en.
Kenà egkaahà is egkengein-inuwan he menge vaal nu wey is ketazeng nu ziyà te merusirem he lugar te nemematey en, su zutun he lugar kenè en egketenuzan is langun.
Piru siak mulà, Nengazen, ne ebuyù a te tavang diyà te kenikew. Kada meselem ed-ampù a ziyà te kenikew.
Piru maan is ed-engkezan a kenikew, Nengazen? Maan is mid-elesan a kenikew?
Puun te vatè e pa, ne nekaantus ad ne hapit ad ebpatey. Naantus ku is menge mekahandekhandek he mibeelan nu kayi te kediey.
Is pauk nu iring te mevendes he keramag he nekeigù kayi te kediey. Edezeetan a kenikew pinaaǥi te mekahandekhandek he menge vaal nu,
he iring te zalem he layun ebpekeliǥuy kayi te kediey; ne wazè ku en edlewangan.
Impekeziyù nu kayi te kediey is menge minahal ku wey is menge emiǥu ku; ne kerusireman dà is nesamà he zuma ku.

Nengazen, layun ku egkentaha is dekelà he ǥaǥew nu. Ne taman te taman is kedtudtula ku te kebmetinumanen nu.
Idsangyew ku he utew melig-en is gaǥew nu he wazè din pidtemanan, ne iring te langit he kenà egkaawà.
Migkaǥi ka te, “Midhimu ku is kebpekid-uyun ku te suluǥuen ku he si David, he mibpilì ku he egkehimu he hadì. Ne iyan heini impesarig ku kandin:
Is kada egkehimu he hadì te Israel ne ebpuun te menge kevuwazan nu taman te taman; is ginhedian nu ebpedayun te wazà pidtemanan.”
Nengazen, is menge ilengiten he linimbag edalig te egkein-inuwan he menge vaal nu wey te kebmetinumanen nu.
Wazà minsan sevaha ziyà te langit he iring kenikew, Nengazen. Wazà ilengiten he linimbag he igkepetug-iring kenikew.
Edtehuzan ka ziyà te menge ketiǥuman te ilengiten he menge linimbag. Is langun he edliǥuy kenikew ne zuen dan kegkahandek kenikew.
Nengazen he Megbevayà he Mekeǥeǥehem, wazà minsan hentei he iring kenikew; mekeǥeǥehem ka wey metinumanen diyà te langun he ebeelan nu.
Edumelahan nu pinaaǥi te ǥehem nu is ebpemaǥel he zaǥat; ibpeengked nu is dezekelà he vaǥel zin.
Midezeetan nu is dekelà he langgam he si Rahab ne mibpatey heini. Impedsusuwey nu is menge kuntada nu pinaaǥi te ǥehem nu.
Kenikew is langit wey is kelibutan; mibeelan nu is kelibutan wey is langun he netaǥù kayi.
Mibeelan nu is dizaya wey is divavà. Is Buntud he Tabor wey is Buntud he Hermon iring heini is dezuwa te menge etew he egkanta te kegkelipey tenged kenikew.
Mekeǥeǥehem ka! Utew subra is desen nu!
Is kedhadì nu egkezumahan te ketazeng wey hustu he kukuman, wey egkezumahan daan te ǥaǥew wey kebmetinumanen.
Nengazen, utew zeyzey is menge etew he nemekesaǥad te melipayen he ked-ugyab tenged kenikew, wey nengungubpaan tenged te hizu nu.
Tenged te keupiya nu kandan, layun sikandan egkelipey. Ne edeliǥen dan is ketazeng nu.
Ebpekezantal key tenged te zesen he imbeǥey nu kenami; ne tenged te keupiya nu kenami ed-umanan nu is egkehimu zey.
Nengazen, Waǥas he Megbevayà te Israel, gaked nu is hadì dey he iyan kelasag dey.
Dengan nekidlalag ka te metinumanen he menge suluǥuen nu pinaaǥi te kebpelawas nu kandan. Ke sikew te, “Midtevangan ku is sevaha he sundaru. Mid-aram ku sikandin puun te menge etew ku su para mehimu he hadì.
Si David he suluǥuen ku, iyan mibpilì ku he hadì pinaaǥi te kedlenahi kandin te segradu he lana ku.
Is gehem ku eduma kandin wey edlig-en kandin.
Kenà sikandin egkelupiglupig te menge kuntada zin; ne kenà sikandin egkezaagdaag te menge lalung.
Ebekbeken ku ziyà te etuvangan din is menge kuntada zin taman te ebpemematey sikandan.
Ebmahalen ku sikandin wey ebpekid-uunungen a kandin. Ne ed-umanan ku is egkehimu zin pinaaǥi te ǥehem ku.
Ibpeiseg ku is keluag te ginhedian din su edhimuwen ku he puun dà te Daǥat he Mediteraneo ne taman en te Wahig he Eufrates.
Egkaǥi sikandin kayi te kediey te, ‘Iyan ka amey ku wey Megbevayè ku; iyan ka endilungè ku wey menluluwas ku.’
Ed-isipen ku sikandin he kinekekayan he anak ku, iyan sikandin lavew te langun he menge hadì.
Ebpedayun is kebmahala ku kandin te wazà pidtemanan, ne kenà egkaawà taman te taman is kebpekid-uyun ku kandin.
Is kada hadì te Israel ne ziyà ebpuun te menge kevuwazan din taman te taman. Ne iring te langit is ginhedian din su kenà egkaawà.
Iyan, emun kenà edtuman is menge kevuwazan din te menge kesuǥuan ku, menge sulunuzen ku, wey menge penurù ku,
<range>
edletiguwen ku sikandan te mesakit tenged te menge salè dan.
Piru ebmahalen ku wey ed-unungan ku ǥihapun si David.
Edtumanen ku is kebpekid-uyun ku kandin, wey is impesarig ku kandin.
Pinaaǥi te waǥas he ngazan ku nenangdù a ziyà te ki David, ne kenà duwazuwa he edtumanen ku is insaad ku kandin su kenè e man teruen.
Is kada hadì te Israel ne ziyà ebpuun te menge kevuwazan din taman te taman. Is ginhedian din iring te andew he kenà egkaawà diyà te etuvangan ku.
Ebpedayun heini taman te taman su iring heini te vulan he egkeseriǥan he tistiǥus diyà te langit.”
Piru, Nengazen, nepeukan nu is pinilì nu he hadì; mid-iniyuǥan nu sikandin wey mid-engkezan nu.
Wazè nu leusa te edtuman is kebpekid-uyun nu kandin te suluǥuen nu, ne in-awè nu is gehem te hadì diyà te kandin.
Midlempag nu is menge verengbeng te inged din wey migevè nu is menge kutà kayi.
Is menge azen dutun te inged din ne mibpenguwa te menge sumeseǥazà. Mibpeel-elezan sikandin te kesikbit din he menge nasyun.
Mibeǥayan nu te zesen is menge kuntada zin; midlipey nu sikandan is langun.
Midhimu nu he wazà pulus te menge ǥumaan din, ne midhimu nu he mezaag sikandin te tebek.
In-awè nu ziyà te kandin is kegkemekeǥeǥehem wey is gehem te hadì.
Henduen be te midtik-ew zà sikandin mebmeǥurang; ne mibpeel-elezan nu sikandin.
Sengemenu keluǥayad is ked-eles nu Nengazen? Taman en be te wazà pidtemanan? Sengemenu keluǥayad is pauk nu he henduen be te hapuy?
Tentenuzi nu Nengazen, he mevavè dà is untung te etew; tentenuzi nu he midhimu nu is etew he zuen din kemetayen.
Hentei is etew he kenà ebpatey? Ebpekelikey ve is etew te kemetayen?
Nengazen, hendei en is gaǥew nu he iring duen te nehuna, he insaad nu ziyà te ki David dengan tenged te kebmetinumanen nu?
Tentenuzi nu, Nengazen, he mibpeel-elezan te menge etew ziyà te mezakel he menge nasyun is menge suluǥuen nu, ne ed-entusen ku heini.
Iyan, is menge kuntada nu, Nengazen, edsudì te pinilì nu he hadì minsan hendei sikandin ebayà.
Dait he edeliǥen is Nengazen te wazà pidtemanan! Amen! Amen!
Nengazen, puun pa zengan ne ziyè key en med-ubpà te kenikew.
Hein wazà nu pa limbaǥa is menge vuntud wey is kelibutan, ne Megbevayè ke en, ne iyan ka ǥihapun Megbevayà te wazà pidtemanan.
Kenikew he vayàbayà is kemetayen te etew; idlikù nu sikandin diyà te tanà he iyan kes ebpuunan din.
Is nengkelibu he tuig kayi te kenami ne iring dà mulà te senga andew ziyà te kenikew, etawa iring dà heini te nepipira zà he uras te mezukilem.
Edsevukan nu te ketepusan is untung dey iring heini te teǥeinep he meǥaan dà egkahanew.
Wey iring te sagbet he edreteb wey edtuvù te meselem, ne emun mahapun en ne egkelay-ub ne egkeǥangu en.
Igkeherati zey is pauk nu; igkezeeti zey is rerangit nu.
Neehè nu is menge salè dey. Minsan is meeles is kebeeli zey zuen ne nepurung nu heini maahà.
Ibpatey zey is pauk nu kenami; ne henduen dà te naasnaas is kegketapus te untung dey.
Is keluǥayad te untung dey ne 70 dà he tuig, etawa 80 he tuig emun melig-en is kedlelawa zey. Piru minsan pa is kineupiyahan he menge tuig te ked-ubpè dey, ne mahabet gihapun he menge keseengan wey menge kelised is egkengeseǥazan dey. Tutuu iyan he meǥaan dà egketapus is untung dey ne egkahanew key en.
Wazè pa nekesaǥad te ipiktu te zekelà he pauk nu. Ne zutun te ked-iseg te keuluwanen dey te pauk nu, ne ed-iseg daan is kedtahud dey kenikew.
Ipeisip-isip nu kenami he mevavè dà is untung dey, su para mebmetau key kayi te kebpengungubpaan dey.
Nengazen, sengemenu keluǥayad is kegkepeuki nu kenami? Seǥipaa key en wey kehizuwi key en is menge suluǥuen nu.
Kada meselem ipetuusi nu kenami is kebmahala nu kenami su para mekekanta key te kedlipey, ne ebmelipayen key te tivuuk he untung dey.
Beǥayi key kenikew te kelipey he iring keluǥayad te menge tuig te kedsiluti nu wey kebpeentusa nu kenami.
Ipeehè nu kenami te menge suluǥuen nu wey te menge kevuwazan dey, is egkein-inuwan he vaal nu wey is kegkemekeǥeǥehem nu.
Nengazen he Megbevayè dey, berakat he edtuvazan key kenikew, wey ebeǥayan key kenikew te kelempusan te langun he ebeelan dey.
Is minsan hentei he ed-aput diyà te Utew Lavew he Megbevayà he Mekeǥeǥehem, wazà ebpekekaid kandin.
Ebpekekaǥi a, ke siak te, “Is Nengazen, iyan sikandin eputè ku wey melig-en he elesà. Iyan sikandin Megbevayè ku he edseriǥan ku.”.
Emun ed-aput ka ziyà te kandin, idlikey ke zin te menge pekaid wey te ebpekepatey he menge zaru.
Edlekupan ke zin iring te piyak ne wazà ebpekekaid kenikew. Is kebmetinumanen din iyan kelasag nu wey pengalang nu.
Kenè ka ereg he egkahandek te mekehandekhandek he menge hitavù, wey te ebpenggezamen he menge zaru, wey menge vangkit he egkehitavù ke mezukilem etawa maandew.
<range>
Minsan linibu pa he menge etew is ebpematey ziyà te ebpekeliǥuy kenikew, kenè ka egkemenu.
Egkeehè nu zà ke ebmenmenuwen te edsilut is lalung he menge etew, ne kenè ka egkeragkes.
Geina te ziyè ke man med-aput te Nengazen he iyan kes Utew Lavew he Megbevayà he iyan ebpengalang kedì,
umbe wazà limas etawa vangkit he ebpekezezaat kenikew wey te pemilya nu.
Su edsuǥuen te Megbevayà is menge velinsuǥuen din te kebantey kenikew minsan hendei ka ebpevayà.
Edselupepayen ke zan wey kenà mepelii is menge paa nu te menge vatu.
Bà nu zà egieki is menge erimaung wey is edhereg he menge uled.
Migkaǥi is Megbevayà te, “Edlibriyen ku wey edlevanan ku is mibmahal wey migkilala kedì.
Emun ed-umawen e zin, ne edtevaken ku sikandin; emun edlised sikandin, ne eduma a kandin; edlibriyen ku sikandin wey ebeǥayan ku te zengeg.
Ebeǥayan ku sikandin te meluǥayad he untung, ne ibpeehè ku kandin is kedlibriya ku kandin.”

Nengazen he Utew Lavew he Megbevayà, meupiya is kebpeselemati kenikew wey is kegkanta te menge idalig kenikew.
Maandew wey mezukilem meupiya is kebpeheyaǥa te ǥaǥew nu,
he ebpezumahan te kedtukari te menge instrumintu he zuen dan menge kuwirdas.
Su midlipey a kenikew, Nengazen, pinaaǥi te egkein-inuwan he menge vaal nu. Tenged te mibpemeelan nu, egkanta a te kegkelipey ku.
Utew egkein-inuwi is mibpemeelan nu, Nengazen! Kenè dey egketegkad is isip nu.
Kenà egkesavut te menge tulebung wey menge taleng
he minsan iring te nenuvù he menge sagbet is ked-uswag te kebpekesavuk te menge lalung, edezeetan gihapun sikandan te wazà pidtemanan.
Piru sikew, Nengazen, lavew ka te langun te wazè din pidtemanan.
Kenà duwazuwa he ebpekedsusuwey is lalung he menge kuntada nu ne ebpemematey sikandan.
Mibeǥayan a kenikew te zesen he iring te zesen te tudu he vaka, wey mibeǥayan a kenikew te kelipey.
Nezineg ku wey neehè ku mismu is kepildiyan te lalung he menge kuntada ku.
Is ked-uswag te menge metazeng igkepetug iring te meveǥas he palma, ne is kebpekesavuk dan igkepetug iring te kayu he sidru ziyà te Lebanon he midtuvù he melig-en.
Iring sikandan te menge kayu he impemula ziyà te valey te Nengazen he Megbevayè tew he meupiya is tuvù dan,
he ebpemeǥas gihapun minsan meǥurang en, ne kemulu ǥihapun meilem wey melig-en.
Ne puriba heini he metazeng is Nengazen he iyan endilungè ku; wazà minsan hengkey he mezaat diyà te kandin.
Hadì ka, Nengazen; is bisti nu iyan is kegkemekeǥeǥehem nu wey is utew nu kegkelavew. Utew melig-en is kebenguna nu te kelibutan ne kenà heini egkehuyung.
Is kedhadì nu puun pa te puunà, su zaan ke en hein wazè pa is kelibutan.
Utew mezaǥing is daǥat, Nengazen, ne edreǥuuk is menge vaǥel.
Piru sikew is Nengazen he ziyà te langit, lavew ke pa he mekeǥeǥehem te kezaǥing te zaǥat; lavew ke pa he mekeǥeǥehem te menge vaǥel kayi.
Nengazen, egkeseriǥan utew is menge suǥù nu, wey is kegkesegradu te baley nu te wazà pidtemanan.
Nengazen he Megbevayà, sikew is ebpenimales; ipeehè nu en is pauk nu.
Iyan ka edhukum te langun he menge etew; umbe, sigi en, belesi nu en is menge gelbuwen te zait he ibales kandan.
Sengemenu pa keluǥayad is kedlipey te menge lalung, Nengazen?
Utew en ebpemahambug is langun he menge etew he memezaat is baal.
Edèdaaǥen dan is menge etew he ǥaked nu.
Mibpenhimetayan dan is menge valu he vahi, is menge ilu, wey is menge lumelengyawà.
Ke sikandan te, “Kenà egkaahà te Nengazen is menge vaal tew; kenè en heini edseǥipaan te Megbevayà ni Jacob.”
Sikiyu is menge taleng wey menge tulebung, keenu kew pa ebpekesavut? Sevuta niw kun be heini:
Kenè be is Megbevayà iyan mibaal te menge telinga tew wey menge mata tew? Maan is egkeǥiyen niw he kela ke kenà sikandin ebpekezineg wey ebpekaahà?
Kenè be ebmensuwen din is menge nasyun? Maan is egkeǥiyen niw he kela ke kenà sikandin edsilut? Kenè be ebpenuruen din is menge etew? Maan is egkeǥiyen niw he kela ke kenà sikandin metau?
Netuenan te Nengazen he is ed-isipen te menge etew, ne pudu wazè din pulus.
Nengazen, utew zeyzey is etew he ebmensuwen nu pinaaǥi te kebpenurua nu kandin te menge kesuǥuan nu.
Ebpenuruen nu sikandin su para zuen din kelinew emun timpu te kesamuk, wey taman en te timpu te kedsiluti nu te menge lalung.
Su kenè nu ed-engkezan, Nengazen, is menge etew he ǥaked nu.
Siguradu he egkeuman egkehitavù is metazeng he menge kedhukum, ne ebpekeuyun kayi is langun he midtinazeng.
Wazà duma he ebpeketavang kedì ke edsurungen a te lalung he menge etew, kekenà, iyan ke zà, Nengazen.
Emun wazà a kenikew tevangi, ne minatey ad guntaan.
Hein migkaǥi a ziyà te kenikew, Nengazen, he henduen be te ebpatey ad, midtevangan a kenikew su mibmahal a kenikew.
Hein utew a nesemuki, midlig-enan a kenikew ne nelipey a.
Kenà egkehimu he edepiǥan nu is lalung he menge menhuhusey, he ebaal te supak te kesuǥuan.
Nesevaha zan te kebpekidkuntada te menge metazeng, ne midhukuman dan te kemetayen is wazè dan menge salà.
Piru, sikew, Nengazen he Megbevayè ku, iyan ka eputè ku wey endilungè ku he vatu.
Edsilutan nu wey edèdeetan nu sikandan tenged te menge salè dan. Nengazen, he Megbevayè dey, edèdeetan nu sikandan.
Kuwa kew en su edlipey kiw pinaaǥi te kegkanta, ne ed-ugyab kiw para te Nengazen he endilungè tew wey menluluwas tew.
Ed-uvey kiw ziyà te kandin duma is kebpeselamat, ne ed-ugyab kiw is egkanta te kedeliǥa tew kandin.
Su is Nengazen, mekeǥeǥehem sikandin he Megbevayà. Mekeǥeǥehem sikandin he hadì wey lavew sikandin te langun he zuma he menge ed-ezapen.
Kandin is kinezizeleman kayi te kelibutan wey is puntur te menge vuntud.
Kandin daan is daǥat wey is tanà su iyan sikandin mibaal kayi.
Kuwa kew en, edluhud kiw te ked-ezapa te Nengazen he midlimbag kenitew.
Su iyan sikandin Megbevayè tew, ne iyan kiw menge etew zin he mibentayan din wey mid-elimahan din iring te kebantey wey ked-elima te menge kerehidu. Emun egkezineg niw ǥuntaan is egkeǥiyen te Megbevayà,
ne kenè niw pekezesena is gehinawa niw iring te mibeelan te menge kepuun niw zengan hein diyà sikandan te Meriba, wey hein diyà sikandan te sibsivayan he Masa.
Migkaǥi is Megbevayà te, “Migezaman e zan dutun minsan pa neehè dan is tavang ku kandan.
Ne seled te 40 he tuig is kegkepeuki ku zutun he lapis te kevuwazan. Ne migkaǥi ku he mid-iniyuǥan a zutun he menge etew ne wazè dan sunuza is impenurù ku kandan.
Ne tenged te pauk ku, ne utew meheǥet is lalag ku he kenè dan ebpekeseled diyà te tanà he zutun ku pezem sikandan ibpehimeley.”
Sikiyu is menge etew te tivuuk he kelibutan, kentahi niw te veǥu he kanta is Nengazen!
Kentahi niw is Nengazen ne deliǥa niw sikandin. Tudtula niw kada andew is mehitenged te kedlibriya zin kenitew.
Ipetueni niw ziyà te langun he menge etew ziyà te menge nasyun is kegkemekeǥeǥehem din wey is egkein-inuwan he menge vaal zin.
Su mekeǥeǥehem is Nengazen, ne ereg sikandin he edeliǥen. Dait sikandin he edtehuzen lavew te langun he zuma he menge ed-ezapen.
Su is langun he menge ed-ezapen te menge etew ziyà te zuma he menge nasyun, ne menge ledawan he mibeelan dan dà, piru iyan is Nengazen mibaal te langit.
Diyà te kandin is kegkemekeǥeǥehem wey kegkelavew, ne ziyà te valey zin is desen wey kekempet.
Sikiyu is menge etew ziyà te menge nasyun, deliǥa niw is Nengazen. Deliǥa niw is gehem din wey zesen din.
Deliǥa niw is kegkemeǥeǥehem din, ne uwit kew te pemuhat dutun te kedseled niw ziyà te valey zin.
Azap kew kandin diyà te segradu he etuvangan din. Sikiyu is menge etew kayi te tivuuk he kelibutan, medtahud kew kandin diyà te etuvangan din.
Tudtula niw ziyà te menge nasyun is edhenduen te, “Edhadì is Nengazen.” Melig-en is kedsevuka zin te kelibutan ne kenà heini egkewaleng. Edhukuman din is menge etew te kedhukum he wazà egkevintahaan.
Medlipey is langit wey is kelibutan, ragkes en is daǥat, menge vevesukà, wey is langun he netaǥù kayi. Is langun he menge kayu ziyà te ketelunan henduen be te menge etew he ebpemenganta te kegkelipey
<range>
ziyà te etuvangan te Nengazen. Su edhendini sikandin te kedhukum te menge etew kayi te kelibutan. Egkezumahan te ketazeng wey ketutuanan is kedhukum din.
Edhadì is Nengazen! Umbe ereg he edlipey is kelibutan, ragkes en is menge isla.
Nekeliǥuy kandin is mekepal he ǥapun, ne egkezumahan te ketazeng wey hustu he kukuman is kedhadì din.
Duen hapuy ziyà te egkehunaan din ne iyan haazà ebpekeepur te menge kuntada zin diyà te peliǥuy.
Is kilat din neketayew te kelibutan. Ne hein naahà heini te menge etew ne mibpengerker sikandan te kegkahandek.
Nengetunew is menge vuvungan he henduen be te kendilà diyà te etuvangan te Nengazen, is Nengazen iyan ebayàbayà te tivuuk he kelibutan.
Impahayag te langit he metazeng sikandin, ne naahà te langun he menge etew is kegkemekeǥeǥehem din.
Egkepeel-elezan is langun he edsimba te ledawan wey is ibpegalbu zan is duma he menge ed-ezapen. Is langun he tarù he megbevayà edluhud te ked-azap te tutuu he Megbevayà.
Nengazen, nezineg te menge meǥinged te Jerusalem wey te zuma pa he menge inged diyà te Juda he edsilutan nu is menge kuntada zan, umbe nengelipey sikandan.
Iyan ka, Nengazen, Utew Lavew he Megbevayà, he ebayàbayà kayi te tivuuk he kelibutan. Utew ka lavew te langun he mid-isip te menge etew he menge megbevayè dan.
Is menge etew he mibmahal zan is Nengazen ne kinahanglan he igkeepes dan is mezaat. Su edtipiǥan te Nengazen is untung te metinumanen he menge etew zin. Ne kenà ebpekezezaat kandan is menge lalung su edlibriyen din sikandan.
Is keupiya te Megbevayà ne iring te andew he edsilà diyà te menge metazeng ne ebpekeveǥey heini te kelipey kandan.
Sikiyu is menge metazeng, lipey kew tenged te mibeelan te Nengazen diyà te keniyu. Tentenuzi niw is kegkewaǥas din pinaaǥi te kedeliǥa niw kandin.
Egkentahan tew is Nengazen te veǥu he kanta, su egkein-inuwan is menge vaal zin! Pinaaǥi te kandin he keugelingen he ǥehem wey zesen, midaag din is menge kuntada tew.
Impaahà te Nengazen diyà te menge nasyun he midtevangan kiw zin ne mibpengelinteuwan din he mekezaag kiw.
Wazè din melipati is insaad din he ebmahalen kiw zin wey ebpekid-uunungen sikandin kenitew te menge tig-Israel. Naahà te langun he menge etew ziyà te minsan hendei he vahin kayi te kelibutan ke mibmenumenu te Megbevayè tew is kedhimuwa zin he mekezaag kiw.
Sikiyu is menge etew kayi te tivuuk he kelibutan, ugyab kew para te Nengazen tenged te kegkelipey niw. Kanta kew he melipayen te kedalig kandin.
Kanta kew te menge kentahan he idalig te Nengazen he eduyuǥan te menge alpa, menge trumpita, wey menge vudyung. Ne ugyab kew te kegkelipey ziyà te etuvangan te Nengazen he Hadì tew.
<range>
Medlipey is kelibutan wey is langun he ed-ubpà kayi, ragkes en is daǥat wey is langun he netaǥù kayi.
Henduen be te menge etew is menge wahig he ebpelakpak, ne ebperedredseey te kegkanta te kegkelipey is menge vuvungan.
Egkelipey zan diyà te etuvangan te Nengazen su edhendini sikandin te kedhukum te menge etew kayi te kelibutan. Metazeng is kedhukumi zin kandan wey wazà bintahà.
Edhadì is Nengazen ne ebpimpinuu sikandin diyà te pinuuwè din te kedhadì he ziyà te teliwazà te menge kirubin. Nehuyung is kelibutan tenged te ǥehem din; ebpengerkeren is menge etew te kezekelà te kedtahud dan kandin.
Mekeǥeǥehem is Nengazen he ziyà te Zion; iyan sikandin ebayàbayà te tivuuk he kemenmenusiyaan.
Edeliǥen sikandin te menge etew su mekeǥeǥehem wey egkein-inuwan sikandin. Waǥas sikandin!
Mekeǥeǥehem sikandin he Hadì, ne zekelà diyà te ǥehinawa zin is hustu he kukuman. Wazè din ibpelavi ke edhukum sikandin, ne metazeng wey hustu is ebeelan din diyà te Israel.
Deliǥa is Nengazen he Megbevayè tew. Ezapa niw sikandin diyà te valey zin. Waǥas sikandin!
Si Moises wey si Aaron, dezuwa sikandan duen te menge memumuhat din dengan, ne si Samuel, sevaha sikandin duen te mid-ampù diyà te kandin. Nengumew-umew sikandan kandin ne midtavak din sikandan.
Nekidlalag sikandin kandan hein diyà sikandin te mekepal he ǥapun; ne midtuman dan is menge penurù din wey menge sulunuzen he imbeǥey zin kandan.
Nengazen he Megbevayè dey, midtavak nu is menge kebpengemuyù te menge etew nu. Impeehè nu kandan he mepeseyluwen ka he Megbevayà minsan midsilutan nu sikandan tenged te menge salè dan.
Deliǥa is Nengazen he Megbevayè tew. Simbaha niw sikandin diyà te segradu he vuvungan he migaked din, su waǥas is Nengazen he Megbevayè tew.
Sikiyu is menge etew kayi te tivuuk he kelibutan, ugyab kew te kegkelipey tenged te Nengazen.
Silbiyi niw is Nengazen duma is kelipey. Uvey kew ziyà te kandin he egkanta te kegkelipey.
Kilelaa niw he Megbevayà is Nengazen! Iyan sikandin midlimbag kenitew, ne ǥaked kiw zin. Menge etew kiw zin ne iring kiw te menge kerehidu he mid-elimahan din.
Seled kew ziyà te valey zin duma is kedalig wey kebpeselamat. Deliǥa niw wey peselemati niw sikandin.
Su meupiya is Nengazen; wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew zin, ne ebpedayun is kebmetinumanen din te taman te taman.
Nengazen, egkanta a mehitenged te ǥaǥew nu wey hustu he kukuman. Egkanta a te menge idalig kenikew.
Ebpekevantey a para wazà igkesawey kedì. Keenu ke man edhendini te kediey? Ebpekevantey a para wazà igkesawey kedì kayi te ed-ubpaan ku.
Ne kenè ku ebpesegdanen is kebpedayun te kelelalung. Utew ku igkeepes is menge ulaula te menge etew he ed-iniyug te Megbevayà, ne kenè ku ebeelan is iring keniyan.
Edlikayan ku is menge etew he kulived; ne kenà a edtampu te kelelalung dan.
Edèdeetan ku is minsan hentei he ebpendezaat te zengeg te zuma zin pinaaǥi te menge lalag din. Kenè ku ebey-anan is kelelalung te menge gelbuwen wey mepelevawen.
Piru ibpeehè ku is keupiya ku ziyà te menge etew kayi te kenitew he menge metinumanen he edsunud te Megbevayà wey nengungubpaan he wazà igkesawey kandan. Ibpeubpè ku sikandan duma kedì ne edtuǥutan ku he ebpenilbi kedì.
Is menge etew he limbungan wey teruen ne kenà ebpekeubpà diyà te turuǥan ku.
Kada andew edèdeetan ku is lalung he menge etew kayi te kenitew. Ibpaawè ku sikandan kayi te inged te Nengazen.

Nengazen, pemineǥa nu is ampù ku. Pemineǥa nu en is kebuyù ku te tavang diyà te kenikew.
Kenà a kenikew elesi zutun te timpu te kelised ku. Pemineǥa a emun ebpengumew a kenikew, ne segugunà a tevaka.
Su is untung ku meǥaan dà egkaawà iring te evel; is lawa ku ne henduen be te edtutungen.
Henduen ad te sagbet he neǥangu su migkires ad. Ne naawè en is gana ku te kegkaan
tenged te egkeǥezam ku ebpekezag-es a. Henduen be te tulan e zà wey lundis.
Sebsevaha ku zà, henduen a te seǥuksuk diyà te sibsivayan. Henduen a te ekang diyà te mid-ewaan en su egkeregdas en he vinelayan.
Kenà a ebpekelipezeng; iring a te tagbis he sebsevaha zin diyà te atep te valey.
Layun a ebpeel-elezi te menge kuntada ku. Edsudien e zan ne egemiten dan he petug-iring is mezaat he kebpekesavuk ku emun edrewakan dan is duma.
Edsudien e zan su wazè ku en kaankaan, ne ebpekezuzungul e zà diyà te avu is edsineǥew
tenged te utew nu kegkepeuki kedì. Edsudien e zan su ǥeina te iring a te vesura he mid-amì nu ne intimbag nu.
Is untung ku iring te alung he meǥaan dà egkaawà diyà te nesevukan din. Wey iring a te sagbet he neǥangu.
Piru sikew mulà, Nengazen, edhadì ka te wazà pidtemanan; edtentenuzan ka te menge etew taman te taman.
Andam en is hizu nu para te Zion, su neume en is midtelaan he timpu he zutun ibpeehè nu is keupiya nu para te Zion.
Su heini he inged mibmahal ǥihapun te menge etew nu he menge suluǥuen nu minsan pa te nezeetan en heini.
Is menge meǥinged diyà te menge nasyun, edtahud dan te Nengazen; is langun he menge hadì kayi te kelibutan edtahud diyà te etuvangan din.
Su ed-umanan ebenguna te Nengazen is Zion; ne ibpeehè din is mekeǥeǥehem he kebpekiduma zin.
Edtevaken din is ampù te menge mekehizuhizu; kenè din ebpekewezaan is ked-ampù dan.
Isurat heini para te huziyan he menge lapis te menge kevuwazan, su para mezalig dan is Nengazen:
Puun diyà te segradu he lugar he iyan is langit, edtengtengan te Nengazen is kelibutan,
su para mezineg din is dag-es te menge etew zin he menge vinihag ne wey zin melibri is menge etew zin he ebpenhimetayan.
Ne tenged kayi, idsangyew ziyà te Zion he iyan is inged he Jerusalem is menge mibeelan te Nengazen, ne zutun he inged sikandin edeliǥa.
Egkeulaula heini emun edtiǥum en dutun is menge etew he ebpemuun diyà te menge nasyun wey menge ginhedian te ked-azap te Nengazen.
Wazè pa meepus is untung ku, ne impemeluya ad te Nengazen; impemevavè din is untung ku.
Umbe, midhangyù a ziyà te kandin, ke siak te, “He Megbevayè ku he wazà pidtemanan te untung din, kenè nu en dèpa kuwaa is untung ku te kenè e pa meǥurang.
Dengan mibeelan nu is kelibutan wey is langit.
Egkengahanew heini piru ebpedayun ka mulà. Ebmerunut is langun iring te visti. Wey iring daan te visti, ne ed-ilisan nu wey egkengahanew zan.
Piru sikew mulà, ne iyan ke zed gihapun; wazè nu ketepusan.
Is menge kevuwazan te menge etew nu he menge suluǥuen nu, ne kenà sikandan egkengezeetan te vangkit ne ebentayan nu sikandan.”
Ereg he edeliǥen ku is Nengazen. Edeliǥen ku is kegkewaǥas din seled te tivuuk he untung ku.
Ereg he edeliǥen ku is Nengazen, ne kenè ku edlipatan is keupiya zin.
Mibpesaylu zin is langun he menge salè ku, wey neulian is langun he menge zaru ku tenged te kebewii zin kedì.
Midlibri e zin te kemetayen, ne midtuvazan e zin tenged te kebmahala zin wey kegkehizuwi zin kedì.
Kayi te kebpengungubpaan ku, mahabet is menge keupiyaanan he imbeǥey zin kedì, ne mezesen a iring te vanug su henduen be te kenà egkaawà kayi te kedì is kengunguhezi.
Edepiǥan te Nengazen is menge edèdaaǥen emun edhukum sikandin, ne ibeǥey zin kandan is hustu he kukuman.
Impezayag din diyà te ki Moises is paaǥi zin, wey impeehè din te menge tig-Israel is mekeǥeǥehem he menge vaal zin.
Hihizuwen sikandin, beliǥeǥawen sikandin, ebmahal sikandin, ne kenà sikandin melemu he egkepauk.
Kenà ebpedayun is kedsewaya zin kenitew, wey kenà taman te taman is pauk din.
Wazè kiw zin siluti te silut he zait te menge salè tew. Wazè kiw zin belesi te sungkad te kelelalung tew.
Is kezekelà te mid-elangan te langit wey tanà, ne iyan daan kezekelà te kebmahala zin te menge edtahud kandin.
Ke sengemenu keziyù is edsilaan diyà te edsenlepan, iyan daan kebpekeziyua zin kenitew puun te menge salè tew.
Is amey hihizuwen te menge anak din, ne iring din ded daan is Nengazen su hihizuwen te menge edtahud kandin.
Su netuenan din ke mibmenumenu kiw zin te ebaal. Ne edtentenuzan din he mibeelan kiw zin he ebpuun diyà te eliyavuk.
Is untung tew te menge etew ne iring te sagbet. Ed-uswag kiw wey edekelà iring te ebpengevukad he vulak diyà te sibsivayan.
Ne edhiyupen te keramag heini is kevukad, ne egketazin heini ne kenè en egkaahà.
Piru wazà ketepusan te kebmahala te Nengazen te menge etew he edtahud kandin, menge edtuman te kebpekid-uyun din, wey menge edtanudtanud te kedtuman te menge suǥù din. Ne is kebpurungi zin kandan ebpedayun pehendiyà en te menge kevuwazan dan.
<range>
Insavuk te Nengazen diyà te langit is pinuuwè din te kedhadì, ne edhedian din is langun.
Deliǥa niw is Nengazen, sikiyu is mekeǥeǥehem he menge velinsuǥuen he ebpemineg wey edtuman te menge lalag din.
Deliǥa niw is Nengazen, sikiyu is langun he ilengiten he menge linimbag he ebpenilbi kandin wey edtuman te egkesuatan din.
Deliǥa niw is Nengazen, sikiyu is langun he menge linimbag he ziyà te langun he menge lugar su zizalem heini te keǥehem din. Ereg he edeliǥen ku is Nengazen.
Ereg he edeliǥen ku is Nengazen. Nengazen he Megbevayè ku, mekeǥeǥehem ka iyan. Is kezekelà te zengeg nu wey is kegkelavew nu, menge kineiya heini he insun-ud nu iring te visti.
Midtembunan nu is keugelingen nu te kerayag he henduen be te visti, ne indempas nu is langit he henduen be te tulda.
Mibangun nu is ubpeey nu ziyà te zivavew pa te kewkewangan. Ne iyan midhimu nu he menge kerwahi nu is menge ǥapun, ne ed-untud ka he egkeuwit te keramag.
Midhimu nu he menge menunudtulè nu is keramag, ne menge suluǥuen nu is menge kilat.
Impelastar nu is kelibutan diyà te nesevukan din, ne kenà heini egkewaleng taman te taman.
Iring te manggad is wahig he intambun nu te kelibutan, ne nesapal is menge vuvungan.
Tenged te mezaǥing he mandar nu mid-awà is wahig.
Ne midtudà heini ziyà te menge vuvungan wey menge suǥud, wey ziyà te zuma pa he menge lugar he in-andam nu para kandan.
Duen menge taltal he insavuk nu para zutun dà sikandan taman, su para kenè dan en meumani mesapal is kelibutan.
Ne impetudè nu is menge serebseb diyà te menge zal-ug, ne midtudà is menge wahig diyà te pid-elangan te menge vuvungan.
Umbe, is langun he menge leew he langgam, ragkes en is leew he menge asnu, nekeinum kayi.
Ne ziyà te uvey zutun te menge wahig, midsesalag is menge tagbis diyà te subpang te menge kayu ne henduen be sikandan te ebpemenganta.
Ne ebpuun diyà te ubpeey nu he langit, mibpeuzanan nu is menge vuntud. Ne tenged kayi te vaal nu nekezawat te tuvad nu is kelibutan.
Impetuvù nu is menge sagbet he para te menge leew wey menge uyaǥen, wey is menge pinemula he para te menge etew su wey zan mekekaan te menge abut kayi.
Duen binu he ebpekelipey kandan, duen lana he ibmesinew te zagwey zan, wey zuen keenen he ebpekepezesen te lawa zan.
Nepurungan mevinyaǥi is menge kayu nu he sidru ziyà te Lebanon, he iyan ka nenguney nemula zuen.
Ne zutun mebpenesalag is menge tagbis; is menge tagbis he dugwak he ebpenesalag diyà te kayu he abitu.
Is leew he menge kambing diyà ebpen-ubpà te metikang he menge vuntud, ne sikan is menge badir ziyà ebpen-eles te menge vatu.
Mibeelan nu is bulan he para tuus te timpu; ne ibpesanlep nu is andew te hustu he timpu.
Mibeelan nu is kerusireman; ne emun mezukilem ebpemenggawas is mahabet he menge langgam diyà te ketelunan.
Edhiniǥer is menge erimaung emun ebpen-ahà sikandan te egkekaan dan he inteǥana nu kandan.
Ne emun edsilè en is andew, ne edlikù sikandan diyà te elesè dan ne zutun dan ebpemenleku.
Ne is menge etew ebpemenggawas diyà te menge valey zan su edterebahu zan taman te egkesakep.
Nengazen, utew mahabet is mibpemeelan nu. Mibeelan nu heini is langun pinaaǥi te ketau nu. Nepenù is kelibutan te menge mibeelan nu.
Is daǥat utew subra is keluag din, ne kenà egkevilang is menge linimbag nu he ebpen-ubpà kayi, dekelà se zeisey.
Ebiyahi kayi is menge varku he ebpemenlikùlikù, ne is dragun he Leviatan he linimbag nu ne ed-en-enunung kayi te zaǥat.
Is langun he uuyag he menge linimbag edsarig te kebeǥayi nu kandan te keenen te timpu te kegkinehenglana zan kayi.
Mibeǥayan nu sikandan te egkekaan dan, ne migkaan dan haazà ne nengahantey sikandan.
Iyan, ke ebey-anan nu sikandan, ne egkengehandek dan; emun id-awè nu is gehinawa zan, ne ebpematey sikandan ne ebpekelikù sikandan diyà te tanà he iyan ebpuunan dan.
Egkeuyag sikandan emun ebeǥayan nu sikandan te ǥehinawa. Iyan heini paaǥi te kebmahabet te uuyag he menge linimbag kayi te kelibutan.
Berakat he ebpedayun is gehem nu, Nengazen, te wazà pidtemanan. Berakat he igkelipey nu is mibpemeelan nu.
Emun edtengtengan nu is kelibutan, ne egkehuyung heini. Ne emun edsemsamen nu is buntud, ne ed-evel heini.
Egkentahan ku is Nengazen seled te tivuuk he untung ku. Egkentahan ku te menge kedalig is Megbevayè ku te uuyag e pa.
Berakat he igkelipey zin is kebpurunga ku ked-is-isipa kayi te langun. Igkelipey ku is Nengazen.
Iyan, is menge lalung wey mekesesalà edèdeetan kayi te kelibutan ne egkengahanew sikandan. Ereg he edeliǥen ku is Nengazen. Deliǥa is Nengazen!
Peselemati niw is Nengazen; simbaha niw sikandin! Tudtula niw ziyà te menge etew is menge vaal zin.
Kentahi niw sikandin te menge kedalig; ipenudtul niw is langun he egkein-inuwan he menge vaal zin.
Deliǥa niw is kegkewaǥas din. Kelipey kew is midangep diyà te kandin.
Sarig kew te Nengazen wey te zesen din. Layun kew zangep diyà te kandin.
Sikiyu is menge pinilì te Megbevayà wey kevuwazan ni Abraham he suluǥuen te Megbevayà, wey menge kevuwazan daan ni Jacob, tentenuzi niw is egkein-inuwan he menge paaǥi zin, wey is egkein-inuwan he menge vaal zin, wey is menge kedhukum din.
<range>
Iyan sikandin kes Nengazen he Megbevayè tew, ne edhukuman din is tivuuk he kelibutan.
Edtentenuzan din layun is kebpekid-uyun din. Kenè din edlipatan is menge saad din taman te taman
Heini is kebpekid-uyun din, midhimu zin diyà te ki Abraham ne insaad din daan diyà te ki Isaac.
Ne impelaus din heini he kebpekid-uyun din diyà te ki Jacob, he migngezanan daan ki Israel, ne heini is kebpekid-uyun din ebpedayun te taman te taman.
Migkaǥi sikandin diyà te kada sevaha kandan te, “Ibeǥey ku kenikew is tanà he Canaan ne egkepengevilin nu heini wey te menge kevuwazan nu.”
Dengan deisey zà is menge etew te Megbevayà, ne menge lumelengyawè pa sikandan diyà te tanà he Canaan.
Midhalinhalin sikandan diyà te menge nasyun wey menge ginhedian.
Piru wazà medtuǥut is Megbevayà he edèdaaǥen sikandan. Para mepengelangi sikandan, midawey zin is menge hadì he ebpekigkuntada kandan. Migkaǥi sikandin te,
“Kenè niw kevuta is pinilì ku he menge suluǥuen; kenè niw pesipelahi is menge ebpeneuven ku.”
Mibpengelinteuwan te Megbevayà he mehitavù is bitil ziyà te Canaan. Mid-amin din kuwaa is langun he keuyaǥan dan.
Piru zaan he impehuna zin diyà te Ehipto si Jose su wey metevangi sikandan. Dutun he timpu uripen si Jose su imbelegyà sikandin.
Migkedinahan is menge paa zin ne midsuupan is lieg din te putew,
taman te netuman is midtagnè din. Is netuman he lalag te Nengazen diyà te kandin kemetuuzan he metazeng sikandin.
Impaawà sikandin diyà te pirisuwan te hadì diyà te Ehipto he nengulu te mahabet he menge etew.
Ne impezumala kandin duen te hadì is turuǥan din wey is langun he menge azen din.
Ne ǥeine te iyan sikandin edumalà, ne zuen din keǥehem te kedawey te menge upisyal te hadì wey te kebpenurù te menge sumesambag te hadì.
Ne midhendiyà ensi Jacob te Ehipto he iyan kes tanà te menge kevuwazan ni Ham, ne mid-ubpà sikandan dutun he menge lumelengyawà.
Ne impemezakel te Nengazen is menge etew zin; ne egkereǥenan he edaag kandan is menge tig-Ehipto he menge kuntada zan.
Ne intuǥut te Nengazen he meepesi wey limbungi te menge tig-Ehipto is menge etew zin he menge suluǥuen din.
Ne zutun midsuǥù din si Moises he suluǥuen din wey si Aaron he pinilì din.
Ne impeehè dan diyà te tanà te menge kevuwazan ni Ham is egkein-inuwan he menge vaal te Megbevayà.
Impemerusirem te Megbevayà is Ehipto; piru midsupak gihapun te menge tig-Ehipto is menge suǥù din kandan.
Midhimu zin he lengesa is menge wahig dan, umbe nemematey is menge isdà.
Utew migerabi is bakbak diyà te tanè dan, ne minsan is menge ruǥu te menge pengulu midselezan te utew gerabi he vakbak.
Pinaaǥi te suǥù te Megbevayà, duen utew gerabi he langew wey kutu ziyà te tanè dan.
Ne wazè din ipeuzan, kekenà, impepenggiyew zin wey impepengilat din dutun te tanè dan.
Mibpendezeetan din is menge pinemula zan he paras wey menge kayu he igira, wey zuma pa he menge kayu.
Pinaaǥi te suǥù din, nekeuma is utew gerabi he terapan he kenè en egkevilang.
Ne migkaan kayi is langun he menge pinemula ziyà te tanè dan ragkes en is menge abut dan.
Mibpenhimetayan te Megbevayà is langun he kinekekayan he menge anak dan he maama.
Ne impeǥawas din is menge tig-Israel puun te Ehipto, ne wazà sikandan memenu, kekenà, nekeuwit dan pa te menge pelata wey menge vulawan.
Nengelipey is menge tig-Ehipto te ked-awà te menge tig-Israel, su ǥeina te nahandek dan kandan.
Dutun te timpu te kedhipanew te menge tig-Israel, midsavuk is Megbevayà te ǥapun su para melembungi sikandan wey hapuy he ebpeketayew kandan emun mezukilem.
Mibuyù dan te keenen, ne mibpeuwitan din sikandan te menge piyuǥù, ne midhantey zin sikandan te keenen he ebpuun te langit.
Mid-ebriyan din is batu ne migawas is wahig. Ne neiring heini te wahig he edtudà su midtudà heini pehendiyà te disirtu.
Ne mibeelan heini te Megbevayà is langun su wazè din lipati sikan is insaad din diyà te ki Abraham te suluǥuen din.
Impeǥuwè din puun te Ehipto he melipayen wey ebpemen-ugyab te kegkelipey is menge etew he pinilì din.
Ne imbeǥey zin kandan is tanà te zuma he menge etew; ne nesunud dan is hineǥuan te zuma.
Midhimu heini te Megbevayà su para tumana zan is menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud din wey kesuǥuan din. Deliǥa is Nengazen!
Deliǥa is Nengazen! Peselemati sikandin su meupiya sikandin; wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew zin.
Wazà minsan hentei he wazà kurang te kedseysaya zin wey kedeliǥa zin te nezumahan te ǥehem he menge vaal te Nengazen.
Utew zeyzey is etew he ebaal te hustu wey metazeng seled te langun he timpu.
Nengazen, elin a kenikew tentenuzi emun edtevangan nu is menge etew nu; ne libriya a zaan ke edlibriyen nu sikandan,
su wey e zaan mekesaǥad te keuswagan te pinilì nu he nasyun, su wey e zaan mekaambit te kelipey zan ne ebpekezalig a kenikew duma kandan.
Nekesalè key iring te menge kepuun dey; utew mezaat is mibeelan dey.
Hein diyà te Ehipto is menge kepuun dey, wazè dan seǥipaa is egkein-inuwan he menge vaal nu. Wazè dan tentenuzi is kepipira nu ipaahà kandan he kebmahala nu kandan, ne midsukul zan kenikew hein diyè dan te Zaǥat he Meriǥà.
Piru midlibri nu sikandan para te zengeg nu wey te kebpaahà kandan te ǥehem nu.
Midsuǥù te Nengazen is Daǥat he Meriǥà he medtevì su wey meluwisi is egkezalandalan he tanà; ne migiyahan din sikandan te kedlayun dutun te zaǥat he iring te ziyè dan medhipanew te disirtu.
Midlibri zin sikandan puun te ǥehem te menge kuntada zan.
Ne nekedlikuey is wahig ne nengelened is menge kuntada zan ne wazà minsan sevaha he nelibri kandan.
Umbe, midtuuwan dan is menge saad din ne migkanta zan te kedalig kandin.
Piru meǥaan dà ne nelipatan dan en is mibeelan din, ne wazè en sikandan medtaǥad te sambag din.
Migezaman dan is Megbevayà hein diyà sikandan te sibsivayan tenged te utew zan kegkesuat te keenen.
Umbe, imbeǥey zin kandan is mibuyù dan, piru impaaǥi zin daan diyà te kandan is daru he inmeluya zan.
Diyà te kampu zan diyà te sibsivayan nesina sikandan ki Moises wey ki Aaron. Si Aaron mibpili he ebpenilbi te Nengazen.
Umbe, mibeka is tanà ne neulug dutun si Datan wey si Abiram wey is menge pemilya zan.
Wey zuen daan hapuy he midtutung duen te menge sumusunud kandan he menge lalung daan.
Hein diyà te Horeb is menge Israilihanen mibaal zan te vulawan he vaka ne mid-azap dan haazà.
Inliwè dan dà is mekeǥeǥehem he Megbevayè dan te ledawan te tudu he vaka he ebpenabtab dà te sagbet.
Midlipatan dan is Megbevayà he midlibri kandan wey mibaal te mekeǥeǥehem wey egkein-inuwan he menge vaal ziyà te Ehipto he tanà te menge kevuwazan ni Ham, wey sikan is baal zin diyà te Zaǥat he Meriǥà.
<range>
Edezeetan en pezem te Megbevayà is menge etew zin ke wazà mebpeteliwazà si Moises is suluǥuen din he midhangyù he eǥena zin is pauk din ne kenè din leusa te edezaat sikandan.
Ne wazè pa sikandan medseled duen te meupiya he tanà su wazè dan medtuu te saad te Megbevayà.
Mibegulbul sikandan diyà te menge tulda zan, ne wazè dan mebpezumazuma te Nengazen.
Umbe, nenangdù is Megbevayà he ebpenhimetayan din sikandan dutun te sibsivayan,
ne ibpeyapat din is menge kevuwazan dan diyà te zuma he menge nasyun, ne zutun sikandan ebpematey.
Ne mibpevayàbayà sikandan te ed-ezapen he si Baal ziyà te Buvungan te Peor, ne migkaan sikandan te impemuhat diyà te menge minatey.
Midhimu zan is igkepauk te Nengazen he iyan is mezaat he menge vaal zan, umbe nehitavù diyà te kandan is bangkit.
Piru mibpeteliwazà si Finehas, umbe neengked haazà is bangkit.
Mid-isip si Finehas he metazeng dutun te mibeelan din, ne edtentenuzan heini te menge etew taman te taman.
Ne hein diyè daan is menge Israilihanen te serebseb te Meriba, midhimu zan gihapun is igkepauk te Nengazen, ne utew ingkesemuki ni Moises is menge vaal zan.
Tenged te midhimu zan is ibmezaat te isip ni Moises, ne nekekaǥi sikandin te menge lalag he kenè din pezem ereg he egkeǥiyen.
Wazà penhimetayi te menge Israilihanen is menge etew ziyà te Canaan he iyan pezem insuǥù kandan te Nengazen.
Nekidsevaha pa ganì sikandan te menge tig-Canaan, ne mid-iring dan te vetasan kayi he menge etew.
Mid-azap dan is menge ed-ezapen kayi he menge etew, ne iyan haazà nekeveǥey kandan te kezeetan.
Impemuhat dan is menge anak dan diyà te menge mezaat he mulin-ulin
he menge ed-ezapen te menge tig-Canaan. Ne tenged dutun te kebpenhimetayi zan te menge anak dan he wazè pa hanew, midremerikan dan is tanà he Canaan,
wey ragkes en daan is keugelingen dan. Ne heeyan is baal zan, iyan paaǥi te kedluivi zan te Megbevayà, iring dan te vahi he midselselaan din is esawa zin.
Umbe, nepeukan te Nengazen is menge etew he ǥaked din, ne ingkeremerik din sikandan.
Imbeǥey zin sikandan diyà te menge nasyun he menge kuntada zan, ne nezizalem sikandan te keǥehem dan.
Midaagdaag sikandan wey mid-uripen te menge kuntada zan.
Kemezakel en sikandan libriya te Megbevayà, piru mibpedayun sikandan te kedsupak kandin, umbe midezeetan sikandan tenged te salè dan.
Piru ebpemineǥen gihapun sikandan te Megbevayà ke ebpengumew zan, ne edtevangan din gihapun sikandan te menge kelised dan.
Midtentenuzan te Megbevayà is kebpekid-uyun din kandan, ne tenged te utew zin kebmahala kandan, nahalin is isip din ne kenè din en sikandan edsilutan.
Ne mibpengelinteuwan din he mehizuwi sikandan te menge mibihag kandan.
Libriya key, Nengazen he Megbevayè dey, ne kuwaa key puun te zuma he menge nasyun. Ne umana key tiǥuma ziyà te tanè dey, su para mekepeselamat key wey mekezalig key te kegkewaǥas nu.
Edeliǥen is Nengazen he Megbevayà te Israel te wazà pidtemanan. Is langun he menge etew edtavak te, “Amen!” Deliǥa is Nengazen!
Peselemati is Nengazen, su meupiya sikandin; wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew zin.
Keǥiya niw heeyan, sikiyu is midlibri zin te kezeetan he ebeelan te menge kuntada niw.
Su midtigum kew zin puun te menge tanà diyà te edsilaan, edsenlepan, dizaya, wey zivavà.
Duen menge etew he nengetazintazin diyà te sibsivayan; kenè dan egketuredu is beyeey pehendiyà te inged he egkehimu he egkeubpaan dan.
Nevitil wey nemezahan sikandan, ne egkeǥezam dan he hapit en sikandan ebpatey.
Ne zutun te kedlised dan, mibpetavang sikandan te Nengazen, ne midlibri zin sikandan.
Impenurù din kandan is dalan he ebpekediritsu zuen te inged he zuen duen menge meǥinged.
Ereg sikandan he ebpeselamat te Nengazen tenged te ǥaǥew zin wey te egkein-inuwan he menge vaal zin diyà te menge etew.
Su ibpemeinum din is egkengemezahan wey ibpekaan din is egkengevitil.
Duen menge etew he mibpirisu he kinedinahan, ne ebpimpinuu sikandan diyà te utew merusirem he pirisuwan.
Nepirisu sikandan su midsupak dan is menge suǥù te Utew Lavew he Megbevayà, wey wazè dan beǥayi te keveǥat is menge sambag din.
Umbe, midlisedlised din sikandan te meveǥat he menge terebahu. Nengepiley sikandan ne wazà midtavang kandan.
Ne zutun te kedlised dan, mid-umew zan is Nengazen, ne midlibri zin sikandan.
Mibpemidtew zin is ingkedina kandan, ne in-awè din sikandan dutun te utew merusirem he menge pirisuwan.
Ereg sikandan he ebpeselamat te Nengazen tenged te ǥaǥew zin wey te egkein-inuwan he menge vaal zin diyà te menge etew.
Su mibpenggevè din is menge ǥemawan he brunsi, wey mibpemadtì din is menge rihas he putew.
Duen menge tulebung he nekebmereǥen tenged te menge kedrapas dan wey kelelalung.
Wazè dan en gana te langun he keenen ne hapit en sikandan ebpematey.
Ne zutun te kelised dan, mid-umew zan is Nengazen, ne midlibri zin sikandan.
Migkaǥi zà sikandin ne nengeulian sikandan. Midlibri zin sikandan te kemetayen.
Ereg sikandan he ebpeselamat te Nengazen tenged te ǥaǥew zin wey egkein-inuwan he menge vaal zin diyà te menge etew.
Ereg sikandan he ebpemuhat para te kebpeselamat diyà te Megbevayà; ne pinaaǥi te kegkanta tenged te kegkelipey ne tudtula zan is menge vaal zin.
Duen menge etew he mid-untud te menge varku, su pinaaǥi te kebiyahi ziyà te zaǥat is igkekuwaa zan te igkeuyag dan.
Neehè dan is egkein-inuwan he menge vaal te Nengazen diyà te menge zaǥat.
Su pinaaǥi te suǥù din, mibpengeramag te mevendes ne midekelà is menge vaǥel.
Tenged dutun ebpehendiyà te zivavew wey ebpehendiyà te zizalem haazà is untuzè dan. Naawà is kevurut dan tenged dutun he hitavù.
Henduen be sikandan te egkengelangut, su ebpemekeziregdireg sikandan ne wazè dan en metueni ke hengkey is ebeelan dan.
Dutun te kedlised dan, mid-umew zan is Nengazen, ne midtevangan din sikandan.
Impeengked din sikan is mevendes he keramag ne mibmelinew is daǥat.
Nelipey sikandan hein mibmelinew en is daǥat, ne impeturedu kandan te Megbevayà is dungguan he iyan mibpenganduy zan.
Ereg sikandan he ebpeselamat te Nengazen tenged te ǥaǥew zin wey egkein-inuwan he menge vaal zin diyà te menge etew.
Ereg dan he ibpehivantug is Megbevayà diyà te kedtiǥum dan wey edeliǥen dan daan sikandin diyà te kedtiǥum te ebpemendumala kandan.
Midhimu te Nengazen he disirtu is edtudà he menge wahig, wey midhimu zin he memaza he tanà is menge serebseb.
Midhimu zin he wazà pulus duen te meupiya he tanà, su ǥeina te menge lalung is nen-ubpà duen.
Midhimu zin he zuen menge wahig diyà te disirtu, wey midhimu zin he menge serebseb is memaza he menge tanà.
Impeubpè din dutun is ebpemitilen ne mibangun dan dutun is inged he ed-ubpaan dan.
Mid-ezek dan diyà te bevesukè dan wey nememula zan te paras, ne zekelà is menge abut dan.
Midtuvazan sikandan te Megbevayà, ne mibmezakel zan. Minsan is menge uyaǥen dan ne wazè din mehimuwa he medeisey.
Ne tenged te kedèdaaǥa, kebpesekiti, wey kebpeentusa kandan, mideisey zan ne nepeel-elezan dan.
Mibpendezeisey te Megbevayà is menge midaagdaag kandan pinaaǥi te kedtezina zin kandan diyà te disirtu he wazà duen menge zalan.
Piru midtevangan din mulà is menge egkaayuayu te menge elentusen dan, ne mibpengelinteuwan din he mevuwad is menge pemilya zan iring te menge uyaǥen.
Naahà heini te menge metazeng ne nelipey sikandan, iyan, is langun he menge lalung ne wazè dan egkekaǥi.
Is menge uluwanen ereg he ebpurung ed-isip-isip mehitenged kayi; ereg he ed-isipen dan is dekelà he ǥaǥew te Nengazen.

He Megbevayà, utew zekelà is kedsarig ku kenikew. Egkentahan ku sikew te menge kedalig kayi te tivuuk he ǥehinawa ku.
Egkeriwaswas pa ne egimerat e en, su wey ku maandam en is menge instrumintu ku he zuen dan menge kuwirdas para meǥamit ku te kedalig kenikew.
Nengazen, edeliǥen ku sikew ziyà te teliwazà te menge etew. Egkentahan ku sikew ziyà te teliwazà te menge etew he meǥinged diyà te senge nenasyun.
Su kenà egkesukud is gaǥew nu wey kebmetinumanen nu.
He Megbevayà, ipeehè nu is kegkemekeǥeǥehem nu ziyà te langit wey kayi te tivuuk he kelibutan.
Libriya key pinaaǥi te ǥehem nu. Tevaka nu is ked-ampù ku su para melibri key is menge minahal nu.
He Megbevayà, migkaǥi ka ziyà te valey nu te, “Ebpekezaag a; ebehinen ku is Shekem wey is Suǥud he Sucot, ne ibpemeǥey ku heini te menge etew ku.
Kediey is Gilead wey is Manase. Is Efraim iyan pengalang ku te menge etew ku ne is Juda iyan ibpezumala ku kandan.
Is Moab suluǥuen ku, ne ǥaked ku is Edom. Igkulahì ku is kegkezeeǥa ku te Filistia.”
He Megbevayà, hentei is ed-uwit kedì diyà te Edom wey ziyà te inged kayi he neliǥuy te verengbeng?
Kenè be iyan ka, is Megbevayà he mid-iniyug kenami ne wazè en meduma te menge sundaru zey?
Tevangi key te ked-asdang te menge kuntada zey, su kenà ebpulus is tavang te etew.
Ebpekezaag key pinaaǥi te tavang nu, He Megbevayà, su edaaǥen nu is menge kuntada zey.
He Megbevayà, he edeliǥen ku, tevaka nu is ked-umew ku kenikew.
Su idsumbung a te lalung wey limbungan he menge etew. Tarù is lalag dan mehitenged kedì.
Layun mezaat is menge lalag dan he ebpekesuǥat kedì minsan wazà hinungdan.
Minsan ebpekid-emiǥu a kandan, ne edtebeken e zan; piru in-ampù ku ǥihapun sikandan.
Mibelesan e zan te mezaat te meupiya he mibeelan ku kandan, wey mibelesan e zan te pauk te kebpekid-emiǥu ku kandan.
Ke sikandan te, “Ebpen-ehè kiw te lalung he etew he egkuntra wey edsumbung kandin diyà te hukmanan.
Berakat he led-ani sikandin te salà emun timpu en te kedhukumi kandin. Berakat he isipa he salà is ked-ampù din!
Berakat he kenà mebmeluǥayad is untung din ne ikeveǥey en te zuma is buluhaten din.
Berakat he mebpatey en sikandin su para meilu is menge anak din wey para mevalu is esawa zin.
Berakat he mekeriǥuriǥu is menge anak din te kebpekilimus, wey verakat he segseǥa sikandan puun te egkeregdas en he ubpeey zan.
Berakat he eǥawa te neutangan din is langun he menge azen din, wey verakat he kuwaa te menge lumelengyawà is hineǥuan din.
Ne emun ebpatey en sikandin ne verakat he wazà mehizu kandin wey te egkeilu he menge anak din.
Berakat he mebpematey is menge kevuwazan din, su para melipati en sikandan te ebpekesunud he lapis te kevuwazan.
Berakat he kenà peseyluwa wey kenà lipati te Nengazen is salà te menge ginikanan din wey te menge kepuun din; berakat he ituǥut te Nengazen he melipati en sikandan kayi te kelibutan.
<range>
Su wazè din hizu; midlisedlised din wey mibpenhimetayan din is menge egkaayuayu, menge pubri, wey sikan is utew dezekelà is seeng dan.
Igkelipey zin is kebpenrawak te zuma; berakat he ziyà mehitavu te kandin is rawak din. Kenè din ebpenubtuvazan is duma; berakat he wazà daan mebpenuvadtuvad kandin.
Neleyaman din en is kebpenrawak te zuma; iring en heini te visti he imbivisti zin. Berakat he medlikù diyà te kandin is rawak din meiring te wahig he edreheb diyà te lawa zin wey meiring te lana he edsenep diyà te menge tulan din.
Berakat he kenè en heini maawà diyà te kandin, iring te visti he imbivisti zin wey te vakes he layun diyà te hawak din.”
Nengazen, berakat he iyan heeyan isilut nu te menge etew he mibutangbutang kedì wey migkaǥi te mezaat he menge lalag mehitenged kediey.
Piru tevangi a mulà, Nengazen he MEGBEVAYÀ, para ikeveǥey kenikew is dengeg. Libriya a tenged te keupiya nu wey gaǥew nu.
Su egkaayuayu a wey pubri a, ne utew mibmesakit is gehinawa ku.
Egkenaneynaney en egkaawà is untung ku iring te lambung he egkahanew emun mezukilem. Wey iring a zaan te terapan he mibpeyupas.
Wazè en desen te menge vuel ku tenged te kedtulung ku kebpuasa. Utew ad migasà.
Utew ad edsusudia te menge kuntada ku. Ebpemenggemenggemen dan emun egkeehè e zan.
Tevangi a, Nengazen he Megbevayè ku; libriya a tenged te ǥaǥew nu.
Ipetueni nu te menge kuntada ku he iyan ka, is Nengazen, midlibri kedì.
Midrewakan e zan, piru edtuvazan a mulà kenikew. Egkepeel-elezan is menge kuntada ku emun edsurungen e zan, ne egkelipey a mulà is suluǥuen nu.
Berakat he mepurung mepeel-elezi heini is menge etew he mibutangbutang kedì; meiring te visti he ebpeketambun te lawa zan is keelezan dan.
Ebpeselematan ku is Nengazen; edeliǥen ku sikandin diyà te etuvangan te mahabet he menge etew.
Su edlevanan din is menge etew he pubri, su para melibri sikandan te edhukum kandan te kemetayen.
Migkaǥi is Nengazen diyà te Nengazen ku he hadì te, “Pinuu ka kayi te egkekewanan ku, taman te igkepezizalem ku ziyà te menge paa nu is menge kuntada nu.”
Mahal he Hadì, ebpuun te Zion ibpemeluag te Nengazen is ginhedian nu, ne edhedian nu is menge kuntada nu.
Dutun te andew te kedtebeka nu te menge kuntada nu, andam is menge etew nu te ked-uǥup kenikew. Is menge vetan-en he menge etew nu edhendiyà te kenikew zutun te segradu he menge vuvungan he henduen be sikandan te menge zehemug emun meselem.
Nenangdù is Nengazen, ne kenà egkahalin is isip din, he memumuhat ka te wazà pidtemanan, iring te kegkememumuhat ni Melkizedek.
Is Nengazen diyà te egkekewanan nu; edèdeetan din is menge hadì emun ibpeehè din en is pauk din.
Edsilutan din is menge nasyun ne mahabet is ebpenhimetayan din. Edèdeetan din is ebpemendumala seled te tivuuk he kelibutan.
Sikew, Mahal he Hadì, ed-inum ka ziyà te wahig he edtudà he ziyà te kilid te zalan, umbe edlikù is desen nu ne ebpekezaag ka.
Deliǥa is Nengazen! Ebpeselematan ku is Nengazen te ebpuun kayi te tivuuk he ǥehinawa ku ziyà te ketiǥuman te menge metazeng.
Mekeǥeǥehem is menge vaal te Nengazen; egngunngunuen heini is langun te menge egkesuat kayi.
Mekeǥeǥehem wey zekelà is dengeg te menge vaal te Megbevayà, ne is kegkemetazeng din ebpedayun te wazà pidtemanan.
Ne ibpetentenuzan din kenitew is egkein-inuwan he menge vaal zin. Meupiya sikandin wey hihizuwen;
ebeǥayan din te keenen is edtahud kandin, ne layun din edtentenuzi is kebpekid-uyun din.
Impeehè din te menge etew zin ke sengemenu is kegkemekeǥeǥehem te menge vaal zin, pinaaǥi te kebeǥaya zin diyà te kandan te menge tanà te menge etew te zuma he menge nasyun.
Egketuusan is ketazeng din wey kebmetinumanen din diyà te langun he menge vaal zin, ne egkeseriǥan is langun he menge suǥù din.
Ne heini is menge suǥù din ebpedayun te wazà pidtemanan, ne nezumahan te kebmetinumanen wey ketazeng is kebeǥaya zin kayi.
Midlibri zin is menge etew zin, ne midhimu zin is kebpekid-uyun kandan te wazà pidtemanan. Waǥas sikandin wey egkein-inuwan.
Emun egkesuat is etew he mebmetau, kinahanglan he edtahud sikandin te Nengazen. Is langun he edtuman te menge suǥù din ne zuen dan hustu he kedsavut. Ereg sikandin he edeliǥen te wazà pidtemanan.
Deliǥa is Nengazen! Utew zeyzey is etew he edtahud te Nengazen, wey igkelipey zin is kedtuman te menge suǥù din.
Ebmeuswaǥen is menge anak din, su is kevuwazan te menge etew he edtinazeng edtuvazan te Megbevayà.
Edsepian is pemilya zin, ne kenà egkelipatan is keupiya zin taman te taman.
Minsan merusirem duen gihapun kerayag para te menge etew he hustu is paaǥi zan te kebpengungubpaan, kelelaǥan, hihizuwen, wey metazeng.
Edtuvazan is etew he kelelaǥan, wey ibpesambey zin is duma, wey kenè din ibpeiseg is kegketiǥayun din pinaaǥi te limbung.
Kenà duwazuwa he ebmelig-en is kebpekesavuk din te minsan keenu. Ne kenà sikandin egkelipatan te wazà pidtemanan.
Kenà sikandin egkahandek te mezaat he menge tudtul, su melig-en is kedsarig din te Nengazen.
Kenà sikandin egkeǥiyaǥiya wey egkahandek, su netuenan din he ziyà te huziyan he timpu egkeehè din is kegkezaaǥa te menge kuntada zin.
Kelelaǥan sikandin diyà te menge pubri; is keupiya zin egketenuzan taman te taman ne ebeǥayan sikandin te Megbevayà te zengeg pinaaǥi te ked-umani te Megbevayà te egkehimu zin.
Egkaahà heini te menge lalung ne egkekeǥetket is menge ngipen dan te kegkepauk dan, ne henduen be sikandan te egkereney tenged te kegkeeled dan. Kenà edlampus is menge pelanu zan.
Deliǥa is Nengazen! Sikiyu is menge etew te Nengazen he menge suluǥuen din, deliǥa niw sikandin.
Berakat he zeliǥa sikandin guntaan wey taman te taman.
Ebpuun te edsilaan pehendiyà te edsenlepan is langun he menge etew edalig te Nengazen.
