Edhedian te Nengazen is langun he menge nasyun, ne kenà egkerepengan is kegkemekeǥeǥehem din.
Wazà iring te Nengazen he Megbevayè tew he ebpimpinuu ziyà te pinuuwè din te kedhadì diyà te zivavew he utew metikang.
Edungul sikandin te ked-ahà te langit wey kelibutan.
Inggaun din te kelised is menge egkaayuayu wey menge pubri.
Ebeǥayan din daan sikandan te zengeg duma te dezekelà is dengeg duen te menge etew zin.
Edlipayen din is bahi he kenà ebpekaanak diyà te ubpeey zin pinaaǥi te kebeǥayi zin kandin te menge anak. Deliǥa is Nengazen!
Is menge Israilihanen he menge kevuwazan ni Jacob, mid-ubpè dan dengan diyà te Ehipto, he selakew is kineǥiyan te menge etew zutun.
Ne hein migawas dan en diyà te Ehipto, ne midhimu te Megbevayà is Juda he segradu he lugar zin, ne midumala zin is Israel.
Is Daǥat he Meriǥà mibpelaǥuy te kegkaahaa zin kandin. Ne is Wahig he Jordan mid-endud.
Neyunggat is menge vuntud wey menge vuvungan he henduen be te ebpemenlinglingketew he menge kambing wey menge kerehidu.
Maan is mibpelaǥuy is Daǥat he Meriǥà wey mid-engked te kedtudà is Wahig he Jordan?
Maan is neyunggat is menge vuntud wey is menge vuvungan he henduen be te ebpemenlinglingketew he menge kambing wey menge kerehidu?
Egkeyunggat daan minsan is tivuuk he kelibutan diyà te etuvangan te Nengazen he Megbevayà ni Jacob;
ne midhimu zin he peneng wey serebseb he edtudà sikan is lintikan he vatu.
Kenè key iyan ereg he ebeǥayan te zengeg, Nengazen, kekenà, iyan ka, tenged te kebmahala nu kenami wey te kebmetinumanen nu.
Maan is mid-insultuwan key te zuma he menge nasyun pinaaǥi te kegkaǥi te, “Hendei en is Megbevayè niw?”
Diyà te langit is Megbevayè dey ne ebeelan din ke hengkey is egkesuatan din.
Piru is kandan he menge megbevayà menge pelata zà wey vulawan he mibeelan te etew.
Duen dan menge vèbà, piru kenè dan ebpekekaǥi; duen dan menge mata, piru kenè dan ebpekaahà.
Duen dan menge telinga, piru kenè dan ebpekezineg; duen dan menge izung, piru kenè dan ebpekahazek.
Duen dan menge velad, piru kenè dan ebpekeǥawed; duen dan menge paa, piru kenè dan ebpekehipanew, ne minsan is laǥeng ne kenè ta egkezineg diyà te kandan.
Is mibaal kayi te kenà tutuu he menge megbevayà wey sikan is midsarig kandan, ne egkeiring daan kandan te wazè dan pulus.
Sikiyu is menge etew te Israel, ragkes en is menge kevuwazan ni Aaron, sarig kew te Nengazen. Iyan sikandin edtavang wey ebpengalang keniyu.
<range>
Sikiyu is langun he edtahud te Nengazen, sarig kew ziyà te kandin. Iyan sikandin edtavang wey ebpengalang keniyu.
Edtentenuzan kiw te Nengazen, ne edtuvazan kiw zin. Edtuvazan din is menge etew te Israel ragkes en is menge kevuwazan ni Aaron.
Edtuvazan din is langun he edtahud kandin dekelà se zeisey is pid-etawan dan.
Berakat he ipemezakel kew te Nengazen wey is menge kevuwazan niw.
Berakat he tuvazi kew te Nengazen he midlimbag te langit wey te kelibutan.
Gaked dà te Nengazen is langit piru imbeǥey zin mulà te menusiyà is kelibutan.
Kenà iyan edalig te Nengazen is nemematey en, su kenè en sikandan ebpekekaǥi,
kekenà, iyan kiw is menge uuyag pa edalig kandin guntaan wey taman te taman. Deliǥa is Nengazen.
Mibmahal ku is Nengazen, su ebpemineǥen din wey edtevaken din is kebuyù ku te tavang diyà te kandin.
Ne ǥeina te ebpemineǥen e zin, ne kenà a ed-engked he ebpengumew kandin mintras uuyag e pa.
Nahandek a su neǥezam ku he henduen be te hapit ad ebpatey; is kemetayen henduen be te pisì he nekevedbed kediey. Nesemukan a wey neipeng a,
umbe mid-umew ku is Nengazen, “Nengazen, libriya a!”
Is Nengazen he Megbevayè tew meupiya, metazeng, wey hihizuwen.
Egkelesaǥan din is iring te kedsarig te vatà is kedsarig dan kandin. Hein wazè ku en egkehimu, midlibri e zin.
Ereg a he kenà egkeǥiyaǥiya, su utew a ebpurungi te Nengazen,
su midlibri e zin te kemetayen, kegkeseeng, wey kezeetan.
Umbe, ed-uvey a ziyà te Nengazen kayi te kebpengungubpaan ku kayi te kelibutan te menge uuyag.
Edtuu a ǥihapun kenikew minsan ke ebpekekaǥi a te, “Utew subra is menge elentusen ku.”
Tenged te kegkehandek ku migkaǥi a te, “Wazà iyan etew he egkeseriǥan.”
Hengkey is igkevales ku te Nengazen te langun he meupiya he mibeelan din kayi te kediey?
Edsimbahan ku is Nengazen ne ed-uwit a te vinu he ibpemuhat ku te kebpeselamat kandin te kedlibriya zin kedì.
Edtumanen ku is menge saad ku he nepirmahan te langun he menge etew zin.
Egkesekitan is Nengazen emun duen ebpatey zuen te menge etew zin.
Nengazen, tutuu he suluǥuen a kenikew. Impelingkawas a kenikew hein nevihag a.
Ed-ezapen ku sikew ne edhalad a para te kebpeselamat kenikew.
Edtumanen ku is menge saad ku ziyà te kenikew he nepirmahan te langun he menge etew nu
ziyà te lama te valey nu ziyà te Jerusalem. Deliǥa is Nengazen!
Sikiyu is langun he menge nasyun, deliǥa niw is Nengazen! Sikiyu is langun he menge etew, beǥayi niw sikandin te zengeg!
Su utew kiw mibmahal te Nengazen, ne wazà pidtemanan te kebmetinumanen din. Deliǥa is Nengazen!
Peselemati is Nengazen su meupiya sikandin; Wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew zin.
Megkaǥi is menge etew te Israel te, “Wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew zin.”
Megkaǥi is menge kevuwazan ni Aaron te, “Wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew zin.”
Megkaǥi is menge edtahud te Nengazen te, “Wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew zin.”
Dutun te timpu te kelised ku, mid-umew ku is Nengazen, ne midtavak e zin pinaaǥi te kedlibriya zin kediey.
Duma ku is Nengazen, umbe kenà a egkahandek. Wazà kezeetan he egkehimu te etew kayi te kediey.
Duma ku is Nengazen. Iyan sikandin edtavang kedì, ne egkeehè ku is kegkezaaǥa ku te menge kuntada ku.
Meupiya pa is kedangep diyà te Nengazen kenà is kedsarig diyà te etew.
Meupiya pa is kedangep diyà te Nengazen kenà is kedsarig diyà te mekeǥeǥehem he menge etew.
Midliǥuyan a te menge etew he ebpuun diyà te mahabet he menge nasyun he menge kuntada ku, piru nezaag ku sikandan pinaaǥi te ǥehem te Nengazen.
Tutuu he midliǥuyan e zan, piru nezaag ku sikandan pinaaǥi te ǥehem te Nengazen.
Henduen dan te petiyukan is midsurung kedì, piru neiring dà sikandan te nevinsulan he reǥami he segugunè dà neevuki. Nezaag ku sikandan pinaaǥi te ǥehem te Nengazen.
Mibpurungan e zan etekiya ne hapit e zan en egkezaag, piru midtevangan a te Nengazen.
Iyan is Nengazen mibeǥey kedì te zesen; iyan sikandin migkanta ku. Iyan sikandin menluluwas ku.
Pemineǥa is ked-ugyab te menge etew te Megbevayà diyà te menge kampu zan tenged te kezeeǥan dan: “Heini he kezeeǥan mibeelan te Nengazen pinaaǥi te ǥehem din! Is gehem te Nengazen iyan mibpezaag kenitew!”
<range>
Kenè e pa ebpatey, kekenà, ebpedayun e pa he uuyag, su wey ku ikeseysey is mibpemeelan te Nengazen.
Minsan utew zekelà is silut te Nengazen kedì, piru wazè din ituǥut he mebpatey a.
Puwasi a te menge ǥemawan te valey te Nengazen su edseled a te kebpeselamat te Nengazen.
Iyan heini menge ǥemawan te Nengazen he menge metazeng dà is ebpekeseled duen.
Ebpeselamat a kenikew, Nengazen, su midtavak nu is ked-ampù ku. Ne iyan ka midluwas kediey.
Is batu he mid-engkezan te menge pandey iyan pa hinuun nehimu he pundasyun he vatu.
Midhimu heini te Nengazen, ne utew heini egkein-inuwi.
Iyan heini andew te kezeeǥan te Nengazen, umbe edlipey kiw wey edsilibra kiw.
Nengazen, ebpengemuyù key ziyà te kenikew he ipelaus nu is kedlibriya nu kenami. Himuwa nu he mebmelempusen is menge vaal zey.
Midtuvazan te Nengazen is sinuǥù din. Ne sikiyu is menge etew, berakat he tuvazi kew zaan te Nengazen puun kayi te valey zin.
Is Nengazen, iyan sikandin Megbevayà; ne utew kiw zin mibpurungi. Ed-uwit kiw te menge subpang te kayu te kedsilibra tew te pista, ne edliǥuy kiw zuen te pemuhatà.
Nengazen, iyan ka Megbevayè ku; ebpeselamat a wey edalig kenikew.
Peselemati is Nengazen, su meupiya sikandin; wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew zin.
Utew zeyzey is menge etew he wazà igkesawey kandan, wey nengungubpaan he ed-ikul te kesuǥuan te Nengazen.
Utew zeyzey is menge etew he edsunud te menge penurù te Megbevayà, ne ebpezumazuma kandin te kebpezumazuma he ebpuun diyà te tivuuk he ǥehinawa zan.
Wazà sikandan mebaal te mezaat, kekenà, edsunuzen dan is menge paaǥi te Megbevayà.
Nengazen, imbeǥey nu kenami is menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu su para tumana zey heini te tinutuuwà.
Utew zekelà is tinguhè ku he mehimu a he metinumanen te kedtuman te menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu.
Emun edtumanen ku is langun he menge suǥù nu, kenà a egkepeel-elezan.
Edeliǥen ku sikew duma is lumpiyu he ǥehinawa ku zutun te ked-istudyuwi ku te metazeng he menge suǥù nu.
Edtumanen ku is menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu, umbe kenà a kenikew vey-ani.
Hengkey is ebeelan te vetan-en para lumpiyu is gehinawa zin? Is kinahanglan he ebeelan din iyan is kedsunud te lalag nu.
Ebpuun diyà te tivuuk he gehinawa ku is kedangep ku kenikew, umbe kenè nu ituǥut he meiniyuǥi ku is menge suǥù nu.
Edtipiǥan ku kayi te ǥehinawa ku is menge lalag nu, su wey a kenà mekesalà diyà te kenikew.
Dait ka he edeliǥen, Nengazen! Penurua a te menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu.
Edliklikuan ku te egkaǥi is menge suǥù nu he imbeǥey nu.
Kelipey ku is kedsunud te menge penurù nu, lavew pa te kelipey ku emun ebpekekuwa a te zekelà he ketiǥeyunan.
Egngunngunuen ku is menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu, ne ebpurungan ku ed-is-isipa is menge paaǥi nu.
Ingkelipey ku is menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu, ne kenè ku edlipatan is menge lalag nu.
Impeehè nu kedì te suluǥuen nu is keupiya nu, su wey a mekepedayun he edtuman te lalag nu kayi te ked-ubpè ku.
Puwasi nu is isip ku su wey ku mesavut is mekempet he menge ketutuanan diyà te kesuǥuan nu.
Edlavey e zà kayi te kelibutan, umbe ipehayag nu kedì is menge suǥù nu.
Seled en te langun he timpu is kegkesuat ku he mesavut ku is kesuǥuan nu.
Midsawey nu is menge gelbuwen, he menge rinewakan nu. Heini sikandan mid-iniyug te menge suǥù nu.
Ilikey a te kebpeelimungew wey kedsudì dan, su midtuman ku is menge penurù nu.
Minsan pa ke edtiǥum is menge ebpemendumala te ked-ituk kedì, ne siak is suluǥuen nu ebpurungan ku egngunngunua is menge sulunuzen nu.
Is menge penurù nu nekeveǥey kedì te kelipey; ne kayi ku egkuwaa is sambag.
Henduen be te ebpatey ad, umbe pekeluǥeyaza nu pa is untung ku sumalà te insaad nu.
Migkaǥi ku kenikew is mehitenged te untung ku, ne mibpemineg a kenikew. Penurua a te menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu.
Ipesavut nu kedì is menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu, su para mengunùngunù ku is egkein-inuwan he menge vaal nu.
Henduen be te egkelened ad te seeng ku, umbe lig-eni a kenikew sumalà te saad nu.
Tevangi a para kenà a mekevaal te mezaat; ne ituvad nu kediey is kebpekeikul te menge kesuǥuan nu.
Mibpilì ku is hustu he zalan; su utew ku egkesuati is kedtuman te menge suǥù nu.
Midsunud ku iyan, Nengazen, is menge penurù nu, umbe kenè nu mehimuwa he mepeel-elezi a.
Ebpeniguduwan ku is kedtuman te menge suǥù nu su ed-umanan nu is kedsavut ku.
Nengazen, ipenurù nu kedì is menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu, ne edtumanen ku heini taman te taman.
Ipesavut nu kedì is kesuǥuan nu, ne edtumanen ku heini wey edtipiǥan ku kayi te tivuuk he ǥehinawa ku.
Giyahi a te kedsunud te menge suǥù nu, su igkelipey ku heini.
Iveǥey nu kediey is dekelà he tinguhà te kedtuman te menge penurù nu, kenà te kedtinguhà te kedsepian.
Ilikey a kenikew te kedtinguhà te menge vutang he wazè dan pulus. Ne pekeluǥeyaza nu pa is untung ku sumalà te insaad nu.
Tumana nu is insaad nu kediey te suluǥuen nu, he iyan kes insaad nu ziyà te menge etew he edtahud kenikew.
Kenè nu himuwa he mehitavù kayi te kediey is igkahandek ku he keelezan, su mid-isip ku he meupiya is menge suǥù nu.
Igkesuat ku is kedtuman te menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu. Ne tenged te ketazeng nu, pekeluǥeyaza nu pa is untung ku.
Nengazen, ipeehè nu is kebmahala wey kedlibriya nu kedì, sumalà is insaad nu.
Ne zutun egketavak ku is mid-eled-eled kedì, su edsarig a te menge lalag nu.
Ipekaǥi a kenikew te tutuu, he iyan is menge lalag nu, te minsan hengkey he timpu. Su iyan midseriǥan ku is menge suǥù nu.
Layun ku edtumana is kesuǥuan nu taman te taman.
Kayi te kebpengungubpaan ku ne kenà a uripen, su ebpeninguhà a te kedtuman te sulunuzen nu.
Kenè ku igkeeled is kedtudtul te menge penurù nu minsan diyà te etuvangan te menge hadì.
Utew ku igkelipey is kedtuman te menge suǥù nu he mibmahal ku.
Midtahud ku wey mibmahal ku is menge suǥù nu, ne egngunngunuen ku is menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu.
Tentenuzi nu is saad nu kayi te kedì te suluǥuen nu, su iyan heini ebpekeveǥey kedì te perateng.
Egkeuyag-uyag a tenged te penaad nu wey ebpekeveǥey heini kedì te kelipey kayi te menge elentusen ku.
Layun a edsudia te menge mepelavawen, piru wazè ku ewai is kesuǥuan nu.
Nengazen, midtentenuzan ku is menge suǥù nu he neuǥet en he imbeǥey nu, su nekeveǥey heini kedì te kelipey.
Dekelà is pauk ku, tenged te menge lalung he mid-iniyug te kesuǥuan nu.
Egkanta a mehitenged te menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu minsan hendei a ed-ubpà.
Nengazen, emun timpu te mezukilem ne edtentenuzan ku sikew, ne ebpurungan ku ed-is-isipa is kedtuman te kesuǥuan nu.
Iyan heini kelipey ku: is kedsunud te menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu.
Sikew, Nengazen, iyan ke zà iyan kinahanglan ku. Midsaad a te kedtuman te menge lalag nu.
Ebpuun kayi te ǥehinawa ku is kedhangyù ku kenikew he kehizuwi a kenikew sumalà te saad nu.
Mid-isip-isip a ke mibmenumenu ku is kebpengungubpaan ku, ne midisisyun a te kedsunud te menge penurù nu.
Ne seǥuǥunè ku midtuman is menge suǥù nu.
Minsan pa te mibakus a te menge lalung, wazè ku lipati is kesuǥuan nu.
Minsan liwazè en te kezukileman egimerat a su ebpeselamat a ziyà te kenikew tenged te metazeng he menge suǥù nu.
Emiǥu a te langun he edtahud kenikew wey edtuman te menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu.
Nengazen, mibmahal nu is langun he menge etew kayi te kelibutan. Penurua-a te menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu.
Nengazen, tulengezi a kenikew is suluǥuen nu, sumalà te insaad nu.
Beǥayi a te ketau wey keuluwanen, su edsarig a te menge suǥù nu.
Hein aney he wazè e pa kenikew mensuwa, ne mid-awà a ziyà te kenikew, piru ǥuntaan midtuman ku en is lalag nu.
Meupiya ka iyan wey meupiya is mibpemeelan nu. Penurua a te menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu.
Minsan mibutbutangan a te menge gelbuwen, midtuman ku ǥihapun is menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu te ebpuun te tivuuk he ǥehinawa ku.
Heini is menge gelbuwen, kenà sikandan ebpekesavut te kesuǥuan nu. Piru siak, igkelipey ku is kedtuman kayi.
Meupiya is kedsilut nu, su pinaaǥi kayi nepenurù a te menge penurù nu.
Para kediey, is kesuǥuan he imbeǥey nu edhuna pa he mahal te utew zekelà he ketiǥeyunan.
Midlimbag a wey mibpurma a kenikew; beǥayi a te kedsavut su para meistudyuwi ku is menge suǥù nu.
Egkelipey is menge etew he edtahud kenikew emun egkeehè e zan, su edsarig a te lalag nu.
Netuenan ku, Nengazen, he metazeng is menge suǥù nu. Ne ǥeina te metinumanen ka te egkeǥiyen nu, umbe mibmansu a kenikew.
Berakat he mekeveǥey kedì te kelipey is gaǥew nu su iyan heini insaad nu kedì te suluǥuen nu.
Kehizuwi a su para mebpedayun is kegkeuyag-uyag ku; su igkelipey ku is kedsunud te kesuǥuan nu.
Berakat he mepeel-elezi is menge gelbuwen tenged te kebutbutangi zan kediey. Iyan, siak mulà, egngunngunuen ku is menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu.
Berakat he med-uvey kayi te kediey is menge etew he edtahud kenikew wey netau te menge penurù nu.
Berakat he metuman ku te ebpuun te tivuuk he ǥehinawa ku is menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu su para kenà a mepeel-elezi.
Edarà ad is edtaǥad te kedlibriya nu kedì, piru edsarig a ǥihapun te lalag nu.
Mibmerusirem en is ked-ehè ku te kedtulung ku kedtaǥad te pesarig nu. Nekeinsà a te, “Keenu e pa vuwa kenikew edlig-eni wey edlipaya?”
Minsan pa ke neiring ad te lundis he teleǥuey te vinu he wazè din en pulus, wazè ku lipati is menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu.
Sengemenu keluǥayad is kebpeketaǥad ku? Keenu nu pa edsiluti is menge etew he mibpesipala kediey te suluǥuen nu?
Mibangbang is menge gelbuwen he wazà medsunud te kesuǥuan nu te para te egkeuluǥan ku.
Egkeseriǥan is langun he menge suǥù nu. Tevangi a, su ebpesipelahan a te menge etew minsan wazà hustu he hinungdan.
Hapit e zan en egkepatey, piru wazè ku engkezi is menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu.
Tipiǥi nu is untung ku tenged te ǥaǥew nu; su para mekepedayun a he edtuman te menge penurù nu.
Nengazen, is lalag nu ebpedayun te wazà pidtemanan; melig-en heini iring te langit.
Is kebmetinumanen nu ebpedayun te wazà pidtemanan. Melig-en is kebpelestara nu te kelibutan, umbe kemulu pa heini.
Is langun he menge naazen kemulu pa taman en guntaan tenged te iyan suat nu. Su haazà is langun ebpenilbi kenikew.
Emun wazà mekeveǥey kedì te kelipey is kesuǥuan nu, ne minatey ad pezem geina tenged te menge elentusen ku.
Kenè ku edlipatan is menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu, su pinaaǥi kayi is ked-uy-uyaǥa nu kediey.
Iyan ka teǥiǥaked kedì, umbe libriya a! Su ebpeninguhà a te kedtuman te menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu.
Is menge lalung ed-ayan te kedhimatey kedì, piru egngunngunuen ku is menge penurù nu.
Neehè ku he zuen ketepusan te langun he menge naazen, piru is menge suǥù nu, wazè din mulà ketepusan.
Utew zekelà kayi te ǥehinawa ku is kesuǥuan nu; layun ku heini egngunngunua.
Ne ǥeina te layun kayi te kediey is kesuǥuan nu, edhuna a he metau te menge kuntada ku.
Mahabet pa is kedì he nesavut, kenà te menge menunudlù ku, su is menge penurù nu iyan ebpurungan ku ed-is-isipa.
Edhuna is kedì he kedsavut te kedsavut te menge meǥurang, su midtuman ku man is menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu.
Midlikayan ku is langun he mezaat he vaal su wey ku metuman is lalag nu.
Wazè ku ewai is menge suǥù nu, su iyan ke man nenurù kayi kediey.
Ke và dà keenen, ne utew meemis is menge saad nu, edhuna pa he meemis te teneb.
Nekaangken a te kedsavut he ebpuun diyà te menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu, umbe egkeepesan ku is langun he mezaat he vaal.
Is lalag nu iring te sulù he ebpeketeyew te ibayè ku.
Edtumanen ku iyan is penangdù ku he edsunud a te metazeng he menge suǥù nu.
Utew subra is kebpekaantus ku, umbe pekeluǥeyaza nu pa is untung ku, Nengazen, su iyan heini saad nu.
Dewata nu, Nengazen, is keugelingen ku he suat te kedalig kenikew, ne penurua a te menge suǥù nu.
Minsan pa te layun a edhephepiti te kemetayen, ne wazè ku lipati is kesuǥuan nu.
Midlitaǥan a te menge lalung, piru wazè ku ewai is menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu.
Is menge penurù nu iyan utew mahal he ketiǥeyunan ku te wazà pidtemanan, su iyan heini ebpekeveǥey kedì te kelipey.
Midisisyun a he edtumanen ku is menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu taman te taman.
Egkeepesan ku is menge etew he kenà tinutuuwà is kebpekid-uyun dan kenikew, piru mibmahal ku mulà is kesuǥuan nu.
Iyan ka elesè ku wey endilungè ku; midsarig a te lalag nu.
Sikiyu is mezaat is menge vaal, pekeziyui a keniyu, su wey ku metuman is menge suǥù te Megbevayè ku.
Beǥayi a te zesen su iyan heini saad nu su para mebpedayun is kegkeuyag-uyag ku; ne kenè nu ituǥut he egkaawà is perateng ku.
Tevangi a su para melibri a; ne layun ku ibpesuǥat is isip ku ziyà te menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu.
Inselikwey nu is langun he midselikwey te menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu. Ne tutuu iyan he wazà pulus te kebpenlimbung dan.
Mid-isip nu he iring te menge besura is langun he lalung he menge etew kayi te kelibutan. Ne tenged kayi mibmahal ku is penurù nu.
Egkerkeren a te kegkahandek kenikew; ingkahandek ku utew is kedhukum nu.
Midhimu ku is metazeng wey hustu, umbe kenà a kenikew vey-ani he edezeetan te menge kuntada ku.
Peseriǥi a he edtevangan a kenikew is suluǥuen nu; kenè nu mehimuwa he edèdaaǥen a te menge gelbuwen.
Mibmerusirem en is ked-ehè ku te kedtulung ku kedtaǥad te pesarig nu he edlibriyen a kenikew.
Himuwa nu kayi te kedì te suluǥuen nu is baal he tenged te kebmahala nu kedì, ne penurua a te menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu.
Suluǥuen a kenikew, umbe beǥayi a te kedsavut su para mesavut ku is menge penurù nu.
Nengazen, ereg ke en he edwaleng guntaan he timpu, su wazè en medtuman is menge etew te kesuǥuan nu.
Tutuu he mibmahal ku is menge suǥù nu lavew pa te vulawan, minsan pa te lunsey he vulawan.
Tutuu he midtuman ku is menge suǥù nu, ne egkeepesan ku is langun he mezaat he vaal.
Utew mekempet is menge penurù nu, umbe midsunud ku heini te kedsunud he ebpuun kayi te tivuuk he ǥehinawa ku.
Is kedseysaya te lalag nu ebpekeveǥey te kerayag diyà te isip te menge etew wey ketau te wazè din ketau.
Utew zekelà is kebpengenduya ku te suǥù nu.
Seǥipaa a wey kehizuwi a, su layun nu heeyan ebeeli ziyà te menge etew he mibmahal kenikew.
Giyahi a kenikew pinaaǥi te lalag nu; kenè nu mehimuwa he meuwit a te kelelalung.
Libriya a te kedèdaaǥa kedì, su wey ku metuman is menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu.
Ipeehè nu kedì te suluǥuen nu is keupiya nu, ne penurua a te menge sulunuzen.
Nekepurung a mekesineǥew su ǥeina te wazà medtuman is menge etew te kesuǥuan nu.
Metazeng ka, Nengazen, wey hustu is menge suǥù nu.
Metazeng wey egkeseriǥan is menge penurù he imbeǥey nu.
Utew subra is pauk ku su ǥeina te mid-iniyuǥan te menge kuntada ku is menge lalag nu.
Nepurung en meǥezami he egkeseriǥan iyan is saad nu, ne mibmahal ku heini te suluǥuen nu.
Minsan egkaayuayu a wey edsusudien a, ne wazè ku lipati is menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu.
Is ketazeng nu wazà pidtemanan wey tutuu is kesuǥuan nu.
Nekesaǥad a te kedlised wey kemereǥenan, piru nekeveǥey kedì te kelipey is menge suǥù nu.
Wazà pidtemanan is ketazeng te menge penurù nu. Beǥayi a te kedsavut te menge penurù nu su para mebpedayun is kegkeuyag-uyag ku.
Nengumew a kenikew, Nengazen, te ebpuun kayi te tivuuk he ǥehinawa ku; tevaka a kenikew ne edtumanen ku is menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu.
Nengumew a kenikew; libriya a, ne edtumanen ku is menge penurù nu.
Mid-enew ad te wazè pa medsilà is andew, ne mibuyù a te tavang diyan te kenikew. Midseriǥan ku is saad nu.
Wazà a medlipezeng seled te tivuuk he kezukileman su egngunngunuen ku is menge saad nu.
Pemineǥa a, Nengazen, tenged te kebmahala nu kedì; iyan ka metau he kenè e pa mebpatey sumalà te metazeng he kukuman nu.
Mid-uvey kayi te kediey is menge lalung he mibpesipala kediey he wazà medawat te kesuǥuan nu.
Piru uvey ka kayi te kediey, Nengazen; ne egkeseriǥan is langun he menge suǥù nu.
Pinaaǥi te ked-istudyu ku zengan te menge penurù he midhimu nu, netuenan ku he ebpedayun te wazà pidtemanan heini is menge penurù nu.
Ahaa nu is ked-antus ku ne libriya a, su wazè ku lipati is kesuǥuan nu.
Levani a kuntra te menge etew he mibutangbutang kedì wey libriya a; pekeluǥeyaza nu pa is untung ku sumalà te insaad nu.
Kenà egkelibri is menge lalung su wazà sikandan medtinguhà te kedtuman te menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu.
Dekelà is hizu nu, Nengazen; pekeluǥeyaza nu pa is untung ku sumalà te kukuman nu.
Mahabet is menge kuntada ku he mibpesipala kediey, piru wazè ku ewai is menge penurù nu.
Egkeepesan ku is menge etew he kenà tinutuuwà is kebpekidepità dan kenikew, su wazè dan tumana is lalag nu.
Ahaa nu, Nengazen, ke mibmenumenu ku te ebmahal is menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu. Pekeluǥeyaza nu pa is untung ku tenged te kebmahal nu.
Tutuu is langun he menge lalag nu, ne wazà pidtemanan te langun he metazeng he menge suǥù nu.
Mibpesipelahan a te ebpemendumala minsan wazà hustu he hinungdan, piru ebpuun te ǥehinawa ku is kedtehuza ku te lalag nu.
Igkelipey ku is saad nu iring te kelipey te etew he nekaahà te zekelà he ketiǥeyunan.
Igkererengiti ku wey egkeepesan ku is langun he tarù, piru mibmahal ku mulà is kesuǥuan nu.
Kepipira a edalig kenikew te senga andew, su ǥeina te metazeng is menge suǥù nu.
Ebmeupiya utew is kebpekesavuk te menge etew he ebmahal te kesuǥuan nu. Ne wazà ebpekezezaat kandan.
Ebperateng a he edlibriyen a kenikew, Nengazen, ne edtumanen ku is menge suǥù nu.
Utew ku mibmahal is menge penurù nu, umbe midpurungan ku heini tumana.
Netuenan nu is langun he mibeelan ku, umbe midtuman ku is menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu wey menge penurù nu.
Nengazen, berakat he ebpemineǥen nu is ked-umawa ku kenikew. Beǥayi a te kedsavut sumalà te insaad nu.
Berakat he ebpemineǥen nu is ked-ampù ku. Libriya a sumalà is saad nu.
Layun ku sikew edeliǥa, su mibpenurù a kenikew te menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu.
Egkanta a mehitenged te lalag nu, su metazeng is langun he menge suǥù nu.
Berakat he layun ka andam he edtavang kedì, su mibpilì ku is kedtuman te menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud nu.
Nenganduy a he libriya a kenikew, Nengazen. Nekeveǥey kedì te kelipey is kesuǥuan nu.
Pekeluǥeyaza nu pa is untung ku su wey ku sikew mezalig, ne verakat he meketavang kedì is menge suǥù nu.
Netazin a iring te kerehidu he netazin, umbe pen-ahaa a is suluǥuen nu, su wazè ku lipati is menge suǥù nu.
Dutun te kedlised ku, mid-umew ku is Nengazen ne midtavak e zin.
Nengazen, libriya a te kezeetan he edhimuwen te menge teruen wey menge limbungan.
Sikiyu is menge limbungan, hengkey vuwa is idsilut te Megbevayà keniyu?
Edsilutan kew zin pinaaǥi te kegkepenaa keniyu te sundaru te midlangga he vesut.
Mekehizuhizu a su nekeubpà a zuma keniyu te iring kezaat te menge meǥinged diyà te Meshec wey Kedar.
Neuǥet en is ked-ubpè ku zuma keniyu te menge etew he kenà egkesuat te kelinew.
Egkesuat a te kelinew piru emun edhisgut a mehitenged kayi, ne tebek mulà is keniyu he egkesuatan.
Midtengtengan ku is menge vuvungan; hendei ves ebpuun is tavang kediey?
Is tavang kediey ne ziyà ebpuun te Nengazen, he iyan mibaal te langit wey kelibutan.
Kenè din idtuǥut he meseligkat ka. Sikandin is ed-ipat kenikew, ne kenà ebpekelipezeng.
Pemineg kew! Is ed-ipat te Israel ne kenà ebpekelipezeng wey kenà edlipezeng.
Is Nengazen, iyan ed-ipat kenikew; diyà sikandin te uvey nu is edlavan kenikew.
Is keinit te andew wey siǥa te vulan ke mezukilem, kenà ebpekezezaat kenikew.
Ed-ipaten ka te Nengazen ne kenà ebpekezezaat kenikew is minsan hengkey he vangkit; ebpekeventayan din is untung nu.
Is Nengazen iyan ed-ipat kenikew ǥuntaan wey taman te taman, minsan hendei ka ebpevayà.
Nelipey a hein migkeǥiyan e zan te, “Edhendiyè kiw te valey te Nengazen.”
Ne ǥuntaan kayi key en mekehitindeg te pultahan te Jerusalem!
Is Jerusalem sevaha he inged he meupiya wey melig-en is kebenguna zuen.
Kayi ebpevayà is menge tribu te Israel te kedalig te Nengazen, su iyan heini insuǥù din kandan.
Kayi te Jerusalem edhimuwa te menge hadì he menge kevuwazan ni David is husayen.
Ampù kew para te meupiya he kebpekesavuk te menge etew ziyà te Jerusalem pinaaǥi te kegkaǥi te, “Berakat he mebmeuswaǥen is menge etew he mibmahal zan heini he inged.
Berakat he melinawen wey meupiya is kebpekesavuk diyà te seled te Jerusalem wey te menge melig-en he vahin kayi.”
Para te keupiyaanan te menge kezuzumahi ku wey menge emiǥu ku, egkaǥi a te, “Berakat he meupiya is kebpekesavuk te Jerusalem.”
Para te keupiyaanan te valey te Nengazen he Megbevayè tew, ed-ampù a he med-uswag is Jerusalem.
Nengazen, edlingahà a kenikew; diyan te kenikew he ebpimpinuu te pinuuwè nu te kedhadi diyan te langit.
Iring te suluǥuen he edtaǥad te kebeǥayi kandin te egalen din, sikami edtaǥad key zaan te tavang nu kenami, Nengazen he Megbevayè dey, taman te egkehizuwan key en kenikew.
Kehizuwi key, Nengazen, su utew key en ebpendezeisaya.
Utew key en edsusudia te menge etew he ebpeeyehey zà he menge hembugiru.
Emun wazè kiw levani te Nengazen, hengkey vuwa is egkehitavù kenitew? Tavak kew is menge tig-Israel!
“Emun wazè kiw levani te Nengazen hein midsurung kiw te menge kuntada tew,
mibpenhimetayan kiw zan en geina tenged te utew zan kegkepeuki kenitew.
Neiring kiw en pezem te naanud te zalem etawa nelened te meseleg he wahig.
<range>
Dait he edeliǥen is Nengazen, su wazè din ituǥut he zèdeeti kiw te menge kuntada tew he henduen be te menge langgam he zumezaas.
Nekepelaǥuy kiw iring te tagbis he nelitag he nekaawà su merunut en is tali.
Is tavang kenitew ne ziyà ebpuun te Nengazen he iyan mibaal te langit wey is kelibutan.”
Is menge etew he edsarig te Megbevayà ne iring te Buvungan he Zion he kenà egkehuyung, kekenà, kenà egkaawà te wazà pidtemanan.
Iring te nehimu he pengalang te Jerusalem is menge vuntud he nekeliǥuy kayi he inged, is Nengazen iyan pengalang te menge etew zin guntaan wey taman te taman.
Kenè din idtugut he ebpedayun is kedumala te menge lalung diyà te tanà te menge metazeng, su kela ke mekevaal zaan te mezaat is menge metazeng.
Nengazen, himuwa nu is meupiya ziyà te meupiya he menge etew, he hustu is paaǥi zan te kebpengungubpaan.
Piru siluti nu zuma te menge lalung is menge etew nu he edsunud te mezaat he vetasan. Berakat he meupiya is kebpekesavuk te menge etew te Israel!
Hein impeuman ipeuswag te Nengazen is Zion, henduen be te teǥeinep dà heini.
Nemen-engit kiw wey migkanta kiw te kegkelipey. Ne zutun migkaǥi is menge etew ziyà te zuma he menge nasyun te, “Mibaal is Nengazen diyà te kandan te menge vaal he nezumahan te zekelà he ǥehem.”
Tutuu he mibaal is Nengazen te menge vaal he nezumahan te zekelà he ǥehem kayi te kenitew, ne utew kiw zutun nengelipey.
Nengazen, ilikù nu is meupiya he kebpekesavuk dey iring te nemezahan he wahig he newehiǥan en maan.
Berakat he sikan is nekesineǥew hein timpu te ked-ezek din, ne mebmelipayen emun edraǥun en.
Is midhipanew he nekesineǥew, he ed-uwit te venì he id-ezek, mekeulì sikandin he egkelipey is ed-uwit te neraǥun din.
Emun kenà edtavang is Nengazen te kedtukud te valey, ne kenà ebpulus is kahaǥù te midtukud kayi. Emun kenà ebentayan te Nengazen is inged, ne kenà ebpulus is kebentayi kayi te menge vantey.
Emun kenà edtavang is Nengazen, wazà daan pulus te kedhaǥù te kedsayu ked-enew wey is kedlapus te kedterebahu para zuen egkekaan. Su iyan is Nengazen ebeǥey te menge kinahanglan te menge etew he mibmahal zin, minsan nekelipezeng sikandan.
Is menge anak beǥey wey gasa he ebpuun te Nengazen.
Is amey he zuen din menge anak he nengeetew hein betan-en pa sikandin iring te sevaha he sundaru he zuen din menge panà.
Utew zeyzey is etew he zuen din mahabet he menge anak, su zuen ebpeketavang kandin te ked-etuvang te menge kuntada zin diyà te hukmanan.
Utew kew zeyzey is menge edtahud te Nengazen, he nengungubpaan he ed-ikul te menge paaǥi zin.
Is rimeǥas te menge kedhaǥù niw ne utew ereg te menge kinahanglan niw; ebmelipayen kew wey ebmeuswaǥen.
Is menge esawa niw he ziyà te menge valey niw ne egkeiring te utew meveǥas he paras, ne is menge anak niw edtigum he ebpekeliǥuy ziyà te lemisahan niw he henduen be te menguhed he menge kayu he ulibu.
Iyan heini tuvad he egkezawat te menge etew he edtahud te Nengazen.
Berakat he tuvazi kew te Nengazen puun te ed-ezapan he valey zin diyà te Zion. Berakat he meehè niw is ked-uswag te Jerusalem taman te kayi kew pa te kelibutan.
Wey verakat he meehè niw pa is menge apù niw. Berakat he meupiya is kebpekesavuk te menge etew kayi te Israel.
Menge tig-Israel, keǥiya niw ke mibmenumenu kew te ebpaantus te menge kuntada niw puun pa te aney en he kegketukud te nasyun niw.
“Dekelà is kebpeentusa zan kenami puun pa te kebpuun te nasyun dey. Piru wazè key zan mezèdeeti.
Mibpelian dan te mezalem is menge peka zey; henduen be heini te tanà he mid-eradu.
Piru metazeng is Nengazen, su impelingkawas key zin te kebpen-uripen te lalung he menge etew.”
Berakat he ebpekepekeziyù tenged te kegkeeled is langun he edumut te Zion.
Berakat he meiring sikandan te menge sagbet he nenuvù diyà te atep, he iyan pa kedtuvù dan ne egkeǥangu zan en.
Wazà edseǥipà te kedtiǥum kayi he menge sagbet wey wazà ed-uwit kayi he vinagkes.
Berakat he sikan is edsaǥad kenà megkaǥi ziyà te kandan te, “Berakat he tuvazi kew te Nengazen! Ebpenubtuvazan dey sikiyu pinaaǥi te ngazan te Nengazen.”
Tenged te subra he kelised nengumew a ziyan te kenikew, Nengazen.
Pemineǥa nu is kebpehizuhizu ku kenikew.
Nengazen, ke và nu zà inlista is menge salè dey, ne hentei zà buwa is egkesamà diyan te etuvangan nu?
Piru mibpesaylu key kenikew, umbe edtehuzen dey sikew.
Edtaǥad a iyan kenikew, Nengazen, wey edsarig a te lalag nu.
Edtaǥad a kenikew, Nengazen, lavew pa te kedtaǥad te perevantey te kebmeselem.
Menge tig-Israel, sarig kew te Nengazen, su veliǥeǥawen sikandin, ne layun sikandin andam te kedluwas.
Iyan sikandin edluwas keniyu te langun he menge salè niw.
He Nengazen, kenà a gelbuwen wey mepelevawen. Wazà a mebpenganduy te zekelà wey mekeayam-ayam he menge vutang he kenè ku egkevaug.
Kekenà, kuntintu ad wey mibmelinawen ad iring te vatà he midlutas te iney zin he kenè en egkesuat he edsusu.
Menge tig-Israel, sarig kew te Nengazen guntaan wey taman te taman.
Nengazen, kenè nu lipati si David wey is langun he elentusen din.
Tentenuzi nu is saad din diyà te kenikew, Nengazen, is Mekeǥeǥehem he Megbevayà ni Jacob. Midsaad sikandin he ke sikandin te,
“Kenà a ed-ulì wey kenà a edhizeǥà;
kenà a edlipezeng
taman te kebpeketuredu ku te lugar he egkeubpaan te Nengazen, he iyan kes Mekeǥeǥehem he Megbevayà ni Jacob.”
Hein diyè key te Efrata netudtul kenami ke hendei sikan is Kavan te Kebpekid-uyun, ne ziyè dey haazà meturedu te vevesukà diyà te Jaar.
Ne zutun migkaǥi key te, “Edhendiyè kiw te valey te Nengazen ne ed-azap kiw ziyà te etuvangan te pinuuwè din te kedhadì.”
Agpas ka, Nengazen, hendiyè ke en te valey nu he ed-ezapan duma sikan is Kavan te Kebpekid-uyun he simbulu te ǥehem nu.
Berakat he layun edtinazeng is menge memumuhat nu, ne egkanta te kegkelipey is metinumanen he menge etew nu.
Tenged te suluǥuen nu he si David, kenè nu engkezi is pinilì nu he hadì.
Nenangdù ka zengan diyà te ki David, ne kenà duwazuwa he edtumanen nu haazà ne kenè nu ebelvelewanan. Ke sikew te, “Sevaha te menge kevuwazan nu is id-ilis ku kenikew he hadì.
Is menge kevuwazan nu he menge hadì, emun edtumanen dan is kebpekid-uyun ku keniyu wey is menge penurù he impenurù ku kandan, edhadì daan sikandan te taman te taman.”
Tutuu he mibpilì wey midtinguhà te Nengazen is Zion, he iyan edhimuwen din he ubpeey zin. Ke sikandin te,
“Iyan heini ubpeey ku taman te taman; kayi a ed-ubpà su kayi a egkesuat.
Ibeǥey ku ziyà te Zion is langun he kinahanglan din, ne edhentayen ku is menge pubri he menge meǥinged kayi.
Layun ku edlibriya is menge memumuhat kayi, ne is metinumanen he menge meǥinged kayi he menge etew ku, layun ebpemenganta te kegkelipey zan.
Ibpahadì ku ziyà te Zion is hadì he kevuwazan ni David ne egkeiring sikandin te sulù he kenà egkeevukan.
Ebpeel-elezan ku is menge kuntada zin, piru ibpeuswag ku mulà is ginhedian din.”
Utew meupiya he ed-ahaan is menge etew te Megbevayà he ebpengungubpaan he egkesevaha.
Iring heini te utew meupiya he lana he inlana ki Aaron he midtudà diyà te sumpè din ne nekeuma ziyà te kuwilyu te visti zin.
Iring heini te zehemug diyà te Buntud he Hermon he nengetaktak diyà te Buvungan he Zion. Ne kayi te Zion medsaad is Nengazen te tuvad, he iyan is untung he wazà pidtemanan.
Hendini kew, deliǥa niw is Nengazen, langun te sikiyu is menge suluǥuen te Nengazen he edterebahu ziyà te valey zin emun mezukilem.
Ivayew niw is menge velad niw zutun te ked-ampù niw ziyà te seled te valey zin, ne zeliǥa niw is Nengazen.
Berakat he tuvazi kew te Nengazen he ziyà te Zion, he iyan mibaal te langit wey kelibutan.
Deliǥa is Nengazen! Deliǥa niw sikandin, sikiyu is menge suluǥuen din
he edterebahu ziyà te valey te Nengazen he Megbevayè tew.
Deliǥa is Nengazen su meupiya sikandin. Kanta kew te kedalig kandin su hihizuwen sikandin.
Deliǥa niw sikandin su mibpilì din is menge etew te Israel he menge kevuwazan ni Jacob, para mehimu he ispisyal he menge etew zin.
Netuenan ku he mekeǥeǥehem is Nengazen, he lavew te langun he zuma he menge ed-ezapen.
Midhimu te Nengazen is minsan hengkey he egkesuatan din, diyà te langit, dini te tanà, diyà te menge zaǥat, wey ziyà te kinezizeleman kayi.
Impezivavew zin is menge ǥapun he ebpuun diyà te meziyù he menge vahin kayi te kelibutan, ne midhimu zin he mebpengilat duma is ked-uzan. Ibpeǥawas din is keramag puun te neteǥuan kayi.
Mibpenhimetayan din is kinekekayan he menge anak he maama te menge tig-Ehipto, wey is kinekekayan he menge anak te menge uyaǥen dan.
Diyà te Ehipto, mibaal sikandin te menge singyal wey menge egkein-inuwan he menge vaal te kedsilut te hadì te Ehipto wey is langun he menge upisyal zin.
Mibpendezeetan din is menge meǥinged diyà te mahabet he menge nasyun wey mibpenhimetayan din is mekeǥeǥehem he menge hadì,
iring ki Sihon te hadì te menge Amorihanen, ki Og he hadì diyà te Bashan, wey is langun he menge hadì diyà te Canaan.
Ne imbeǥey zin is menge tanè dan diyà te menge etew zin he menge Israilihanen para maangken dan haazà.
Nengazen, is ngazan nu wey is kegkevantug nu egketenuzan taman te taman.
Su ibpeehè nu, Nengazen, he wazà mekesalà is menge etew nu he menge suluǥuen nu, ne egkehizuwan nu sikandan.
Is menge ed-ezapen diyà te zuma he menge nasyun pelata wey vulawan, ne etew zà is mibaal zuen.
Duen dan menge vèbà, piru kenè dan ebpekekaǥi, duen dan menge mata, piru kenè dan ebpekaahà,
duen dan menge telinga, piru kenè dan ebpekezineg, wey kenè dan ebpekeǥehinawa.
Is menge mibaal kayi te menge ed-ezapen wey is langun he edsarig kayi ne egkehimu zaan sikandan he iring kayi te menge ed-ezapen he wazà pulus.
Sikiyu is menge etew te Israel, ragkes en is menge kevuwazan ni Aaron wey is duma pa he menge kevuwazan ni Levi, deliǥa niw is Nengazen! Sikiyu is edtahud te Nengazen, deliǥa niw sikandin!
<range>
Deliǥa niw is Nengazen he ziyà te Zion. Diyà sikandin med-ubpà te inged he Jerusalem. Deliǥa is Nengazen!
Peselemati is Nengazen su meupiya sikandin. Wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew zin.
Peselemati is Megbevayà he lavew te langun he zuma he menge ed-ezapen. Wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew zin.
Peselemati is Nengazen he utew lavew te langun he menge egalen. Wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew zin.
Iyan dà sikandin midhimu te egkein-inuwan he menge hitavù. Wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew zin.
Pinaaǥi te ketau zin, mibeelan din is langit. Wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew zin.
Impelastar zin is tanà diyà te ebpekelapew te wahig. Wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew zin.
Mibeelan din is andew wey vulan. Wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew zin.
Mibeelan din is andew para meketayew heini emun maandew. Wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew zin.
Mibeelan din is bulan wey menge vituen su para meketayew heini emun mezukilem. Wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew zin.
Mibpenhimetayan din is kinekekayan he menge anak he maama te menge tig-Ehipto. Wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew zin.
Impeǥawas din is menge Israilihanen puun te Ehipto. Wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew zin.
Impeǥawas din sikandan pinaaǥi te zekelà he ǥehem din. Wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew zin.
Midtevì din is Daǥat he Meriǥà. Wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew zin.
Ne zutun mebayà te mid-elangan is impelayun din he menge etew zin. Wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew zin.
Piru midlened din mulà is hadì diyà te Ehipto wey is menge sundaru zin diyà te Zaǥat he Meriǥà. Wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew zin.
Migiyahan din diyà te sibsivayan is menge etew zin. Wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew zin.
Mibpendezeetan din is mekeǥeǥehem he menge hadì. Wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew zin.
Mibpenhimetayan din is bentuǥan he menge hadì. Wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew zin.
Midhimetayan din si Sihon, is hadì te menge Amorihanen. Wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew zin.
Midhimetayan din daan si Og, is hadì te Bashan. Wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew zin.
Imbeǥey zin is tanè dan diyà te menge etew zin su para maangken dan heini. Wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew zin.
Heini he tanà naangken te menge Israilihanen he menge suluǥuen din. Wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew zin.
Netenuzan kiw zin hein kenà meupiya is kebpekesavuk tew. Wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew zin.
Midlibri kiw zin te kedezaat te menge kuntada tew. Wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew zin.
Mibeǥayan din te keenen is langun he menge linimbag din. Wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew zin.
Peselemati is Megbevayà diyà te langit. Wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew zin.
Nememinuu key ziyà te veyvey te menge wahig diyà te Babilonia he ebpemenineǥew hein netenuzan dey is Zion.
Impenanggat dey zà is menge alpa zey ziyà te menge subpang te kayu.
Su ibpekanta key te menge mibihag kenami. Midsuǥù key zan te kedlangan kandan. Ke sikandan te, “Kentahi key te kanta he mehitenged te Zion!”
Ebmenumenu key te kegkanta te kanta mehitenged te Nengazen diyà te tanà te menge mibihag kenami?
Berakat he kenè ku en mewaleng is kewanan he velad ku ke egkelipatan ku is Jerusalem!
Berakat he kenà ad mekekaǥi emun kenè ku edtentenuzan wey ed-isipen he iyan ebpekeveǥey kedì te zekelà he kelipey is Jerusalem.
Tentenuzi nu, Nengazen, is mibeelan te menge Edomnen hein mid-aǥew te menge tig-Babilonia is Jerusalem. Migkaǥi zan te, “Purungi niw heeyan bengkaǥa.”
Sikiyu is menge meǥinged te Babilonia, edezeetan kew! Utew zeyzey is menge etew he ebales keniyu tenged te mibeelan niw ziyà te kenami.
Utew zeyzey is egkuwa te menge anak niw ne idrumbag dan diyà te vatu.
Ebpeselematan ku sikew, Nengazen, te ebpuun kayi te tivuuk he ǥehinawa ku. Egkanta a te menge idalig kenikew ziyà te etuvangan te zuma he menge ed-ezapen.
Edluhud a he edsinaru ziyà te valey nu he edalig kenikew tenged te ǥaǥew nu wey kebmetinumanen nu. Su impeehè nu he sikew wey is lalag nu lavew te langun he menge vutang.
Hein mid-umew ku sikew, ne midtavak a kenikew; midlig-enan a kenikew pinaaǥi te zesen nu.
Edalig kenikew, Nengazen, is langun he menge hadì kayi te tivuuk he kelibutan su egkezineg dan is menge lalag nu.
Egkanta zan mehitenged te mibeelan nu, su zekelà is gehem nu.
Minsan lavew ka te langun, Nengazen, ed-isipen nu is menge egkaayuayu. Ne minsan diyè ka te meziyu su metikang ka, netuenan nu is langun he menge vaal te menge mepelevawen.
Minsan utew a edlised, ne wazè nu ituǥut he mebpatey a. Midsilutan nu is utew egkengepauk he menge kuntada ku. Ne midlibri a kenikew pinaaǥi te ǥehem nu.
Edtumanen nu, Nengazen, is menge saad nu kayi te kediey. Wazà pidtemanan te ǥaǥew nu. Kenè nu pesegdana heini is menge linimbag nu.
Nengazen, midsusi a kenikew umbe nekilala a kenikew.
Netuenan nu ke keenu a ebpinuu wey edhitindeg. Minsan diyè ka te meziyù netuenan nu is nengetaǥù te isip ku.
Egkaahà a kenikew ke edterebahu a wey ke edhimeley a. Netuenan nu is langun he ebeelan ku.
Nengazen, minsan kenè e pa ebpekekaǥi, ne netuenan nu en he zaan ke hengkey is egkeǥiyen ku.
Diyè ka te peliǥuy ku, ne egkelesaǥan a kenikew pinaaǥi te ǥehem nu.
Is kegketueni nu mehitenged kediey ne utew egkein-inuwi; kenè ku heini egkesavut.
Hendei e man ebayà para melikayi ku is Mulin-ulin nu? Egkehimu ve he ed-elesan ku sikew?
Emun edhendiyà a te langit, ne ziyè ka; emun edhendiyà a te iveyaan, ne ziyè ka zaan.
Emun be e zà ebpekelayang ne edlayang a pehendiyà te edsilaan etawa ziyà a ed-ubpà te utew meziyù he ziyà te edsenlepan,
ne zutun ka is ed-aǥak wey edtavang kedì.
Minsan mebpetambun e pa te merusirem wey minsan meveeli pa he mezukilem heini is kerayag he nekeliǥuy kediey kenà a ebpekeeles.
Su minsan is merusirem ne kenà merusirem diyà te kenikew, ne is mezukilem iring ded kerayag te maandew.
Nekilala a kenikew su iyan ka mibaal te tivuuk he lawa ku. Iyan ka mibpurma kediey ziyà te ǥetek te iney ku.
Edeliǥen ku sikew su egkein-inuwan is kebeeli nu kediey. Egkein-inuwan is menge vaal nu, ne netuenan ku heeyan.
Neehè nu is menge tulan ku hein mibpurma a kenikew ziyà te seled te ǥetek te iney ku.
Naahà ad kenikew minsan hein wazè e pa mepurma. Is kahabet te menge andew te kegkeuyag-uyag ku ne nekesurat en diyà te libru nu, minsan wazè pa mebpuun is untung ku.
He Megbevayà, kenè ku egketegkad is menge ed-isipen nu; utew heini mahabet.
Emun ebilangen ku heini ne edhuna pa he mahabet te menge pantad. Te kegkepukew ku, is isip ku ziyà gihapun te kenikew.
He Megbevayà, berakat he ebpenhimetayan nu is menge lalung! Berakat he mebpekeziyù kayi te kediey is menge ebpenhimatey te menge etew.
Mezaat is menge lalag dan mehitenged kenikew. Heini is menge kuntada nu, undaunda is kedsempita zan te ngazan nu.
Nengazen, egkeepesan ku is egkeepes kenikew. Egkeepesan ku is ebpekigkuntada kenikew.
Utew ku egkeepesi sikandan; mid-isip ku sikandan he menge kuntada ku.
Susiya a kenikew, Megbevayè ku, su para metueni nu is kayi te ǥehinawa ku. Gezami a, su para metueni nu is ed-isipen ku.
Ahaa nu ke zuen mezaat he vaal ku, ne eǥaka a ziyà te zalan he ereg he ed-ikulen ku taman te taman.

He Nengazen, luwasa a zutun te lalung wey mesipala he menge etew.
Ebpelanu zan te mezaat wey layun dan ebulanga is menge etew.
Iring te edhereg he uled is dilè dan; is menge lalag dan ne ebpekepesakit iring te hereg te uled.
Endilungi a, Nengazen, wey a kenà mesuǥat te menge etew he mesipala he tuyù dan is edezaat kediey.
Is menge mepelevawen, mid-endaman e zan te paaǥi he iyan igkeutela zan kedì. Ke và e zà pait, iring te puket he intaan is paaǥi zan te kedhingutela zan kedì.
He Nengazen, iyan ka Megbevayè ku. Pemineǥa nu, Nengazen, is kebpehizuhizu ku kenikew.
Nengazen he MEGBEVAYÀ, iyan ka mezesen he menluluwas ku. Iyan ka nengalang kedì te timpu te tebek.
Nengazen, kenè nu ituǥut diyà te lalung he menge etew is tinguhè dan. Kenè nu mehimuwa he medlampus is tuyù dan, su kela ke mekepezalig dan.
Berakat he meuney is menge kuntada ku he nekelingut kedì te mezaat he tuyù dan pezem kediey.
Berakat he meuluǥi sikandan te regreg, ne iulug sikandan diyà te menge vudsi ne kenè dan en mekaawà.
Berakat ke kenè en mebpedayun kayi te tanà is menge etew he menge tigbutangbutang te zuma. Berakat daan he meumahi te vangkit is menge mesipala he iyan ebpekezezaat kandan.
Nengazen, netuenan ku he edlevanan nu is ketenged te menge ayu-ayu; ibeǥey nu kandan is hustu he kukuman.
Siguradu he edeliǥen ka te menge metazeng ne ebpengungubpaan sikandan duma kenikew.
He Nengazen, ebpengumew-umew a kenikew, ne segugunà a tevangi. Pemineǥa nu heini is kebpengumew-umew ku kenikew.
Isipa nu he iring te veyewà heini is ampù ku ziyà te kenikew. Isipa nu is kebeyawa ku te menge velad ku he iring kemahal te mahapun he kebpemuhat.
Giyahi nu, Nengazen, is kebpengaǥikaǥi ku su wey a kenà mekekagi te mezaat.
Ilikey a te kebpekevaal te mezaat wey te kedtampu te ebeelan te menge lalung. Ilikey a te kebpekivahin te ǥastu zan.
Mezawat ku is kedawey wey kedsawey kedì te metazeng he etew; kenè ku haazà mevelivezi su iyan idhimuwa zin dutun is tenged te ǥaǥew zin wey keupiya zin kedì. Iyan, is menge lalung mulà layun ku id-ampù he kenà medlampus is mezaat he menge vaal zan.
Emun ibpenimbag en diyà te pangpang is menge edumala kandan, ebpeketuu zan he tutuu is menge lalag ku.
Ne zutun egkaǥi zan te, “Ebpekedsusuwey en bes is menge tulan tew ziyà te edlevengan kenitew ne egkeiring heini te menge vatu he ebpemekeǥawas ke egkeeradu.”
Umbe, Nengazen he MEGBEVAYÀ, diyan e zà edsarig; ed-aput a ziyà te kenikew, umbe kenè nu ituǥut he egkepatey a.
Ilikey a kenikew zuen te menge penuǥes te lalung he menge etew he idhingutel zan kedì.
Himuwa nu he iyan sikandan meutel zuen te penuǥes dan, ne mekelikey a mulà dutun.

Nengazen, mezesen is ked-umew ku kenikew. Ebpengemuyù a he ikehizu a kenikew.
Idtug-an ku kenikew is menge riklamu ku wey is menge kelised ku.
Ne emun neewaan ad te perateng, ne heeyan ke zed is ebpekevantey te menge egkengehitavù kedì. Diyà te ibayè ku zuen idtuǥes kedì te menge kuntada ku.
Ahaa nu man is nekelingut kedì, wazà midtavang kedì, wazà nengalang kedì, wey wazà neipeng kedì.
Ebpengum-umawen ku sikew, Nengazen; iyan ka ebpengalang kedì. Iyan ke zà utew egkinehenglanen ku kayi te kelibutan.
Pemineǥa nu is kebuyù ku te tavang diyan te kenikew, su wazè en duma he egkehimu ku. Ilikey a te edtelinguma he edrasey kediey, su memezesen dan kenà siak.
Ipeǥawas a kenikew kayi te kegkepirisuwa kedì, wey a mekezalig kenikew. Ne zutun ed-erungut kayi te kediey is menge metazeng tenged te kebpurungi nu kediey.
He Nengazen, pemineǥa nu heini is ked-ampù ku kenikew. Dineǥa nu heini is kebpehizuhizu ku kenikew. Tenged te metazeng wey metinumanen ka, ne tevangi a.
Peseyluwa a te menge nehimu ku he mezaat is suluǥuen nu. Su wazà minsan hentei he metazeng diyà te etuvangan nu.
Nezaag a te menge kuntada ku, ne mibpesipelahan e zan. Ne hein mibpirisu e zan diyà te merusirem, neiring a te minatey he neuǥet dà diyà te penlevengà.
Dutun ne naawà is perateng ku ne utew a neherati.
Iyan, dutun daan netenuzan ku is nengehimu nu ziyà te nengehuna he timpu. Ne egngunngunuen ku heini is langun,
umbe imbayew ku is menge velad ku zuma te ked-ampù he edhenduen te: Nenginahanglan a kenikew Nengazen! Ne iring e en te utew memaza he tanà he egkinahanglan te wahig.
Segugunà a tevaka, Nengazen. Naawè en is perateng ku. Kenà a kenikew elesi su kela ke ibpatey ku.
Kada meselem, ipetentenuzi nu kedì is kebmahala nu kedì. Su iyan ke zà midseriǥan ku. Ipenuru nu kediey is hustu he paaǥi te kedsunud ku kenikew. Su iyan ke zà ed-empuen ku.
Luwasa a, Nengazen, te kedezaat kedì te menge kuntada ku, su iyan ka midhengyuan ku he mebpengalang kedì.
Ipenurù nu kedì is paaǥi te kedtuman te egkesuatan nu, su iyan ke man Megbevayè ku. Berakat he is hihizuwen he Mulin-ulin nu iyan megiya kedì pehendiyà te dezeyaan he kebpekesavuk.
Luwasa a, Nengazen, su wey ka mezeliǥi. Geina te metazeng ka, luwasa a te kelised ku.
Geraa nu is menge kuntada ku tenged te ǥaǥew nu kedì, su suluǥuen e man kenikew.
Ereg he edeliǥen is Nengazen he iring te vatu he endilungè ku. Iyan sikandin midlumbad kedì te kebpekidtebek.
Iyan sikandin beliǥeǥawen he Megbevayè ku wey melig-en he elesà. Iyan sikandin eputè ku wey menluluwas ku. Iyan sikandin kelasag ku ne ziyà a te kandin ebuyù te pengalang.
He Nengazen, hengkey ves is menusiyà? Maan is utew nu sikandin igkeseeng? Menusiyè dà sikandin, maan is kenè nu egkehimu te ed-awà sikandin diyà te isip nu?
Is etew, iring dà sikandin te keramag su meǥaan dà egkaawà is untung din, ne is menge andew zin ne iring dà te alung he edlavey zà.
He Nengazen, puwasi nu is langit ne vulus ka. Semsama nu is menge vuntud wey med-evel.
Gemita nu is menge kilat he iring te panè nu su wey mengekepelaǥuy is menge kuntada ku ne mekedsusuwey zan.
Puun diyan te langit, kewaa a kenikew wey luwasa a puun te ǥehem te menge kuntada he lumelengyawà he memezesen su iring dan te meseleg he zalem.
Wazà tutuu he egkeǥiyen dan. Ne minsan edsesapà sikandan, ne tarù is egkeǥiyen dan.
Egkantahan ku sikew, Megbevayè ku, duma te keduyug te alpa.
Kenikew he ketau he mekezaag is menge hadì ne midluwas nu si David te kemetayen.
Luwasa a te ǥehem te menge kuntada he lumelengyawà, he kenà egkaǥi te tutuu ne edtarùtarù minsan ebpengulivet.
Berakat he is menge anak dey he maama, te vetan-en dan pa ne meiring sikandan te pinemula he mehinuvù. Henduen ded daan is menge anak dey he vahi su iyan maan meiringi zan is menge tukud he mekempet diyà te turuǥan.
Berakat he mepenù is menge budiga zey te langun he kelasi te neraǥun. Berakat he med-anak te mahabet is menge kerehidu zey ziyà te vevesukà.
Ne mekergahi is menge vaka zey te zekelà he menge pruduktu. Berakat he kenè key en surunga te menge kuntada zey ne kenè key en mevihag. Ne verakat he wazè en maan menge sineǥawan te egkeseeng diyà te menge zalan dey.
Utew zeysey is menge etew he egkeiring kayi is ked-ubpè dan. Deyzey is menge etew he nekekilala wey midtuu te tutuu he Megbevayà he Nengazen.
Edeliǥen ku sikew, Megbevayè ku he Hadì. Edeliǥen ku sikew te wazà pidtemanan.
Edeliǥen ku sikew te kada andew, ne ed-ul-ulahan ku heini te taman te taman.
Mekeǥeǥehem ka he Nengazen, umbe ereg ka he edeliǥen. Kenà egketegkad is kegkemekeǥeǥehem nu.
Is kada lapis te kevuwazan, ne idsangyew zan is nezumahan te ǥehem he menge vaal nu ziyà te edsunud kandan he menge kevuwazan.
Egngunngunuen ku is kegkelavew wey kegkemekeǥeǥehem nu, wey is igkeinuinu he menge vaal.
Is menge etew, idsangyew zan is utew egkein-inuwi he menge vaal nu, ne ibpenudtul ku zaan is kegkemekeǥeǥehem nu.
Ibpenudtul zan daan is kegkevantug te keupiya nu he wazè din repeng, wey egkanta zan mehitenged te ketazeng nu.
Nengazen, hihizuwen ka wey iipengen; beliǥeǥawen wey kenà daan melemu he egkepauk.
Nengazen, edtulengezan nu is langun; duen nu hizu te langun he linimbag nu.
Ebpekepeselamat kenikew, Nengazen, is langun he linimbag nu; edeliǥen ka te metinumanen he menge etew nu.
Ibpenudtul zan is kegkemekeǥeǥehem te ginhedian nu wey is kegkemekeǥeǥehem nu,
su wey mesayud is langun he keet-etawan te nezumahan te ǥehem he menge vineelan nu wey is mekeǥeǥehem he ginhedian nu.
Is kedhadì nu wazà pidtemanan. Nengazen ka he metinumanen te langun he menge penaad nu, wey veliǥeǥawen ka te langun he linimbag nu.
Midtevangan nu is langun he edlised wey midlig-enan nu is langun he meǥuyà.
Midsarig diyà te kenikew is langun he uuyag he linimbag, ne mibeǥayan nu sikandan te keuyaǥan dan te timpu he egkinehenglanen dan en.
Ne kenè kurang is ibeǥey nu umbe egkengahantey sikandan.
Nengazen, metazeng ka, ziyà te langun he paaǥi nu, ne hihizuwen ka ziyà te langun he ebeelan nu.
Uvey nu zà, Nengazen, is langun he epengumew-umew kenikew te tinutuuwà.
Is menge edtahud kenikew ne ebeǥayan nu sikandan te penganduy zan; ebpemineǥen nu is pengumew-umew zan kenikew, ne edluwasen nu sikandan.
Binentayan nu layun is langun he etew he mibmahal kenikew, iyan, edezeetan nu mulà is langun he menge lalung.
Edeliǥen ku sikew, Nengazen. Is langun he linimbag nu edalig daan kenikew te wazà pidtemanan.
Deliǥa is Nengazen! Ereg he edeliǥen ku is Nengazen.
Edalig a kandin seled te tivuuk he untung ku. Egkanta a te kedalig te Megbevayà mintras uuyag e pa.
Kenè niw iyan seriǥi is mekeǥeǥehem he menge etew wey minsan hentei, su kenè dan ebpekeluwas keniyu.
Ebpekelikù sikandan diyà te tanà ke ebpatey zan en. Ne zutun ebpekeengked sikandan he ebpelanu.
Utew zeyzey is etew he iyan edtavang kandin kes Megbevayà he ed-ezapen ni Jacob, ne iyan edseriǥan din is Nengazen he Megbevayè din,
su haazà he edseriǥan, ne iyan sikandin kes Nengazen he nenlimbag te langit, tanà, daǥat, wey te langun he taǥù kayi. Iyan heini kes Nengazen he engayan he edseriǥan te wazà pidtemanan.
Is kedhukum din ne edapig diyà te menge edèdaaǥen. Wey iyan sikandin ebeǥey te keuyaǥan te langun he egkinahanglan kayi. Ibpelingkawas din is menge vihag,
ebpekaahà is menge lakap he ebewian din, midlig-enan din is menge meluya, mibmahal zin is menge metazeng,
ebentayan din is menge langyew, edtevangan din is menge ilu wey menge valu he vahi, iyan, ebengkaǥen din mulà is paaǥi te menge lalung.
Sikiyu is menge meǥinged diyà te Zion, is Nengazen he Megbevayè niw iyan sikandin kes edhadì te wazà pidtemanan. Deliǥa is Nengazen.
Deliǥa is Nengazen! Utew meupiya is kegkanta te menge idalig te Megbevayè tew. Ne meupiya heini su zait man iyan sikandin he edeliǥen.
Mid-umanan tukuza te Nengazen is inged he Jerusalem; wey midtiǥum din umana is menge kevuwazan ni Israel he nevihag.
In-awè din is seeng te egkengeseeng; mibewian din is menge palì dan.
Kandin he ketau ke pira is kezakel te menge vituen ne migngezanan din is kada sevaha kandan.
Utew iyan mekeǥeǥehem is Nengazen, ne is ketau zin ne kenà egketegkad.
Impeketikang din is menge egkengaayuayu. Iyan, is menge lalung mulà ne mid-ey-eyazan din te edezaat sikandan.
Kentahi niw is Nengazen duma te kebpeselamat diyà te kandin. Ipezaǥing niw is alpa para te Megbevayè tew.
Midilungan din is langit te menge ǥapun, ne mibpeuzanan din is dini te kelibutan, wey mibpetuvuan din is menge vuntud te menge sagbet.
Iyan sikandin mibeǥey te egkeenen te menge langgam dini te lumpad. Iring din daan te menge pispis te uwak ke egkinahanglan te egkeenen dan.
Is igkelipey zin ne kenà iyan is kezesen te menge kudà etawa is meǥaan he menge sundaru,
kekenà, iyan is edtahud kandin wey edsarig te ǥaǥew zin.
Sikiyu is menge meǥinged diyà te Zion he inged he Jerusalem, deliǥa niw is Nengazen he iyan Megbevayè niw.
Su midlig-enan din is menge pultahan te inged niw. Ne midtuvazan kew zin.
Mibeǥayan kew zin te kelinew ziyan te ed-ubpaan niw. Ne midhantey kew zin te meupiya he egkeenen.
Ebmenduan din is kelibutan, ne segugunà heini edtuman.
Midtembunan din is tanà te ayis ne iring heini te meputì he malung, ne ingkayar zin is pinu he ayis he henduen be te avu.
Impeuzan din te ayis he iring te zezeisey he vatu. Ne wazà minsan hentei he ebpeketigker te keǥenew kayi.
Ne mibmenduan din heini ne nengetunew heini. Impepengeramag din ne midtudà is wahig.
Impahayag din is menge lalag din, menge sulunuzen he ibpesunud din, wey menge suǥù din diyà te menge tig-Israel he menge kevuwazan ni Jacob.
Wazè din heini ul-ulaha ziyà te zuma he menge nasyun; wazè dan mulà haazà metueni is menge suǥù din. Deliǥa is Nengazen!
Deliǥa is Nengazen! Sikiyu is diyan te langit, deliǥa niw is Nengazen!
Deliǥa niw sikandin, sikiyu is langun he menge velinsuǥuen, he menge sundaru zin diyà te langit.
Deliǥa niw sikandin, andew, bulan, wey menge vituen.
Deliǥa niw sikandin, kinetikangan he langit wey is wahig diyà te zivavew.
Medalig dan is langun te Nengazen! Su pinaaǥi te kebmandù din, nelimbag sikandan is langun.
Wazà pidtemanan is kebpekesavuk dan diyà te midsevukan din kandan, ne kenè en heini egkahalin is kebpekesavuk dan.
Deliǥa niw is Nengazen, sikiyu is langun kayi te kelibutan, menge dezekelà he langgam he ziyà te zaǥat, wey is langun diyà te kinezeleman en te zaǥat.
Deliǥa niw te Nengazen, sikiyu is menge kilat, menge ǥiyew, menge ǥapun, wey mevendes he keramag he edtuman ke edsuǥuen din.
Deliǥa niw is Nengazen, sikiyu is menge vuntud, menge vuvungan, wey menge kayu he zuen din beǥas wey wazà,
langun he menge langgam: he leew wey is ayam, wey zuma pa he kelasi te langgam he ebpenanap wey ebpemenlayang.
Deliǥa niw zaan is Nengazen, sikiyu is menge hadì, menge upisyal, menge ebpemendumala, wey is langun he etew zini te kelibutan;
menge menguhed man, wey is menge meǥurang en, wey ke iyan be menge vatà.
Langun te sikandan ne medalig te Nengazen su iyan sikandin lavew te langun. Iyan sikandin lavew he mekeǥeǥehem te langun he ziyà te langit.
Midlig-enan din wey mibeǥayan din te zengeg is metinumanen he menge etew zin, he iyan is menge tig-Israel he utew zin pelanggà. Deliǥa is Nengazen!
Deliǥa is Nengazen! Megkanta kew te veǥu he kentahan para te Nengazen. Deliǥa sikandin diyà te ketiǥuman te menge etew zin he metinumanen.
Medlipey kew is menge tig-Israel; ikelipey niw is midlimbag keniyu. Medlipey kew is menge etew ziyà te Zion tenged te hadì niw.
Deliǥa niw sikandin duma is kedsayew wey kedtukar te tamburin wey menge alpa.
Su igkelipey te Nengazen is menge etew zin; mibeǥayan din te zengeg is kenà memepelavawen pinaaǥi te kebpekezaag dan.
Medlipey is menge etew he mepezumdumahan te Megbevayà tenged te kebpekezaag dan; megkanta zan te kegkelipey minsan diyà te menge hizeǥaan dan.
Kinahanglan he igkulahì dan is kedalig dan te Megbevayà dutun te egawed sikandan te meǥarang he menge ispada,
te kebales wey kedsilut te menge etew ziyà te zuma he menge nasyun,
te kebekusa te menge hadì wey menge pengulu zan,
su iyan kedsiluti kandan he insuǥù te Megbevayà. Ne para heini te kegkezeliǥi te langun he menge etew te Megbevayà. Deliǥa is Megbevayà!
Deliǥa niw is Nengazen! Deliǥa niw is Megbevayà diyà te valey zin. Deliǥa niw sikandin he ziyà te langit, is melig-en he ubpeey zin.
Deliǥa niw sikandin tenged te nezumahan te ǥehem he menge vaal zin. Deliǥa niw sikandin tenged te wazà ebpekerepeng te kegkemekeǥeǥehem din.
Deliǥa niw sikandin pinaaǥi te kebpezaǥing te menge vudyung. Deliǥa niw sikandin pinaaǥi te zaǥing te menge alpa wey menge lira.
Deliǥa niw sikandin pinaaǥi te menge tamburin wey kedsayew. Deliǥa niw sikandin pinaaǥi te zuma pa he instrumintu he zuen menge kuwirdas wey menge pulalà.
Deliǥa niw sikandin pinaaǥi te mezaǥing he menge simbal.
Is langun he uuyag medalig te Nengazen. Deliǥa is Nengazen!
Iyan heini sikan is menge erubasa ni Solomon he anak ni David te hadì diyà te Israel.
Heini he menge erubasa, ebpekeveǥey te ketau wey ebpekemansu kenikew, ne egkesavut nu is mezalem he menge lalag he ebpekeveǥey te ketau.
Ebpekemansu heini kenikew para mehimu ka he uluwanen, he ebpengungubpaan te hustu, metazeng, wey mezait he menge ulaula.
Ebpkeveǥey heini te ketau te wazè din ketau, wey ebpekeveǥey heini te keuluwanen te menge vetan-en te ked-isip-isip ke hengkey is hustu.
Pinaaǥi te kebpemineg kayi, ne egkeumanan pa is ketau te menge uluwanen wey egkegiyahan is duen din menge netuenan,
su wey zan mesavut is ibpesavut te menge erubasa, menge sempità, wey menge peentukà te menge metau.
Is kedtahud te Nengazen iyan ebpuunan te hustu he ketau, piru is tulebung he etew kenè din egkesuatan is hustu he ketau, ne kenè din daan egkesuatan he metulid is mezaat he vetasan din.
Mama, pemineǥa nu is sambag ku ne kenè nu iniyuǥi is penurù te ǥinikanan nu.
Is penurù dey ebpekeveǥey kenikew te meupiya he vetasan iring te kuruna he menge vulak etawa velieg he ebpekeveǥey kenikew te mekempet he kedezagwey wey zengeg.
Mama, kenè ka peuwit te menge mekesesalà.
Emun ke sikandan te, “Duma ka kenami su ed-ayan kiw, ne edhimetayan tew is edsaǥad minsan pa te wazà mekesalà.
Is edsanggar ziyà te kenitew ne kenè tew en edsemaan te ǥehinawa.
Su emun egkepatey tew sikandan egkaangken tew is mahal he menge azen dan su wey mepenù is menge valey tew te menge azen he tinakew.
Duma ka kenami ne emun egketiǥayun kiw en, ne ebehinen tew is tinakew tew.”
Mama, kenè ka zuma te menge etew he iring dutun, kekenà, likayi nu sikandan.
Su utew sikandan meǥaan he ebaal te mezaat wey ebunù te etew.
Wazà pulus te penuǥes te tagbis emun netuenan en dutun te menge tagbis he edtuǥesen nu sikandan.
Ne iring kayi is tulebung he menge etew: ne iring dà te iyan dan edhimatey te lawa zan etawa iring dà te iyan dan ed-eyanan is keugelingen dan.
Iyan heini egkehitavù te menge etew he mid-angken te ketiǥeyunan pinaaǥi te mezaat he paaǥi. Haazà is paaǥi, iyan kes dalan pehendiyà te kemetayen.
Is ketau, iring te sevaha he etew he edwali te mezaǥing diyà te menge zalan, menge pelasa, menge mirkadu, wey ziyà te menge pultahan te menge inged. Ke sikandin te,
<range>
“Sikiyu is menge wazè din hanew, taman te taman en be he iring kew keniyan? Sikiyu is menge mesudì, taman te taman en be is kegkelipey niw te kedsudì? Sikiyu is menge tulebung, taman te taman en be he kenè kew egkesuat he mebmetau?
Mebpezumazuma kew te kedawey ku keniyu. Guntaan, egkeǥiyen ku keniyu is egkeisip ku; ibpetuenan ku keniyu is egkeǥiyen ku keniyu.
Tenged te kenè kew ebpezumazuma te ked-umew ku wey kenà a keniyu edseǥipaan,
ne tenged te mibey-anan niw is menge sambag ku wey kenè kew egkesuat he ebpepenurù,
bà ku zà sikiyu ed-engiti emun ebpekebmereǥen kew; bà ku zà sikiyu ed-un-undaha zutun te kemereǥenan wey mekahandekhandek he egkeulaula niw he iring te eribpures.
<range>
Ne ed-umawen a keniyu, iyan, kenà ad edtavak; ebpen-ahaan a keniyu, iyan, kenà a keniyu egketuredu.
Su geina te kenè kew egkesuat he ebpenuruen wey wazè niw kedtahud te Nengazen.
Wazè niw seǥipaa is menge sambag ku wey wazè niw itetenged is kedawey ku keniyu,
ne egkeraǥun niw is mezaat he menge beǥas te vaal niw, wey is menge mezaat he pelanu niw.
Su is kewewalì te etew he wazè din hustu he ketau iyan ibpatey zin, ne is kebpeeyehey te tulebung iyan ebpekezezaat kandin.
Iyan, is ebpemineg kedì, dezeyaan is kebpekesavuk din. Ne kenà sikandin egkehandek he egkekeizan.”
Mama, tentenuzi nu is menge penurù he idsuǥù ku kenikew ne kenè nu lipati.
Pemineǥa nu is menge penurù he ebpekeveǥey te ketau wey te meupiya he kedsavut.
Peniguduwi nu he mekaangken ka te kedsavut,
iring te kebpeniguduwi nu kebpen-ahaa te selapì etawa nekeeles he ketiǥeyunan.
Ne emun egkeveelan nu heini, egkesavut nu is kehuluǥan te kedtehuza te Nengazen, wey egkesavut nu is ketau mehitenged kandin.
Su is Nengazen iyan ebeǥey te ketau. Ne iyan daan sikandin ebpuunan te keuluwanen wey kedsavut.
Egkelesaǥan din wey edteǥenahan din te kezeeǥan is menge metazeng is menge ulaula,
su wey sikandan is menge metazeng wey menge metinumanen, ne egkepengelangan din sikandan dutun te menge ebeelan dan.
Emun ebpemineg ka kedì, egketuenan nu ke hengkey is meupiya he ed-ul-ulahan: is hustu, metazeng, wey mezait he menge ulaula.
Ne egkehimu ka he uluwanen, ne ebpekeveǥey heini kenikew te kelipey.
Egkehimu he kutè nu is hustu he kedsavut nu,
ne iyan ebpekepelikey kenikew te mezaat he ebeelan wey te menge etew he egkaǥi te sayep.
Heini he menge etew mid-awà diyà te metazeng he kebpengungubpaan, ne iyan mid-ikul zan is menge ulaula pehendiyà te merusirem.
Igkelipey zan is kebaal te mezaat, ne igkelangan dan is kelelalung he ebeelan dan.
Mezaat is ulaula zan; ne midsuwey zan puun te hustu he zalan.
Pinaaǥi te ketau, ebpekelikey ka wey ka kenà metintal emun edtintalen ka te vahi he edsalàsalà pinaaǥi te menge lalag he ebpeketintal.
Haazà he vahi nekidsuwey te esawa zin hein betan-en pa sikandin; wazè din en isipa is meupiya he menge penangdù din diyà te Megbevayà.
Benar iyan, emun edhendiyè ka te valey zin ne iring te iyan nu ebeyaan is kemetayen nu. Ne is ked-ikul nu te zalan pehendiyà te valey zin, ne iring te iyan nu ed-ikulen is dalan pehendiyà te iveyaan.
Wazà ebpekehendiyà te kandin he ebpekelikù. Is ebpekehendiyà te kandin, ne kenè en ebpekeikul te zalan pehendiyà te ubpeey te menge uuyag.
Umbe, iringi nu is kebpengungubpaan te etew he metazeng; ikula nu is metazeng he menge ulaula zan.
Su iyan ebpekeubpà kayi te tanè tew is menge metazeng; ne iyan kenà egkaawà kayi is wazà duen igkesewayi.
Iyan, sikan is ebpemen-ulaula te mezaat wey meluiven ne id-awà. Iring sikandan te sagbet he ebezuten.
Mama, kenè nu lipati is menge penurù ku kenikew; tipiǥi nu ziyà te gehinawa nu is menge suǥù ku,
su pinaaǥi kayi edluǥeyazan ka te untung wey ebmeuswaǥen ka.
Kenè nu ewaa ziyà te kenikew is kebpekid-uunungen wey is kegkemetinumanen; ke và dà belieg ne ipurung nu ivevelieg, ne ke và dà litra ne isurat nu ziyà te ǥehinawa nu.
Emun ed-ul-ulahan nu heini, egkezeliǥan ka ne ebpekepenunuat ka te Megbevayà wey menge etew, ne meupiya is kedtengtengi zan kenikew.
Purung ka sarig te Nengazen ne kenè nu iyan seriǥi is kenikew he keugelingen he ketau.
Minsan hengkey is ed-ul-ulahan nu ne isipa nu is Nengazen, ne iyan sikandin metau wey nu iyan meikul is metandang he zalan.
Kenè nu isipa he utew ke en uluwanen, kekenà, tehuza nu is Nengazen, ne kenè nu ul-ulaha is mezaat.
Iring heini te tambar he ibmeupiya te lawa nu.
Beǥayi nu te zengeg is Nengazen pinaaǥi te kedhelaza nu te ketiǥeyunan nu wey te egkehuna he veǥas te langun he menge pinemula nu.
Ne emun ed-ul-ulahan nu heini, ne egkepeuluwan is budiga nu, ne edrepey te inumen is menge teleǥuey nu.
Mama, kenè nu isipa he mezaat is kebmansu te Nengazen wey kenè nu ikeepes is kedawey zin.
Su ebmensuwen te Nengazen is menge mibpelanggè din iring te ebeelan te sevaha he amey ziyà te anak din he pelanggè din.
Utew zeyzey is etew he zuen din ketau wey kedsavut.
Su zekelè pa is pulus kayi kenà is selapì wey vulawan,
ne mahal pa heini kenà is menge elahas, ne wazà minsan hengkey he egkesuatan nu he ebpekerepeng kayi.
Is ketau ne ebpekepeluǥayad te untung nu wey ebpekeveǥey zaan te ketiǥeyunan nu wey zengeg.
Ebpekeuǥup heini te kebpengungubpaan nu wey te meupiya he kebpekesavuk nu.
Utew zeyzey is etew he edtulung ebpepenurù su wey mebmetau; is ketau ebpekelipey kandin wey ebpekepeluǥayad te untung din.
Pinaaǥi te ketau wey keuluwanen, midlimbag te Nengazen is tanà wey langit, ne nemenlepew is menge serebseb ne nehimu is uzan pinaaǥi te ǥapun.
<range>
Mama, tipiǥi nu is ketau wey keuluwanen nu. Ne kenè nu heini mehimuwa he maawà diyà te kenikew,
su ebpekeveǥey heini kenikew te meluǥayad wey mekempet he ked-ubpà.
Ebpengungubpaan ka he wazà ebpekekaid kenikew ne kenè ka egkemenu.
Emun edhizeǥè ka ne kenè ka egkahandek wey meupiya zaan is kedlipezeng nu.
Umbe, kenè ka ereg he egkehandek emun egketik-ew egkehitavù is mekahandekhandek he hitavù, etawa edezeetan is menge lalung,
su ebpekesarig ka he iyan ebantey kenikew is Nengazen, wey ka kenà mekeizi.
Tevangi nu is kinahanglan he edtevangan sumalà is egkehimu nu.
Ne emun duen ebpekitavang ne kenè nu en kèkeeselema pa is kedtevangi nu kandin emun duen en igketavang nu kandin.
Kenè ka mebpelanu te ebpekezezaat te sengeeetew he uvayè nu he midsarig kenikew.
Kenè nu tebeka is sengeeetew emun wazà mezaat he neveelan din diyà te kenikew.
Kenè ka mesina te etew he mesipala ne kenè nu zaan iringi is menge ulaula zin.
Su egkeepesan te Nengazen is etew he mesinupaken, iyan, ebpekid-emiǥu mulà sikandin te etew he metazeng.
Edrewakan te Nengazen is pemilya te etew he mezaat is menge vaal zin, iyan, edtuvazan din mulà is pemilya te etew he metazeng.
Edsudien din is menge mesudì, ne edtuvazan din is kenà mepelevawen.
Is menge uluwanen, ne egkezeliǥan, piru is menge tulebung ne egkepeel-elezan.
Menge anak, purungi niw pemineǥa is menge penurù te amey niw, su wey zuen niw metueni.
Meupiya is penurù ku keniyu umbe kenè niw iselikwey.
Siak, hein batè e pa, is budtung he anak te ginikanan ku, pinelanggà a te iney ku.
Mibpenurù a te amey ku. Migkeǥiyan e zin te, “Ipurung nu itaǥù diyà te isip nu is menge penurù ku. Layun nu tumana is menge suǥù ku su wey mebmeluǥayad is untung nu.
Peniguduwi nu he maangken nu is ketau wey kedsavut. Kenè nu lipati is menge lalag ku kenikew, ne kenè nu heini suwayi.
Kenè nu iselikwey is ketau, kekenà, mahala nu heini su iyan heini ebantey wey ed-elima kenikew.
Is ketau etawa is kedsavut iyan utew impurtanti he kinahanglan te etew, umbe penigudu ka wey nu maangken heini minsan maamin pa is langun he azen nu.
Mahala nu utew wey tipiǥi nu is ketau, ne pinaaǥi kayi egkevantug ka.
Iring heini te kuruna he menge vulak he ebpekeveǥey kenikew te kekempet wey zengeg.”
Mama, pemineǥa nu wey tumana nu is menge egkeǥiyen ku su wey ka luǥeyazi te untung.
Mibpenurù ku en sikew ke ebmenmenuwen is kebpengungubpaan he egkezumahan te ketau wey kebpurungpurung.
Emun edtumanen nu heini, wazà egkehimu he velavag te kebpengungubpaan nu, wey wazà mezaat he egkehitavù kenikew.
Pekezeseni nu te egawed is penurù ku; kenè nu ituǥut he maawà diyà te kenikew, pekeventayi nu su iyan heini untung nu.
Kenè nu iringi is menge vaal te menge lalung.
Likayi nu heini ne pedeyuna nu is metazeng he kebpengungubpaan.
Su kenè dan ebpekelipezeng emun kenè dan pa ebpekevaal te mezaat etawa ebpekependelahig te zuma.
Is mezaat he menge ulaula wey is kebpesipala, impeiring dan te keenen wey inumen.
Is kebpengungubpaan te menge etew he metazeng ne igkepetug-iring te aney en he kedsilà te andew ke egkepawà he ebmerayag taman te meudtu.
Ne is kebpengungubpaan mulà te menge etew he mezaat is menge ulaula zan, igkepetug-iring te utew merusirem, ne kenè dan egketuenan ke hengkey is hinungdan te kegkezeeti kandan.
Mama, purungi nu pemineǥa is menge penurù ku kenikew.
Tentenuzi nu heini, ne tipiǥi nu heini ziyà te ǥehinawa nu.
Su ebpekeveǥey heini te meupiya he kedlelawa wey meluǥayad he untung te edawat kayi.
Purungi nu pekeventayi is diyà te isip nu, su ke hengkey is ed-is-isipen nu, iyan daan egkeveelan nu.
Iselikwey nu is mezaat wey is mahawag he kegkaǥi.
Tengteng ka ziyà te egkehunaan wey ziyà te menge meupiya he menge vutang.
Ikula nu is hustu he zalan su para wazà mezaat he egkeulaula kenikew.
Pengungubpaan ka he metazeng; likayi nu is kebaal te mezaat.
Mama, purungi nu pemineǥa is menge lalag ku he egkezumahan te ketau,
su wey nu ikepaahà is hustu wey kedlalag he egkezumahan te ketau.
Is lalag te vahi he mengungumpadi meemis pa te teneb, ne is kegkaǥi zin ebpekevihag iring te idhamham he lana te ulibu.
Piru ziyà te egkehuziyanan is igketaǥak din diyà te kenikew iyan is keseengan wey kemereǥenan.
Emun eduma ka kandin ne edumahan ke zin diyà te lugar te menge minatey; is dalan he ed-ikulen din ne ebpekepehendiyà te kemetayen.
Wazè din seǥipaa is dalan pehendiyà te untung. Bulegkù is dalan he ed-ikulen din, ne wazè din heini metueni.
Umbe, menge anak, pemineǥa a keniyu wey pezumdumahi.
Likayi niw is bahi he mengungumpadi, minsan is ked-uvey zà diyà te ǥemawan te valey zin ne kenè niw ul-ulaha.
Su emun ebeelan niw heini, egkaawà is dengeg niw ne egkaangken heini te zuma, ne edhimetayan kew te menge etew he wazà kegkehizu.
Ne is langun he ketiǥeyunan niw wey is duma pa he hineǥuan niw egkuwaan te menge lumelengyawà.
Ne ebpekezag-es kew emun edserupatey kew en, ne egkeǥuǥus en utew is lawa niw.
Ne ebpekekaǥi kew te, “Geina iyan te igkeepes ku zà is kebmensuwa kedì; geina iyan te midsupak ku is indawey kedì.
Wazè ku pemineǥa is ebpemenurù kedì.
Umbe, iyan nepengkusan ku is hapit a egkepeel-elezi ziyà te etuvangan te nevurun he menge etew.”
Iring te ed-inum ka te wahig he ebpuun te sekezuwè nu, iyan nu zà daan hileveti is esawa nu.
Kenè nu ituǥut he egkehimu ka he iring te serebseb he minsan hentei zà he vahi is ebpekekuwa wey ebpekeinum duen.
Kinahanglan he para zà heini keniyu te teleesawa; ne kenè niw heini peǥezami te zuma.
Umbe, lipey ka pinaaǥi te esawa nu, ne verakat he tuvazi sikandin te Megbevayà.
Mekempet sikandin wey ebpekahalin te ǥehinawa su iring is kekempet din te nati he selazeng, umbe zeyzey ke mewili ka kandin wey layun nu egkeisip is kebmahal zin.
Mama, kenè nu iyan isipa is bahi he mengungumpadi. Kenè nu iyan egkesuati is esawa te sengememaama.
Su egkaahà te Nengazen is langun he menge vaal nu. Ne minsan hendei ka ebpevayà ne egkeehè ke zin.
Is mezaat he menge ulaula te lalung he etew iring te litag he ebpekehiket kandin.
Ebpatey sikandin tenged te kebpezumdumahi zin te mezaat he suat te lawa zin. Is ketutulebungi zin iyan ed-uwit kandin pehendiyà te penlevengà.
Mama, emun nenangdù ka he iyan ka ebayad te utang te sengeeetew wey mibpesarig ka he iyan ka ebpenavak te televaken te zuma,
ne egkezeetan ka zutun te penangdù nu,
ne zuen nu en televaken diyà te zuma. Piru iyan heini ul-ulaha nu su wey ka melibri zutun te penangdù nu ziyà te kandin: Hendiyè ka te kandin ne hangyù ka he tevangi ke zin he mekelingkawas ka zutun te televaken nu.
Kenè ka lipezeng wey himeley taman te ebpekelingkawas ka.
Libriya nu is keugelingen nu iring te selazeng etawa tagbis he nekaawà he nelitaǥan te mengenganup.
Sikiyu is menge peǥulen, ahaa niw wey istudyuwi niw ke mibmenumenu te menge lemetik is kedlaǥud te igkeuyag dan, para mehimu kew he uluwanen.
Minsan wazè dan egalen etawa pengulu he ebmandar kandan,
iyan, edtiǥum sikandan te egkekaan dan timpu te ǥulavung wey tiraǥun su para zuen dan mekaan emun tipenguzan.
Sikiyu is menge peǥulen, edtulung kew zè be edliplipezeng? Keenu kew en be ed-enew?
Hidhizeǥè kew, liplipezeng kew, pahareyharey kew,
ne egketik-ew egkehitavù diyà te keniyu is kewewezai he iring te kebpekeuma te neǥumeenan he tulisan.
Is menge etew he wazè dan pulus wey is mezaat is menge ulaula zan, ne iyan dà idsuǥuksuǥuk dan is ebpemenudtul te tarù.
Ebpemengendat sikandan wey ebpeuy-uyawà pinaaǥi te menge velad wey paa zan para te kedlimbung te zuma.
Tenged te kebmesinupaken dan, layun dan ebpelanu te kebaal te mezaat, wey iyan sikandan ebpemuunà te samuk.
Umbe, egketik-ew egkehitavù diyà te kandan is kezeetan; segugunè dan ebpekehendiyà te kezeetan ne wazè en paaǥi wey zan melibri.
Duen pitu he kelasi te etew he egkeepesan wey edumutan te Nengazen:
is menge gelbuwen, is menge teruen, is menge memumunù,
is menge ebpelanu te mezaat, is menge elistu te kebaal te mezaat,
is menge ebpemenistiǥus te tarù, is menge edretem te menge kesamuk diyà te zuma zan.
Mama, sunuza nu is menge suǥù wey ibpenurù te ginikanan nu kenikew.
Ipemula nu heini ziyà te ǥehinawa nu su wey kenè nu heini melipati.
Emun edhipanew ka ne iyan heini egkehimu he ǥiya nu, ne emun edlipezeng ka ne iyan heini egkehimu he vantey nu, ne emun egkepukew ke en ne iyan heini edsambag kenikew.
Su heini is menge suǥù dan wey menge penurù iring te sulù he ed-anlag diyà te kenikew. Ne is menge kedawey zan kenikew, ebpeketandang te vetasan nu, ebpekeuǥup wey ebpekepeluǥayad te untung nu.
Ne pinaaǥi kayi ebpekelikey ka te vahi he mengungumpadi wey kenè ka egkeuwit te mekevivihag he menge lalag din.
Kenè ka petintal tenged te kekempet din. Kenè ka peuwit te mekevivihag he menge mata zin.
Su is kebpekidhilavet te vahi he ebelegyà te zengeg din, utew ebpekepepubri zutun te edhilavet, piru kedhilavet te esawa te zuma, ne ebeyazan nu te untung.
Is etew he edsepipi te hapuy, egketutung is bisti zin;
is edhipanew ziyà te vaǥa, egketutung is paa zin.
Ne iring din ded daan is maama he egkevut te vahi he zuen din en esawa su kenà ebpeseyluwen, kekenà, edsilutan sikandin.
Kenà edsudien te menge etew is tekawen emun iyan ibpenakew zin te keenen su ǥeina te egkeumes en sikandin.
Iyan, emun egkezekepan sikandin, ne ibpevayad sikandin te kepipitu edtekepa is bali zutun te midtakew zin, minsan pa ke pinaaǥi kayi egkeamin is langun he azen din.
Is etew he edhilavet te zuen din esawa ne kenà metau he ed-isip te hustu. Iyan dà sikandin ed-uney edezaat te lawa zin.
Ebpesekitan sikandin ne egkepeel-elezan taman te taman.
Ne is ebpengelikud he teǥiesawa zutun te vahi he edhilevetan, ne utew egkererengiti, ne wazè din en kegkehizu emun ebelesan din is midsalàsalà diyà te kandin.
Kenè din en edewaten is ibayad diyà te kandin ne kenè en sikandin egkepeypeyuan minsan sengemenu pa kezekelà is ibpayùpayù kandin.
Mama, layun nu tumana is menge lalag ku ne kenè nu lipati is menge suǥù ku.
Tumana nu is menge suǥù ku ne edluǥeyazan ka te untung. Ne pekeventayi nu is menge penurù ku iring te ked-urami nu te mata nu.
Ipemula nu heini ziyà te isip nu wey nu kenà melipati.
Is ketau, isipa nu he iring te etevey nu, ne is kedsavut, isipa nu he iring te utew nu emiǥu.
Tenged kayi egkelikayan nu is bahi he edsalàsalà te esawa zin, wey te mekevivihag he menge lalag dan.
Diyà te valey ku zuen timpu he midsulew a,
ne neehè ku is menge vetan-en he menge maama he wazè dan pa utew pereg, ne nesusi ku he is sevaha kandan egketalengtaleng.
Midhipanew sikandin pehendiyà te suyuk he zutun kes ed-ubpaan te sevaha he vahi he mengungumpadi.
Mahapun en dutun ne malù en ebmerusirem.
Ne midsinuǥung sikandin te vahi he mibivisti te iring te visti te vahi he ebelegyà te zengeg din, ne zuen din mezaat he pelanu.
Berèbaan heini he vahi ne wazè din keelezan. Ne layun en sikandin wazà diyà te valey zin.
Ed-ayan sikandin diyà te menge kelesada, etawa ziyà te kada suyuk, wey ziyà te menge pelasa.
Migkepkepan din sikan is maama, ne midhezekan din. Ne wazè en sikandin menawànawà is egkaǥi te,
“Midtuman ku ǥeina is penangdù ku ziyà te Nengazen he ebpemuhat a, umbe zuen usa ziyà te valey.
Umbe, mibpen-ehè ku sikew, ne meupiya su neehè ku sikew.
Daan ku en he mibpurungi te edempas is hizeǥaan ku te dikulur he manggad he linu he ebpuun diyà te Ehipto.
Mibpehemutan ku en te menge pehemut he mira, aloe, wey sinamun.
Ne hendiyè ki en, su ebpehulizà ki; ebpemulpulusan ta is kebpeked-eriǥè ta taman te egkepawà,
su is esawa ku ne wazà diyà te valey. Meziyù is midhipenawan din.
Dekelà is selapì he mid-uwit din ne edlavey pa is dezuwa he simana ne human sikandin ebpekeulì.”
Pinaaǥi te keungangen te menge lalag din neuwit din haazà is maama.
Segugunà sikandin miduma zutun te vahi, ne iring sikandin te tudu he vaka he eduma te edtuyuk kandin pehendiyà te lugar he zutun edlepaa, wey iring te selazeng he ebpetandang en diyà te litag
he zutun edhimetayi pinaaǥi te panà. Iring daan sikandin te sevaha he tagbis he edhendiyè en te litag, wazè din metueni he kemetayen en bes is egkepengkusan din.
Umbe, ǥuntaan menge anak, purungi niw pemineǥa is egkeǥiyen ku.
Likayi niw is bahi he iring dutun, ne kenè kew peuwit kandin.
Mahabet en he menge maama is nengezeetan tenged kandin.
Emun ebpehendiyè kew te valey zin, ne henduen be te mid-ikul niw is dalan pehendiyà te kemetayen.
Is ketau wey is meupiya he kedsavut iring te etew he edwali.
Edhithitindeg sikandin diyà te metikang he menge lugar ziyà te kilid te zalan, diyà te menge suyuk,
wey ziyà te menge ǥemawan te inged, wey ziyà te menge veyeey. Ne ebpengumew sikandin te,
“Sikiyu is langun he menge etew, edlelaǥan ku sikiyu.
Sikiyu is menge wazè din utew hanew, penigudu kew wey kew mebmetau. Sikiyu is menge tulebung, gemita niw is kedsavut niw.
Pemineg kew su zekelà is pulus wey hustu heini is egkeǥiyen ku.
Egkaǥi a te tutuu, su egkeepesan ku is kegkaǥi te mezaat.
Tutuu is langun he egkeǥiyen ku; wazà tarù wey limbung he menge lalag ku.
Is etew he zuen din kedsavut, ne utew zin egkekeleduwi is langun he menge lalag ku, ne wazà igkesawey zin duen.
Ne isipa niw he lavew pa he mahal is penurù ku kenà te pelata, ne isipa niw zaan he lavew pa he mahal is ketau kenà te pinilì he vulawan.
Su is ketau mahal pa kenà is mahalen he menge vatu, ne wazà minsan hengkey he egkesuatan te etew he ebpekerepeng kayi.
Siak, is ketau, metau he ed-isip-isip ke hendei is hustu etawa kenà, wey netuenan ku ke ebmenmenuwen te ed-angken is ketau wey kedsavut.
